svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-prithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâ-
raka Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Traiḷôkyamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam
uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ saluttum ire | tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi
samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ | lattalû.... Yadu-vaṃśa-lalâmaṃ | bhuvanaika-
Râmaṃ | vidvishṭa-Nârâyaṇaṃ | vidagdha-Chârâyaṇaṃ | pratyaksha-Vikramâdityaṃ | dha.... prati-
paksha-bhîkaraṃ | dharmma-ratnâkaraṃ | para-nârî-putraṃ | śatru-nirkshatraṃ | maṇḍalaṃ gâvaṃ |
Koḷḷipâkeya gôvaṃ | Peñjer̤u gô .. nirbbara-gaṇḍaṃ | daṇḍim munn ir̤ivaṃ | sauryyamaṃ mer̤evaṃ |
Chôḷa-Lâḷa-sâmanta-kañja-vana-kuñjaraṃ | saraṇâgata-vajra-pañjaraṃ | dakshiṇa-diśâ-kavâṭaṃ | ripu-
bhûpâḷa-kâḷakûṭaṃ | raṇa-raṅga-nîr̤aṃ | drôha-sâmanta-bandikâr̤am | mâvana śiṅgaṃ | vikramôttuṅgaṃ
Raṭṭara Mêru nâmâdi-samasta-prasasti-saḥitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ | Siṅgaṇa-Dêvar Uch-
chaṅgi-mûvattumaṃ | Sûḷuṅgal-erppattumaṃ | Maṇḍaḷi-sâyiramumaṃ | nâlkuṃ bhatta-grâmeyumaṃ |
nidhi-nidhâna-nikshêpa-śahaśra-daṇḍaṃ-modalâgi dushṭa-nigraḥa-visishṭa-pratipâḷanadiṃ râjyaṃ
geyyuttuṃ | Saka-varisha 981 neya Vikâri-saṃvatsarada Pushya-suddha 8 mî-Bṛihavârad andu |
svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-mônânushṭhâna-japa-samâdhi-sampannar appa |
śrîmat-Sântarâsi-Paṇḍitara śishyar appa Dharmmarâsi-Baṭṭârakara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ
mâḍi | Kâkambâḷa Jagadêkamalla-Śrîvarmma-Gâvuṇḍana sannidhânadoḷ śrî-Bhôgêśvara-dêvargge
biṭṭa bel̤dale Gôpiya-dêguladiṃ mûḍaṇa-deśeyalu mattar eraḍu | int î-dharmmamaṃ rakshisidavar
Arghyatîrthaṃ Prayâge Vâraṇâsi Kurukshêtraṃ Gayey emba-î-tîrtha-sthânaṅgaḷoḷ ubhaya-mukhi
tulâpurusham emba mahâ-dânaṃ geyda puṇyamantar î-dharmmaman aḷidavar î-puṇya-tîrthaṅgaḷoḷ |
kapileyumaṃ | brâhmaṇarumaṃ | tapôdhanaruman aḷida mahâ-pâtakar ǁ (usual final verse) svasti
śrî-Siriyamma-Gâvuṇḍaṃ Bhôgêśvara-dêvargge tôṇtada Ada-Gâvuṇḍa suṅkamam biṭṭam | śrî-vaḍḍa-
râvuḷada pannâyada perggaḍe Lâlimayyaṃ tamma deseya suṅkamaṃ biṭṭaṃ | perjjuṅkada Nambi-
yaṇṇaṃ tamma deseya suṅkamaṃ biṭṭan | int î-mûr̤u-suṅkaṃ parihâraṃ ǁ

lg.l: nîḍ irade guru-parôkshade | mâḍisidaṃ Gaṅgarâsi bâpp amaḷa-yaśô- |
śvara-bhaktan ende pogaḷguṃ | nirantaraṃ dharaṇi Gaṅgarâsi-vratiyaṃ ǁ

div.head:
79
At Kôgunḍi (same hobli), on a stone near the Îśvara temple.

lg.l: lakshmîṃ pushṇâtu vô Vishṇôr vârâham adhikônnataṃ |
rêśan avaṅge putran avaniṃ pesar-vettudu Sôma-vaṃśav ant |
bbîśa-kulaṃ tad-anvayadoḷ âdan akhaṇḍita-dôr-bbaḷaṃ Saḷaṃ ǁ
â-samayadoḷ eḷtarpaṭṭ- | âsurada-byâghranaṃ munîndraṃ kaṇḍaṃ ǁ
baḷa-yuta kêḷ int î-puli | suḷisuḷidar̤e kâḍutarppud idan añjade poy |
seḷeyind ene munipâjñâ- | baḷadiṃ Saḷa-nṛipati poydu Poysaḷan âdaṃ ǁ
avanind ittaṇa tat-kula- | d avanîśargg âytu Hoysaḷâkhyaṃ matt ant |
avarge puliy-uṇḍigeyuv â- | di(ra)vijârchchitey enipa Śaśapurâmbikey-olaviṃ ǁ
tad-amaḷa-kuladoḷu dhareyaṃ | paduḷav enalu tanna bhûri-bhujadoḷu taḷedaṃ |
â-vibhuviṅg Er̤eyaṅga-mahî- | varan udayisidan â-nṛipaṅg Êchalegaṃ |
* So in the original. prathamôktare nâ Vishnuḥ | prithvî-patiy embud uḷḷa kâraṇadindaṃ |
mathita-ripu Vishṇu-janapaṃ | prithi[vî]-patiy âgi negaḷdan î-mûvaroḷaṃ ǁ
â-Vishṇu-nṛipana kîrtti- | śrî-vanitâdhipana sûnu negaḷdaṃ sakaḷôr- |
vvîvaran â-(gi) Narasiṃhan U- | mâvara-pada-padma-gandha-lubdha-bhramaraṃ ǁ
vîtana taneyaṃ negaḷdaṃ | nûtana-Manuv enisi Vîra-Ballâḷa-nṛipaṃ ǁ

kayvaḷiya jaya-śrîyuṃ | meyvaḷiya śrîyuv
* So in the original. iruveralu Ballâḷaṃ |
sayvaḷiya naḍadu lôgara | bây vâyoḷu barppa-kîrtti-vanitege kûrppaṃ ǁ

div.p:
ant enisida samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-prithvi-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ Dvârâ-
vatî-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ Yâdava-kuḷâmbara-dyumaṇi sarvvajña-chûḍâmaṇi(ta) | malerâja-râja malapa-
roḷu gaṇḍa | gaṇḍa-bhêruṇḍa | kadana-prachaṇḍan | aśahâya-śûran êkâṅga-vîra | Śanivâra-siddhi | giri-
durgga-malla chalad-aṅka-Râma | niśśaṅka-pratâpa-chakravartti Hoysaṇa-śrî-Vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvaru |
dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷanadiṃ prithvî-râjyaṃ geyvuttaṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadindam ire |
tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi | śrîman-mahâ-vaḍḍa-vyavahâri | râja-śrêshṭhi | Kâśyapa-gôtrâmbuja-dyumaṇi
Kamme-kuḷa-tiḷaka Kammaṭada śrî-Malliyôgapa Noṇambavâḍi-nâḍa | Sivapurav âda mahâgrahâra
Kôguṇḍiya hiriya-ker̤eya îśânyadalli | tamma tandeya hesaralu śrî-Bâchêśvara-dêvara pratishṭheyaṃ
mâḍi dêvâlayavan ettisiy | â-dêvara nitya-naimittika-pûjegav â-dêvara pûja(ra)ka-parichârakara | grâsa-
kaṃ | Saka-varshada
* So in the original ; but 1035 = Vijaya, Srîmukha = 1135. 1035 neya Srîmukha-samvatsarada Pushya-śu 11 Budhavârada (v)uttarâyaṇa-
saṅkramaṇad andu | śrî-Vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvargge binnahaṃ mâḍi pâda-pûjeyaṃ tettu | Kôguṇḍiya
innûrvvar-mmahâjanakke | śrî-Vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvariṃ hêḷisi (stops here)

div.head:
80
At the same village, on a stone in the enclosure of the Basava temple.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya.. Śâlivâhana-śakha-varusha sâ 1528 neya | Parâbhava-saṃvatsarada | Mârgga-
śira-śu 5 Sô lu śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara râjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa ratna-simhâ-
sanârûḍhar âda śrî-Vêṅkaṭapati- mahârâyara kâryyakke karttar âda | śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâryya |
Kâmagettiya Chikkaṇa-Nâyaka-ayyanavara kâryyakke karttar âda | Biḷichôḍa-sîmeya pârupatyagâr̤aru
Sîreya Malli-Seṭṭiyaru Biḷichôḍu-sîmeya kelasigaḷige biṭṭa grâma-dere | sarvamânya-kelasake allade ..
.. karadavara bâyalli ........ avara chippe .. nîra kuḍasida hâṅge

div.head:
81
At Chitaldroog, on a rock west of the fresh water pond.
div.p:
svasti vijayâbhyudaya ...... 1357 nê Râkshasa-saṃvatsarada Paushya-śu 4 Budhavâra ...... śvara
śrî-Vîra-Vijaya-Râyaravaru Ruku-śâkheya Viśvâmitra-gôtrada .. hari .. maṭhada kaṭige salvudu
sîmeya mâna-kra ................

div.head:
82
At Hulêgundi (Chitaldroog hobli), on a stone behind the Siddêśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ prithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja paramêsvara parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ
Satyâsraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara râjyam uttarôttarâbhi-
pravriddhi-varddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târam-baraṃ saluttum ire | svasti samasta-bhuvana-stutam
appa mahâ-mahimôdayôllâsita-Pallavânvaya śrî-prithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêsvara vîra-
Mâhêsvaraṃ vidagdha-vilâsinî-vilôchana-chakôra-chandraṃ pratyaksha-Dêvêndraṃ vikrânta-kaṇṭhî-
ravaṃ maṇḍaḷika-Bhairavaṃ saraṇâgata-vajra-pañjaraṃ Châḷukya-dik-kuñjaraṃ vandi-brinda-santar-
ppaṇaṃ vijaya-lakshmî-mukha-darppaṇaṃ râya-kumara-chamatkâraṃ sâhasâḷaṅkâraṃ kîrtti-vallarî-
vaḷayita-triḷôkaṃ satyâvaḷôkaṃ râja-vidyâṅganâ-bhujaṅgan aṇṇa-nissîmaṃ śrîmat-Trailôkyamalla-
Noḷamba-Pallava-Permmâḍi-Jayasiṅga-Dêvara divya-śrî-pâda-padmôpajîviy appa | svasti samasta-
dushṭârâti-manneya-madândha-gandha-gaja-siṅghaṃ sâhasôttuṅgaṃ raṇa-raṅga-râkshasaṃ Visaḷa-
madêbhâṅkusaṃ chapaḷa-manneya-gondaḷa-Chaturmmukhaṃ machcharipa-vairi-ghaṭâ-bhumbhukam
okkettu gaṇḍaṃ kadana-prachaṇḍaṃ kâyvara Bhîmaṃ chalad-aṅka-Râmaṃ pageyaṃ beṅkoḷvaṃ kaliya
mârkkoḷvaṃ ba . daser̤e mallaṃ bhîtaraṃ kollan e . rttig îvaṃ mar̤evare kâvan(re kâvaṃ) ahita-jana-
kadaḷî-vana-kuñjaraṃ su-bhaṭa-lalâṭa-paṭṭa vairi-gharaṭṭaṃ tappe tappuvaṃ vîradind oppuvaṃ para-
maṇḍaḷa-sûr̤ekâr̤a vairi-baṅgâr̤aṃ ari-baḷa-kari-chhurakaṃ vîrâgragaṇya hata-vitata-kôlâhaḷaṃ kavi-
gamaka-vâdi-vâgmi-saṃvaraṇaṃ durita-saṃharaṇa-Dharmmâvatâraṃ chatus-samayâdhâraṃ Sômê-
svara-dêva-pâda-paṅkaja-bhramaraṃ nâmâdi-samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-sâmantaṃ Ker̤e-
yûra Maṅgiy-Êchayyaṃ Sûḷgall-el̤pattuman âḷuttum il̤du svasti Saka-varisha 995 neya Pramâdîcha-
saṃvatsarada Paushya-bahuḷa-ashṭamî-Sômavârad and uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrânti-tithiyoḷ svasti yama-
niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-mônânushṭhâṇa-japa-samâdhi-sampannar appa srîmat-Ker̤eyûra
Jñânasiva-dêva-môni-munipara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi Sûḷgal-tîrthada Bhîmêśvara-
Hiḍuṃbêśvarav-âdiy-âg alliy uḷḷa dêvargg ella kôṭeyiṃ paśchima-diśâvaradoḷ biṭṭa keyi mattar ar̤uvattu
śrîman-mahâ-sâmantam Maṅgayyana-Gâvuṇḍaṃ Bimma-Gâvuṇḍaṃ Ker̤eyûra tanna ker̤eya ker̤e-
goḍaṅgeyalu Bhîmêsvara-dêvargge biṭṭa gal̤de kammaṃ 100 ǁ intu bhûmi-dânaṃ mâḍidargge phala ǁ
int î-dharmmamaṃ pratipâḷisidavargge ǁ

lg.l:
tasya tat phal̤am âpnôti Siva-lôkê mahîyatê ǁ
* So in the original.

div.p: int î-dharmmaman aḷidaṃ mahâ-pâtakan akku

lg.l: na vishaṃ visham ity âhur dêva-svaṃ visham uchyatê |
visham êkâkinaṃ hanti dêva-svaṃ putra-pautrakaṃ ǁ

div.p: (usual final verse)
î-siḷâ-lêkhamaṃ baredaṃ srîman-mahâ-śâmantaṃ Maṅgiy-Êchayyana sandhi-vigrahi Bammayyaṃ ǁ

div.head:
84
At Kyâsâpura (Hirê-Guṇṭanûru hobli), on a copper plate in possession of śânabhôga Râmaṇṇa.
div.p: (I a) śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ | namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti (śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varsha sâ 1574 Kali-varsha sâ 4753 madhyama-bîsige-sam-
vatsara 6 Nandana-samvatsara)
† The words in brackets are in Nâgarî characters. da Mâgha-śudha 5 Bhânuvâradallu śrîmatu râjâdhirâja râjêśrî Raṅga-
Râyar-aiyyanavara kâryyakke karttar âda Hagalu Kaggoleya mannya śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâryya
Kâmagetti Vôbaṇṇa-Nâyakar-aiyanavara komâra Me(dakeri-)
† The words in brackets are in Nâgarî characters. Nâyaka-aiyanavara komâra Kastûri-
Raṅgappa-Nâyakar-aiyanavara komâra yimmaḍi-Medakeri-Nâyakar-aiyanavaru Kshâtre-Bhaṭṭara
Baggûra-Bhaṭṭara Keñchayyanâ maga Puṭṭaṇṇa yîtana maga Timmappage manaḥ-prîtiy âgi koṭṭa agra-
hâra namma Chitrahaḷi-sîmê-voḷagaṇa Hîrê-Guṇṭunûra mâgaṇige saluvantha grâma Kaḍalegudu â-
Kaḍalegudige saluvantâ kâḍârambha-nîrârambha-biṭṭi-kâmaṭa-suṅka-saha sakala-suvarṇṇa-âdâya
yêka-svâmyavanu yêka-bhôgavanû śâsanâṅkitav â(I b)gi agrahâra-mâḍi koṭṭevu namma putra-pautra-
âbhivṛiddhiy âgi sûryya-chandrâdigaḷu uḷḷa pariyantradallu bhôjanava mâḍikoṇḍu dharmada korani
koṇḍu yihadu yendu koṭa tâmbra-sâsana Medekeri-Nâyakar-aiyyanavaru koṭṭa śâsana-patra maṅgaḷa
mahâ śrî

div.head: DÂVAṆAGERE TALUQ.

1
In Dâvaṇagere, on a stone in the western wall of a varandah of the Âñjanêya temple.
div.p: ôṃ namaḥ Śivâya ǁ namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

gadya ǁ svasti samasta-bhuvana-saṃstûyamâna-Mânabyasa-gôtrâṇâṃ Hâritî-putrâṇâṃ Kauśika-vara-
prasâda-labdha-svêtâtapatrâdi-râjya-chihnânâṃ sapta-mâtṛikâ-parirakshitânâṃ Kârttikêya-vara-
prasâda-labdha-mayüra-pichchha-kunta-dhvajânâṃ bhagavan-Nârâyaṇa-prasâdâsâdita-vara-varâha-
lâñchhana-kshaṇa-kshaṇa-vaśîkṛitârâti-râja-maṇḍalânâṃ samasta-bhuvanâśraya-sarbba-lôkâśraya-
Vishṇuvarddhana-Vijayâdityâdi-viśêsha-nâmnâṃ râja-ratnânâm udbhava-bhûmiḥ ǁ

lg.l: râjâsîj Jayasiṃha-Vallabha iti khyâtaś charitrair nnijair
yyô rêjê chiram âdi-râja-charitôtkaṇṭhâṃ prajânâṃ haran ǁ

yô Râshṭra-[pa]llava
1 Read Râshṭrakûṭa. -kulam Indra iti prasiddhaṃ

dvaya-parimitam
1 Read ṛitviksâch. ṛitsyach chakârâśvamêdhê ǁ

div.p: tat-tanayaḥ |

lg.l:
gravasita-sita-kîrttiḥ Kîrttivarmmâ nṛipô’
2 Read ‘bhût. bhûvaḥ ǁ

div.p: tadanu tasyânujaḥ ǁ

lg.l: 4 Read ullaṅghyâbdhiṃ vyadhita. ullaṅghyâṭiṃ tryadicha pṛitanâ Rêvatî-dvîpa-lôpaṃ |

5 Read râja-. râjyaṃ strîṇâṃ haṭha-patir
6 Read abhûdyaś. brâtaiś cha Kâḷachchurîṇâṃ

babhrê bhûmiṃ saha sa sakalair
7 Read maṅgalair. mama Maṅgalîśaḥ ǁ
8 Read jyêshṭha-. jyêśṭa-bhrâtus sati suta-varê’py arbbhakatvâd a-śaktêr
yyasminn âtmany akṛita hi dhuraṃ Maṅgalîśaḥ pṛithibyâḥ |
tasmin pratyârpipad a[tha] maḥîṃ yûni Satyâśrayê’sau
Châḷukyânâṃ ka iva hi pathô dharmmyataḥ prachyavêta(ḥ) ǁ
Mṛiḍam arishṭa-dharaṃ manasôdvahan Tiḍamariḥ kshitipô’jani tat-sutaḥ ǁ
tatô’pi Yuddhamallâkhyô yuddhê Yama-samô nṛipaḥ ǁ
11 Read taj-janyô. taj-jatyaṃ Vijayâdityô vîrân êkâṅga-saṅgarê |
chaturṇâṃ maṇḍalânâm apy ajayad Vijayôpamaḥ ǁ
yêna Châḷukya-râjya-śrîr antarâyiṇy abhûd bhuvaḥ ǁ

tat-sûnuḥ Kîrttivarmmâbhû
12 Read d ut-. n ṛit-prâsârdita-durjanaḥ ǁ

Ai[yya]ṇâryyas tatô jajñê yad-vaṃśasya śriyaṃ
13 Read svakâm. sakâṃ |
p[r]ârpayann iva vaṃśaṃ svaṃ sa vabrê Kṛishṇa-nandanâṃ ǁ

abhavat tv a[na]yôs tanujô vibhava-
14 Read vibhâsî. bhavâsî virôdhi-vidhvaṃsî |

vibhava-vijita-
1 Read Śakram. yaśô Vikramâditya-nâmnaḥ ǁ
sahaja-baḷasya Harêr iva bâla-krîḍâbhavad yasya ǁ

div.p: ari-Râshṭrakûṭa-kula-sambaddhâv ubhau |

lg.l: aurjjityâch charaṇâv iva prachaḷitau sâkshât Kalêḥ krâmataḥ
lûnau yêna sukhêna Karkara-raṇa-staṃbhau raṇa-prâṅgaṇê ǁ

itthaṃ purâ
2 Read Diti-sutair iva. Ditinatir idaṃ bhûtadhâtrîṃ

.. mmaha-Raṭṭâd abha(t)vad bhûpâḷâd Râshṭrakûṭa-kula-
3 Read tilakât. tilakân |
Lakshmîr iva salilanidhêś śrî-Jâkabbâhvayâ kanyâ ǁ

Châḷukya-vaṃśâṃbara-bhânumâlî śrî-Taila-bhûpâla
4 Read upâyatainâṃ. tupâlayaty ênâṃ |
tayôś cha lôkâbhyudayâya yôgas sa chandrikâ-chandramasôr ivâsît(aḥ) ǁ
śrîmat-Satyâśrayaṃ Skandam Aṃbikâ Tryaṃbakâd iva ǁ
tasyânujaś śrî-Daśavarma-nâmâ tad-vallabhâ Bhâgyavatî cha dêvî |
5 Read tayôr abhûd. tayâvibhûd vikrama-śîḷa-śâlî .. Vikramâditya-[nṛipa]s tanûjaḥ ǁ

asau nija-jyêshṭha-pituḥ parôkshaṃ vabhâra vârâśi-
6 Read vṛitâṃ. dhrutâṃ dharitrîṃ |

bhujêna kêyûra-latâm ivôchchair vidhâritâ
7 Read yâri-. yâti-kadaṃbakêna ǁ

div.p: tadanu tasyânujaḥ |

lg.l:
yasyâkhiḷa-vyâpi yaśô’vadâtam akâṇḍa-
8 Read dugdhâmbudhi. ḍaprabuddhi-vṛiddhi-śaṅkâṃ |

karôti mugdhâmara-sundarîṇâm abhût
9 Read sa. pa bhûpô Jagadêkamallaḥ ǁ
tasyâtmajaḥ pâlayitâ dharâyâś śrîmân abhûd Âhavamalla-Dêvaḥ ǁ
11 Read dôḷan tâḷî-vanântâny. dôlatâ srî-vanam anusarati sarin-nâtha-kûlâni Chôḷaḥ |
Kanyâkubjâdhirâjô bhajati cha tarasâ kandarâs tâ Himâdrêr
uddâmâ yat-pratâpê śiśira-bhara-bhuvô hîti vibhrânta-chittâḥ ǁ

yaḥ prôchyatê
1 Read nanu. natu Chaḷukya-kula-pradîpaḥ ǁ
sâdhyaṃ grâhayituṃ diśâṃ pariva(n)nat sarbbân iva prâhiṇôt

div.p: tadanu tasyânujaḥ ǁ

lg.l: sparśâd uchchaiś śriyam avanibhṛitâṃ bhâsurâṇâṃ dadhânaḥ |

dhvânta-bhrântiṃ dadhad iva
4 Read dṛiśôr. ṭṭiśôr añjanaṃ vairi-vîra-
tîrê sindhôr bahumukha-bhayâd êtya vai bhîshaṇa-śrî-

dhâmnâ
5 Read rêmê. nêmê dhru ...... yaś cha Châḷukya-Râmaḥ ǁ
prasthânê .. mahîm atîtya vimalâ yat-kîrttir ra .. ratâ |
ity âkhyâtum ivârṇṇava-sthiti-jushaḥ Śaurês tri-lôkî-gurôḥ ǁ

div.p:
6 Read sa. śa tu śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja .... parama-bhaṭṭâraka Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷaka Châḷu-
kyâbharaṇa śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Vallabha-narêndra-dêva[ḥ] ǁ kuśalî kuśa ... n(y)êva [yathâ-
sambadhyamânakân] râshṭra-pati-vishaya-pati-grâma-kûṭakâyuktaka-niyuktakâdhikârika-mahatta-
râdîn samâdiśaty astu vaḥ | saṃ[viditaṃ yathâ]smâbhir [râjâvaḷi-samâpta] .... varshê ashṭâ-cha-
tvâriṃśê aṅkatôpi 48 pravarttamâna-kâlê Śôbhakṛitu-saṃvatsarê tad-antarggata-Kârttika-paurṇṇa-
mâsyâṃ .... vârê bahûni ma .. dânâni nirvartya tad-dakshiṇâ-kâlê Jayantîpura-samâvâsita-nija-
vijaya-saṃ.... rṇṇâdhishṭhâyaka-Draviḍâditya-daṇḍanâyakasya śrîmad-âryya-pâdânâṃ cha vijñâpya
śrîma[t-Tribhuvanama]lla-Pâṇḍya-nirmita-śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Pâṇḍyêśvara-dêva...... khaṇḍa-
sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhâra ............ purâṇa-śâstra-vêda-śâ ........ Śiva ... brâhmaṇa .... Kadamba-
daśa-sahasrântarggata-Beḷtûru-dvâdaśa-madhyê Beḷtûru-sîmântarggata-Châḷu (left side) kyasamud-
raṃ nâma taṭâkaṃ...Aygûru-Beḷvanûru-Beḷtûru-sîmântarggata-Mugguḍḍe-taṭâkaṃ cha itthaṃ taṭâka-
dvayaṃ sa-śulka-kara-bâdhâ-parihâraṃ samastâdâya-sahitaṃ râjakîyânâm an-aṅguḷi-prêkshaṇîyaṃ
nidhi-nidhâ[na]-nikshêpa-samêtaṃ sarva-namasyaṃ tri-bhôgâbhyantara-sidhyâ dêva-bhôgâya śrîmat-
Śai ... chârya-Vidyâsiva-paṇḍita-nâma-śrî-Râmaṇḍa-dêvasya pâda-prakshâḷanaṅ kṛitvâ tasya hastê
dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ dattaṃ tasya taṭâka-dvayasya sîmâ êvaṃ (34 lines following contain details of boun-
daries) itthaṃ tat-taṭâka-dvayasya chatus-sîmâ tad yushmâbhir âgâmibhir asmad-vaṃśa-jair anyaiś
cha bhûmipâlaiḥ pâlanîyaṃ ǁ tathâ chôktaṃ bhagavatâ Vêdabyâsêna ǁ

lg.l: yasya yasya yadâ bhûmis tasya tasya tadâ phalaṃ ǁ

div.p: apaharaṇê‘pi cha dôshas tênaivôktaḥ ǁ

lg.l: sva-dattâṃ para-dattâṃ vâ yô harêta vasundharâṃ |
suvarṇṇam êkaṃ gâm êkâṃ bhûmêr apy êkam aṅgulaṃ |
haran narakam âpnôti yâvad â-bhûta-saṃplavaḥ ǁ

div.p: Râmabhadrêṇâpy u....

lg.l: yê pâlayanti mama dharmmam imaṃ samastaṃ
têbhyô mayâ virachitô’ñjalir êsha mûrdhni ǁ

div.p: maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî

div.head:
2
In Dâvaṇagere, on a stone in the travellers’ bangalow bungalow

lg.l: śaṅkhaṃ chakram asiṃ gaḍâṃ cha nirataṃ bhṛitvâ chaturbhiḥ karair
ârûḍhô Garuḍaṃ navîna-jalada-śyâmô Harir̤ pâtu vaḥ ǁ

div.p: śrî-Viśhṇu Pâṇḍyanaṃ rakshisuge

lg.l: śrî-vallabhan adhika-jaya- | śrî-vallabha chakravartti Vikrama-bhûpaṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhjrâjaṃ parameśvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭâ-
rakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam utta-
rôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravardhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire ǁ tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ

lg.l: pariyiṭṭ î-bandan î-bandane .... daḷânîkadiṃ Pâṇḍyan end êṃ |
vîram âyt end ôḍi durgga-trayaman ar̤asi beḷkurttu . kolliyuṃ mê- |
.. red udyad-bhîtiyindaṃ pu .. ya mol adaṃ tâgadu...... ǁ
ḍalika-brâtaman âjiyoḷ bar̤a-siḍil poyd andadiṃ poyyal au- |
vaḷisutt irppudu Râya-Pâṇḍyana ga .. daṇḍaṃ bhujâ-daṇḍadoḷ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-sabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Kâñchî-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ Yadu-vaṃsâṃ-
bara-dyumaṇi su-bhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ parichhêdi-gaṇḍaṃ Râjiga-Chôḷa-ma-
nô-bhaṅgaṃś rîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-pâdâbja-bhṛiṅgaṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara Tribhuvana-
malla-Râya-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaru Noḷaṃbavâḍi-muvatt-irchchâsiramumaṃ Sântaḷige- .... maṃ dushṭa-ni-
graha-sishṭa-pratipâḷanadiṃ Beltur̤uvina nelevîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ .... m ire ǁ
tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ

........ yatanaṃ tanage .................. ratnâbharaṇaṃ sakala-dharmma-samuddharaṇaṃ ..
.... jana-vinôdaṃ kôdaṇḍa-Parasurâmaṃ chalad-aṅka-Râmaṃ Pâṇḍya-Dêva-pâdâbja-bhṛiṅgaṃ sâha-
sôttuṅgaṃ Tennâḍa-Tirukkaṇaṃ-gauḍa Kur̤uṅguḍiy-âḷva Parichchhêdi-Gaṇḍaṃ Pallava-Râyana paḍevîḍi-
noḷ tâṃ mâḍisida Râyarâja-Baṇṇaḷûr-âḷva śrî-Vâsudêvargge nitya-nivêdyâṅga-bhôgakkaṃ khaṇḍa-
r̤phuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhârakkam âhâra-dânakkav âgi Beltur̤u-panneraḍar̤oḷagaṇa Beḷva .. ra Târaṇavaḷḷiyu-
man Arasanaker̤eya keḷag ondu mattaru tôṇṭadali tri-bhôgâbhyantarav âgi śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-
varshada 48 neya Sôbhakṛitu-saṃvatsarada uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrântiyandu Râya-Pâṇḍya-Dêvara kayyalu
Paramêśvara-dattiy âgi chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ salvant âgi Parichchhêdi-Nâyakaṃ paḍedu dêvargge
koṭṭa î-sthânakke sthâna-patiy âgi śrî-Kṛishṇa-Bhaṭṭan âna Tirumale-naṃbige Parichchhêdi-Nâyakaṃ
koṭṭa ǁ (usual final phrases and verses) kavi-Mâdirâja baredaṃ Kaḍabâchâri kaṇḍarisidaṃ ǁ

div.head:
3
At Ânêkoṇḍa (Dâvaṇagere hobli), on a stone in Nârayya’s field.
div.p: ôṃ namas Śivâya

lg.l: śrî-vallabhan amaḷa-yaśaś- | śrî-vallabha chakravartti Vikrama-bhûpaṃ ǁ
bâḷ-veras eyde bâḷ verasu bâḷ-dalegoṇḍan adinnum ântaḍe |
taḷve nija-pratâpa-dahanaṃ kaḍut aḷve virôdhigaḷ chalaṅ- |

div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâ-
rakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam
uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire ǁ tat-pâda-padmôpa-
jîvi ǁ

lg.l: ddâyâdyaṃ mâḍidaṃ Vikrama-nṛipatige vikrântadiṃ Pâṇḍya-bhûpaṃ ǁ
Chôḷana darppamaṃ mur̤iyal Ândhranan aṇḍaleyal Kaḷiṅganaṃ |
Mâḷavanaṃ gelal negaḷda Gûrjjaranaṃ tuḷiyalke Pâṇḍya-bhû- |
pâḷane sâlkum eṃb initu nachchike Vikrama-chakravarttige ǁ
ḍaḷika-lalâman endu dhare kîrttisuguṃ sale Vîra-Pâṇḍyanaṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Kâñchî-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ Yadu-vaṃ-
śâṃbara-dyumaṇi su-bhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍa parichchhêdi-gaṇḍa Râjiga-Chôḷa-
manô .... śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-pâdâbja-bhṛiṅga śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Tribhuvana-
malla-Pâ .... varu Noṇaṃbavâḍi-mûvatt-irchchâsiramumaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-visishṭa-pratipâlanadiṃ
Beḷtur̤uvina nelevîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyu[ta]m ire ǁ

lg.l: nâḍeyum oḷpuvett-eśeva Beḷtur̤u lakshmige janma-bhûmi koṇ- |
â-grâmâdhipar akhiḷa-gu- | ṇâgraṇigaḷu dharmma-kâryyamaṃ ner̤e mâḍalk |
âgrahigaḷ prabhu-śakti-sa- | magra-prabhu-ratnam enipa mûvar prabhugaḷ ǁ

div.p:
sakaḷa-kaḷâ-vidar ene negaḷda Barmma-Gâvuṇḍanum urbbî-sannûta-kîrtti Saṅkara-Gâvuṇḍanum
Udeyam-arasan-embumanuṃ ǁ svasti samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ sakala-guṇa-saṃ[pa]nnar appa
Kannaḍa-nâlku-sâsirada Mummar̤i-daṇḍaṅgaḷige mukhyar appa Śaivara-Dêvi-Seṭṭiyaru ǁ

lg.l: dharmmada Mêru dharmmada tavar-mmane dharmmada janma-bhûmi sad- |
dharmma-sakhâyan endu dhare kîrttisugum [..] Śaivara-Dêvi-Seṭṭiyaṃ ǁ

div.p:
Châḷukya-Vikrama-varushada 46 neya Plava-saṃvatsarad-Âsvîja-bahuḷa-pañchamî-Âdivârad andu
śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Tribhuvanamalla-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaruṃ Berttur̤uvada mûvar-prabhu-gâvuṇḍu-
gaḷa kaiyalu Śaivara-Dêvi-Seṭṭiyaru â-mûvar-prabhugaḷige sthâna-pûjeyaṃ koṭṭu Dharmêśvara-
dêvara khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrnnôddhârakkaṃ nitya-naimittikakaṃ dêvara nandâdîvige-dhûpôpahârakaṃ
sthânâchâryya-grâsakaṃ dhârâ-pûrbbakav âgi mâḍi (here follow details of gift) int initumaṃ â-Śaivara-
Dêvi-Seṭṭiyaru śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Pâṇḍêśvara-dêvara sthânâchâryya Brahmaśiva-Dêvara Malli-
kârjjuna-gurugaḷa Rudraśakti-Dêvara int ivara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrbbakaṃ mâḍi â-prabhugaḷu
sahita koṭṭaru

div.head:
4
At the same village, on a stone near the Maraḍi Basava temple.
div.p:
(3 lines illegible) svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara para-
ma-bhaṭṭâraka Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷaka Châḷukyâbharaṇa śrîmatu Bhûlôkamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam
uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire | tat-pâda-padmô-
pajîvi | svasti samadhigata(ṃ)-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara Kâñchî-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ
Yadu-vaṃsâmbara-dyumaṇi su-bhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍa parichchhêdi-gaṇḍa
Râjiga-Chôḷa-manô-bhaṅga śrîmatu Bhûlôkamalla-Dêva-pâdârâdhaka śrîmatu Vîra-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaṃ
Noṇambavâḍi-mûvatt-irchchhâsiramumaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-ś(r)ishṭa-pratipâḷanadiṃ Uchchaṅgiya
kôṭeya nelevîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅ[ka]thâ-vînôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyuttam ire śrîmatu Jagatêśvara-dêvar-aṅga-
bhôga.. pûjâ-nivêdyakaṃ tapôdhanar-âhâra-dânakaṃ | khaṇḍa-r̤phuṭita-jirṇṇôddhârakkav endu
Arasanaker̤eyaṃ dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi-koṭṭa â-Arasanker̤eya haḷe...... sîmâ-sammandham ent
endaḍe (here follow details of boundaries) Jagatêśvara-dêvarige koṭṭa datti ǁ svasti yama-niyama-
svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-mônânushṭhâṇa-japa-samâdhi-sîḷa-guṇa-sampanṇar appa śrîmatu Lôkâ-
bharaṇa-paṇḍitargge Dundubhi-saṃvatsarada Puśya-mâsada êkâdasî-Sômavârad andu vyatîpâta-
uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrâ-...... dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭa Dêmarasa Vîra-Pâṇḍya-Dêvara stiraṃ.. tu..
mattha-Râyarasaru Jagatêśvara-dêvarge Niḍu ............ mattal eraḍu ǁ svasti śrîmatu mahâ-
maṇḍaḷêsvara .... pâdârâdhakar âda .. ltur̤uvina biḍina samasta-jagatigaḷu ........... ta-vajra-
pañjararuṃ mar̤e-oge-kâvaruṃ ............ geya.. yaru dînânâsti-janaṅgaḷige tavar-manegaḷuṃ
chalake balu-dalegalum enisida Alinâgabôva | Siṅgabôva | (others named) ivar-modalâda-samasta-
kottaḷigaḷu Lôkâbharaṇa-paṇḍitara kâlaṃ karchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭaru | Jagatêśvara-
dêvara pûjâ-nivêdyakke koṭṭaru | (here follow details of gift) â-ker̤eya keḷage pûrvva dêva-dâna hor̤at
âgi (stops here).

div.head:
5
At the same village, on a stone in the suṇṇada-gummi.
div.p: ôṃ namaś Śivâya | namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ
râjâvaḷi ǁ

ântu kîrttiyaṃ Chêdi-Râja-tanûjaṃ ǁ jaya.. maṃ jagatîshvarâgraṇi phaḷaṃ jita-na........ tat-tanu-
jâtan atuḷa-yaśaṃ bhûpati Râya .. -Pâṇḍya ...... baḷaṃ.. -sampâdana-sâditâdhika .............
vachana ǁ .. ya-Pâṇḍya-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvarana paṭṭa-mâhâdêvi enisida...Sôvala-Dêvi..........

lg.l: ssutar âgal vîra-mantritvamuman avaniyoḷ tâne.. tâḷdi nindaḷ ǁ

div.p: va.. ǁ antu pogaḷtegaṃ negaḷtegaṃ neleyâda Sôvala-Dê[vi]yara.... bhava... ḷ-agra-bhavan enisi ǁ

lg.l: ṇa viḷâśâ.. gâtreyaṃ nija-bhujâ-daṇḍaṃ jaya-śrîyan on- |

div.p: tad-anujâtaṃ ǁ

lg.l: ttaravina Vîra-Pâṇḍya-mahipaṅg eṇey âvano bhûtadhâtriyoḷ ǁ
avar-irbbarggaṃ kir̤iyan | Divijêndra jaḷadhiy enutaṃ negaḷdaṃ[....] |

div.p:
...... ǁ svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Kâñchiya-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ
Yadu-vaṃśâmbara-dyumaṇi su-bhaṭa-chûḍamaṇi Mahêndra-maṇi-makuṭa-kôṭi-vighaṭita-nija-vijaya-
kara-kaṅkaṇaṃ lîlâ-mâtrâsâdita-sapta-Koṅkaṇaṃ Kanaka-naga-silâ-sthâpita-pâṭhîna-lâñchhana-
jaya-stambhaṃ dûrîkṛitârâti-vîrâvashṭambhaṃ Tâmbraparṇṇî-nirṇṇikta-mauktikâyuktânêka-ratna-
kara-mudrâ-mudrita-bhâṇḍâgâraṃ Maḷaya-giri-kandara-chandana-Nandana-madhya-dêśa-nivêśita-
śṛiṅgârâgâraṃ kiṅkarîkṛita-bhûta-bêtâḷa-maṇḍaḷaṃ | svîkṛitânêka-ripu-nṛipati-maṇḍaḷaṃ | hêḷâ-
gṛihîtânêka-jaḷa-saiḷa-durggaṃ | vandîkṛitârâti-vîra-maṇḍaḷika-varggaṃ | śrî-Saṅkara-Nârâyaṇa-dêva-
charaṇa-smaraṇa-pariṇatântaḥkaraṇaṃ | Yâdavâbharaṇaṃ | Pâṇḍya-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ |
parichchhêdi-gaṇḍaṃ | Râjiga-Chôḷa-manô-bhaṅgaṃ | sâhasôttuṅgan-ity-akhiḷa-nâmâvaḷî-virâjitan
appa | śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaru | Noḷambavâḍi-mûvatt-irchchhâsiramu-
mav Uchchaṅgiya nelevîḍinoḷu dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâlanavaṃ mâḍi sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ
râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire | tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ Sôvala-Dêviyara pratishṭeya...... jîrṇṇôddhârakkam
.... ya-pâtra-pâvuḷakkaṃ ...... Pârttiva-saṃvatsarad uttarâyaṇa ........ pratipat-Sômavârad
andu Belluhaḷḷiya............ ent endaḍe (rest contains details of gift and usual final verse)

div.head:
6
At the same village, on a stone in Saṇṇa-Basayya’s field south of the village.
div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Kâñchî-pura-varâdhiśvaraṃ Yadu-vaṃ-
śâṃbara-dyumaṇi su-bhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇi Mahêndra-maṇi-makuṭa-kôṭi-vighaṭita-nija-vijaya-kara-kaṅka-
ṇaṃ lîlâ-mâtrâsâdita-sapta-Koṅkaṇaṃ Kanaka-naga-śiḷâ-taḷa-sthâpita-pâṭhîna-lâñchhana-jaya-stam-
bhaṃ dûrîkṛitârâti-vîrâvashṭaṃbhaṃ Tâṃbraparṇṇî-nirṇṇikta-mauktikâyuktânêka-ratnâkarâ-mudrâ-
mudrita-samudra-bhâṇḍâgâraṃ Maḷaya-giri-kandara-chandana-Nandana-madhya-dêśa-nivêśita-śṛingâ-
râgâraṃ kiṅkarîkṛita-bhûta-vêtâḷa-maṇḍaḷaṃ svîkṛitânêka-ripu-nṛipati-maṇḍaḷaṃ hêḷâ-gṛihîtâ-
hitânêka-jaḷa-śaiḷa-durggaṃ vandîkṛitârâti-vîra-maṇḍaḷika-varggaṃ śrî-Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇa-dêva-
charaṇa-smaraṇa-pariṇatântaḥkaraṇaṃ Yâdavâbharaṇaṃ Pâṇḍya-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ parich-
chhêdi-gaṇḍaṃ Râjiga-Chôḷa-manô-bhaṅgaṃ sâhasôttuṅgan ity-akhiḷa-nâmâvaḷî-samâḷaṅkṛitar appa
śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-Dêvar śrîman-Noṇaṃbavâḍi-mûvatt-irchchhâsira-
maṃ śrîmad-râjadhâniy-Uchchaṅgiya nelevîḍinoḷ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam
ire tat-kâladoḷ svasti śrîmat-Saka-varshada 1091 neya Virôdhi-samvatsarada dvitîya-Śrâvaṇa-śuddha-
puṇṇamî-Sômavârad andu śrîmad-râjadhâni-Hiriya-Bêtûra haḷeya-bîḍinalli Moneyadhareyaru Kîḷvog-
oḍeyarasa-Dêvara râjyadalli pratishṭhe-mâḍid Avimuktêśvara-dêvar-aṅga-bhôga-raṅga-bhôgakkey
â-kâladalliy arasara kayyalu kâruṇyaṃ baḍedu biṭṭa sarvva-namasyada gaddey Arasanaker̤eya modala-
tuṃbina keḷage mattar ondu kaṃba nâl nûr̤-ayvattu mattav adar̤a samîpada mâvin-âraveya tôṭa
kaṃbav innûr̤u pûrvvada hû-dôṇṭada beddale mattar ondu kaṃba nûr̤u â-beddaleya samîpadalli
koḷaṃ kaṃba nûr̤ inisuv eḍeyal apahṛitav âgi dharmmaṃ keṭṭ-iral anisuvaṃ pûrvvâparadiṃ vichârisiy
â-bhûmiy-anisuvaṃ śrîmad-Avimuktêśvara-dêvara aṅga-bhôga-raṅga-bhôgakkaṃ nitya-naimittika-
dêvatâ-pûje-naivêdyakkaṃ khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhârakkaṃ sarvva-namasyav âgi punar-ddhârey
âgi koṭṭaru ǁ (usual final verses) Kôbûra Tille-Nâyakara magam Śivakalyâṇa-nambi haḍada vṛitti |

div.head:
8
At Bêtûru (same hobli), on a stone near the Kallêśvara temple, north of the village.

lg.l: kômaḷa-sarasijar enipa ma- | hâ-mahimar chChaṭṭa-Râjanuṃ Kûch-arasan ǁ
avar-irvvarggaṃ piriyaḷ | bhuvana-stute Maiḷu-bâyge Dâyyaṅg ant ud- |
bhavisida-Sênana vîrava | havaṇipaḍe Sahasra-jihveyuḷḷaṃ nereyan ǁ
suridavü hûvina maḷegaḷ | sura-dundubhi moḷage magu[si] Sênanan ant â- |
sura-kannyeyar olid oydaru | sura-lôkada sukhaman eydidaṃ paramârtthaṃ ǁ

div.head:
9
At the same place, on a second vîrakal.
div.p:
svasti samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ Bhâcharasa bhîma-Kṛidânta-râja Krôdhi-saṃ-
vatsa[ra]-Jêshṭha-su .... Maṅgaḷavâradali Kundugoḷada paḍuvasiyali kâdi hiriday-âḷu kudureya kondu
biddanu

div.head:
10
At the same place, on a third vîrakal.
div.p:
svasti śrî Saka 1111 Krôdhana-saṃvatsara-Jêshṭha-su 10 Maṅga[ḷa] śrîmanu mahâ-pradhânaṃ
Hamigan Tuganûrinali pâr̤i tamma Mandugoḷadiṃ paḍuvaṇa-ker̤eya .......... lôttaraṅga ......
...... ḷayana vâruva bidu svarga-sthan âda maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî

div.head:
11
On a stone to the south of the same temple.
div.p: śrî-mûla-sthânada dêvara tôṭada taḷâr̤aṃ Sûliya Bammaya-Nâyaka biṭṭaru

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-prithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭâ-
rakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Traiḷôkyamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam
uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrâkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire tan-nandanaṃ
svasti sarvva-lôkâśrayaṃ samasta-budha-janâśrayaṃ Âhavamallan-aṅkakâr̤aṃ para-maṇḍaḷa-sûr̤e-
kâr̤aṃ kaṭaka-prâkâraṃ vandi-janâdhâraṃ vairi-mada-marddanaṃ pratâpa-Janârddanan a-chaḷita-
vâkyaṃ Châḷukya-mâṇikyaṃ vijaya-śrî-kêḷi-sadanan abhinava-Madana vipaksha-kuḷa-Kâḷa-daṇḍaṃ
vîra-mârttaṇḍaṃ ripu-râya-kumâra-hṛidaya-śella sâhasa-malla dînânâtha-chintâmaṇi maṇḍaḷika-ma-
kuṭa-chûḍâmaṇi Veṅgi-maṇḍaḷêśvaran udâra-Mahêśvaran ayyana daṇḍe śrî-Vishṇuvarddhana-mahâ-
râja-Vijayâditya-Dêvar Noḷaṃbavâḍi-mûvatt-irchchhâsiramumaṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ
geyyuttam ire avara besadiṃ śrîman-mahâ-sandhi-vigrahi daṇḍanâyakaṃ perggaḍe-Dêvapayya-
pramukha-karaṇaṅgaḷu sâsirada manneyaṃ Nâgâtiyarasaruṃ panneraḍar̤a manneyaṃ Mûkarasanum
alliya prabhugaḷ Mâcha-Gâvuṇḍanuṃ Mâḷa-Gâvuṇḍanuṃ Udayâdityayya-Nâyakanum irddu ǁ Saka-
varsha 988 neya Parâbhava-saṃvatsarada Bhâdrapadad-amâvâsyê-Maṅgaḷavâra-sûryya-grahaṇad
andu hanneraḍar̤a modala bâḍa Beḷtur̤uvada śrî-mûla-sthânada Mahâdêvar-aṅga-bhôgakkaṃ khaṇḍa-
sphuṭitakkaṃ sarvva-namasyam âgi Sântirâsi-Dêvargge dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi-biṭṭa-bhûmi (11 lines
contain details of gift and usual final pharses and verses)

śrî-nûla-sthâna-dêvarige bhôgavaṃ mâḍuva har̤ekâr̤a Bhôgôjaṅge mûvaru .. târarum idu dêva-guttike
tekoṇḍu biṭa bhûmi (here follow details of gift)

div.head:
12
At the same village, on a stone in the sarpada dibba.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-prithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ
Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarôtta-
râbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire ǁ tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi sama-
dhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmantâdhipati mahâ-prachaṇḍa-daṇḍanâyaka bêḍida-vara-dâyaka
su-jana-prasanna nuḍidu-matt-enna gôtra-pavitra parâṅganâ-putra .... ya-Rêvanta vairi-Kritânta
sâhasôttuṅgan ayyana siṅgaṃ nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahita śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ Bâṇasa-
verggeḍe-daṇḍanâyakan Anantapâḷayyaṅgaḷa besadiṃ samasta-râjya-bhara-nirûpita-mahâmâtya-pada-
vî-virâjamâna mânônnata prabhu-mantrôtsâha-śakti-traya-sampannaṃ nuḍidu-matt-enna gôtra-pavitra
parâṅganâ-putran ayyana siṅga nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîmad-achchu-pannâyad-adhishṭâ-
yaka śrîmatu Bammarasaru Noḷaṃbavâḍi-mûvatt-irchchhâsirada pannâyamaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-
visishṭa-pratipâḷanadiṃ sukhadin âḷuttam ire ǁ

lg.l: râgade tanna pannayada suṅkadoḷaṃ daśa-pannav ittan int |
dharaṇaṃ tiṅgaḷge paryyâyadoḷe salisuvan ant âgiral mâḍidam Ba- |
mmarasaṃ pannâyadoḷ dharmmaman ina-śaśiy-üḷḷannam utsâhadindaṃ ǁ

div.p:
Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâlada 33 neya Sarvvadhâri-saṃvatsarada Pushya-śuddha-pañchamî-Brihavârad-
and uttarâyaṇa-saṅkramaṇa-vyatîpâta-nimittam âgi Nîlakaṇṭha-Paṇḍitara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-
pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi śrî-Sarppêśvara-dêvar-aṅga-bhôga-pradipa-nivêdyakkam endu Bammarasaṃ tanna
pannâyada suṅkadoḷu tiṅgaḷiṅg aydu-paṇamaṃ Paramêśvara-dattiy âgi biṭṭu-koṭṭan int î-dharmmaman
âr orvvar pratipâlisidavargge Vâraṇâsi-Kurukshêtrârgghyatîrtthadoḷu sahasra-vêda-pâragar appa
brâhmaṇargge sahasra-kavileya kôḍuṃ koḷagumaṃ pañcha-ratnaṅgaliṃ kaṭṭisi-koṭṭa phalam akku
î-dharmmaman aḷidavar anibar-brâhmaṇaruman anitu-kavileyuman â-tîrtthaṅgaḷoḷ aḷida pâtakan
akku ǁ (usual final verse) svasti |

div.head:
13
At the same village, on a stone near the Siddhêśvara temple.
div.p: .... stu ǁ

...... nânâ-nûtna-ratna-pravaṇa-.......... samudrâ ...... g anûna-dâna-vibhava........ Jaṃbû
dvîpam â-samudradiṃ mudritam âgirppud alli ǁ

.......... yenipa-bhôgya-nuta-vastu ............ nîkânêka ...... dhâman eśeda sâra-saukhyâ-
râmaṃ ǁ .... antu santataṃ . modalâd-anêka-janapadak adhîśvaranum atuḷa-pratâpa-Laṅkêśvaranuṃ
Yâdavânvaya-viyat-taḷa-mârttâṇḍanuṃ naya-vi .... nânâ-dâna-guṇa-maṇi-karaṇḍanuṃ vijayâ......
vidhâyakanum appa .. Râmachandra-bhûpâḷan-anvaya........ Mâḷava.... Mâgadha-Vaṅga-Kaḷiṅga-
Chêra-Nêpâḷa Va...... pâḷara......... enitu jîvipud î .... Jayasiṃhaṃ ......

.......... pragûḍham enisirppa-varûthava dore .... balaṃ ........ diṃ ner̤eda....... dharitriyoḷ
martya-rûpa .. sahôdara Mahadêva .. yana pratâpam ent ene ǁ
va ǁ mattam â-Kandara-Râya-tanûbhava-śrî-Râma-Dêva-pratâpam ent ene ǁ

va ǁ mattaṃ tat-pâda-padmôpajîviy appa Kûchi-Râjana râja-guru śrîmaj-Jina-bhaṭṭâraka-dêvar-anvaya-
mahônnatiy ent ene ǁ
.. gragaṇyara mahônnatiy ent ene ǁ

lg.l: .... mada-vibhañjanan .. jva.... re bhâvipud î-dharitriyoḷ ǁ
pati-nuta Padmaśêna-yati-nâtha kṛitârthane nîne dhâtriyoḷ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ mattam â-munîśvara-pâdâravinda-dvandva-bhaktanum an-ûna...... dhîranuṃ nija-turaga-daḷa-
khara-khura-pragha ...... m anêka-biridâvaḷî-virâjamânanum appa śrî-Kûchi-Râjan-anvaya-mahônna-
tiy ent ene ǁ

lg.l: guṇadiṃ pôlvare pôlvar endu budha-bandhu-brâtam ânandadiṃ |

div.p: va ǁ mattam â-Kûchi-Râjana sarbbâṅga-lakshmiya mahônnatiy ent ene ǁ
va ǁ mattam â-Kûchi-Râja-tanûjana pratâpav ent ene ǁ

lg.l: sûrana sutaṅgam adhikaṃ | dhâriṇiyoḷ Kûchi-Râja-tanujaṃ dânô- |
dârateyiṃ Voṇa-Dêvaṃ | śûrateyiṃ Śûdrakaṅgam aggal̤am enipaṃ ǁ
saṅgara-raṅgadoḷ adaṭaṃ | siṅgada vikramaman irade tân êḷisuvaṃ |

div.p: va ǁ mattaṃ Pâṇḍya-dêśa-madhyâdhyâsitam âda Bêtûra chaluv ent ene ǁ

lg.l: karam eśeva-prâkâraṃ | pirid eśed udyânadinde Bêtûr eseguṃ ǁ

div.p: va ǁ mattam â-Bêtûra manneyara śeṭṭi-guttara gauḍugaḷa vûr-oḍeyara mahônnatiy ent ene ǁ

lg.l: koṇḍeyaraṃ durjjanaraṃ | gaṇḍigaraṃ tegadu tegadu sikshipar ant â- |
maṇḍaḷada śeṭṭi-guttar | mmaṇḍita-vikramigaḷ esevar avanî-taḷadoḷ ǁ
kshitiyoḷ Mâchi- tanüjaṃ tanûjaṃ | vitata-yaśaṃ Haripa-Gauḍan udadhi-gabhîraṃ |
Rati-pati-nibha Mâka-priya- | sutan esevaṃ Yôga-Gauḍan ûrjjita-têjaṃ ǁ
Sôma-sutaṃ gauḍa-kula- | byômâṅkaṃ sûran ante varttisut irppaṃ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ mattam â-Kûchi-Râjaṃ Bêtûru-prabhṛiti-grâvagaḷaṃ vaḷitam âgi paḍedu sukhadin irppuduṃ śrî-
Padmaśêna-bhaṭṭârakar-upadêśadiṃ nija-sarvvâṅga-lakshmi .... svarggâpavargga-saukhyaṃ kâraṇam
âgi Lakshmî-Jinâlayamaṃ mâḍisidan ad ent endoḍe ǁ

va ǁ mattam â-Kûchi-Râjaṃ Prajâpati-saṃvatsaradalli śrî-vîra-Mahadêva-Râyana praśasta-hastadalli
bâḍaman agrahâram âgi biḍuvalli Lakshmî-Jinâlayakke Huṇiseyahaḷḷiyanu hanneraḍu honniniṃ ni-
yata-śrôtram âgi puṇya-tithiyoḷ dhâreyaṃ paḍedu-bandu taj-Jinâlayada śrî-Pârśvanâtha-dêvargge
śâsana-pûrvvakaṃ śrî-Padmaśêna-bhaṭṭâraka-dêvara śrî-pâda-prakshâḷanavaṃ mâḍi gauḍugaḷu sa-
manvitam âgi koṭṭar av âvuv endoḍe ǁ

lg.l: aṅgaḍiyan aḍake-dônṭama- | n Aṅgaja-nibhar enipa-gauḍu-sahitaṃ Kûchaṃ |
Gaṅgana-mattaran eraḍa | .... gâṇama dhâreyan er̤edar ǁ

div.p: va ǁ mattam â-Huṇiseyahaḷḷi ........ mêgaṇa naṭṭa-kallu teṅkaṇa-dikkinalli ......

div.head:
15
At the same village, on a stone on the tank-bund, near the Uṇṇi-Basappa’s temple.
div.p:
(The upper part is broken) dyakke ........ sakti-jîyara kâlaṅ karchchi ........ vuḷada paṇa 1
vi 10 perjjuṅkada paṇa 2 vi 10 antu paṇa 4 (usual final phrases and verse)

uttarâyaṇa-saṅkramaṇad andu Tuṃbêśvarakkaṃ Duṇḍêśvarakkaṃ Kûḍalûra ûr-oḍeya Vachchapayya
tanna mânyadoḷage dêvara nivêdyakke ûriṃ baḍaga kaṭṭada kôḍiyalli ere matta 1 ûriṃ teṅka
Kuṃbâr̤ager̤eya kôḍiyalli kisu matta 1 antu matta 2 (usual final verse) ǁ maṅgaḷaṃ ǁ

div.head:
16
At Bûdihâḷu (same hobli), on a stone in the Ânjanêya temple.

lg.l: Harêr lîlâ-varâhasya daṃshṭrâ-daṇḍas sa pâtu vaḥ |
Hêmâdri-kalaśâ yatra dhâtrî chhatra-śriyaṃ dadhau ǁ

div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śakha-varshaṅgaḷu 1640 neya Viḷaṃbi-nâma-saṃvatsarada
Mâgha-śu 15 yalu Âśvalâyana-sûtrada Viśvâmitra-gôtrada | Beḷagâvi-Râmaṇṇâ[ya]karige pautrar âda
Sûrapa-Nâyakara putrar âda Râmaṇṇâyakarige | Vâlmîki-gôtrada śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâryya Kâma-
getti-Kastûri-Raṅgappa-Nâyakara pautrar âda .... Kêti-Nâyakara putrar âda Baramaṇṇa-Nâyakaru
barasi-koṭṭa grâma .... śâsanada kramav ent endare namma hiriyarugaḷige puṇya salubêk endu nâü
âḷuva Bêtûra śîmey-oḷagaṇa Chhikka-Bûdihâḷu yeṃba grâmavannu paurnnamî-puṇya-kâladallu sa-
hiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvakav âgi Kṛishṇârpaṇav âgi tri-vâchâ tri-karaṇa-pûrvakav âgi koṭṭu
yidhêve ǁ (rest contains details of gift & usual final verses)

div.head:
17
At Kâḍajji (same hobli), on a stone on the tank-bund.
div.p:
svasti Sakha-nṛipa-kâḷâtîta-saṃvatsara-sataṅgaḷ 809 neya Kîlaka-saṃvatsarada Mâgha-śuddha-chaṭṭî-
Sômavâraṃ pravarttiśe svasti śrî-Kannara-Dêva-râjyam uttarôttaraṃ salutt ire Maydam-arasara sûḷe
Kâḍachchi Kâḍachchiya magaḷ Kâḍabbe Kâḍabbê-magaḷ Âychabbe Âychabbê-magaḷ Kaḷiṅgabbe
Kaḷiṅgabbegaḷ-ayya Pallaharaki Parakiya magaḷ Kaḷiṅgabbe Kaḷiṅgabbeya magaṃ Parakayyan intu
pâraṃparyyâyam eḍevar̤iyadebanda-dharmma-santati Muddimayyaṅge Parakayyaṃ pannirvvara arasina
sâdhishṭitadoḷ kâlaṅ kal̤chchi koṭṭa-bhûmi âvud endoḍe modal-êr̤iyoḷ ir-khaṇḍuga vede gal̤de pannir-
mmattal er̤e aynûr̤u-baḷḷiya tôṇṭa Âlaker̤e ivan âvan orvva naḍeyisidan âtanade dharmma int appudan
aḷid-âtaṃ Vâraṇâsiyoḷam Kurukshêtradoḷaṃ Prayâgeyoḷaṃ sâsirvvaruṃ brâhmaṇaruṃ sâsirvva-
kavileyumaṃ liṅgavuman aḷida-pâtaka sarvva-bâdhâ-pariyâraṃ maṅgaḷa ǁ

lg.l: vishaṃ na visham ity âhur brahma-svaṃ visham uchyatê ǁ
visham êkâkinaṃ hanti brahma-svaṃ putra-pautrakaṃ ǁ

div.p: svasti śrî Tippayya baredaṃ maṅgaḷa śrî

div.head:
18
At the same village, on a stone in the Ânjanêya temple.
div.p: śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ ǁ śubham astu | namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

lg.l: Hariyindaṃ biṭṭu daivaṃ dharaṇi-taḷadoḷ ill endu pêḷvar kelaṃbar |
Haranindaṃ biṭṭu daivaṃ dharaṇi-taḷadoḷ ill endu pêḷvar kelaṃbar |
karam appaṃ dvandva-rûpaṃ taḷedu Hari-Haraṃ kûrttu rakshikke nammaṃ ǁ

div.p:
gadya ǁ svasti samasta-bhuvanâdhîśvaraṃ dêvâdhidêva-paramêśvaraṃ Śaiva-Vaishṇavâdi-bhêda-
vâda-vidhvaṃsanaṃ Mârkkaṇḍêya-vara-pradâna-kâraṇa Hari-Haraikyâvatâraṃ Guhâsura-mada-vidâ-
raṇaṃ Guhâsura-vakshô-nikshêpa-charaṇâravinda-yugaḷaṃ svargga-marttya-pâtâḷa-tri-bhuvana-pûjitaṃ
bhakta-janad abhîshṭa-siddhi-dâyakaṃ Guhâraṇyav eṃba-puṇyâraṇya-nivâsigaḷg abhaya-dânavaṃ
mâḷpa Tuṅgabhadrâ-pûrva-kûla-nivâsanav enisida Kûḍalûra-pura-varâdhîśvaran âda śrî-Hari-Hara-
dêvarige Vidyânagaradali siṃhâsana-sthan âda Sadâsiva-Râyara haḍapada Sindhugôvinda sitakara-
gaṇḍa [dha]vaḷaṅka-bhîma Maṇinâgapura-varâdhîśvara Baippa-Nâyakara makkaḷu Kṛishṇapa-Nâya-
karu Śaka-varuśa śâvirada 1482 Durmati-saṃcharada Mârgaśira-śuddha-Dvâ[da]śî-puṇya-kâladalu
tamma tande Baippa-Nâyakarigu tamma tâyi Koṇḍammagu avar-ibarigu puṇyav âgabêk endu Biḷichôḍa-
sîmey-oḷagaṇa Kâḍaji-yaṃba-grâmavanu | śrî-Hari-Hara-dêvara chatrada | avasarada naivêdyada
tuppake suṅka-taḷavâr̤ake-maṇiha-payîka saha sarvamânyav âgi samarpisi kṛitârthan âdanu ǁ yî-
dharmmavanu pratipâḷisidavarige ananta-aśvamêdha-yâgada phalav ahudu yî-darmmavanu aḷida-
pâpige Tuṅgabhadrâ-tîradali gô-brâhmara mâtṛi-pitṛigaḷa vadheya mâḍida pâtakakke hôharuv endu
barada śilâ-śâsana |
maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî

div.head:
19
At Âvaragere (same hobli), on a stone lying near the 159th mile-stone.
div.p:
svasti śrî pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja paramêsvaraṃ śrîmaj-Jayasiṅgha-Dêvana râjyada
Irmmaḍi-Nol̤ambaṃ Ballakunde 300 Kogaḷi 500 Kadaṃbaḷinge-sâsiravuman âḷuttav ire Bhrântikâḍu
30 Binnavuraṃ 12 Murchchanûru 12 antu 54 bâḍavumaṃ Chaḷiki-Ayyaharasaṃ nâḷ-gâvuṇḍu geyye
Saka-varsha 964 neya Chitrabhânu-saṃvatsarada Phâlguṇa-śuddha-pañchamî-Brihaspativârad andu
Indara-Gâvuṇḍana magaṃ Barmmi-Seṭṭige Binnavuraṃ 12 r̤-oḷagaṇa Kuḷuvanûruṃ niṭṭ-âraveyan ant
eraḍûvane khachâya ele kuḍuva nûrmmaḍi Ayyaharasaṃ Barmmi-Seṭṭige goṭṭa śâsanada polada sîme
mûḍalu kariya-khal-mor̤aḍiye ante bare vaṭa-vṛikshave âgnêyada Kadavada koḷaṃ ante bare Oḍilager̤ege
banda-bâge â-ker̤ey-oḷagaṇa ballêriye â-ker̤eya teṅkaṇa-kôḍiye alliṃ banda haḷḷaṃ ant â-Biḷiche-tor̤eye
ant â-eraḍuṃ paḷḷada modala mûḍaṇa-gêrî kalla biḷiya-haraḷe ant â-eraḍuṃ paḷḷada naḍuvaṇa-tevare
ante bare khaggoḷaṃ ante muggaḍḍeya pâsar̤e | baredaṃ Madhuvayyaṃ ǁ idan aḷidaṃ Kurukshêtra-
doḷ Bâṇarâsiyuṃ kavileyuvaṃ kondaṃ ǁ

div.head:
20
At Vaḍḍanahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone in Girimallappa’s field.
div.p:
...... gata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda Pallavânvaya śrî-prithvî-vallabhaṃ Pallava-kula-tiḷakan êka-vâkya
Kâñchî-pura-varêśvaraṃ śrîmat-Trailôkyamalla-Nanni-Noḷaṃba-Pallava-Permmânaḍi-Dêvaru Koṅ-
gaḷiy aynûr̤uṃ | Kadaṃbaḷige sâsiramuṃ | Ballakunda mûnûr̤uṃ | Kaṇiyakal mûnûr̤uṃ | Kuḍiyâraviy
el̤pattuṃ | Kariviḍi mûvattuṃ | nidhi-nidhâna-nikshêpaṃ sahaśra-daṇḍam oḷagâgi sukha-saṅkathâ-
vinôdadin âḷuttum ire | tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi | svasti samasta-dharâmara-charaṇa-smaraṇa-pariṇataṃ |
machcharipara gaṇḍaṃ vana-gaja-kêsari śrîmat-Nâgayya-Nâyakaṃ Beḷvanûruṃ Beltur̤uvada pannâ-
yada suṅkamuman âḷuttam il̤du | svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâṇa-
japa-samâdhi-saṃpannar appa śrîmat-Beḷvanûra | samasta-guṇa-saṃpanna | śauch Âñjanêyaṃ | satya-
Yudhisṭhiraṃ | ..... pâda-paṅkajam | ahita-nikshatra | ripu-sarppa-Garuḍaṃ | gôtra-pavitraṃ | śrîmat-
Beḷvanûra yûr-oḍeya Mâramayyaṃ | avara putra-mitra-kaḷatramuṃ | alliya mahâ-janamuṃ | nûr̤-
irppadiṃbarum il̤du | Sakha-varsha 966 neya Târaṇa-saṃvatsarada Paushya-śuddha-trayôdaśî-Âditya-
vâramuṃ (y)uttarâyaṇa-saṅkramaṇamuṃ vyatîpâtamuṃ kûḍi banda puṇya-tithiyandu Nâgayya-
Nâyakanuṃ | ür-oḍeya-Mâramayyanu | nûr̤-irppadiṃbarum il̤du Beḷvanûra mûla-sthânada Kalidêva-
svâmige hiriya-ker̤eya keḷage gadde ma 1 Telliga-ger̤eya keḷage gadde martta 1 ka 450 bel̤dale martta
1½ | 500 baḷḷiya tôṇṭamuṃ 11 erttu-gâṇamuṃ | 12 maneya svâmyamuṃ | 1 kay-gṇâamuṃ | avar̤oḷage
dêvargge snâna-nivêdya-sûrṇṇa-sêvegaṃ | gal̤de matta 1 | bel̤dale matta 4 | Brahmavêdi-jiyarggaṃ |
bhôgaṃ mârppa par̤ekâr̤arggaṃ | pâtrakkaṃ babinaṅgaṃ vâgi naḍeva gal̤de matta 1 ka 450 | bel̤dale
matta 12 | ant initumaṃ sarvva-bâdhâ-parihâram âgi biṭṭar | yivaṃ tappade pratipâḷisidavargge
sûryya-grahaṇadalli Vâraṇâsiyalu Prayâgeyaluṃ | sâsirvva-brâhmaṇargge sâsira-kavileya kôḍuṃ
koḷagumaṃ ponnalu-kaṭṭiy ubhaya-mukhi goṭṭa phaḷam akkuṃ | yidan âvan orvvan aḷida Bâṇarâsiyoḷe
sâsira-kavile[yu]maṃ sâsirvvar-brâhmaṇarumaṃ sâsira-liṅgavuman aḷida mahâ-pâtakan akkuṃ ǁ

(usual final verses) śrîman-Nâgayya-Nâyakana perggaḍekâri Sântayyan-anubhavaṇiyind âtan-anukûḷa-
teyiṃ dêguḷav âytu | baredaṃ dvija-pâda-paṅkaja-bhramara-Baladêvayyanuṃ Mûṅkiyayyana maga
Tippaṇṇa bareda maṅgaḷaṃ ǁ

div.head:
21
On a stone in the boundary of Âvarahaḷḷi, west of the same village.
div.p: Kôṇaṅgaya bhaktiyinda âyeda 3 kaṃ biṭṭam gajaṃ 52 tamadu gade maṅgaḷa

div.head:
22
At Harihar, on a stone to the south of the Hari-Harêśvara temple.
div.p: śrî-Hari-Harâya namaḥ | namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varsha 1477 neya Ânanda-saṃvatsarada Vaiśâkha-śu-14
Sômavâradallu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa-Sadâśiva-Dêva-mahârâyaru
Vidyânagariyallû sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ vajra-siṃhâsanârûḍhan âgi pṛithvî-râjyaṅ geyiutt irppa-
samayadalu svasti samasta-bhuvanâdhîśvara dêvâdhidêvaṃ dêva-paramêśvara Śaiva-Vaishṇava-bhêda-
vâda-vidhvaṃsana Mârkkaṇḍêya-vara-pradâna-kâraṇa Hari-Haraikyâvatâra Guhâsura-mada-vidâraṇa
Guhâsura-vakshô-nikshipta-charaṇâravinda-yugaḷa svargga-martya-pâtâḷa-tri-bhuvana-pûjita bhakta-
janad-abhîshṭârtha-siddhi-dâyaka Guhâraṇyav emba puṇyâraṇya-nivâsigaḷg anavarat-abhaya-dânamaṃ
mâḷpa Tuṅgabhadrâ-pûrvva-kûla-nivâsan enisida Kûḍalûra-pura-varâdhîśvaran âda śrî-Prasanna-Hari-
Hara-dêvarige â-Sadâśiva-Dêva-mahârâyara haḍapada Sindhu-Gôvinda sitagara-gaṇḍa dhavaḷâṅka-
bhîma Maṇinâgapura-varâdhîśvara Baiyappa-Nâyakara makaḷu Kṛishṇappa-Nâyakaru śrî-Narasiṃha-
jayantî-puṇya-kâladalu tamma tande Baiyappa-Nâyakarigû tamma tâyi Koṇḍamammanavarigû puṇyav
âgabêk endu Beḷuvaḍiya-grâmavanû śrî-Hari-Hara-dêvara madhyâhnad avasarada satrake samarppisi
êkântad avasarada atirasada naivêdyakke Hariharada.... ttaneya rokka .. samarppisi atirasavanû
svâmige naivêdyada samarppaṇege beḷḷiya harivâṇavanû samarppisi kṛitârthan âdanu î-dharmavanu
pratipâlisu-vanthâvarige anantâśvamêdha-yâgada phalav ahudu î-dharmavanû ujjîvisade aḷiden eṃba
pâpishṭage Gaṅgeyalu gô-brâhmaṇa-mâtâ-pitṛigaḷa vadheya mâḍi mâtṛi-gamana putra-mâṃsavanû
bhakshisida pâpav ahudu endu bareda-śilâkshara ǁ (usual final verses)

...... vâḍiya-grâmavanu śrî-Hari-Hara-dêvara dharma-chhatrakke ........ Kâmarasara makkalu
Dânappage maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî

div.head:
23
At the same place, on a 2nd stone.
div.p: śrî-Hari-Harâya namaḥ ǁ namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

lg.l: sô’yaṃ pâtu nirantaraṃ Hari-Haras trailôkya-rakshâ-maṇiḥ ǁ
bhramarîva dharâ sô’vyâl lîlâ-kôlâkṛitir Hariḥ ǁ
viśvaṃbharêti sânvarthâ bhûr bbhûyâd bhûtayê sadâ ǁ
sô’vyâch chandraḥ kaḷâ-sândras sâkshâl Lakshmî-sahôdaraḥ ǁ
Kalinâ kalitaḥ kâla ity âlôkya vidhôḥ kulê |
sa sûnur abhavat tasya râjâ Hariharâbhidhaḥ |
prâjyair âjyair ivâjasraṃ aśru-varshair vvivardhatê ǁ
dushṭa-śikshâ-karaś śrîmân Sênânîr Dhûrjjaṭêr iva ǁ
vyâḷî saiva tayâ tirôhita-tanau bhânau yadîyârayaḥ |
gachchhanty atra sa Dêva-Râya-nṛipatiḥ kshmâ-maṇḍalê râjatê ǁ
bhaṅgas sindhushu jâḍyam aṃbuni pada-chchhêdô’pi padyê’khiḷê
nânârthôddharaṇañ cha kâvya-nivahê martyêshu naitâny ahô ǁ
bhîtim nâpa phaṇâ-sahasra-bharaṇê yôgyêshu gâtrêshv asau |
vâñchhâṃ nâkṛita Bhôgi-râḍ api Śivaś chintâṃ jahau mûrdhni mê
chandrasyaika-kalêti bhâti sa nṛipaś śrî-Dêva-Râjâhvayaḥ ǁ

div.p:
gadya ǁ svasti samasta-bhû-maṇḍala-maṇḍana bhujâ-daṇḍa-parikalita-prachaṇḍa-vairi-shaṇḍa-khaṇ-
ḍana-paṇḍitôddaṇḍa-kôdaṇḍa | varttamâna-râja-paramêśvara | nirantara-pûjâ-paritôshita-Girijâdhîśvara |
pûrvva-paśchima-dakshiṇôttara-samudraika-nâyaka | pratyartthi-pârtthiva-sârthâpârtthîkaraṇa-nipuṇâ-
kshaya-sâyaka | bhâshâtilaṅghi-râjanya-bhujaṅga pratibhaṭa-bhaṭa-kôṭi-vighaṭana-kalushitâpâṅga
Hinduva-râya-suratrâṇa viśrâṇita-śaraṇâgata-kshôṇîpati-prâṇa | vishṭapânishṭa-vidhâyi-dushṭa-pâṭach-
chara-kôti-pâṭana-prakaṭita-pratâpa | vidaḷita-sakaḷa-janânutâpa | śrî-svayaṃbhu-Triyaṃbaka-chara-
ṇâravindârâdhaka śrîmad-râya-râja-guru-maṇḍalâchâryya âchâryya-varyya a-bhaṅga-Râütta-râya |
tapô-râjya-lakshmî-nija-nivâsa-kâya śrî-Kriyâśakti-guru-vara-charaṇa-paricharaṇa-prasâdâsâdita-
mahita-sârvvajña-sâmrâjya-vaibhava-samâja śrîmad-râjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa-
Dêva-Râja-mahârâjaḥ ǁ

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śaka-varusha 1332 neya Vikṛiti-saṃvachchharada Bhâdrapada-śuddha 12
Śômavâradalu śrîmad-râjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâ pa Dêva-Râya-mahârâyaru śrî-Hari-
Hara-dêvarigeü Harihara-kshêtra-vâsigaḷ aha mahâ-janaṅgaḷigeü mâḍikoṭṭa vyavahâra-nirṇṇaya mahâ-
janaṅgaḷu tamma tamma kaiyya dhanavanû yikki śrî-Hari-Hara-dêvara sîmeyoḷage Haridrey emba-
nadiyanû kaṭṭi dêvara bhûmiyoḷage Hariharakke kâluveya tandalli â-kâluve yelli-pariyanta naḍad-antu
â-naḍada kâluveya keḷage nîruvariy âdashṭu-bhûmiyoḷage śrî-Hari-Hara-dêvarige yeraḍu-bhâga-bhûmi
tamma kaiya-dhanavan ikki kaṭṭeya kaṭṭi kâluveya tanda mahâ-janaṅgaḷige vondu-bhâga-bhûmi yî-
maryyâdeya nirnnayadalu sarvvamânyav âgi â-chandrârkka-sthâyiy âgi sukhadiṃ bhôgisûdu yendu
koṭṭa tâmra-śâsana ǁ

tatra śrî-Hari-Hara-dêvasya bhâga-dvaya-prayuktâ bhûmiḥ (42 lines following contain names &c. of
vṛittidars and details of gift) Haridrâ-sêtu-bandha-tat-kulyâ-nirmmâṇa-vyâpâra-paritushṭair ....
vṛittiman-mahâ-janaiḥ...... Gautamâya Jagannâtha-sûnavê Buḷḷapâya svâṃśê hiraṇyôdaka-dâna-
dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ (y)êka-sthaḷê khârî-dvaya-parimitâ śâlêya-bhûmir ddattâ | śrî-Hari-Hara-dêvarige
saluva Bannikôḍa-sîmeyoḷage Haridrey emba-nadiyaṃ kaṭṭi â-Bannikôḍu-Beḷuvaḍi-Hanagavâḍi-Hari-
hara-Guttûru-Gaṅganarasiya-ker̤e-pariyantav âgi banda kâluveya keḷage nîruvariyâd-ishṭu-bhûmiyanu
mûr̤u-bâgeyaṃ mâḍi yeraḍu pâlu-bhûmiyanu srî-Hari-Hara-dêvaru bhôgisuvaru vondu-pâlu-bhûmi-
yanu honnan ikki kaṭṭeyaṃ kaṭṭi kâluveyam tandanthâ mahâjanagaḷu bhôgisuvaru kaṭṭê kâluve
mugidudar̤indaṃ mêle munde prati-varshadalli kaṭṭe-kâluveya âraikeya vechcha matte kâlântaradalli
râjika-daivikadinda banda kaṭṭe-kâlvê-vechchavanu dêvaru yeraḍu-pâlu brâhmaṇaru vondu-pâlu î-
mariyâdeyalu tettukombaru kâluveyalli bandashṭu nîranu dêvaru yeraḍu-pâlu brâhmaru vondu-pâla
mariyâdeyalu anubhavisuvaru yî-kâluveya keḷage huṭṭuvanthâ kaṭṭe-kuṇṭegaḷanû balitu kaṭṭikomba
kelasa nadige hattidanthâ-vechchavanu dêvaru yeraḍu-pâlu brâhmaru vondu-pâla mariyâdeyalu tettu
bhâga-kramadinda bhôgisuviri yendu koṭṭa tâmra-śâsanada pratiya śilâ-śâsanav idu ǁ

lg.l: viprair bbaddhâṃ Haridrâm nir-upama-charitais svârttha-jâtêna dṛishṭvâ
jâtâm taj-jîvanêna kshitim a-parimitâṃ yas tri-bhâgaṃ vibhajya |
datvâ dvâv atra bhâgau sapadi Hari-Harâyêtaraṃ brâhmaṇêbhyas
tatrârtthê Dêva-Râja-kshitipatir adiśat śâsanaṃ sô’tra jîyât ǁ
âjñâṃ samprâpya râjñô bhuvi mahita-nadîm śrî-Jagannâtha-mantrî
sô’yaṃ tat-tushṭayê’sminn akṛita Hariharê kalya-kulyâ-pratishṭhâṃ ǁ
ity addhâ vibudhâ vadanti satataṃ badhvâ Haridrâbhidhâṃ
kâ tvaṃ kîrtiḥ pitâ .... Hari-Hara-bhâk kalya-kulyâkhya-dharmmaḥ
kasyâsau Buḷḷapâkhya-prabhu-nikara-patêr astu tâvat kva yâsi |
śrîs tasyâgâra-vâśiny atuḷa-vasu dadâty artthinê .. nirâsaṃ
karttuṃ kshîrâmbudhêḥ tvam nikaṭam upagatâ .... vâdya hṛidyaṃ ǁ

div.p:
Haridrâ-sêtu-pratishṭhâ-kâladalli śrî-Hari-Hara-Dêvarû kâluveya vṛittivanta-mahâ-janaṅgaḷu Gautama-
gôtrada ruk-śâkheya Kṛishṇamallâchâryyara makkaḷu Bharatârâdhyarige kâluveya keḷage dhârâ-pûrv-
vakav âgi koṭṭadu maṇuvina hattu-koḷaga-gadde adakke vivara | dêvarinda ayiguḷa brâhmarinda
ayiguḷa antu hattu-koḷaga gadde | î-śâsana-kṛitiyanu hêḷidadake śrî-Harihara-dêvarû kâluveya
vṛittimanta-mahâjanaṅgaḷu pariṇamisi dêvarinda nâguḷa brâhmarinda nâguḷa ubhayaṃ eṇṭu-koḷaga-
gaddeyanû Kâsyapa-gôtrada Yajuś-śâkheya Chala-sampradâyada Mallikârjjunâchâryyara makkaḷu
Bâyaṇâcharyyarige dhârâ-pûrvvakav-âgi koṭṭa maṇuvina eṇṭu-koḷagada gadde ǁ Haridrâ-sêtu-pratishṭhâ-
kâla .... dêvarû kâluveya mahâjanaṅgaḷu aṅga-pradakshiṇada Śaṅkara-bhaṭṭarige dhârâ-pûrvvakav
âgi koṭṭadu dêvarinda ikkuḷa brâhmarinda ikkuḷa ubhayaṃ maṇuvina nâguḷada gadde ǁ (usual final verse)
maṅgaḷa mahâ ............
śrî śivam astu śubham astu su-pratishṭhitam astu samasta-du ...... tir astu ǁ śrî

div.head:
24
At the same place, on a 3rd stone.
div.p: śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ ǁ namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja-râja-paramêśvara-śrî-vîra-pratâpa-śrî-vîra-Achyuta-Dêva-mahârâya-kṛita-Ma-
hânandanidhi-praśaṃśâ-padya-dvayaṃ likhyatê ǁ

lg.l: kṛitv Ânandanidhiṃ dvijân Dhanadayann âmôdayan Mâdhavaṃ ǁ
mand-Ânandanidhêḥ na kê’pi nidhayaḥ kin tê labhantê tulâṃ ǁ

div.head:
25
At the same place, on a 4th stone.
div.p: śrî-Hariharâya namaḥ ǁ namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

lg.l: ḍâmaṇi santataṃ Hariharaṃ parirakshisut irkke dhâtriyaṃ ǁ
Hariyindaṃ biṭṭu daivaṃ dharaṇi-taḷadoḷ ill endu pêḷvar kkelambar |
Haranindaṃ biṭṭu daivaṃ dharaṇi-taḷadoḷ ill endu pêḷvar kkelambar |
karam app ant onde-rûpam taḷeda Hariharaṃ kûrttu rakshikke nammaṃ ǁ
sanda-Śivaṅge Vishṇuvina rûpaṃ ad âdudu Vishṇuviṅge pemp |
end adan aide niśchayisuv-antire Kûḍaloḷ êka-mûrttiyiṃ |
ninda jagan-nutaṃ Hariharaṃ parirakshisut irkke dhâtriyaṃ ǁ
paripûrṇṇaṃ chinmayaṃ vâk-karaṇa-rahitav âd â-nir-âkârav int î- |
dhareyoḷ sâkâram âd antire negaḷda Guhâraṇyadoḷ ninda dêvaṃ |
ire vaktrâmbhôjadoḷ vâg-vanite nelese tann-âjñe vidvishṭa-bhûpâ- |
lara kôṭîraṅgaḷoḷ varttise viśada-yaśam parbbe vârâśi-tîraṃ- |
barav âḷdam viśva-dhâtrî-taḷaman ati-baḷam râyaroḷ Nârasiṃhaṃ ǁ

div.p: vachana ǁ â-pratâpa-chakravarttiy-anvayâvatârav ent endoḍe ǁ

lg.l: stuti-geyyutt ire Padmanâbhan esedam lôkaika-kalpa-drumaṃ ǁ
â-dêvana nâbhî-pa | dmôdaradoḷ Padmagarbbhan ogedaṃ nâlkuṃ |
vêdaṅgaḷ nâlkuṃ mukha- | m âd antire bhuvana-sṛishṭi-kâraṇa-purushaṃ ǁ
amaḷa-guṇan Atri puṭṭida- | n amṛita-kaḷâ-mâḷi Sôman âtaṅg ogedaṃ ǁ
prêmaṅge saumyan ogedaṃ | sâmaja-śikshita-vadhâvadhaṃ Budhan embaṃ ǁ
sandudu Yaduvindav alli Saḷan udayisidaṃ ǁ
kiḍiyam sâliḍe nîḷda kês-uriyavol jihvâ-daḷaṃ poṇme bal- |
siḍilaṃ dâḍeya kûrpp adirppe huliy ond âkasmikaṃ vismayaṃ |
yene seḷeyim hoydu kondu Hoysaḷan âdaṃ |
d er̤agadavargg er̤agutirppa bar̤a-siḍil enipaṃ ǁ
vallabhan ene negaḷdam avaroḷ â-Vishṇu-nṛipam ǁ
deśeyoḷ niś-chaḷam irppa dêvar-ede ḍhakkâ-dhvânadiṃ ḍhakke-vâ- |
jise sênâ-rajadiṃ kesar mmasage vârâśi-brajam beṭṭu gha- |
ṭṭisid ant âge dharitriyoḷ jaya-niyôgôdyôgadoḷ hôgi sâ- |
r̤isi vîrâri-nṛipâḷaraṃ barisidaṃ mû-viṭṭigaṃ Biṭṭigaṃ ǁ
Biṭṭigan âhavâṅgaṇake jaṭṭigan ettidoḍ atta Kañchi ben- |
goṭṭudu Koṅgu kûḍe nele-geṭṭudu mikka-Virâṭa-kôṭe kûg- |
iṭṭudu Kôyatûr kedar̤i keṭṭudu rûḍhiya Chakragoṭṭav iṃb- |
iṭṭudu kaiyduv ikki kaḍaḷoḷ paḍaliṭṭudu sapta-Koṅkaṇaṃ ǁ
Baliyindaṃ Gaṅgeyindaṃ śuchi kula-giriyindaṃ sthiraṃ vârddhiyindaṃ |
kaliy entuṃ siṅgadindaṃ samara-vijaya-vikrânta-ramhaṃ Nṛisiṃhaṃ ǁ
endiṅg âr̤uvud oṭṭid-aṭṭegaḷa beṭṭ ell elliyuṃ baṭṭey inn |
endiṅg appudu Mârigaṃ hasiv ad endiṅg appud embannegaṃ |
sirav aśva-śrêṇi mêl-aṅkavaṇiya maṇi-paryâṇadiṃ tôrkke-vett ey- |
tare tann ond-âneyim Sêvuṇa-nṛipa-baḷamaṃ nûṅki bennaṭṭi kondaṃ |
voṭṭaji mikku sorkki kar̤i-gaṭṭida vairi-nṛipâḷakar chchalaṃ |
kadanada gellav ond er̤aḍu mûr̤ ene lekkisal uṇṭe Sêvuṇar |
kkudid idir-ântu sattudane baṇṇipen iṃ gadeyinde Bhîman û- |
r̤ada Kuru-bhûmiy illa kali-râya-Nṛisiṃhana paṭṭad-âne me- |
ṭṭada-raṇa-raṅgav ill amama bâppu jayaṃ tanag ekka-lâvaṇaṃ ǁ
javarâ tû jagad-êka-vîru majha dêvâ rôhakû bâpu |
Yâdava-Nârâyaṇu Nârasiṅgu bhalay end aṇmiṅge tâṃ mechchi tû- |
dduvu tann âneya honna-ḍeñcheyada chañchat-kêtu-daṇḍaṅgaloḷ ǁ
kaḍad Amarâdriyiṃ kaḍalan andu surâsurar onde dantiyaṃ |
modaloḷ Vikramapâḷa-Pâvusaran ittal kondan attal poraḷ- |
chidan â-Kâḍava-Râyanaṃ Magaranaṃ Pâṇḍyêśanaṃ koṇḍan un- |
mada-gandhêbhaman oldu paṭṭaman adaṃ Chôḷaṅge mund iṭṭu kaṭ- |
ṭidan â-sêtuvinoḷ Nṛisiṃhan adaṭim naṭṭaṃ jaya-stambhamaṃ ǁ

div.p:
gadya ǁ svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithivî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ Dvârâ-
vatî-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ Yâdava-kuḷâmbara-dyumaṇi sarbbajña-chûḍâmaṇi malerâja-râjaṃ maleparoḷ
gaṇḍaṃ gaṇḍa-bhêruṇḍan a-sahâya-śûran êkâṅga-vîraṃ Sanivâra-siddhi giri-durgga-mallaṃ chalad-aṅka-
Râman Adiyama-madêbha-kaṇṭhîravaṃ Pâṇḍya-gaṇḍaśaiḷa-vajra-daṇḍaṃ Kâḍava-Râya-Kaiṭabha-
Janârddanaṃ Makara-Râya-râjya-nirmmûlanaṃ Chôḷa-Râya-râjya-pratishṭhâchâryyan enisida Hoysaḷa-
śrî-Vîra-Nârasiṃha-Dêvaṃ mahâ-maṇḍaḷika-daṇḍanâtha-sâmanta-sîmantinî-nikâyaṃ berasu nija-râja-
dhâni-Dôrasamudradoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ pṛithvî-râjyaṃ geyyuttum irddan â-pratâpa-cha-
kravarttiya têjakke kâypin-ante kayduge kûrppin-ante mantrakke śaktiy-ante râjyakke vajra-sannâhad-
ant a-bhêda-bhâvadiṃ mana-sandu mahâ-pradhâna-padavig adhinâthan âda tolagada-kambav emba-
biruda-dhvajâḍambaraman avaḷambisida saṅgîta-sârana saj-janâdhârana kâbya-karttârana kîrtti-bha-
rttârana kavi-janâbharaṇana sûkti-sudhâkiraṇana vitaraṇa-viḷâsana lakshmî-nivâsana Vaishṇava-cha-
kravarttiya jagan-môhana-mûrttiya satya-svabhâvana Pôlâḷva-Dêvana permmeya vistâramaṃ pêḷvoḍe ǁ

lg.l: târavadiṃ jagaj-janake râgaman ittu sukhakke santataṃ |
kâraṇam âgi Nâraṇapuraṃ parirañjipud Andhra-dêśadoḷ ǁ
samarakk âyudhav îva-kay vitaraṇakk âlôchanakk âpta-man- |
tri migil gaṇ para-durgga-vargga-vijayakk âsthâna-raṅgakke ra- |
ha mahîśaṅgav amâtyan âdan adhikaṃ Pôlâḷva-daṇḍâdhipaṃ ǁ
ḍḍanav îtaṃ sabheyoḷ samasta-sachivar leppaṅgaḷ ent embe man- |
taṇadoḷ nâlagey îta nîṃ sachivaraṃ daṇḍêśaraṃ balloḍ inn |
eṇisû kâryyada khaḷgad aggaḷikeyoḷ Pôlâḷvanaṃ pôlvaraṃ ǁ
dharanîpâḷarkkaḷuṃ mantrigaḷuv itarar ill endu boṭṭ ettideṃ râ- |
yaroḷ ant â-Nârasiṃhaṃ sachivaroḷ esakaṃ-vetta Pôlâḷvan îy-irb- |
bare śauryyaṃ kâryyav oṅkirdd eḍeyoḷ adaṭiniṃ geldar âr atta Bâṇô- |
daranaṃ ninn-antir âr Hoysaḷana sakaḷa-sâmrâjyamaṃ kâdar ittal ǁ
karuviṭṭaṃ satyadiṃ kaṇ ḍer̤edan a-sama-sâhityadiṃ baṇṇav iṭṭaṃ |
siriyiṃ kûrtt âyu-voydaṃ para-hita-charitôdyôgadiṃ Barmman emb ant |
guruv âdaṃ Nârasiṃhâdhipana kaṭakadoḷ mantri-Pôlâḷva-Dêvaṃ ǁ
bageg ênuṃ kaval illa vâkyav eraḍ ill audâryyadoḷ mândyam i- |
jugadoḷ lâbhada lôbham illa siriyoḷ sorkk illa Pôlâḷvanaṃ |
pogaḷd ind anyaran aṇṇa pêḷ pogaḷvudê hâl uṇḍu mêl uṇbudê ǁ
idu vidyâ-lakshmi nir-mmatsaratey asadaḷaṃ jauvvanaṃ betta rûp int |
idu Gaṅgâ-pûra-pûtaṃ naḍavaḷiy idu vikrântav utsêkav enduṃ |
padanaṃ Pôlâḷva-daṇḍâdhipa paḍeyadu ninnalli munn âvudô nôn- |
tudu saypind âran ârâdhisi paḍedano ninn-annanaṃ Padmagarbbhaṃ ǁ
jagamaṃ jhampisut-irppa kîrtti mugilaṃ muṭṭ-irppa pemp amburâ- |
śige mâr̤-aṇḍalam âda guṇpu pati-râjya-śrîg aḍarpp âda man- |
tra-guṇaṃ râgaman urbbigg îva siri sâyujyâdi-sampattiyaṃ |
nagut-irpp Achyuta-bhakti tannoḷ enipaṃ Pôlâḷva-daṇḍâdhipaṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudayaś cha Śaka-varsha 1145 neya Svabhânu-saṃvatsarada Mâgha-śuddha 11 Bṛiha-
vârad andu Chôḷa-pratishṭhâchâryya śrî-Vîra-Nârasimha-Dêvara mahâ-pradhânaṃ Pôlâḷva-daṇḍa-
nâthaṃ 115 honna-kaḷasadiṃ mer̤ev ant âgi Harihara-dêvargge dêvatâlayamaṃ mâḍisidan â-dêvatâ-
bhavana-vâsada viḷâsamaṃ pêḷvoḍe ǁ

lg.l: siriyindaṃ kaḍu-rûḍhiyaṃ taḷeda râyar mmunnam ârum yugân- |
sthiram app-antire tâne mâḍisi jasaṃ bettaṃ jagad-bhûshaṇaṃ |
giriyô kûṭamo sûryyanô kaḷaśamô dig-bhittiyô bhittiyô |
piriduṃ niṭṭisa-bârad end ene janaṃ Pôlâḷva-daṇḍêśan a- |
chchariy app-ant ire mâḍidaṃ Harihara-śrî-dêvatâ-vâsamaṃ ǁ
vagam opputt ire rañjikuṃ Harihara-śrî-dêvatâ-mandiraṃ ǁ
bbane puṇyâñjana-siddhiyaṃ paḍedan ind ant allad-irdd-andu bhôṅ- |
munnaṃ Hermmâḍi-Râyaṃ Harihara-gṛihamaṃ mâḍisal vêḷkum end ir- |
ppannaṃ mund orbba bhaktaṃ jeniyisiy eneg âvâsamaṃ mâḍidappaṃ |
nîṃ nill end âtanaṃ svapnadoḷe nilisi dêvâlyamaṃ nîne lês ap- |
pannaṃ Pôlâḷva mâḍ end osedu Hariharaṃ hêḷdu tâṃ mâḍikoṇḍaṃ ǁ
migilâg irppudu dhâtriyoḷ Harihara-kshêtram samant alli Mê- |
śrutig artthaṃ smṛitig âyu mantrada mahattvaṃ tantrad âdhârav emb |
mmita-dharmmakke samagra-vajra-kavachaṃ tâm âge Pôlâḷvan ûr- |
Dvârâvatiy ene negaḷda Gu- | hâraṇyam enippa Harihara-kshêtra-chatur- |
dvâradoḷ oppuva Lakshmî- | Nârâyaṇa-vesara Bânavaḷḷiy ad eseguṃ ǁ
samasand irdd Elevaḷḷiyuṃ Jiguḷeyuṃ tâṃ Hêḷehâḷuṃ pravi- |
shṭam enipp aggada Bânavaḷḷiyan udâttaṃ nûr̤a-nâlvargg anu- |
kramadim sarvva-namasyam âgi sale dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ koṭṭan ut- |
ênaṃ pêḷvudo Bânavaḷḷiyoḷe nâlkuṃ-vṛittiyaṃ bêr̤e La-|
guru dharmma-dvitayakke nîne diṭadiṃ Pôlâḷva kêḷ munnav â-|
daroḷ inn apparoḷ indu varttiparoḷ ârgg uṇṭâduv î-dharmmav âr |
Hari-châritraman oldu shaṭpadade pêḷdar ninnavol ninnavol |
dhare chôdyaṃ-baḍuvant ir âr Harihara-śrî-gêhamaṃ mâḍidar ǁ

div.p: (usual final verses) maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî

div.head:
26
At the bottom of the same stone.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Yâdava-Nârâyaṇaṃ bhuja-baḷa-prahuḍha-pratâpa-chakravartti śrî-vîra-Râma(ṃ)-
chandra-vijaya-râjyôdayada 32 Sârvvari-saṃvatsarada Śrâvaṇa-su 9 Sômavârad andalu pûrvvadali-
Brahma(ṃ)-dattiya Hariharavanu yanantara Krishṇa-Kandâranu jîrnnôddhârava mâḍidavaṃ yâ-Hari-
haravanu Muṃmuḍi-Siṅgaya-Nâykana maga Khaṇḍeya-Râyaru punar-ddhâreyanu śrî-Vishṇu-śrî-
pâdaṅgaḷa vaiyalu yâ-Hariharada mahâjaṅgaḷa mund iṭṭu punar-ddhârey âgi koṭṭanu
śrî maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî śrî

div.head:
27
At the same place, on a 5th stone.
div.p: śrî-Hariharâya namaḥ | namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

lg.l: bhûyâd bhûtyai tri-jagatâṃ vapur Hariharasya yat |
viśvâkrânta-Guhântakô Hariharaḥ pâyât sa viśvaṃ jagat ǁ
iti kṛiśa-śaśi-lêkhâm âśu bibhrach chakâsti ǁ
sêvâm apêkshya tu chiram Harir a-chyutô’pi
tasminn Achyuta-bhûpâlê pâlayaty akhilâṃ mahîṃ ǁ
chêtô yasya Girîśa-pûjana-kṛitair jâta-śriyaḥ sat-kṛitaiḥ ǁ
paurṇamâsyâṃ sitê pakshê vârê Śaśisutasya cha ǁ
guṇavân dharma-sîlaś cha satya-vâkyô dṛïḍha-vrataḥ ǁ
guṇâtîtâya nityâya satê Hariharâya cha ǁ
Yer̤agunṭê’bhidhâd ghôshâd dakshiṇasyâṃ diśi sthitaṃ ǁ
kṛitavân iha padyâni śâsanê prabhu-śâsanât ǁ

div.head:
28
At the same place, on a 6th stone.
div.p: śrî-Hariharâya namaḥ | namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti srî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varsha 1452 Vikruti-śaṃvatsarada Śrâvaṇa-bahuḷa 8 yu Sôma-
vâra-jayantî-puṇya-kâladalli śrî-Kṛishṇâvatâra-samayadalli śrîmad-râjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-
vîra-pratâpa-Achyuta-Râya-mahârâyaru sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ pṛithvî-râjyaṃ geyutt iralâgi svâmi
namage Amara-nâyakatanakke palisida Koṭṭûra-châvaḍige saluva Uchchaṅgiya vênṭheyad oḷagaṇa
Pâṇḍya-nâḍige saluva Hariharada sîmeya voḷagaṇa Achyutarâyapurav endu prati-nâmadhêyav âda
Buḷḷâpurav emba grâmavanu Vasishṭha-gôtrada Âśvalâyana-sûtrada chinna-bhaṇḍârada Timm-arasara
makkaḷu Nârâyaṇa-Dêvagaḷu śrî-Harihara-dêvara avasara-satrakke samarppisiddu eraḍu-pâlu Gautama-
gôtrada Âśvalâyana-sûtrada Hariharada Râmachandrârâdhyara makkaḷu Viśvêśvarârâdhyarige śrî-
Harihara-dêvara sannidhiyalli sa-hiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvvakav âgi koṭṭadu vondu-pâlu yî-rîtiya
tri-bhâgadalli nimma putra-pautra-parampareyâgi â-chandrârka-sthâyigaḷ âgi sukhadiṃ anubhavi-
suviri yandu koṭṭa-dharma-śâsana ǁ (usual final verses)

lg.l: yê gṛihṇanty agrahârê’smin dhanaṃ tê mâtṛi-gâminaḥ ǁ

div.p: (usual final verse)
śubham astu
yî-grâmada chatus-sîmeya vivara (stops here)

div.head:
29
At the same place, on a 7th stone.
div.p: śrî-Hariharâya namaḥ |

svasti samasta-bhû-maṇḍala-maṇḍana-bhujâ-daṇḍa varttamâna- .. ja-paramêśvara pûrvva-paśchima-
dakshiṇôttara-samudraika-nâyaka bhâshâtilaṅghi-râjanya-bhujaṅga Hindu-râya-suratrâṇa śaraṇâgata-
vajra-pañjara śrî-vîra-pratâpa-Harihara-mahârâya-tanûja śrî-vîra-pratâpa-Dêva-Râya-mahârâyara
śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ Nâgaṇṇa-daṇṇâyakara nirûpadiṃ ǁ

lg.l: nadiyaṃ bal-gaṭṭeyaṃ kaṭṭisi dhare pogaḷa- ... yiṃ tanna lîlâ- |
sadanaṃ dêvargge viprargg akhiḷa-janake sañjîvanôpâyamaṃ mâ- |
ḍidan ant â-svâstheyiṃ jîvisut ati-sukhadind irddud â-vipra-yûthaṃ ǁ
yaṃ tappidud endu chintisutt irpp-âgaḷ ǁ

div.p:
.... yintu Buḷḷa-Râjaṃ śrî-vîra-pratâpa-Dêva-Râya-mahârâyara śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ Nâgaṇṇa-
daṇṇâyakara nirûpadiṃ-nânu mâḍida Haridrâ-sêtu bhaṅgav âyittu yidaṃ punaḥ-pratishṭheya mâḍuva
puṇya-purushar âr endu vichârisi nôḍi nirddharisi śrîmad-râjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-
pratâpa-râya-Bukka-Râja-kumâra śrî-vîra-pratâpa-Dêva-Râya-mahârâyara samasta-sainyâdhipatiyaṃ
śrî-Sômêśvara-liṅga-pada-payôja-parâga-parimaḷâsakta-madhuvratanaṃ śubha-guṇânvitanaṃ Boppa-
Dêva-tanûjâtanaṃ vandi-jana-pârijâtanaṃ yuvatî-jana-Kusumakôdaṇḍanaṃ kadana-prachaṇḍanaṃ
sâma-bhêdâdi-chatur-upâya-vichakshaṇanaṃ sad-dharmma-rakshaṇanaṃ saṅgîta-lôlanaṃ Châma-
nṛipâlanaṃ kaṇḍu Dêva-Râya-mahârâyara nirûpadim nânu mâḍida Haridrâ-sêtu bhaṅgav âdadar̤inda
śrî-Harihara-dêvara aṅga-raṅga-vaibhava â-kshêtra-nivâsigaḷaha brâhmaṇarugaḷa svâsthe tappitu
adanu punaḥ-pratishṭheyaṃ mâḍuvadakke dharmma-sahâyigaḷu nîv allad emb î-kâladalli matt obbar illav
âgi yinitu nirmmâ .. dharmmada phalavu a-gaṇitav endu hêḷuva-śâstrôktaṅgaḷ-artthavanû nîvu ballir
âgi yî-dharmmavanû nîvu jîrṇṇôddhârava mâḍabêk endu pêḷda vâkyavaṃ kêḷdu pariṇamisi kaikoṇḍu
Saka-varusha 1346 neya Krôdhi-saṃvachchharada Kârttika-śuddha 12 Śômavâraṃ kûḍida puṇya-
tithiyoḷu â-kaṭṭege hattuva dhanavanû śrî-Harihara-dêvara brâhmara prati-hastav âgi Buḷḷ-arasara
kaiyali dhâr̤eyan er̤adu koṭṭu namma prati-hastav âgi.... kaṭṭeyaṃ kaṭṭisi dhâ.... yaṃ.... gas endu
buddhi-galisi kaḷuhi jîrṇṇôddhâravaṃ mâḍida Châma-nṛipâḷana bahaḷa-pratâpav ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: vara-suta Châma-Râja ninag ar ddore bhâvise bhû-taḷâgradoḷ ǁ
piriduṃ sad-dharmmamê mûrttiyan anukarisittô ghana-jñânamê bhâ- |
sura-gâtraṃ bettudô sat-kaḷegaḷe purushâkâramaṃ tâḷduvô bhû- |
surar-uchchhâhaṃ śarîraṃ paḍedudo diṭam emb andadiṃ râjipaṃ saṅ- |
d î-vaṃśaṃ .... daḍ oldu kâvaṃ vijaya- |
dhuradoḷ gaṇḍara-gûḷi vairi-gaja-siṃhaṃ kôpadim tanna bil- |
diruvim sastram aḍarddu sârchchal idir-ântar ttamma jîvaṅgaḷam |
beraḷam sârchchida .... di dall ire giri-vrâtaṅgaḷô .... hamaṃ |
bharadiṃ sârchchidar ântu nilv adaṭin âvaṃ Châma-bhûmîśanoḷ ǁ
pudid oḍḍirdd anya-sainyaṃ bharadi kavidu bhôy endu nâl-dikkiniṃ mu- |
ttidaḍ â-saṅgrâma-bhîmaṃ turagaman aḍard ugrâsiyim poyd akhaṇḍaṃ |
kedar̤al bhôr endu nettar ppariye śiram ur̤uḷd âḍe bhûta-vrajam pô- |
gade pâḍal kâdi kondaṃ para-balaman id êm dhîranô Châma-Râjaṃ ǁ
dharmmakk idu kaḷaśav âytu sêtûddharaṇaṃ ǁ

div.p:
vachana ǁ yintu dharmma-kîrtti-pratâpaṅgaḷiṃ pesar-vvaḍeda Châma-nṛipanaṃ sakaḷa-dharmma-
bôdhegaḷiṃ bôdhisi pûrvvôttaraṅgaḷalliye mahâ-sêtu-nirmâṇavanû yajamânikeyaṃ pottu mâḍida
Kamme-kulâvatâranuṃ su-lalitâkâranuṃ Gautama-gôtra-pavitranuṃ śrî-Jagannâtha-putranuṃ Chen-
nâṃbikâ-jaṭhara-vanadhi-sudhâkaranuṃ sad-dharmmâdhâranuṃ sakaḷa-kaḷâ-pravîṇanuṃ vanitâ-jana-
Pañchabâṇanuṃ dêva-brâhmaṇa-śuśrûshâ-sâvadhânanuṃ purusha-nidhânanum enisida Buḷḷa-Râjana
mahimônnatike yent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: vîra-Bhagîrathaṃ gagana-Gaṅgeyan urvvige tandan ant ad êṃ |
paurusham altu kêḷ gaganadiṃ keḷag irddu Haridre yattaluṃ |
bârad iralke kaṭṭi piḍid aṭṭi Harîśa-purakke koṇḍu band |
î-raseyoḷ pesar-vvaḍeda Buḷḷa-chamûpan id êṃ sa-bhâgyanô ǁ
puduvindaṃ Tuṅgabhadrâ-jaladoḷ odage têjaṃ masuḷd â-Haridrâ- |
mada-bhṛiṅgaṃ râjip-abjâvaḷi verasu Harîśâṅghriyaṃ sârchchi saukhya- |
pradeyaṃ prakhyâteyaṃ mâḍidam ati-sulabhaṃ Buḷḷapâmâtya-varyyaṃ ǁ
vôrante tîvi baha ken- | nîriṃ pari-kâl virâjikuṃ Buḷḷa-nṛipaṃ |
dhâraṇige rachisidaṃ vi- | stârada sîmantad agra-sindûradavol ǁ
nindir enal ninn-âjñege | nindaḷ nîṃ kareyal oḍane pari-kâlvindaṃ |
bandaḷu Haridrey enal ên- | end usurvem Buḷḷa-Râja ninnaya satvaṃ ǁ
yintuṃ kaṭṭeya(ne) kaṭṭ ese- | vantâ-kâlveyane tanda sâhasavan iḷâ- |
kântaṃ pradhânan â-dvija- | santati ner̤e nôḍe tammoḷ utsavadindaṃ ǁ
yilli Haridreyiṃ tegada-kâlveye Kaḍḍa.. lli .... d ûr |
alliya kâḍu mânyada polaṃ .. r̤i piriyâya-.. dâyam int |
ellavan ettikoṇḍu sale bhôgipud endu .. maṃ kaḷâ- |
vallabha-Buḷḷa...... n enda dharitriy irppinaṃ ǁ
munnaṃ tâṃ mâḍisal adu | bhinnaṃ .. galu maha . sêtuv adaṃ |
tanna svârjjita .... | jîrnnôddhâravanu mâḍidaṃ Buḷḷa-nṛipaṃ ǁ

div.p: śubham astu ǁ kalyâṇam astu ....

lg.l: Harihara-dêvara varadiṃ | vara-gadyaṃ padya .. ḷavaṃ śâsanadoḷ |

div.head:
30
At the same place, on an 8th stone.
div.p: srî-Hariha(ra)râya namaḥ śubham astu
Kannaḍada padye ǁ surara narar-uraga-lôkama- |

lg.l: sô’yaṃ pâtu nirantaraṃ Hariharas trailôkya-rakshâ-maṇiḥ ǁ

div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâ(na)hana-śaka-varsha 1482 Durmati-saṃvatsarada Mâgha-śu 15 Sôma-
vâra-sômôparâga-puṇya-kâladalû śrî-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa-Sadâsiva-mahâ-
râyaru Vidyânagaradali sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ pṛithvî-râjyaṃ geyyuttal irppa samayadallu svasti
samasta-bhuvanâdhîśvaraṃ dêvâdhidêva-paramêśvaraṃ Śaiva-Vaishṇava-vâda-vidhvaṃsanaṃ Mârk-
kaṇḍêya-vara-pradâna-kâraṇa Hari-Haraikyâvatâraṃ Guhâsura-mada-vidâraṇaṃ Guhâsura-vakshô-
nikshipta-charaṇâravinda-yugaḷaṃ svargga-martya-pâtâḷa-tri-bhuvana-pûjitaṃ bhakta-janad-abhî-
shṭârtha-siddhi-dâyakaṃ Guhâraṇyav-eṃba-puṇyâraṇya-nivâsigaḷg abhaya-dânavaṃ mâḷpa Tuṅga-
bhadrâ-pûrva-kûla-nivâsan enisida Kaḍalûra-pura-varâdhîśvaran âda śrî-prasanna-Harihara-dêvarige
â-Sadâsiva-mahârâyara Haḍapada Sindhu-Gôvinda sitakara-gaṇḍa dhavaḷâṅka-bhîma Maṇinâga-
pura-varâdhîśvaran âda Haḍapada Baiyappa-Nâyakara makkaḷu Kṛishṇappa-Nâyakara kâryyakke
karttarâda Velûra Kâḷappa-Nâyakara makkaḷu Mârggasahâya-Nâyakaru Kṛishṇappa-Nâyakarige
puṇyav âgabêk endu Harihara-dêvara heṇḍiru mahâ-Lakshmî-dêvêra Pârvvatî-dêvêra Chaitra-śudha
15 dina Kṛishṇappa-Nâyakarige puṇyav âgabêk endu rathôtsahakâgi Gaṅganarasi-emba-grâmavanu
sarvvamânya-jîrṇṇôddhârava mâḍi samarppisi kṛitârthan âdanu ǁ (usual final phrases and verses)

Gaṅganarasiya-grâmavanu Harihara-dêvara Lakshmî-dêviyara ratha-utsâhake Mârggasahâya-
Nâyakarige binnahaṃ mâḍi jîrnnôddhâravanû mâḍisi grâmavanû biḍisikoṇḍavaru Chadupurâla-
Koṇḍama-râjagaḷa makkaḷu Sûrappaiyyanu avarige maṅgaḷa maha śrî

div.head:
31
At the same place, on a 9th stone.
div.p: śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ nir-vvighnam astu ǁ

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varuśaṅgaḷu 1453 neya Khara-saṃvatsarada Âśvîja-śu 10
Saumyavâradalu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa-śrî-Achyuta-Râya-mahâ-
râyaru Vidyânagariyalu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ pṛithvî-râjyaṃ geyutt iralu svâmi namage Amara-
nâyaka-tanake pâlisida Pâṇḍya-nâḍoḷagaṇa Uchchaṅgi-vêṇṭheyake saluva Hariharada sîmeyoḷagaṇa
Beḷuvaḍiya-grâma 1 Gaṅganarasiya-grâma 1 ubhayaṃ grâma 2 ḍanu Gârgya-gôtrada Âpastaṃbha-
sûtrada Yajuś-śâkheya Aṇṇâji-Dêvagaḷa makkaḷu Avasarada-Dîkshitaru śrî-Harihara-dêvara amṛita-
paḍi-nayivêdyake vartaney-âgi Âpastaṃbha-sûtrada Bâdarâyaṇa-gôtrada Avasarada Dêmarasarige
akshaya-puṇya-lôka-prâptiy âgabêkû endu sadyaḥ parikshêdavam âgi śrî-Harihara-dêvarige samarppi-
sideü â-Beḷuvaḍiya-grâmadoḷage Gârgya-gôtrada Âpastaṃbha-sûtrada Yajuś-śâkheya Aṇṇâji-Dêvagaḷa
makkaḷu Avasarada-Dîkshitaru Âtrêya-gôtrada Âpastaṃbha-sûtrada Yajuś-śâkheya Tâya-Timmaṇṇa-
gaḷa makkaḷu Sâvitre-Bhaṭṭarige khaṃ 1 aiguḷava ereya holannu sa-hiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûr-
vakav âgi śrî-Harihara-nâthana sannidhiyali Dêmarasaṅge puṇya-lôka-prâptiy âgabêk endu dhâreyan
er̤adu koṭṭeü yî-holavanu nimma putra-pautra-pâraṃparey âgi anubhavisal uḷavaru endu koṭṭa dhar-
mma-śâsana ǁ (usual final verses) Aṇṇâji-Dêvagaḷa makkaḷu Avasarada-Dîkshit-ayyanavaru śrî-Hari-
hara-dêvara maneya akkasâle Nîra-Vîrôjana maga Kariya-Tipôjanu yî-śâsanava tiddida Beḷuvaḍiya-
grâmadallu vokkaḷada ereya bhûmiyanu koṭṭeü ǁ

div.head:
32
On a first stone to the east of the same temple.
div.p: śrî-Hariharâya namaḥ ǁ

lg.l: vîtaratu phalam ishṭaṃ santataṃ kalpa-vṛikshaḥ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ | Kâñchî-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ | Yadu-
vaṃśâṃbara-dyumaṇi | su-bhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇi | śrî-Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇa-dêva-charaṇa-smaraṇa-pariṇatân-
taḥkaraṇaṃ | Yâdavâbharaṇaṃ | Pâṇḍya-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ | parichchhêdi-gaṇḍaṃ | Râjiga-
Chôḷa-manô-bhaṅgaṃ | sâhasôttuṅgan ity-âdi-nâmâvaḷî-virâjamâna-mânônnatânûna-têjô-nidhâna śrî-
mad-Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-Dêva-vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-
târaṃ-baraṃ saluttav ire ǁ

lg.l: mîr̤uvev eṃba maṇḍaḷikar ill adaṭinde bayalge vandu mey- |
dôr̤uvev eṃba vikramigaḷ illa kunuṅgi kaḷald aḷaldu kâyp- |
âr̤i poḍarppu-geṭṭu besakeyvavar allade mikka tanna kâyp-|
êr̤ida têjadiṃ Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-mahîpan id êṃ pratâpiyô ǁ

div.p:
tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ svasti samasta-sa-mada-sâmanta-sâmaja-samâja-kaṇṭhîravaṃ | raṇa-raṅga-
Bhairavaṃ | Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-pada-kamaḷa-parâga-tiḷakita-lalâṭa-paṭṭaṃ | svâmi-drôha-saṅghaṭṭa-gha-
raṭṭaṃ | pratibhaṭa-niśâṭa-kôṭî-samuchchâṭana-paṭutara-mantra-prayôga-chatura-Châṇakyaṃ | man-
tri-maṇḍaḷa śikhaṇḍa-mâṇikyaṃ | ripu-nṛipa-sainya-sâgara-samuttaraṇa-samagra-pratyagra-Pavana-
nandanaṃ | dig-aṅganâ-tuṅga-kucha-sthaḷa-sthâsaka-yaśaś-chandanaṃ | nirupama-bhakti-bhâra-samâ-
râdhita-nija-pati-vitîrṇṇa-Kumâra-nâmâbharaṇaṃ | śrî-karaṇaṃ | nija-prajâ-samadhika samanushṭhita-
sakaḷa-prajâ-rakshaṃ | sarvvâdhyakshan ity-âdi-nâmâvaḷi-virâjita-râjat-têjô’dhirâja-śrîmad-Vijaya-
Pâṇḍya-Dêva-prâjya-râjya-sthirîkaraṇa-daksha-dakshiṇa-dôr-ddaṇḍa-maṇḍita-mahâ-pradhâna śrîmad-
Vijaya-Permmâḍi-daṇḍanâthan eseyuttav ire ǁ

lg.l: besan ên ennada vîrar illa bhayadiṃ mûviṭṭiyiṃ bandu jî- |
visad irpp uddhatar illa pêḷda-besanaṃ mârkkoṇḍu kayvârddu bâ-|
ḷva sa-mudrârigaḷ ill enal Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-śrî-mahîpaṅge sâ-|

div.p:
vachana ǁ â-vijaya-lakshmî-viḷâsa-viḷasita-nija-bhuja-Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-Dêva-pâda-padmôpajîvi | svasti
samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ | Banavâsi-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ | vânara-dhvaja-
mṛigêndra-lâñchhanaṃ | Permmaṭṭi-tûryya-nirgghôshaṇaṃ | chatur-aśîti-nagarâdhishṭhita-Lalâṭa-
lôchana-Chaturbbhujaṃ | jagad-viditâshṭâdaśâśvamêdha-dîkshâ-dîkshitaṃ | Himavad-girîndra-
rundra-śikhara-śakti-saṃsthâpita-nijânvaya-prakaṭitôrjjita-pratâpa-śîḷâ-staṃbhaṃ | baddha-mada-gaja-
mahâ-mahimâbhirâmaṃ | Kâdaṃba-chakri-Mayûravarmma-vaṃśôdbhavan | Uchchaṅgi-giri-nâthaṃ |
śrî-Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇa-dêva-labdha-vara-prasâdan enisida Kêtarasaṅgaṃ tan-manô-nayana-chakô-
rôtpaḷa-chandrikey enisida Kanakabey-arasigaṃ |
tad-guṇônnatiy ent endaḍe |
alladeyuṃ ǁ
vachana ǁ mattav â-Nâgati-kshitîśaṅge ǁ

vachana ǁ antu pogaḷtegaṃ negaḷtegaṃ neley âda Sâyira-nâḍa manneyaṃ Nâgatiyarasanuv âtana kir̤iy-
ayya Hamparasanuṃ Sattiyarasanuv â-Nâgatiyarasana tamma Hariyarasanuṃ kumâraṃ Kêtarasa-
nuṃ Mâcharasanuṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadin irdd ondu-divasav âdi-râja-charita-dharmma-kathâ-
śravaṇa-datta-śravaṇar âgi para-baḷa-vijaya-vanitâ-haraṇa-samudyatar-ante dharmmâbhimukhar
enisi śrîmat-svayaṃbhu-Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇa-dêvar-anâdiy-agrahâraṃ Kûḍalûra tamma nibandhiya
kâṇike-sahita manneyamuman â-vûra kâluvaḷḷiy enisida Beḷvaḍiya tamma nibandhiya kâṇike-sahita
manneyamumaṃ Śaka-varsha 1093 r̤eneya Vikṛita-saṃvatsarada Pushya-bahuḷa-pâḍiva-Śukra-
vârad uttarâyaṇa-saṅkramaṇad andu śrîmat-svayambhu-Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇa-dêvara divya-śrî-pâda-
padmaṅgaḷge â-chandrârkka-sthâyiy âgi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭaru î-dharmmamaṃ rakshisida-
vargge Vâraṇâsi-Kurukhsêtrârgghyatîrttha-Gayâ-Prayâga-śrî-Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇa-sthânâdi-mahâ-puṇya-
kshêtraṅgaḷalli amâvâsye-sûryya-grahaṇa-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkramaṇa-vyatîpâtâdi-puṇya-tithigaḷalu
śaṅkha-mahâśaṅkha-saṅkhyâ-samanvitam enipa chatur-vvêda-vêdâṅga-vêdântâdi-vidyâ-viśêshakar
a-gaṇya-puṇyar enipa bhûmi-dêvôttamargge pratyêkaṃ kôṭi-kôṭi-suvarṇṇa-varṇṇada kavilegaḷa kôḍu-
gaḷaṃ ponnoḷu koḷagugaḷaṃ beḷḷiyoḷ kaṭṭi kâṃsya-dôhana-pâtraṃ berasu kâmadhênu-samânav enipa
dhênugaḷaṃ yathôktadiṃ dânaṃ geyda phalav akku ǁ (usual imprecatory phrases and verses)

div.head:
33
On the same stone.
div.p:
svasti śrîmat-Śaka-varsha 1095 neya Nandana-saṃvatsarada Bhâdrapada-śuddha-tadige-Bṛihaspati-
vârad andu ǁ

lg.l: janakaṃ saubhâgya-bhâgyânvite negaḷda Mahâdêvi tây viśva-vidvaj- |
jana-sêvyaṃ Sôma-Dêvaṃ tanag anujan enal dhâtriyoḷ bâppu sâmâ- |

div.p:
śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ Banavase-pannirchchhâsirad adhikâri śrîmad-Duggarasa-daṇḍanâyakaru
śrîmad-anâdiy-agrahâraṃ Kûḍalûra mahâjanaṃ nûr̤a-nâlvargge hoṅge tiṅgaḷiṅge hâga-vriddhiyalu
koṭṭa gadyâṇa 10 ttuṃ akshayav âgi vṛiddhiyalu nandâdîvige â-chandrârkka-sthâyiy âgi śrî-Śaṅkara-
Nârâyaṇa-dêvargge mahâjanaṅgaḷu naḍasuvant âgi dhârâ-pûrbbakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭaru ǁ

div.head:
34
At the same place, on a 2nd stone.
div.p: śrî-Hariharâya namaḥ namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

lg.l: saṃpatyai bhavatât sadâ Hariharâkâraṃ jagat-kâraṇaṃ ǁ
iti bhuvi tasya sutâv ubhâv abhûtâṃ |
srajam iva narapâlâ yasya sêvâm akârshuḥ ǁ
prauḍhaḥ kshmâm aśishan Murântaka iva śrî-Bukka-pṛithvîpatiḥ ǁ
nityaṃ saukhya-karaṃ paraṃ punar asâv âkâṅkshamâṇâ padaṃ |
âvirâsît kaḷâ-ślâghyaḥ kshîrâbdhêr iva chandramâḥ ǁ
atha tâm êva nagarîm adhyavâtsîn mahîpatiḥ |
pitrâbhirakshitâṃ pûrvvam Ayôdhyâm iva Râghavaḥ ǁ
râjâ râjâdhirâjô Harihara-nṛipatiḥ kshôṇi-kâñchî cha Kâñchî
lôkê śâkhâ-puraṃ śrîḥ katham iva vachasâṃ gôcharê syâd ihâsyâḥ ǁ
Râmêṇâmita-têjasâ Daśarathân mantrî Sumantrô yathâ ǁ
hanta chitraṃ prakaṃpantê śatrûṇâṃ prâṇa-vâyavaḥ ǁ
tîra-sthair ûrdhva-bâhâ iva bhuvi saritô yan-nisṛishṭâgrahâra-
stômaṃ sarvva-praśastaṃ nija-ninada-mishân nityam udghôshayanti ǁ
shaṭ-triṃśad atra vṛittîḥ ...... śrî-Hariharâya dêvâya ǁ
tatra dvâdaśa dattâ chatasṛibhir adhikâ tu viṃśatis tv anyâ |
tâvat-saṅkhyâvadbhyô viprêbhyô vṛittayas samaṃ dattâḥ ǁ

div.p:
asya grâmasya sîmâ-nirddêśas tu sphuṭa-parijñânârtthaṃ Karṇṇâṭa-bhâshayâ vilikhyatê | (here follow
details of gift and names &c. of vrittidârs) miḷitvâ shaṭ-triṃśad-vṛittayaḥ | asminn agrahârê kshêtra
.... vidyâ.... châgrahârârtthaṃ âgâmi-tat-sarvvaṃ vyaya-jâtaṃ cha shaṭ-triṃsad ....... brâhma-
ṇaiś cha samaṃ vibhajyânubhavanîyaṃ ǁ
(usual final verses)
śubham astu maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî-Harihara-Râyana voppa śrî-Virûpâksha ǁ
â-agrahâradavara voppa srî-Harihara ǁ
śrî śrî śrî

div.head:
35
At the same place, on a 3rd stone.

lg.l: namâmi tad vapur nnityam êkaṃ Hariharâtmakaṃ |
tvame rûpaṃ taḷed-ante chinmayan Ajaṃ nâbhy-abjadoḷ puṭṭidaṃ ǁ

div.p: antu puṭṭi |

lg.l: kramadiṃ tat-Padmajaṃ mâḍidan akhiḷa-jagach-chakradoḷ nôḍ elai ma- |
dhyama-lôkaṃ chelvan â-lôkadoḷav ati-manô-hâri tân âdud int â- |
dame Jambûdvîpav â-dvîpadoḷav atiśayaṃ Bhâratôrvvî-taḷaṃ ma- |
ttam enittânuṃ tad-urvvî-taḷadoḷav aniśaṃ Kuntaḷa-kshôṇi rayyaṃ ǁ

div.p: va ǁ tat-Kuntaḷa-dharâ-taḷâdhipatyadoḷ anêka-Châḷukya-chakrêśvara-pravarttanâ-vyatikramaṇadoḷu |

lg.l: Danu-sutan orvvan urvvareyan â-raseg uydoḍ avaṅge bhaṅgamaṃ |
janiyisi tanda munnina Mukundana śauryyaman âtma-vikramaṃ |
neneyise Râshṭrakûṭa-nṛipar âḷva dharitriyan iḷḍukoṇḍ agur- |
vvina kali Tailan uddharisidaṃ nija-châru-Chaḷukya-vaṃśamaṃ ǁ

div.p: anantara ǁ

lg.l: taḷa-pâḷaṃ mattav alliṃ baḷike tad-anujâtâtmajaṃ tâḷdidaṃ dôr- |
vvaḷa-dṛiptaṃ Vikramâṅkaṃ baḷike tad-anujaṃ tâḷdidaṃ châru-chandrô- |
ântaran ikki sâdhisida dhâtrige suttid agaḷ payôdhi ṭhâ- |
ṇântaradoḷ niyôjisida nâyakar â-dig-adhîśar âge niś- |
chinteyin êka-bhôgyav akhiḷaṃ jagav embinav âḷdan â-dharâ- |

div.p: tad-anujaṃ ǁ

lg.l: ṭṭege gôd-ant iral urbbi ninda sabaḷaṃ Nêpâḷanâ bâyoḷ â- |
yagav aḍḍaṃ nile naṭṭi kaṭṭid-alag âdaṃ tanna dôr-ggarvvamaṃ |
tri-guṇaṃ mâḍe samastamaṃ taḷedan urvvî-chakramaṃ Vikramaṃ ǁ

div.p: tat-sutaṃ ǁ
tat-kâladoḷu ǁ

lg.l: dharaṇî-chakrakk adhisṭhânam id enisidud âtmîya-dôr-daṇḍav unma- |
tkara-karṇṇôtkîrṇṇav âyt ujvaḷa-yaśav enipaṃ Bijjala-kshôṇipâḷaṃ ǁ
toḍardoḍ arȧti-bhûbhujara ben-dovalaṃ heḍa-maṇḍeg etti kû- |
g-iḍasade ketti munn aḍig uruḷchi karuḷgaḷan eyde sârchchi gêḷ- |
iḍisade gaṇṭalaṃ ner̤eye kaṇ por̤a-pâyvinav otti mutti bây- |
vasundarâ yeṃba vâkyav ene dhareyaṃ sâ- |

div.p:
va ǁ ant anûna-guṇa-nidhânan enisida Kasapayya-Nâyakar dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭânugraha-pûrvvakaṃ
Banavâsi-pannirchchhâsiramumaṃ pratipâḷisuttam iral â-kâladoḷu ǁ

lg.l: idu sukhad âgaraṃ Siriya puṭṭida-sâgarav ârayal samabh- |
yudayada gottu satyada tavar-mmane Chittajan-ikke-ṭâṇam un- |
budan ene śôbheyaṃ taḷedud int aniśaṃ Banavâsi-maṇḍaḷaṃ ǁ
bisadiṃ haṃsâḷiyaṃ rakshipa-jaḷaja-vanaṃ rayyav â-nâḍoḷ ellaṃ ǁ
nir̤i-daḷir-doṅgalaṃ taḷed aśôke taguḷd eḷenîra tandalaṃ |
kar̤ev eḷe-deṅgu biṇ-gonegaḷin toṇad-âḍuva kauṅgu bêrggaḷiṃ |
tur̤ug-ire kâyta-bakke sale kaḷtale tân nelegoḷvin-anda .. |
ḍ ir̤id ele-vaḷḷi kaṇg esevuv elliyuv alliya nandanaṅgaḷoḷ ǁ

div.p: va ǁ ant anûna-śôbheyaṃ taḷeda Banavâsi-janapadâṅganânana-viḷâsamaṃ tâḷdi |

lg.l: mada-madhupâḷi suttad alar-dôṇṭav agurvvina gandha-śâḷi sut- |
tada bayal añche-viṇḍu ner̤e-suttada pû-goḷan ikshu-vâṭi su- |
ttada purav aṃbuja-pratati suttada per-gger̤e Kâvan-âjñe su |
ttada banav ill enal sogayis-irppudu Nâgarakhaṇḍa-kaṃpaṇam ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ antu sogayisuva Nâgarakhaṇḍav-eppattar̤a-manneyakk-adhipatiyuṃ sudatî-jana-hṛidaya-kumu-
dinî-târâdhipatiyuv enisi ǁ

lg.l: nisadam ad eyde varttise nijôjvaḷa-kîrttiyan ottu-vettu-var- |
prasaraman iṃbu-vettu parivarttise Sôma-nṛipâḷan urvviyoḷ ǁ

div.p: va ǁ â-maṇḍaḷêśa-maṇi-maṇḍanana viśuddhêddha-vaṃśâvataraṇav ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: yise mar̤ey end alli paṭṭamaṃ kaṭṭade jâ- |
esad ire kaṭṭidar enalk ad inn ê-vogaḷveṃ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ ant a-dabhra-kadaṃba-vṛiksha-sândra-chchhâyayoḷ baḷedan-appudar̤iṃ Kâdaṃba-kulave kulav
âge negaḷda Mukkaṇṇa-Kadaṃba-Mayûravarmmaniṃ baḷiyan tad-vaṃśadoḷ anêka-bhûpâḷaka-pra-
vartanânantaraṃ ǁ

lg.l: jagamaṃ tann ârppu nichchan taṇipe daśa-diśâ-chakramaṃ tanna kîrtty-aṃ- |
śugaḷ âdaṃ parvve tann âkṛiti jana-nayanânandamam mâḍe dushṭâ- |
rigaḷaṃ tann ugra-śauryyaṃ ner̤e masuḷisi kîḷ mâḍe tann ujval̤a-ksha- |
tra-guṇaṃ mattâḍhyaraṃ dhikkarisi negaḷdan urvvîśvaraṃ Barmma-Dêvaṃ ǁ
hoṅg eḍegeṭṭu baṇṭan ol̤akeydu virôdhiyan âmpa vandiyaṃ |
nîgal ad entuv âr̤ad aḷut îva nijêpsita-kâryyav ondan ud- |
yôgisi satyamaṃ nuḍiva bhûbhujaraṃ diṭav appa-vîradiṃ |
châgadin oppuv or-nnuḍiyin âṃ saridappene Boppa-Dêvanoḷ ǁ
dore hari śauryyadoḷ dore surâvanijaṃ ghana-dâna-vṛittiyoḷ |
dore śaśi kîrttiyoḷ dore Manôbhavan aṅga-viḷâsad êḷgeyoḷ |
dore yinit akkuv allade nṛipar ddorey appare Boppa-Dêvanoḷ ǁ

div.p: tat-sati ǁ

lg.l: davan â-Nârâyaṇaṅgaṃ Sirigav anupamaṃ Chittajaṃ puṭṭuv-ond-an- |
davan Indraṅgaṃ tad-Indrâṇigav eseva Jayantaṃ magaṃ puṭṭuv-ond-an- |
davan ânt urvvî-nutaṃ puṭṭidan amaḷa-yaśô-vallabhaṃ Sôyi-Dêvaṃ ǁ
ḷpôchitav âytu Kalki nija-châru-charitradin endoḍ aṇṇa vâg- |
avaniyan ânt Anantana manaṃ goḷal ârppudu biṇpu nîradâ- |
dhvavan ........ putrana manaṃ goḷal ârppudu pempu vârddhiyan |
tave tare pîrd-Agastyana manaṃ goḷal ârppudu guṇp enalke pe |
.. radiṃ bêḷpantuṭaṃ koṭṭ o .. vin-esakadiṃ mâdikoṇḍaṃ dvishad-bhû- |
...... matte .... rbbaṃ sobagina madadiṃ Sôyi-Dêva ...... ǁ
nôḍi jagakke sanda chaturâṅganeyar samarakke vandu .... ṭṭ |
ôḍida .... nnapar ad elliyuv âraye tâve pêḷarê ǁ
para-samba .... doḷ kundada nava-nidhi râjâlayô .... doḷ si- |
tkaradoḷ kalpâvanîjaṃ pramada-vanadoḷ uḷḷantevol vêga vi .. |
