châri-hayakk eseyal êṛuvaṃ Sôma- .. paṃ ǁ
...... maṃ kaṇḍu .. raysada kaṇṇaṃ sîmeyaṃ dâṇṭi |

div.p:
...... vṛita ........ doḷ Surarâja-kânte bhûmi-nute ......................... ra kântey endoḍ
inn ân eṇe ...................... de Sôma-bhûmîpana ..................................
sampadâkaranuṃ ........................ savutta ................................
................ pâyô ............................ hômaṃ ..........................
...................... doḷ vettisal vêḷke ...............................................
.... tâmra .................... laviṃ Kadaṃba-ku ............... viṭṭan uṇbesa ..........
...... vidhânakkav â-dêvâ .................................................... dhârâ-
pûrvvakav â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ .................. ndhi-vigrahi .... rimayya nâl̤-prabhu
Saṅka-Gâvuṇḍa.............. Gâvuṇḍagaḷu śrî-Harihara-dêvara nitya-pûje........ ḍav eppatta..
.. vûral aydu-paṇa .... kâlamuṃ naḍav antâgi dhârâ-pûrbbakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭa ...... int î-dharm-
mamaṃ sa-dharmmadiṃ rakshisidavaru Vâraṇâsi-pramukha-tîrttha-kôṭiyoḷu vêda-vêdânta-vêdigaḷ
appa vipra-kôṭige gô-dâna-bhû-dâna-kanyâ-dâna-pramukha-dâna-kôṭiyan aḷaṅkâra-sahita sûryya-
grahaṇa-saṅkramaṇa-pramukha-tîrtta-kôṭiyoḷu koṭi-sûḷu koṭṭa phalav akku (usual imprecation)

div.head:
36
On the wall to the south of the mahâdvâra of the same temple.
div.p: śrî-Hariharâya namaḥ ǁ namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

lg.l: yâ pâdâṃbhôja-bhâjâṃ niravadhi kurutê śrî-viḷâsaṃ viśâlaṃ
dêvaḥ pâyâd apâyâd vaḥ Śrîśô yasya .. tur nnanu |

Śrî-kântâ-nâtha-chakshus-tuhinakiraṇataḥ
* So in the original. śrîra-ruk-paunaruktyaṃ |
târâḥ kshîrâmburâśi-pratima-vana-ruchas tâṇḍavaṃ vaḥ punâtu ǁ
kaṇṭhê na dhattê sma vishaṃ dvijihvair
bhû-jâtaḥ pârijâtas tirayati cha sudhâ-mâdhurîm sâdhu-vâdaiḥ ǁ
* So in the original. sthâyal-lôchana-bibhramâ guṇa-gaṇa-śrî-jyâyasî prêyasî |
nâmnâ yâpi cha Rêvalêti viditâ dhâmnâ cha hêma-prabhâ
dâmnâpi smayatê smitêna cha sudhâ-bhânuṃ mudâ nindati ǁ
yat-svâmî Sôma-nâmâ jagati vijayaṭê vâhinî-vallabhô’yaṃ ǁ
anyathâ katham udbhûtir ddânâmbu-saritâm ataḥ ǁ
śrî-vidyâ-nidhi-Sômanâtha-nagarî sâ bhâti bhushâ bhuvaḥ ǁ
Gopâḷêna Janârddanêna cha saha śri-Kêśavô madhyataḥ ǁ
Mastyâdyâ daśa mûrttayô Muraharâ Nârâyaṇâ dvâdaśa
prâkârêshu cha Kêśavâdaya itaḥ Saṅkarshaṇâdyâs tathâ |
dêvâs Sômapurê sahâpi cha Girâ yêna pratishṭhâpitâḥ ǁ
dhîrô Gaṅgâdharâryyas tilakayati sabhâṃ yaś cha bhâsâṃ nivâsaḥ ǁ
Vaikuṇṭhê Nîlakaṇṭhê nigama-nikathitaṃ khyâpayan advayaṃ yaḥ
akshâmâ(ṃ)sô’ sti dêvo jagati Hariharaḥ yasya dâsaḥ sa Sômaḥ ǁ
itthaṃ vikattha ṛê yaś cha mahas tatvaṃ sitâsitam ǁ
prâkâraṃ guṇpuvett-â-parikhe mer̤eyal ant alli sômârkka-vîthyâ- ǁ
mâkâraṃ kaṇge nichchaṃ sogayipudu puraṃ Sômanâthâkhyeyindaṃ ǁ
tvada sujanatvad ûrjjitada vipra-varêṇyarin intu chelvu-vet- |
tud enalu Sômanâthapurad unnati baṇṇipoḍ innuv aggaḷaṃ ǁ
baḷas ire Sômanâthapurav urvvige sarvva-samagra-bhûshaṇaṃ ǁ
duv enalu pempu-vett eseda Sôma-chamûpati gâyi-gôvaḷaṃ ǁ
râgaṃ mâḷp adhipaṃ Janârddanan ivar mmûrtti-trayaṃ tammoḷ î- |
ḷ av ellav ant alli tôrkku tara-taradindaṃ ǁ
taradind opp ire Bijjalêśvaram ad ant â-mârggadiṃ Perggaḍê- |
śvaram att ûrjjita-Rêvalêśvaramum attaṃ śôbhip â-Ba(y)iṛalê- |
chiram app antire mâḍi pempu-vaḍedaṃ śrî-Sôma-daṇḍâdhipaṃ ǁ
vara-mûrtti śrî-Nṛisiṃhêśvaran enipa Bhavaṃ Yôga-Nârâyaṇaṃ su- |
sthiradiṃ Lakshmî-Nṛisiṃhaṃ nelas ire nalaviṃ Sômanâthâkhye-vett â- |
purav â-Kâvêriyâ madhyadoḷ eseye jagad-vandyam âg irppud ant â- |
puram embant artthiyiṃ mâḍidan atuḷa-baḷaṃ Sôma-daṇḍâdhinâthaṃ ǁ
srî-vidyâ-nidhiy emba pempu jasamaṃ bîrutt iral mâḍi sad- |
* So in the original. prâvarttittad udagra-vipra-nivahakk utsâhadind ittan int |

div.p: âtana vaṃśôtpattiy ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: n-annar ad âr nni ...... vîra-vitaraṇad eḍeyoḷ ǁ
lôkaṃ śrî-Jagadêkamalla-nṛipa-nâthaṃ mechchuv âḷ embud î- |
tvîkaṃ sâhasi gâyi-gôvaḷan ati-prakhyâtiyaṃ tâḷdidaṃ ǁ
ire neley aidan eyde cheluv âgire bâgi .. vâḍa-kâñchanôt- |
kara-kaḷasaṅgaḷiṃ rachi.... ṇyada perchchuge dharmmad eḷtaraṃ |
sthirav ene kîrtti-vett eseda Sôma-chamûpati gâyi-gôvaḷaṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ ........ janâśrayaṃ śrî-prithvî-vallabhaṃ bhaya-lôbha-durllabhaṃ
mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvaraṃ Dvârâvatî-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ Yâ...... ra-dyumaṇi sarvvajña-
chûḍâmaṇi malerâja-raja nija-râja-têja malaparoḷu gaṇḍa gaṇḍa-bhêruṇḍa kadana-prachaṇḍa ri......
mârttaṇḍa a-sahâya-śûra para-nârî-dûra êkâṅga-vîra raṇa-raṅga-dhîra Sanivâra-siddhi Sura-mantri-
buddhi giri-durgga-malla ripu-ḥṛidaya-bhalla chalad-aṅka-Râma saṅgrâma-Bhîma vairîbha-kaṇṭhirava
Yadu-kuḷa-kaumudî-kairava Magara-râjya-nirmmûḷanaṃ Chôḷa-râjya-pratishṭhâchâryyaṃ Pâṇḍya-
râjya-samuddharaṇa niśśaṅka-pratâpa-chakravartti śrî-Vîra-Nârasiṃha-Dêv-arasaru abhinava-dakshiṇa-
Dvârâvati nija-râjadhâni-Dôrasamudrada nelevîḍenoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam
iralu tat-pâda-padmôpajîviy appa śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ mantri-mâṇikyaṃ nîti-Châṇâkyaṃ niyôga-
Yôgandharaṃ pati-kâryya-dhurandharaṃ ati-vishama-hayârûḍha-prauḍha rêkhâ-Rêvantanuṃ para-baḷa-
Kṛitântanuṃ svîkâra-sârôdayanuṃ anna-dâna-sva(va)rṇṇa-dâna-kanyâ-dâna-bhû-dâna-gô-dânâdi-
sakaḷa-dâna-vinôdanuṃ gôtra-pavitranuṃ maṇḍaḷika-jûbaṃ gâyi-gôvaḷaṃ gaṇḍa-peṇḍâraṃ svâmi-vañ-
chakara gaṇḍaṃ śrî-Sôma-daṇḍanâthaṃ Śaka-varshada 1190 neya Vibhava-saṃvatsarada Vaiśâkha-
śuddha-pañchamî-Sômavârad andu śrî-vidyâ-nidhi-prasanna-Sômanâthapurav emba agrahâravaṃ
mâḍi alli śrî-Śaiva-Vaishṇava-dêvatâ-bhavanaṅgaḷaṃ mâḍisi â-â-dêvategaḷaṃ su-pratishṭheyaṃ mâḍi
tad-anantaraṃ śrî-Hariharadali Harihara-nâthana dibya-bhavanada pûrvva-dvâradalli aydu suvarṇṇa-
kaḷaśa-sahitav aydu neleyav âgi .... mâḍisi lôka-hitârtthaṃ svârtthav ensi kṛitârtthan âdâṃ ǁ
maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî |

div.head:
37
At the basement of the dîpamâle pillar, east of the same temple.
div.p: (Nâgarî characters)

śrî-Râmô jayati ǁ Nîlakaṇṭha-prabhu-varmmaṇaḥ pautrasya Bâdâmî-prabhu-varmmaṇaḥ putrasya
Râmachandra-Bâdâmî-prabhu-varmmaṇaḥ tasya râjñô râjya-lakshmî-visishṭa-prathama-purushârthaṃ
dharma-mârgê ...................... hlâda-kârinî amarîva saubhâgyavatî Tuḷajâbâî Harihara-
kshêtrê nṛipa-Sâlivâhana-śakê 14.. Pramâthi-nâma-saṃvatsarê Mârgaśira-bahuḷa 4 Śukravârê dîpa-
mâlâbhikhyaṃ sva-kuloddharaṇârthaṃ
* So in the original. nirmitâ ǁ śubham astu ǁ

div.head:
38
At the same temple, on a broken vîrakal to the north.
div.p:
.. da Ashâḍha-ba 5 A ǁ śrîman-mahâ ........ Sôvaṇa-daṇṇâyakaru taṃ.. gaḷa śrî-Hariharada
kaḷasada kâ .. da goṇḍu bahali Kañchiyager̤e.. lli Bêḍaru bandu tâgidaḍe halav âḷa kondu.... la hoy-
ali bandu mu . yara paḍedu svargga . n âda maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî

div.head:
39
At the same temple, on a stone near the aśvatta tree to the north.

lg.l:
jayanti Sthâṇu-
* So in the original. Dharayôr advaita-dyôtanôdyatâḥ |

div.p: svasti śrîr jayaś châbhyudayaś cha ǁ

lg.l: Dhâtrâ sṛishṭi-dhuran-dharô muni-varaḥ prâg Atrir âsûtritaḥ ǁ
yaṃ nirmmâlya-srajam iva parê bhartṛi-bhûtâ bhajanti |
dêvasyâpi Tripura-jayinaḥ śêkharaṃ yasya lêkhâ ǁ
gôtraṃ Yâdava-bhûbhujâm udabhavat têjas tadîyam yathâ ǁ
saṃrâjaḥ kati nâma Haihaya-mukhâs tasmin abhûvan na vâ |
Pâṇḍyâkhyayaiva su-dṛiḍhâṃ bhuvi rûḍhim âpa ǁ
Pâṇḍyânâṃ para-vaibhavâsahaṃ ahô têjas tad ôjâyatê ǁ
svârâjya-daṃ vijayatê yudhi yasya śauryyaṃ ǁ
yasy smârita-Bhârati punar abhûd aty-uddhatâ yuddha-bhûḥ ǁ
tasyâmushya kavîśvarâḥ kati na vâ vâṇîm aḷaṃkurvvatê ǁ
sâ sûtê sma sutântaraṃ tad-anujaṃ śrî-Vîra-Pâṇḍyaṃ nṛipaṃ ǁ
śauryya .. sya nutau prayâti katamaḥ sâkalyataḥ kalyatâṃ ǁ
naishâm Atri-munîyituṃ prabhavati prâyaḥ paraḥ kaśchana |
bhûyaḥ Kâma-nṛipâtmanâ cha yad ayaṃ Lakshṃî-patir vvarttatê ǁ
nyakkṛityâpi vahanti yat katipayê gâḍha-grahaṃ vigrahê ǁ
êkaḥ kô’pi sa Vêdhasâ nirupamaḥ sṛishṭô yadîyân guṇân
dhairyyâdîn anukarttum atra na paraṃ kalyaṃ kvachid dṛiśyatê |
âkrântâḥ kula-bhûbhṛitô jaḷadhaya(ḥ)s tîrṇṇâ viḍîrṇṇô raviḥ ǁ
asmâkaṃ na payômayaṃ nidhim apâm âpânitaṃ vêḷayâ ǁ

div.p: tasya pradhânâmâtyaḥ |

lg.l: chêshṭâḥ śatru-bhaṭair iti prakaṭayan jîyâch chiraṃ Mârutêś

div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabdê mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvarê Kânchî-pura-varâdhîśvarê Yadu-vaṃ-
śâmbara-dyumaṇau | su-bhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇau | Mahêndra-maṇi-makuṭa-kôṭi-vighaṭita-nija-vijaya-kara-
kaṅkaṇê | lîlâ-mâtrâsâdhita-sapta-Koṅkaṇê | Kanaka-naga-śiḷâ-taḷa-sthâpita-pâṭhîna-lâñchhana-jaya-
staṃbhê | dûrîkṛitârâti-vîrâvashṭaṃbhê | Tâmraparṇṇî-nirṇṇikta-mauktika-yuktânêka-ratnâkarâmu-
dra-samudra-bhâṇḍâgârê | Maḷaya-giri-nandana-chandana-madhya-dêśa-nivêśita-śṛiṅgârâgârê | kiṅ-
karîkṛita-bhûta-bhêtâḷa-maṇḍaḷê | svîkṛitânêka-ripu-nṛipati-maṇḍaḷê hêḷâ-gṛihîtâhitânêka-jaḷa-śaiḷa-
durggê | vandîkṛitârâti-vîra-maṇḍaḷika-varggê śrî-Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇa-charaṇa-smaraṇa-pariṇatântaḥ-
karaṇê | Yâdavâbharaṇê | Pâṇḍya-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍê | parichchhêdi-gaṇḍê | Râjiga-Chôḷa-manô-
bhaṅgê | sahasôttuṅgê | śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraḥ | Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaḥ Noḷaṃbavâḍi-pramukham
akhiḷa-mahî-maṇḍaḷaṃ dik-kuṃbhi-kuṃbha-kûṭa-samunnatêna pannaga-râja-bhôga-nirbbharâbhô-
gêna kamaṭha-pati-ka .. ṭi-karkkaśêna bhuvana-bhavana-rakshâ-dîkshaṇa-dakshiṇa-bhujêna | vaḷa-
yam iva sa-hêḷam udvahann anavarata-vinamad-akhiḷa-narapati-mukuṭa-taṭa-ghaṭita-masṛiṇa-maṇi-
marîchi-vîchi-saṃbhâra-saṃbhêda-mêdura-charaṇa-nakha-kiraṇa-chakravâḷa-vâḷavyajana-santarppita-
sakaḷa-jagaj-jana[ś] śrîmad-Uchchaṅgy-abhidhânâṃ râjadhânîm adhishṭhâya | dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭâ-
nugraha-nishṭhaḥ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdêna râjyaṃ kurvvann êkadâ ǁ Śaka-nripa-kâlê êkôna-navaty-
adhika-sahasratamê | aṅkataḥ 1089 neya Sarvvajit-saṃvatsarê varttamânê tat-Pushya-śuddha-dvâda-
śyâṃ Sômavârê Rôhiṇyâṃ Brahma-yôgê Makara-saṅkrântau mahâ-pradhâna(ḥ)-śrîkaraṇa-sarvvâdhya-
ksha-mahâpasâyita-Kumâra-Vijaya-Permmâḍi-daṇḍanâtha-vijñaptyâ bhagavataḥ śrî-Harihara-dêva-
syâṅga-bhôga-traikâlika-nivêdyâgrâśana-brâhmaṇa-bhôjanâkshara-śikshâ-vyâkaraṇa-mîmâṃsâ-vêdânta-
vyâkhyâna-Ṛig-Yajur-vvêda-dvayâdhyâpanârtham êva nishka-śata-traya-mâtram êva karaṃ parikalpya
parihṛita-sarvva-bâdham âyuktakaṃ râja-vallabhâdi-daushṭyasya kadâchid apy a-gôcharaṃ cha
Kûḍalûr-grâmaṃ vêda-vêdâṅga-pâragêbhyaḥ sadâchâra-parêbhyaḥ sakaḷa-śâstribhyaḥ chatur-uttara-
śatêbhyô brâhmaṇêbhyaḥ piṇḍâdâna-rûpêṇa prâdât (here follow details of gift &c.) êvaṃ-vidhô yaḥ kaś-
chid râjâ râja-vallabhaḥ ........................ sarvva-pâpinâm adhamaḥ | tathâ hi | (usual
final verse) maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî.

div.head:
40
On the same stone.
(Lines 1 to 22 the same as in the previous No.)

lg.l: sâ sûtê sma sutântaraṃ tad-anujaṃ śrî-Vîra-Pâṇḍyaṃ nṛipaṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabdê mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvarê | Kâñchî-pura-varâdhîśvarê | Yadu-vaṃ-
śâṃbara-dyumaṇau | su-bhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇau | Mahêndra-maṇi-makuṭa-kôṭi-vighaṭita-nija-vijaya-kara-
kaṅkaṇê | lîlâ-mâtra-sâdhita-sapta-Koṅkaṇê | Kanaka-naga-śilâ-taḷa-sthâpita-pâṭhîna-lâñchhana-jaya-
staṃbhê | dûrîkṛitârâti-vîrâvashṭaṃbhê | Tâmraparṇṇî-nirṇṇikta-mauktika-yuktânêka-ratnâkarâmudra-
samudra-bhâṇḍâgârê | Maḷaya-giri-chandana-nandana-madhya-dêśa-nivêśita-śṛiṅgârâgârê | kiṅkarî-
kṛita-bhûta-bhêtâḷa-maṇḍaḷê | svîkṛitânêka-ripu-aṛipati-maṇḍaḷê | ...... hitânêka-jaḷa-śaiḷa-durggê |
................ śrî-Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇa-charaṇa-smaraṇa-pariṇatântaḥkaraṇê | Yâdavâbharaṇê |
Pâṇḍya-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍê parichchhêdi-gaṇḍê Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-Dêvê sakaḷa-mahî-maṇḍaḷa....
........ śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaḥ (rest effaced)

div.head:
41
At the same place, on a 2nd stone.

lg.l:
svarggâpavargga-mârggânuśâsanaṃ dharmma-śâsanaṃ ǁ
* These verses are in Nâgari characters.

div.p: śrî-Hari-Harâbhyâṃ namaḥ

lg.l: vistṛitav âge mâḍiḍa charâchara-dhâtriyan eyde sutti rô- |
nikaraṃ kaṇg eyde chalvaṃ paḍedud aviraḷôttâḷa-kallôḷa-mâḷâ- |
tad-vaḷaya-vaḷayitaṃ viḷa- | sad-vastu-vichitrav enisi sogayisuvudu Jaṃ- |
bû-dvîpav alli naḍuve ku- | bhṛid-vallabhan enisi Mêru-giri rañjisuguṃ ǁ
ant enisid Amara-giriyin- | daṃ teṅkaṇa deseyoḷ eseva Bhârata-varshâ- |
bhyantaradoḷ iḷâ-kânteya | kuntaḷav ene mukhyav âytu Kuntaḷa-dêśa ǁ
Kuntaḷa-dêśaman âḷdar a- | nantâvanipâḷa-nikaramaṃ geldu mahî- |
kântâ-vallabhar atiśaya- | kânta-guṇâvâsar ati-balar chChâḷukyar ǁ

div.p: tad-anvayâvatârav ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: vâriyoḷ âdudu sita-sara- | sîruhav ati-bahaḷa-surabhi-parimaḷa-miḷita ǁ
Jaḷaruhajaṭharana jaṭharada | jaḷajâtadoḷ ogeda Jaḷajajâtana bṛidaya- |
sthaḷa-jaḷaruha-jâtaṃ nija- | kuḷâdibhûtaṃ Harîtan ati-vikhyâtaṃ ǁ
âtana tanûbhavaṃ Hari- | taṃ tach-chuḷuka-jaḷadoḷ achchariy enal ut- |
khâtâsi-verasu puṭṭida- | n âtata-têjaṃ pratâpi Sattima-Dêva ǁ
śrî sat-kîrttiyan âḷdud alli palaruṃ vikrântadiṃ vairi-san- |
bhîḷa-pratâpan asuhṛit- | kîlâlapan enipa Tailapaṃ vasumatiyaṃ ǁ
ene śauryônnatan âda Tailapan-apatyaṃ Sattimaṃ tan-nṛipâ- |
ḷana putraṃ vibhu Vikramaṃ tad-anujaṃ sand-Ayyaṇaṃ tan-mahî- |
śana tammaṃ Jayasimhan âtana magaṃ Trailôkyamalla-kshitî- |
san enipp Âhavamallan âtana sutaṃ Sômêśvarôrvvîśvaraṃ ǁ
mudadim râjanvatiy eni- | sidan avaniyan ubhaya-râya-beṅkoḷva nṛipaṃ ǁ
ḍita-lôlaṃ lîleyiṃ pâlisidan akhiḷa-bhû-chakramaṃ Vikramâṅka ǁ
tat-sutan akhiḷa-kaḷâ-sam- | pat-sannidhi tannoḷ eseye Sarvvajña-mahî- |
Bhûlôkamalla-vallabha | n î-lôkaman âḷdan eseye Sarvvajña-mahî- |
pâla-vesar itara-bhûpar | mmûlôkaman âḷdar âdaḍam pesar vaḍeyar ǁ
dyat-paṭutara-pratâpaṃ | sat-pâlakan âḷdan urvviyaṃ Permma-nṛipa ǁ
ttigaḷan ad entu pôlipudo pêl enal a-pratima-pratâpan a- |
enisida Châḷukya-nṛipâ- | ḷana nachchina kaṭṭid-alaginant esedaṃ kûr- |
ppina balpina têjada mân- | taṇad oḷpiṃ Vîra-Pâṇḍya-Dêva-narêndraṃ ǁ
prâvîṇya-saṃstava-pra- | stâvane tân eyd ad âdaḍaṃ stutiyisuveṃ ǁ
dâmateyan âḷdu sogayipa | Sômânvayav akhiḷa-vandyav enduv a-nindya ǁ
sarasiruhadoḷ udiyisidaṃ | surarshi-pati vigata-tandran Atri-munîndraṃ ǁ
â-munipana nayana-sudhâ- | dhâmadin udiyisidan amṛitamayan amaḷa-kaḷâ- |
nijav enal ambuja-jananâ- | bdhijanana-muni-nayana-jananav emb î-janan A- |
tri-janaṇaman eydi Sôma | tri-jâtan ent Atri-jâtan idu chitratara ǁ
Râjânvavâyadoḷ Yadu- | Râjaṃ janiyisidan âtaniṃ Yadu-vaṃśa- |
śrî jagadoḷ esedu Yâdava- | râjanyaka-nâmav âytu viśruta-dhâma ǁ
â-vaṃśadoḷ âv aṃśaḍoḷ | âva mahîpâḷa-vaṃśa maṅ.... n emba ǁ
Âditya-Dêvan embaṃ | Yâdava-kuḷa-tiḷakan âtanind âdudu Pâṇ- |
ḍyôdayav â-Pâṇḍya-nṛipaṅ- | g âdaṃ śrî-Chêdi-Râjan emba tanûja ǁ
Chêdi-mahîśaran adaṭale- | d âdaṃ śrî-Chêdi-Râjan â-nṛipana sutaṃ |
Yâdava-bhûshaṇan enisida- | n âdaṃ Paḷamâṇḍa-Dêva-Pâṇḍyâvanipa ǁ
śrî veras âdud embinegav eyde pogaḷteyan âḷdu viśva-dhâ- |
ḍyâvanîvallabhaṃ negar̤dan âtana vikramam ûrjjita-krama ǁ
vanibhṛin-nikâyav ambhô- | dhi-nilînaṃ miḍukal aṇmad achaḷav enikkuṃ ǁ
adhika-bhuja-balaran adaṭale- | d adhikatara-bhuja-prâtâparaṃ geldu sama- |
bhyadhikatama-sauryyan âḷdaṃ | vadheyaṃ rumhariyoḷ ahitaraṃ Râya-nṛipa ǁ
ene negaḷda Râya-Pâṇḍyâ- | vanipaṅg arddhâṅga-lakshmiy enisidaḷ akhiḷâ- |
vani-vanitâ-ratnav id ond | ene Bôvala-Dêvi sakaḷa-guṇa-gauravadiṃ ǁ
jyâyaṃ tanag ene jagadaoḷa- | g â-yuvatiya sat-kulînatege tegaḷ uṇṭê ǁ
ḍya-dharâdhipatiya pôlvige | badhira-dharâdhîśar entuv êṃ bandaparê ǁ
Manu-muni-charitaṃ vidvaj- | jana-vallabhan aty udâtta-chittaṃ sakaḷâ- |
vanitaḷadoḷ Paṇḍita-Pâṇ- | ḍya-narêndraṃ negal̤dan intu negaḷvudu bhûpa ǁ
tad-anubhavan uddhatârâ- | ti-daḷana-paṭuv enipa Kâma-Dêvâvanipa ǁ
śrîman-mahâ-pradhâna-śi- | khâmaṇiy ene chakravartti kuḍe paḍed akhiḷôr- |
vvî-mahita-dhâma viśruta- | nâmadin Âditya-daṇḍanâthaṃ negal̤da ǁ
śrî-Vîra-Pâṇḍya-Dêvana | dêvi mahâ-dêviy enipa pempaṃ paḍedaḷ ǁ
piriduṃ kâruṇyadindaṃ piriy-arasige mâḷk ishṭa-saṃsiddhiyaṃ Śaṅ- |
nuje Vîra-Pâṇḍya-pṛithvî- | bhuja-vallabhe vibudha-kalpa-latey ene negaḷdaḷ ǁ
piriduṃ kâruṇyadiṃ mâḍuge vibhu Vijayâ-Dêvig iśhṭârtthamaṃ Śaṅ- |
śrî-Vîra-Pâṇḍya-Dêvan i- | ḷâ-vallabhan alli paḍedan uddhata-ripu-śaur- |
ḍuritaṃ paiśaṅgitaṃ karbburitav aruṇitaṃ Vîra-Pâṇḍyâji-raṅgaṃ ǁ
brajadoḷ tôrppuvu nôḷpaḍ ill itara-vastu-stôma-nâmaṅgaḷiṃ ǁ
adirad idaridaran idir-iḍu- | v adaṭaran adaṭaledu bedar̤e beṅkoṇḍu sama- |
sta-dig-antaramaṃ pudid oda- | vida jasadind esevan asadaḷaṃ Pâṇḍya-nṛipa ǁ
piriduṃ kâruṇyadiṃ Pâṇḍyarasa ninage dîrgghâyumaṃ śrîyumaṃ Śaṅ- |

div.p:
svasti samasta-vastu-guṇa-rûpa-saṃstava-stutya-châru-châritra | vividha-vibudha-jana-vichitra-
stôtra-pâtra | sakaḷa-kaḷâ-kaḷâpa-kauśaḷa-kautukita-prabaḷa-paṇḍita-prakara | paritôshita-kavi-
gamaki-vâdi-vâgmi-nikara sukara-kavi-nikara-chitta-chamatkârakara | sahaja-saubhâgya sarasa-
sârasvata | vîrâri-maṇḍaḷika-Châṇûra-malla-gaḷa-gâḷa |
* So in the original. taraḷaukita-ḍhaukara-janana-hikkâ-ninâda
.... sampâdana-pravîṇâpratimalla-purâṇa-Nârâyaṇa | mâninî-manô-môhana-karaṇa-kaḷâ-chatura-
Chârâyaṇa | chatur-aṅga-tantra-pañchâṅga-mantra-nânâṅga-yantra-samudayôbhaya-prâkârâkâra-

pûta-satatôddîpta-nija-pratâpa-hutavaha tri .... ra-tri-vidha-râjahaṃsa-maṇḍaḷa-ruchi-tiraskaraṇa-
kâraṇa-ghana-ghaṭâṭôpa | ripu-nṛipâḷa-jâḷa-tila-kaḷâkaḷana-bhañjana-paṭu-prabhañjana samasta-vasu-
matî-jana-chitta .... samara-samârambha-saṃrambhôjjṛimbhita-gambhîra-bham.... Bhaîrava nija-
vijaya-bhûri-bhêrî-rava-śravaṇa-samanantara-kshubhita-rabhasa-prati ........ apasaraṇa-pratijñâ-
gûḍha-prauḍha-ripu-maṇḍaḷika-saṅkuḷa-drâvaṇa | jagad-dâridrya-vidrâvaṇa | sakaḷa-lôka-lôchana-
purâkṛita-sukṛita-sañchayânurôdha-bôdha-nirmmâṇa-karmmaṭha-Brahma-nirmmita-sarvva-sampûrṇ-
ṇa-śubha-lakshaṇa-lakshitâkshaya-manôharâkṛiti-nirâkṛita-Manôjâta | ruchira-śuchitôchitâchâra-
chârutâ-smârita-Surasarijjâta | grahaṇa-nirggata-prêraṇa...... sthâpanôtkaḷita-sâdi-sûdana Sûkaḷa-
sapti-saṅkuḷa-grâhita-pañchadhârâ-prapañcha-sañcharaṇa-chaturatara-su-rêkhâ-Rêvanta | vipuḷa-nija-
kîrtti-vallî-vêllita-dig-anta | anavarata-vinamad-ananta-sâmanta-samudaya-maṇi-makuṭa-kûṭa-kôṭi-
ghaṭita-taruṇa-taraṇi-kiraṇâruṇa-śôṇa-maṇi-marîchi-mañju-mañjarî-puñja-rañjita-charaṇa-sarasîruha |
an-anya-sâmânya-vadânyatâ-nyakkṛita-kaḷpa-bhûmiruha | ati-bahaḷa-viḷasita-sitaruchi-ruchi-nichaya-
ruchira-vichakiḷa-mukuḷa-kuḷa-dara-daḷita-kumuda-vana-Tuhina-girivara-dhavaḷa-kamaḷa-Maḷayaja-
Rajata-kudhara-dhavaḷima-tuḷita-viśada-nija-yaśaḥ-prasara-dhavaḷita-nikhiḷa-daśa-diśa | nirantarôttarô-
ttara-pravarddhâmâna-su-daśa ǁ prâkṛita ǁ ayakka-vikkanta-kakkaḍa-sakukkaḍa rivu-maṇḍaḷiya-Daṇu-
taṇaya-Dêvayî-ṇandaṇa | rivu-maṇḍaḷiya-kuḷa-śaiḷa-daḷaṇa-Saṅkandaṇa paḍivakhkha-vikhkhêva-
pakhkhavâya.. ta-jaya Lachhchhi-vikhkhitta-tikhkha-kaḍakhkha-vîkhkhaṇa-sa-lakhkhaṇa-raṇa-mukh-
kha rivu-maṇḍaḷiya-sikhkhâ-viyakhkhaṇa | nisagga ....saya-sahugga-khagga-muhagga-giḷiya-rivu-baḍa
.... bî.... yachcharia Kali-kalusa-vilôvi-kamma-sach-charia ṇittiṃsa-kasaṇa-viphphâria-viphphu-
ḷiṅga-viphphulia-rivu-maṇḍaliya maḍaphpha-tuphpha.. jaṇum.... laṇa-pavîṇa-kivâṇa rûvâhari .. ya-
Kusumbâṇa | visaṇṭhuḷi.. kuṇṭhida-rivu-maṇḍaḷiya-turaya-thôra-thaṭṭa rivu-maṇḍaliya-kuḷa-diśâpaṭṭa ǁ
vyâkaraṇa-vidyânavadya-viśruta-Śrutadhara | dhairyyâvadhîrita-Mandara-dharâdhara | bhabya-śrâvya
kâbya-nâṭakâkhyâyikâkhyânâdi-byâkhyâna-vyâpârâ .... ta-nabya-Śrîharsha | sarasa-śruti-svara-
śravaṇa-puṭa-pêya-gêyâmṛita-rasâsvâda-sañjanita-santatôddharsha | nyâya-śikshâ-vichakshaṇâksha-
pâda-Vaiśêshika | viśêsha-vi.. Kaṇâda | pratipaksha-paksha-saṃbharaṇa-samrôdha-prasâdita-Syâd-
vâda-vidyâ-prathita-guṇa-jâḷa | Mîmâṃsâ-sarasî-sañchâra-chañchura-marâḷa | Sâṅkhya-siddhânta-
saṅkhyâ-prasiddha-Kapila-siddha | Bauddha-râddhânta-prabuddha-Buddha | Lôkâyata-mata-vichâra-
chatura-Dêvatâchâryya | nirupama-prakhyâtaudâryya | śrîmad-amṛitakara-samârûḍha-prauḍha-Yadu-
vaṃśa-vaṃśa-prabhava-shâḍguṇya-sampatti-yukta-su-byakta-mauktika-viḷâsa | sakaḷa-vidyâdhidêvatâ-
viḷâsa-nivâsa | nikhiḷa-Lôkapâḷôttarôttarâśâ-prasâda-prabaḷa-pratâpa-prakhyâta-śrî-Râjarâjâtmajâta ǁ
śrî-Sôvala-Dêvî-samâkhyâ-vikhyâtâbhaṅga-Gaṅgâ-prasûta | anya-râjanya-janya-janita-jaya-svîkâra-
prasiddha-nâmâbhirâma śrîmat-Sômânvaya-lalâma | śrîmad-amarâdhinâtha-paramêśvara-śrî-Śaṅkara-
Nârâyaṇa-dêva-vara-prasâdâsâdita-nirantaraiśvaryya | kuḷâchaḷa-nichaya-niśchaḷa-dhairyya | śrîmaj-
Jagadêkamalla-Dêva-vijaya-jagad-rakshâ-daksha-dakshiṇa-kara-kaḷita-kaukshêyaka-śôbhâ-vibhâsa | sa-
kaḷa-maṅgaḷa-nivâsa | śrî-Vîra-Pâṇḍya-Dêva sthiraṃ jîva |

lg.l: prakhyâta-stuti-sâra-châru-charita svasty astu tubhyaṃ chiraṃ ǁ
ninag îg ishṭârttha-saṃsiddhiyan ati-mudadiṃ Pâṇḍya-bhûpâḷa śumbhad- |
śrî-vibhavar mMadhusûdhana- | Dêvar vvirachisidar eseye śâsana-kṛitiyaṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara Kâñchî-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ | Yadu-vaṃ-
śâmbara-dyumaṇi | su-bhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇi | Pâṇḍya-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ | parichchhêdi-gaṇḍaṃ |
Mahêndra-maṇi-makuṭa-kôṭi-vighaṭita-nija-vijaya-kara-kaṅkaṇaṃ | lîlâ-mâtra-sâdhita-sapta-Koṅka-
ṇaṃ | Kanaka-naga-śilâ-taḷa.. pita-pâṭhîna-lâñchhana-jaya-stambhaṃ | dûrîkṛitârâti-vîrâvashṭambha |
Tâmbraparṇṇî-nirṇṇikta-mauktika-yuktânêka-ratnâkarâmudra-samudra-bhâṇḍâgâra Maḷaya-giri-kan-
dara-chandana-madhya-dêśa-nivêśita.... gâraṃ | kiṅkarîkṛita-bhûta-vêtâḷa-maṇḍalaṃ | svîkṛitânêka-
ripu-maṇḍaḷika-maṇḍalaṃ | hêḷâ-gṛihîtâhita-gada.... la-śaila-durggaṃ | vandîkṛita-vîra-vairi-maṇḍa-
ḷika-varggaṃ | Râjiga-Chôḷa-manô-bhaṅgaṃ | śrîmaj-Jagadêkamalla-Dêva-pâdâbja-bhṛiṅgaṃ | śrî-
Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇa-dêva-charaṇa-smaraṇa-pariṇatântaḥkaraṇaṃ | Yâdavâbharaṇaṃ | nâmâdi-praśas-
ti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Jagadêkamalla-Vîra-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaru Noḷambavâḍi-mûvat-
tir-chchhâsiraṃ modalâgi palavuṃ dêśaṅgaḷaṃ kumâra-vṛittiyind âḷdu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôda-
diṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttav ir̤ddu śrîmach-Châḷukya-pratâpa-chakravartti-Jagadêkamalla-varshada 10
neya Prabhava-saṃvatsarad Âśvayujad-amâvâsey-Âdivâra-sûryya-grahaṇad andu śrî-Tuṅgabhadrâ-
Haridrâbhidhâna...... sambhêda-mahâ-tîrtthadalli Gôbi-jîya .... samasta-mahâ-dânaṅgaḷaṃ mâḍi
śrî-Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇa-dêvargge śrîgandha-kuṅkuma-karppûra-lêpanâdy-aṅga-bhôgakkaṃ naivêdya-
kkaṃ dêvara .... satrakkav endu chakravarttiyalli kâruṇyavaṃ paḍedu Pâramêśvara-datṭiy......
kâḍu 30 r̤-oḷagaṇa Guttivûraṃ pûrvva-prasiddha-chatur-âghâṭa-samanvitaṃ mêlâ ........ sahitaṃ
sarvva-bâdhâ-parihâradiṃ ...... chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ sthirav âgi goṭṭar î-dharmma.. haḍapad-
Âditya-bhaṭṭargge dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭa gaḷde ...... beddalu mattarunâlku int î-dharmma
........ Vâraṇâsi-Kurukshêtrârgghyatîrttha-Gayâ-Prayâga śrî-Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇa- ............
mahâ-puṇya-tîrtthaṅgaḷalli ............ śaṅkha-saṅkhyâ-samanvitav enipa chatur-vvêda-vêdâṅga-
vêdântâdi-vidyâ-viśêshaka...... puṇyar enipa bhûmidêvôttamargge pratyêkav âgi koṭṭa suvarṇṇa-
varṇṇada kapilegaḷaṃ kôḍugaḷaṃ ponnoḷu koḷagugaḷaṃ beḷḷi .. kâṃsya-dôhana-pâtraṃ (rest illegible)

div.head:
42
In the enclosure of the same temple, on a stone to the north of the Kâśî-Viśvêśvara temple.

lg.l: srîmach-chit-sau ...... Bhava kṛitiyoḷ êkâtmar âm embudaṃ nis- |
prêmar ddaṇḍâdhipaṃ Barmmarasan-abhimatâvâptiyaṃ tâme nichchaṃ ǁ
śrî-Girijâ-varaṃ Haran ad orvvaḷ iḷâmara-putri tannan int |
râgadal âkeyaṃ kanasinoḷ nereyal samasanda tat-samâ- |
yôgadin Îśvarâṃśam ene nindudu garbbhav adabhra-vibhramaṃ ǁ

div.p: antu garbbhaṃ nelesi nava-mâsaṃ tîval oḍane ǁ

lg.l: yutan akhiḷa-sat-kaḷâ-vi- | śrutan udayasidaṃ ripu-vrajôshṇaṃ Kṛishṇaṃ ǁ
udayisi nâpita-karmadi- | n ad-orvva nara-mâṃsa-bhakshiyam nṛipanaṃ dur- |
mmadanaṃ saṃharisi jagan- | mudamaṃ muṃ paḍedan alte Kâḷañjaradoḷ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ ant âtanaṃ Kṛitânta-dantântarvartti-mâḍi tadîya-râjya-sâṃrâjya-lakshmiyaṃ bâhâvaḷêpadin
iḷdu-koṇḍu nava-laksha-Dahaḷâ-maṇḍaḷama nuḍige sâdhyaṃ mâḍi Kaḷachuri-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Kṛishṇa-
bhûpâḷaṃ sukhadin arasu-geydan âtan-anvaya-jâtaroḷ anêka-bhûpâḷaka-pravarttanâ-vyatikramaṇa-
doḷu ǁ

lg.l: esakaman appukeyye dharaṇî-pati Kannama-Dêvan urvviyoḷ ǁ
tad-vikhyâtaṅg adhika-bhu- | ja-dvayam ene sanda Râja Bijjalan embar |
sad-vidyar jjaya-lakshmî- | hṛid-vallabhar âdar irvvaruṃ priya-putrar ǁ
bhuvanadoḷ ekka-lâvaṇam ivaṅg ene nindan iḷêjya-râjyadoḷ ǁ
narapati Kannaraṃ negal̤ḍa Jôgaman emba tanûjar intu nâl- |
varum esad irddar ant avaroḷ agrajan Ammugiy ântan urvviyaṃ ǁ

div.p: anantaraṃ tad-anujaṃ ǁ

lg.l: ântaran Antakânanadoḷ aḷgisi matt uḷid ôḍid anya-bhû- |
kântaran anta-kânanadoḷ aḷg ire śâsisi lîleyiṃ padâ- |
krântaran âdya-vṛittige samantu niyôjisi dhâtri baṇṇipan- |
nan Tal̤ikâḍa Jôgama-nṛipaṃ mer̤edaṃ nija-râja-nîtiyaṃ ǁ

div.p: tat-putra ǁ

lg.l: ari-bhûpâḷara mîse bhôṅkene kariṅk-êḷvannegaṃ têjav â- |
karisutt âtma-charitrav ên adhikanô Permmâḍi-bhûpâḷakaṃ ǁ

div.p: â-nṛipaṅge ǁ

lg.l: dharanî-chakrakk adhishṭhânam id enisudud âtmîya-dôr-ddaṇḍav unma- |
kara-karṇṇôtkîrṇṇav âyt ujvaḷa-yaśav enipaṃ Bijjaṇa-kshôṇipâḷaṃ ǁ
sale nile vêḷey endu bhayadiṃ kaḍid aṅguḷi melda bâya tam- |
bulav eḷakoṇḍu maṇḍam aḍa-gûḷ urad aṅkusav âgi koyda nuṇ- |
galey ivu kâguv allade virôdhi-nṛipar chchalad-aṅka-Râmanoḷ |
maled idir âdaḍ âḷ kudurey âne rathaṃ ner̤e kâyal ârppuvê ǁ
nosalôḷ sâmrâjya-paṭṭaṃ nelasal oḍane dôr-ggarvvadiṃ manneyargg ub- |
basavaṃ muṃ mâḍidaṃ matt irey ire chaladiṃ maṇḍaḷêsargge bêroḷ |
bisi-nîraṃ poydan ant antirey ire baḷiyaṃ râyaraṃ kûḍe nirmmû- |
odavida garvvadiṃ beseva râyara ben-dovalaṃ bidirchchi râ- |
gadin eḷatanda danti-haya-santatiy allade honnan ittu ka- |
ṭṭida kari-vâji-sâhaṇadoḷ elliyum ill enip ondu sâhasâ- |
munid idirânta bhûbhujara nettiyan aṭṭeyoḷ âḷe poyyad ir- |
ppane suli-pal ghalillen uge bâḷina kîḷ-parajinde môdad ir- |
ppane naḍu-bennoḷ aḷ-garuḷan ommeya neydala kâvan urchchuv-ant |
anituman urchchad irppane raṇâgraṇi Bijjala-Dêva-bhûbhujaṃ ǁ
koḍadin udiyisid Agastyaṃ | kaḍalaṃ pîrddante maṇḍaḷêśvara-râjyakk |
oḍeyan ene puṭṭi vîradi- | n eḍegoṇḍaṃ sakaḷa-dhâtriyaṃ Bijja-nṛipaṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ Kâḷañjara-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ suvarṇṇa-
vṛishabha-dhvajaṃ | ḍamaruka-tûryya-nirghôshaṇaṃ Kaḷachuri-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ | kadana-
prachaṇḍaṃ | mâna-Kanakâchaḷaṃ su-bhaṭar âdityaṃ | kaligaḷ-aṅkuśaṃ gaja-sâmanta saraṇâgata-
vajra-pañjaraṃ pratâpa-Laṅkêśvaraṃ para-nârî-sahôdaraṃ Śanivâra-siddhi giri-durgga-mallaṃ |
chalad-aṅka-Râmaṃ | vairîbha-kaṇṭhîravaṃ niśśaṅka-malla-namâdi-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîmad-bhuja-
baḷa-chakravartti-Tribhuvanamalla-Bijjaṇa-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddha-
mânam â-chandra târaṃ saluttam ire tad-pâda-pad nôpajîvi ǁ

lg.l: sthiti Kasapayya-Nâyakanoḷ eyde jagan-nuti-vettu tôr̤uguṃ ǁ
ttanaman aṇaṃ diśântadoḷ adhishṭhisidaṃ Kasapayya-Nâyakaṃ ǁ
sad-amaḷa-charitradind em- | budu sale Kasapayya-Nâyakanan akhiḷa-janaṃ ǁ
âtaṅge sakaḷa-jana-vi- | khyâta-guṇaṅg eseva maydunaṃ tân ene sañ- |
Bhîma .... gadoḷ îkshipaḍ ill enavêḍa bandu sa- |
prêmade nôḷke tâṃ bayasi bêḷke virôdhaman eyde mâḷke nis- |
ôvade râyaraṃ mur̤iva Poysaḷan-oḍḍan ad onde-vâji .. |
.. vagav endoḍ âr ppogaḷal ârpparo Parmmana sâhasaṅgaḷaṃ |
peḍeyaṃ tâṃ paḍe poyguv endu Phaṇipaṃ ...... |
miḍukaṃ dâḍegaḷaṃ kaḷal̤chugum enuttuṃ siṃhav î-lôkadoḷ |
poḍaralk aṇmavu kaṇḍoḍ eyde poseguṃ ...... doḷ |
siḍil aḷkirppud enalk ad âv adaṭan âmpaṃ Barmma-daṇḍêśanaṃ ǁ
eraḍ illada nuḍiy ondaro- | ḷ irav ...... |
poreyad udâraṃ seraguṃ | berag illada vîrav emma Barmmaṅge nijaṃ ǁ
ḍisidara nettaraṃ nelake vâgi kanalchi . raḷ-garuḷgaḷaṃ |
jjisuvara gaṇṭalaṃ nulidu tammaḍa .. ner̤e tôr̤ad-annegaṃ ǁ
jvalana ........ rggamumaṃ suḍal ârppan endu Bi- |
jjala-nṛipan aḷkar̤im besasuvaṃ gaḍa Barmman id êṃ pratâpiyô ǁ
tova ...... man asthiyaṃ ner̤eye koṭṭar munnin-â-dânigaḷ |
nevadiṃ bêḷpavarg ant avaṃ tuḍal uḍal ........ |
.... gyam akkuve pêḷe ...... nirâkaripavol bhûshâḷiyaṃ divya-va |
vârakav adhikârada siri | nîr êr̤al ad êke garvvadind ant adar̤ol |
sâraṃ pa...... | ... ant ire Barmma-daṇḍanâthaṃ kuḍuvaṃ ǁ
bhyudaya-sthânaṃ mahô ........ payôrâśiy emb ondu pempiṃ |
viditaṃ tân âdan âdaṃ Ravicharasan udâtta ........ draṃ ǁ
ttige paḍi ........ ritav â-cḥaritakk eṇey-âda lakshmi la- |
kshmige saman âdud ond ar̤ivu matt ar̤iviṅg anurûpavâ...... |
...... iv âvagaṃ karaṇad Âcharasaṅg aḷavaṭṭu tôr̤uguṃ ǁ
bâdhâkaraṇaṃ karaṇaṃ | Srîdhara-Nâyakan akharvva ...... raṇaṃ ǁ
bâlyadin audâryyaṃ sâ- | ... yaśô’rtthite su-śîḷav ar̤ivu jagan-mâṅ- |
galyav enisidavu .. | ...... ṇa-Nâyakanoḷ endaḍ êṃ pogaḷveṃ ǁ
takka-gabhîrate karaṇada | Tikkarasaṅg ekka-ḷâvaṇaṃ tâm enikuṃ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ ant enisida ........ kshaṅgaḷ appa samasta-karaṇaṅgaḷu verasu Barmmarasa-daṇḍanâyakar
bBanavâsi-pannir-chchhâsiramu ........ graha-sishṭânugraha-pûrvvakaṃ pratipâḷisuttam irdd ondu-
divasaṃ dharmma-kathâ-pra .... mâhâtmyaṃ prastutav âda samayadoḷu ǁ

lg.l: Gayeyiṃ pâvanav eyde Vâraṇa .... vitraṃ Prayâ- |
ba yaśô-lakshmiyan ântud â-Harihara-sthânaṃ jagan-maṅgaḷaṃ ǁ
.. tu sandôhaṅgaḷiṃ matt uḷida su-charita-vrâtadiṃ pôgad aty-û- |

div.p: (rest illegible)

div.head:
43
At the same place, on a second stone.
div.p: svasti śrî jayâbhyudayaś cha
va ǁ â-ratnâkara-vêshṭitam appa Jambûdvîpada naṭṭa-naḍuve ǁ

lg.l: bhramaṇâvaḷi divijô- | ttama-niḷayaṃ Mandarâchaḷaṃ rañjisuguṃ ǁ

div.p: va ǁ â-Mandara-ma . dharada dakshiṇa-dig-maṇḍaḷakke maṇḍanamum enisi ǁ

lg.l: kântaṃ dhâtrî-kânteya | kuntaḷav ene tôrppud oppi Kuntaḷa-dêśaṃ ǁ

div.p: tat-Kuntaḷa-dharâtaḷâdhipatya .. ḷ anêka-Châḷukya-chakrêśvara-pravarttanâ-byatikramaṇadoḷu ǁ

lg.l: bhîḷa-parâ .. ma-kramanan eyde jagaṃ Jagadêkamallana ǁ

div.p: tat-kâladoḷu ǁ

lg.l: dharaṇî-chakrakk adhîsṭhânam id eni .. dud âtmîya-dôr-ddaṇḍav unma- |
kara-karṇṇôtkîrṇṇav âyt ujvaḷa-yaśav enipaṃ Bijjaḷa-kshôṇipâḷa ǁ
bhôdhi nirâkṛita-vidviḍ- | bâdhaṃ śrî-Vîra-Pâṇḍya-bhûpan udâra ǁ

div.p: tad-agra-tanûjaṃ ǁ

â-Pâṇḍya-maṇḍaḷâdhîśvaraṃ Noṇaṃbavâḍi-mûvatt-ir-chchhâsiramaṃ sva-dharmmadiṃ pratipâḷisuttam
ire tad-anuvarttiy enipa Sindânvayad avatârav ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: Siva-Sindhu-saṅgadind ud- | bhavisidan orbbaṃ kumâran âtana pesaraṃ |
Bhavan iṭṭan oldu Sai.. va- | n ivan end uragâdhirâja-rakshâ-sahitaṃ ǁ
puli-vâlaṃ kuḍid allade | kaliy âgaṃ putran endu Gaurî-pati tann- |
olaviṃ puliyaṃ nirmmise | puli-vâlaṃ kuḍidu beḷedan â-śiśu dhareyoḷ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ mattaṃ Paramêśvaraṃ tanna putraṅge Mâḷatî-dêviyaṃ saṅgrâmakke sahâyey âg endu besase
Niḍudôḷa-Sindan end eraḍaneya pesaraṃ kuḍe paḍedu |

lg.l: Karahâṭaṃ yôga-pîṭhaṃ tanage neley enal sandu tad-bhûmipâḷôt- |
dharaṇîpâḷarkkaḷoḷ ballidan adaṭan udâraṃ kula-khyâtan end ur- |
bbare nichchaṃ baṇṇisal bhû-bhuvanadoḷ esedaṃ Sinda-vaṃśâvatâraṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Karahâṭa-pura-varâdhiśvaraṃ Mâḷatî-
dêvî-labudha-vara-prasâda sâdita-samasta-mahî-maṇḍaḷaṃ | vijaya-lakshmî-karṇṇa-kuṇḍaḷaṃ | nîḷa-
dhvaja-virâjamânaṃ | dâna-Kânînaṃ | mallaḷi-tûryya-ghôshaṇaṃ | guṇa-ratna-bhûshaṇaṃ | Sinda-
mârttaṇḍa vijaya-dôr-ddaṇḍa | Phaṇi-râja-vaṃśa | sujanâvataṃsa | vyâghra-mṛiga-lâñchchhanaṃ |
viniyôga-kâñchanaṃ | śauryya-pârâyaṇaṃ | vairi-Nârâyaṇaṃ | aras-aṅka-karagasaṃ birudar-aṅkuśa |
vairi-vana-dâvaṃ Sindara-Dêvaṃ Niḍudôḷa-Sinda Karahaḍa-nâl-sâsirav-oḷagâg anêka-dêśaṅgaḷan
âḷdan âtana vaṃśadoḷ anêkaruṃ râjyaṃ geydar avaroḷu |

lg.l: pogaḷe dharâtalaṃ piriya-Chaṭṭarasaṃ pesarvettan urbbiyoḷ ǁ
âtana sati sakaḷa-guṇô- | pête Mahîjâtegaṃ Mahîdhara-sutegaṃ |
khyâtey ene Dôrabarasi vi- | nûta-patibrata-guṇakke modal ene negaḷdaḷ ǁ
â-dampatigaḷa puṇyadi-n âdaṃ magan adhika-vikramaṃ Jôgarasaṃ |
mêdiniyan âḷdan âtaṅg | âdaṃ Chaṭṭarasan udita-bhâgyaṃ putra ǁ
siḍda poḍarppinoḷ dorege vappudu daḷḷipa-têjad êḷge pâl- |
gaḍala gabhîra-vṛittig eṇey âdudu tanna gabhîra-vṛitti nâl- |
vaḍi Kanakâchaḷakke migil unnati kaḷpa-mahîruhakke nûr- |
mmaḍi migil âytu châgad esakaṃ dorey âvano Chaṭṭa-bhûpanoḷ ǁ
taḷare taḷarchchuvaṅge Kanakâchaḷam ottuvavaṅg elê viyat- |
praḷeyam avuṅkuvaṅge Javan aṅkisuvaṅge siḍild siḍil diṭaṃ |
seḷedapen-embavaṅg aḷurva-daḷḷuri Chaṭṭaman emba jeṭṭigaṃ ǁ

div.p: va ǁ tad-anantaraṃ tad-vaṃśadoḷu |

lg.l: bhêdisi kâṇbar innuv ari-râja-puraṅgaḷa sîmeyalli sam- |

div.p: ad alladeyuṃ ǁ

lg.l: kaliyaṃ mûdali .. te pandeyan elê pôg endu saṅgrâmadiṃ |
sale pûrbbâṅgadoḷ âvagaṃ tur̤ugi tôr̤utt irppa śastra-braṇâ- |
vaḷi vîrâṅgane kûḍe kaṇ-dereda .. ant oppuguṃ santataṃ ǁ
stârita-vikrama dyumaṇiy-ant ire sat-pada-varttiy embud î- |

div.p: va ǁ yint enisida Sindânvaya-gagana-sudhârôchiy appa Mâchi ...... ge ǁ

lg.l: Ratigaṃ Pârbbatigav Arun- | dhatigaṃ migilâda rûpu-saubhâgya-pati- |
brata-guṇadin oppire hi .. | .. te Chaṭṭala-Dêviy agra-mahiśiy enippaḷ ǁ
lalanâ-ratnav id endu dhâtri pogaḷguṃ .... radiṃ pûṇdu nir- |
bidura-parâkraman âdaṃ | vidita-guṇaṃ Malli-Dêvan ûrjjita-têja ǁ
âvâsam enisidaṃ saṃ- | bhâvitan-.... rasan agrajaṅg ati-bhakta ǁ
taḷa-vikhyâtan enippa Dâśarathig â-Saumitriy ant êne niś- |
mmaḷa .... sa keyvan Ayharasan aṇṇaṅg agraja-snêhadiṃ ǁ
dâna-guṇaṃ kaṇ-der̤adudu | Kânînaṃ maguḷe hu ...... ṅg enipaṃ |

div.p: ant enisid Aiharasa .... ya-tanûjaṃ Râyarasan âtana nûtana-nṛipêtara-prabhâvav ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: doreyê mattina ṭuṃ .... tipar end end âgaḷuṃ kîrttikuṃ |

div.p: â.... da kula-tilakana kula-vanite ǁ

lg.l: guṇadoḷ chaduroḷu śubha-la- | kshaṇadoḷ dore Girije Vâṇi Lakshmî-vadhuv end- |
a...... kîrttisuguṃ dhâ- | riṇi Bûchala-Dêviyaṃ patibrata-nidhiyaṃ ǁ

div.p: â-dampatigaḷge ǁ

lg.l: aṃrita-payônidhiyiṃ chan- | draman udayâchaḷadin arkkan abjôdaradiṃ |
Kamaḷajan ogevante Ramâ- | ramaṇîśvaran Îśvara-nṛipâḷa .... gedaṃ ǁ
paramânandadi nôntu kîrtti-vijaya-śrî-śâ.. gaḷ kûḍal Î- |
Uragêndraṃ Madu-vaṃśad unnatiy idaṃ hô nôḷpen end âgaḷ â- |
daradiṃ ........ tand oḍarchchisida nânâ-dîpad-ant oppuguṃ ǁ
berasu k(h)arav oldu band Î- | śvara-Dêvaṅg ittar eseyal âyuṃ śrîyaṃ ǁ
taḷedirdd â-Hariy Îśvarôrbbipatig îgi........ ddhiya ǁ
kâdapen emba mât amṛita-mantra-nibhaṃ mar̤e-vekkavaṅge tân |
âdaradinde bandhura-da ...... koṭṭapen emba mâtu pu- |
kâduven em ....... puv âjige mâraṇa-mantra-sannibha ǁ
.. gitav âge bâhu nija-dêhave khaḷgave dâḍey embinaṃ |
aras-aṅka-gâḷan embudu | para-baḷake gajêndra-vairiy embudu mattaṃ |
birudarige birudan embudu | .... doḷag Îśvara-niṛpâḷa-kahaḷa-ninâda ǁ

ire dhâre kaliya nettiya |
* So in the original. karagasam enisitt Îśvarâvanîśana khaḷga ǁ
dhuradoḷage hîrut irppudu | kara-chhôdyaṃ Sinda-vaṃśa .......... ǁ
bhuja-baḷa-Bhîma nôrppaḍ abhirâmanu kûrppaḍe Kâman int ivaṃ |
kaṇḍu śaraṇyam enda ...... id endaḍ urbbiyoḷ |
chaṇḍa-parâkramaṅg idiroḷ ântu barduṅkuvar âru bhû .... ǁ
sthirate Himâchaḷakke migil â-sura-dhênuge śauryyam enduv iṃ |

div.p:
va ǁ antu vinayada kaṇiyuṃ vikrama...... ma mâvan alla.... santana râjya-baḷakke..........
Maṇḍali-nâḍ-oḷa ........ hanneraḍuṃ ............. ttuman ayvattâr̤a .......... ḷḷiganepp-
.... manuja .. ḷalu hanneraḍumaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷanadin âḷdu sukha-saṅkathâ-
vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyutta ǁ Banavase-nâḍ-oḷaga .... kampaṇa .......... urbbarâ-tiḷakad ant
esedirddudu Haḷḷavûru-nandana .......... ramya-harmya ...... śâḷa rañji .. nurâga ........
.... mara-râja-râja .......... t enisida ...... śikhâvaḷeyam enisi ǁ

lg.l: ... taṃ pa(y)iśaṅgitaṃ karbburitav aruṇitaṃ Tuṅgabhadrâ-jaḷaugha ǁ

div.p: int ........ Haḷḷavûralu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyuttam irddu ǁ

endu dharmmamane mukhyaṃ mâḍi svasti śrîmat-Kaḷachuryya-kuḷa-tiḷaka chakravartti Bhujabaḷa-
malla-Dêva-varshad eṇṭeneya Śubhânu-saṃvatsarada Puśya-suddhad
* So in the original. amavâse-Bṛihavârad andu śrî-
man-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Yîśvara-Dêv-arasaru śrî-dakshiṇa Gaṅge-Vâraṇâsi-śvayambhu-Śaṅkara-
Nârâyaṇa-dêvara prabhâta-śrî-kâryyakaṃ naivêdya-shôḍashôpachârakke Bhrânti mûvattar̤a tamma
manneyara nibandhiyoḷag ûral ondu honnan uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrânti-sûryya-grahaṇa-byatîpâtad andu
alliya aśêsha-mahâjanaṃ nûr̤a-nâlvaru naḍasuvant âgi avara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrbbakaṃ mâḍi
koṭṭaru ǁ

div.head:
44
On a fifth stone, at the same place.
div.p: va ǁ â-Jambûdvîpada madhya-pradêśakk aḷaṅkârav enal oppambaḍedu ǁ

lg.l: staradiṃ rañjipud ujjvaḷôrjjita-yaśaṃ śrî-sundaraṃ Mandaraṃ ǁ
â-Mandarakke dakshiṇa- | bhû-maṇḍaḷam esevud alli Bharata-kshêtraṃ |
śrî-maṇḍanam ene tôrkkuṃ | bhû-mâninig amardu nimirda Kuntaḷa-dêśaṃ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ â-viśvambharâ-maṇḍaḷamaṃ vijaya-lakshmî-maṇḍita-nija-bhuja.... padiṃ tâl̤dar anekar chChâ-
ḷukya-chakrêśvarar alliṃ baḷiya ǁ
va ǁ âtan-atuḷa-pratâpav ent endoḍe |
va ǁ antuv alladeyuṃ |

lg.l: lîleyan ântu karchchi naliv-uddhata-châtaka-saṅghadind ad â- |
râya-Murâriyaṃ padedu baṇṇipud î-dhare Sôvi-Dêvanaṃ ǁ
tad-anujan ene negal̤dan eseye Mallugi-Dêvaṃ ǁ
śramamaṃ mâṇipen ende Kûrmma-Phaṇabhṛid-dig-dantigaḷg ande saṃ- |
bhran adind âdima-chakravartti-vijayâḷaṅkâran int oppe Saṅ- |

div.p: ad alladeyuṃ |

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvaraṃ Kâḷâñjara-pura-
varâdhîśvaraṃ suvarṇṇa-vṛishabha-dhvaja ḍamaruga-tûryya-nirgghôshaṇa kadana-prachaṇḍa subha-
ṭar-âditya kaligaḷ-aṅkusa chalad-aṅka-Râma śrîmatu Kaḷachuryya-bhuja-baḷa-chakravartti nissaṅka-
malla Saṅkama-Dêvaru Kalyâṇada nele-vîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire |
tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi vairi-bhaya-dâyakan enippa Kâvaṇa-Daṇḍanâyakana...... v ent endoḍe ǁ

lg.l: ḷâvide sati Jakkaṇavve pati-hitey enipaḷ ǁ
natiyaṃ pîl̤dane sand Agast[y]a-kula-jaṃ daṇḍâdhipaṃ Kâvaṇaṃ ǁ

div.p: va ǁ antum alladeyuṃ ǁ

lg.l: maṇḍaḷamaṃ kaḍaṅgi gele nuṅgavud achchariy allad î-jagan- |
upamege chitrav âyt enipud î-vibhu-Kâvaṇa-daṇḍanâthana ǁ
kusidan iḷâtaḷakk irade Gûrjjaran uṭṭudan ikki Hoysaṇaṃ |
misukade Gôveyâ ...... idan endoḍ ad âmpan âvan int |
dore-vettaṃ kadana-prachaṇḍan enisal daṇḍâdhipaṃ Kâvaṇaṃ ǁ

div.p: va ǁ ant â-vibhuvina satiyara mahimey entene ǁ

lg.l: Ratiy ent ante viḷâsadiṃ vibhavadiṃ Mâ-dêviy ent ant Arun- |
dhatiy ent ante patibrate prabhuteyiṃ châturyyadiṃ Bhâratî- |
satiy ent ante negaḷte-vettu mer̤evaḷ châritradiṃ bhâgyad un- |
staramaṃ Mâḷala-Dêvi tâne paḍadaḷ saubhâgyadiṃ bhâgyadiṃ |

div.p: ant âtan-anujana pratâpa-prabhâvav ent endoḍe ǁ

lg.l: seḍedar aḍaṅgidar mmaḍidar ôḍidar aḷgidar aḷki baḷkidar |
mmiḍukade birdd uruḷdare .... gundidar uṭṭudan ikki kaiduvaṃ |
biḍal anugeydar end ari-nṛipâl̤akaraṃ poḍe saṅgarâgradoḷ |
bhyudayada maiyme-vettu sale rañjipar î-dharaṇî-taḷâgradoḷ ǁ

div.p:
svasti śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ sênâdhipati bâhattara niyôgâdhipati râya-daṇḍanâthaṃ gaṇḍa-peṇḍ-
ârav uddaṇḍa-maṇḍaḷika(ṃ)-garvva-sarvvasva-sûr̤ekâr̤a (y)ari-biruda-maṇḍaḷika-mastaka-sûla Ve-
lunâḍa-Chôḷeya-nirmmûḷana Hoysaṇa-diśâpaṭṭa Koṅkaṇa-bhayaṅkara Kaḷachuryya-râjya-samud-
dharaṇa yity-âdi-nâmâvaḷî-virâjamânônnatar appa śrîmat-Kâvaṇayya-daṇḍanâyaka...... dakshiṇa-dig-
vijayamaṃ mâḍi bandu Banavâsi-dêśavaṃ ........ samasta-sâmâ .. verasu ...... sukha-saṅkathâ-
vinôdadiṃ bîḍaṃ biṭṭ irddalli ǁ

lg.l: Banavase-nâḍu rayyam enal oppuvud î-vishayântarâḷadoḷ ǁ

div.p: antu negalte-vetta Banavâsi-dêśa-lakshmige karu-mâḍav enal oppambetta...... tâpav ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: gajamaṃ piḍid ittu chakrig imbene paḍe .. |

div.p:
.......... ḷêśvaraṃ dhîrôdâtta ...... ka-maṇḍana mahiyo .......... dêva maṇḍalika ........
ṇḍanâyakaru supra ............ kîrtti-valliya .......... Tuṅgabhadrâ .......... aṅga-bhôga ..
...... sahita-vâg irdda........ bâḍa baḷiya........ sthâna-mânya hor̤ag âgiy â-nûr̤a-nâlva ......
...... chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluvantâ ........ kkapuṅge tiṅgaḷige ho .... lekkade yathârgha-
diṃ .... chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluvantâgi dhârâ-pûrvvakâṃ mâḍi koṭṭar ǁ Śivâya namaḥ ǁ
(usual final verse)

lg.l: kulâni târayêt karttâ sapta sapta cha sapta cha |
adhô’dhaḥ pâtayêdd harttâ sapta sapta cha sapta cha ǁ

div.p: (usual final verse) śrî-Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇâya namaḥ

div.head:
45
On a stone south of the same temple.

lg.l: .................... ǁ .... gâyamâṇâ bhûr bbhûyâ...... râyaṇasya vaḥ ǁ

div.p: śrî-Lakshmî-Nârâyaṇâya namaḥ ǁ

svasti samadhiga ........ Banavâśi-pura-varâdhîśvara Jayantî-Madhukê...... tya-Râdhêya śaraṇâ-
gata-vajra...... kaligaḷ-aṅkuśa śrî-vîra-Malli-Dêv-arasa...... Kêtaya-Nâyakanu vîra-vitaraṇa-niḷaya
........ davisugu janada ka .. aṃ manakaṃ .. ǁ...... kshâmaṇi Manu-nîti-nija-niḷaya ........
ḍug abhimatamaṃ Malla-ga ...... yya .... naveḍevar̤i .............. tâpa-chakravartti.... rkka-
târaṃ .. salutta ...... rakkiger̤e ........ vayya .... ga bûdi ...... kaṃba 6 a......

div.head:
46
On a pillar of the pial of the same temple.
div.p:
(east face) Vijeya-saṃvatsarada Pushya-śu 12 Â lû Makara-saṅkrânti-puṇya-kâladali avasarada
Chandraśêkhar-ayyanu tamma mâva avasarada Dêmaras-ayyana hesarali Harihara-dêvara uttara-
bhâgadali guḍiyanu kaṭṭisi Dêmêśvara-dêvara pratishṭhênu mâḍisi ar̤avattu-mandige brâhmaṇa-chhatra-
kû dêvara nayivêdyakû (north face) ........ Achyuta-Râya-mahârâyara nirûpadinda.... (rest illegible)

div.head:
47
On a stepping stone to the roof of the same temple.
div.p:
* In Nâgari characters. Ôṃ namô Hariharâya śrî-Mârkkaṇḍêya-tîrthaṃ ǁ
† In Tamil characters. Ôṃ namô Hariharâya śrî-Mârkkaṇḍêya-tîrtthaṃ
Ôṃ namô Hariharâya śrî-Mârkkaṇḍêya-tîrttha | ya-snâna-pânôpa .... du kôṭi-guṇa ...... chatur- ǁ
vvidha-purshârttha-paḍavar ida Skanda-purâṇôktiyiṃ śrî-Vêch-arasaṃ nilisida ǁ

div.head:
48
At the same temple, on the first pillar of the first aṅkaṇa of the mukha-maṇṭapa.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Saka-varshada 1185 neya Rudhirôdgâri-saṃvatsarada Śrâvaṇa-su 15 Âdivârad andu
śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Bommarsara maneya sarvva-pradhânaṃ Kuppageḍḍeya Mêdhâvi-
sênabôvanu śrî-Harihara-dêvariṅge â-mahâjanaṅgaḷa kayalu koṭa bîja-honu ga 10 kaṃ varisake baḍi
ga 3 kaṃ taka leka nichchalu vondu vupâravanu sarvvârâdhane sahita naḍasuvaru â-chandrârkka
maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî śrî

div.head:
49
On a second pillar at the same place.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudayaś cha ǁ Vikrama-saṃvatsarada Bhâdrapada-śu 10 Gu | śrî-Harihara-dêvarige
Gôveya-Paramânanda-Sômanâtha-bhaṭôpâdhyâyara makkaḷu râja-guru Śrîdhara-Dêvaru yavara tamma
Harihara-Dêvaruṃ dvâdaśi-dvâdaśigaḷa vondu-parivâṇa pañcha-bhakshyada upahârake mahâjanaṅ-
gaḷa kayalu avara Vishṇu-bhaṭṭaru koṭṭa-varâha ga 10 r̤a baḍḍi gadyâṇaṃ 3 kke mahâjanaṅgaḷu â-
chandrârkka naḍasuvaru maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî

div.head:
50
On a third pillar at the same place.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Pramâdi-saṃvatsarada Phâlguṇa-su 1 Śu | svasti śrî mahâ-manḍaḷêśvara
vairi-Nârâyaṇa Chaüḍa-veggaḍeyaru tamma maiduna Râjayya-Hariyaṇṇaṅgaḷa kayyalu | Harihara-
dêvara nandâ-dîvigege ga 3 vanamâlege ga 1 antu ga 4 r̤a baḍḍige mahâjanaṅgaḷu â-chandrârkkav âgî
naḍasuvaru maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî śrî

div.head:
51
On the door of the Kâḷabhairava temple, north of the same temple.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Viḷaṃbi-saṃvatsarada Bhâdrapada-su 10 Sômavârad andu śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêś-
varaṃ Yâcharasa-Paṇḍitara yaḷiya Vommarasara maneya Taḍiya-Nâyka Kukanûra Nâgeya-Nâykana
maga mandeyara-ganḍa Gôpaya-Nâykanu śrî-Sâmihara-dêvara teṅkaṇa-bâgila kañchina-vâraṇa kshila-
pâḷana bâgila kañchina tô[ra]ṇa yî-yeraḍanâ mâḍida dharma yâ-chandrârkka maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî
śrî śrî

div.head:
52
At the same temple, on the eastern pillar of the northern door of the raṅga-maṇṭapa.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Prabhava-saṃvatsarada Âśvayija-śuddha 5 Śukravârad andu śrî-Harihara-
dêvage vairi-Nârâyaṇa Chauḍa-veggaḍeyaru ga 3 r̤ar̤a baḍige nandâ-dîvige mattaṃ ga 1 r̤a baḍige
vanamâle antu ga 4 nû mahâjanaṅgaḷa kaiyalu Perumâḷa-Dêvanu Gôvinda-sênabôvanu â-chandrârkka
naḍavantâgi koṭaru maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî śrî

div.head:
53
On the western pillar at the same place.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudayaś cha | Âṅgira-saṃvatsarada Mârggaśira-ba 14 Maṃ | śrî-Harihara-dêvarige
vairi-Nârâyaṇaṃ Chavuḍa-veggaḍeya maga Bîrayyanu ga 3 r̤ar̤a baḍḍige nandâ-dîvige ga 1 r̤a baḍd-
ge vanamâle antu ga 4 nu mahâjanaṅgaḷa kayyalu Perumâḷe-Dêvanu â-chandrârkka-sthâyiy âgi naḍa-
vantâgi koṭaru maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî

div.head:
54
At the bottom of the same pillar.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudayaś cha Dhâtu-saṃvatsarada Mâgha-su 5 Â | śrî-Harihara-dêvarige vairi-Nârâyaṇa
Bîra-veggaḍe nandâ-dîvigege koṭṭa ga 3 r̤ar̤a baḍḍige vanamâle ga 1 r̤a baḍḍige antu ga 4 nu mahâ-
janaṅgaḷa kayyalu Perumâḷe-Dêvanu â-chandrârkka-sthâyiy âgi naḍavantâgi koṭṭanu maṅgaḷa mâhâ
śrî śrî śri

div.head:
55
On the east pillar of the southern door of the raṅga-maṇṭapa.
div.p:
Siddhârtthi-saṃvatsarada Bhâdrapada-su 1 Bri mattaṃ Aṇṇama-veggaḍeya magaḷu Siriyave nandâ-
dîvigege ga 2 baḍige Chayitrake ga 1 vanamâlege mâlagâr̤arige ga 1 antu ga 4 r̤a baḍḍige â-chand-
rârkkav âgi naḍasuvaru mahâjanaṅgaḷu maṅgaḷa mahâ śri śri śri

div.head:
56
At the bottom of the same pillar.
div.p:
Śaka-varsha 1184 neya Dundubhi-saṃvatsarada Aśâḍha-ba 30 Sô | bitîpâtad andu Kuppageḍḍeya
Medaya-sênabôvana heṇḍati Jakkave Harihara-devarige 2 hûvina mâle 1 tuḷasî-danḍe antu daṇḍe
3 kaṃ ga 3 r̤ar̤a baḍḍiyalu â-chandrâkka naḍasuvantâgi mahâjanaṅgaḷa kaiyalu koṭṭaru maṅgaḷa
mahâ śrî śrî śrî

div.head:
57
On the west pillar.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Râksha[sa]-saṃvatsarada Mârggaśira-suddha 5 Sukravâradalu vairi-Narâyana Aṇṇama-
veggaḍeya magaḷu Honniyave .. śrî-Harihara-dêvarige ga 1 r̤a baḍḍige vanamâle mattaṃ ga 3 r̤a
baḍḍige nandâ-dîvige antu ga 4 mahâjanaṅgaḷa kayalu â-chandrârka naḍavantâgi Perumâḷe-Dêva
koṭṭa maṅgala mahâ śrî śrî

div.head:
58
At the same village, on a stone near the main entrance leading to the river.
div.p: (Tamil and Grantha characters)

Śivamayam kôvil pûjai pannukuravar pañjâṅga .... pantulu 1824 varusham—pashṭu 6 rejiminr̤u
neṭṭev inpantiri—2 Subêdâr Shêk baḍê Jemêdâr Veṅgiṭṭâchalam mar̤upaḍi ...... yivâḷ Agôshṭu—
5 têdi Piḷḷaiyâr kôvil kaṭṭi vattôm yinimêl varapaṭṭa ...... —yinda kôvilu kku pûjai naḍappikki-
r̤adu ivar 31 mêl viḷunda bâram mâtuṇai

div.head:
59
At Harihar, on a stone in front of the Lakshmî-dêvi’s temple.
div.p: śrî-Hariharâya namaḥ śrî-Râya-Mahadêva-Lakshmî-Nârâyaṇâya namaḥ ǁ
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

lg.l: Harir avatu kiri-vapur vvô ya(sa)sya radâgrâṅgaṇê sthitâ satataṃ |
ḷ irut oppuvaḷ abja-madhupa-lalaneya ter̤adiṃ ǁ
parav ene neydalant eseva dhâtriyan Adi-varâha-rûpadiṃ |
dharisidan âvan â-Hariharaṃ paripâlisug î-su-dharmmamaṃ ǁ
tri-jagad-adhîsvaraṃ koḍuge namma manôrathamaṃ Gaṇâdhipaṃ ǁ
stârisi hastadiṃ piḍidu tanna saraṇ buguvarge lêsumaṃ |
prêrisalôsugaṃ japisutippaḷ iruḷ pagal âvaḷ ôrvvaḷ â- |
Bhârati namma jihvadal an-âviḷadind irutikke santataṃ ǁ
śrî-Lakshmi prêmadind and udisid-udadhiyoḷ puṭṭi târâdhinâthaṃ |
alli samasta-bhû-vaniteg orbban adhiśvaran âgiy âḷid-â- |
ellarig agragaṇyan enal oppida-kîrttig adhîśa Siṅghaṇaṃ ǁ
naleviṃ vaihâḷig âtaṃ por̤amaḍutiral â-sêneyind edda-dhûḷî- |
kulamaṃ kaṇḍ añji satṛi-kshitipatigaḷu tand itta vittaṅgaḷ ellaṃ |
yiḷeyoḷ kâl-ikkal imb ill ene pasarisal ambhônidhîśaṅge ninn î- |
jaḷadoḷ dauvvârikar baichiḍis enal avar̤iṃ vârdhi ratnâdhinâthaṃ ǁ
bharavasadinda vistarisut oppida Siṅghaṇan emba bhâskaraṃ ǁ
staradind a-krôdhadindaṃ pusige sogasan emb ondu tâtparyyadindaṃ |
ari-chakraiśvaryyamaṃ koṇḍ uduṭi kaḷava sâmarthyadiṃ dhairyyadindaṃ |
vara-bhâgyaṃ Pâṇḍavâdyaṅg eṇey enal esedaṃ vîṛa-Kandhâra-Dêvaṃ ǁ
mudadi nṛipâlan âdanô Haraṃ ripu-Darppakanaṃ gelalke puṭṭ- |
idan ene Kandharânuja mahâ-Mahadêva-mahîśan oppidaṃ ǁ
biḍu nîṃ Kêraḷa ninna râjya-madamaṃ Hammîra nîṃ vîradiṃ |
keḍabêḍ îgaḷe bandu kâṇ oḍeyanaṃ kappaṅgaḷaṃ bêgadiṃ |
kuḍu nîṃ Koṅkaṇa Chôḷa ninna balup inn ên appud end âgaḷuṃ |
poḍavîsaṃ Mahadêvan orbban enutaṃ dvârâdhipar ssâr̤uvar ǁ
Gauḷar kkâḷagak añji putt aḍaridar ṇṇâṇ-geṭṭu-pôg Utkaḷar |
chchêḷa-prîtiya biṭṭar ôḍi jalavaṃ pokk añjidar mMâḷavar |
Lâḷar kkâṇike goṭṭu kaṇḍar uḷida-kshmâpâḷar ell âgaḷuṃ |
vêḷ-âḷ-âgihar endaḍ êṃ pogaḷven â-bhûpa-pratâpôgramaṃ ǁ
pura-mûr̤akk eṇeyâgi mâḍi kaḷad â-têjôgram ent âdudô |
ari-mattêbhama geldu pempu vaḍedaṃ matt âvanô bhûmiyoḷ |
Girijêśaṃ Mahadêva-Râya-vesariṃ pṛithvîśan âdaṃ diṭaṃ ǁ
tv anuguṇa-vara-nâmâ bhutaḷê bhâti Râmaḥ ǁ

div.p:
svasti śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâraka Dvârâvatî-pura-varâ-
dhîsvara Yâdava-kuḷa-kamaḷa-kaḷikâ-vikâsa-bhâskara Mâḷava-Râya-Madana-Triṇêtra Gûrjjara-Râya-
vâraṇâṅkuśa Teluṅga-Râya-sthâpanâchâryya Hoysaṇa-Râya-sâmrâjya-lakshmî-haraṇa-prachaṇḍa-dôr-
ddaṇḍa ari-râya-jagajh-jhamparuṃ paṇâchâriya śrî-râya-Nârâyaṇa prauḍha-pratâpa-chakravartti śrî-
vîra-Râmachandra-Bâya-vijaya-râjyôdayadalli âtana maneya samasta-sainyâdhipati śrîmat-Sâḷuva-
Tikkama-Dêvana prâdurbbhâva-pratâpaṅgaḷ entendaḍe ǁ

lg.l: vara-sêneg adhîśan âgi Tikkaman esadaṃ ǁ
mîr̤ida kharggadind esava pempugaḷ-obbuḷig orbban îśvaraṃ |
kaumudiy êrid emba teradi karam esadirddaṃ ǁ
giriyaṃ chûrnnisi bhûmiyâgi nabhamaṃ mâḍuttam ambhôdhiyaṃ |
piriduṃ perggesar̤ âgi śatṛi-śiramaṃ seṇḍâḍi vairi-śriyaṃ |
paritand îvudu Ramachandra-charaṇakk ânandadiṃ vikramaṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti śrîman-mahâ-manḍaḷêsvaraṃ atyantôddhata-yuddha-sannaddha-baddha-vaira-vîrârâtî-brâta-
śirô-nikṛintana-prachaṇḍa-dôr-ddaṇḍanuṃ yuddha-prachaṇḍanuṃ grahaṇa-nirggata-prêraṇa-lagna-
sthâpanôllaḷita-sâdi-sû .... sûkaḷa-sapti-saṅkuḷa-grâhita-pañcha-dhârâ-prapañcha-sañcharaṇa-
chaturatara-su-rêkhâ-Rêvantanuṃ vipuḷa-nija-kîrtti-va .... lalita-dig-antanuṃ vîrâri-maṇḍaḷika-Châ-
ṇûra-malla-gaḷa-gâḷa-taraḷaukita .... pa-janita-ḍhakkâ-ninâdana-sâda-sampâdana-prabhô pratimalla
purâṇa-Nârâ ...... ṇanuṃ ǁ śrî-Triyambaka-śrî-Harihara-nâtha-pâdâravinda-prasâda-prâpta-râjya-
rakshaṇa-daksha-daksihṇa-bhujâ-daṇḍa .... sannâha .. ra-pârijâta kanaka-dhârâ-varusha-nissîma-
sauriyanuṃ Kâdamba-Râya-sthâpanâchâriyanu Hoyisaḷa-Râya-disâpaṭṭanuṃ brâhmaṇa-prasâdâ-
sâdita-sâśvataisvaryya-niratanuṃ su-charita-charitanum appa samasta-sainyâdhipati nissaṅka-pra-
tâpa śrî-Sâleya-Tikkama-Dêvarâṇeyaru dakshiṇa-dig-vijeya-Dôrasamudrâkramaṇa-kṛita-kâryya kari-
turaga-mukhya-samasta-vastu-sahitaṃ kappaṃ-goṇḍu bandalli ǁ

lg.l: dhareyoḷ bêr̤âgiy ond ond eḍeyoḷu ghanav end endu sandirddaḍaṃ tâṃ |
sariyê Vârâhiyiṃ bhû-surar enisutihâ nûr̤a-nâlvar dvijâgrê- |
sarariṃ Saurîśan-âvâsadin esava Guhâraṇya-dêśakk av ellaṃ ǁ
yidu Gaurîśvaran ippa Raupya-giriyô bhû-lôkadoḷ kautukaṃ |
yidu nôḍalk olid andu band ar̤id idaṃ śrî-mânyamaṃ mâḍidaṃ |
mudadiṃ śrî-Maha .... daṃ tan-nâma sad-dharmmamaṃ ǁ

div.p: va ǁ yi-Harihar-agrahâra sarbba-mânyavâda prakârav entendaḍe ǁ

lg.l: suṅkaṃ siddhâyav enitu mânyav enuttaṃ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ yî-Harihara ...nâḷâ Sâḷuva-Tikkama-Dêvanu tann oḍeyan appa Mahadêva-Râya-vesara dêvâlaya-
dharmmavaṃ mâḍal vêḍi mana-danda pariy-entendaḍe ǁ

lg.l: dêvaṃ tanna samarchchakargg olidudam tand îven end embudaṃ |
jîvan-martyarig oppe tôrppa ter̤adiṃ śrî-mânyamaṃ mâḍidaṃ |
dêvatvaṃ paḍed endu tân ar̤ipidaṃ śri-Tikkamaṅg Îśvaraṃ ǁ

div.p:
va ǁ î-pariyalu manamaṃ prêrisid â-dêvana samîpadalliye tann oḍeyan appa Mahadêva-Râyan ane
Lakshmî-Nârâyaṇa-mûrttiyaṃ pratishṭhâpisal â-sthaḷasthar appa mûr̤a-nâlvaraṃ santôshaṃ baḍisi
bhûmiyaṃ krayaṃ-gonḍu prâsâdôpakramada dinav âvud endaḍe ǁ svasti śri jayâbhyudaya-Saka-var-
shada 1199 neya Îśvara-saṃvatsarada Chai .. 13 Śukravâradandu toḍagi naḍavutaṃ barey alliṃ
mêlaṇa
* So in the original. Bahudhâyana-saṃvatsarada Mâgha-śu 5 Guruvârad andû ǁ

va ǁ alliṃ mêlaṇa Pramâthi-saṃvatsarada Phâlguṇa-śu 5 Bhaumâśviniyoḷ â-dêvâlyakke suvarnna-kala-
śa-pratishṭheyaṃ mâḍi â-dêvara śrî-kâryakke Hariharadalli krayaṃ-goṇḍu koṭṭa bhûmiya vivarav
ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: neṭṭane tâṃ gadde nâlku mattaran olaviṃ |

div.p:
â-dêvâlyada sammukhada kalla-kôṭeyim mûḍaṇa mane 1 koṭṭeya-Kallayyaniṃ baḍagaṇa voḷa-tuḍuke 1
santhey-âraveya teṅkaṇa hor̤a-kaḷa 1 Râmanâtha-dêvara tôṭadiṃ baḍagaṇa hû-dôṭa 1 ǁ

va ǁ mattaṃ śrî-Hariharada aśêsha-mahâjanaṅgaḷuṃ Noṇambavâḍi-mûvattitsâyira samasta-
paṭṭaṇakke sirômaṇi-Uchchaṅgi-Bêtûru-Lôkeyaker̤e-Banevaḷḷi-modalâda-paṭṭaṇigaru seṭṭiguttaruv
ubhaya-Nânâ-dêsigaḷu mukhyavâda hadineṇṭu-sameyaṅgaḷu Hariharadalu vajra-bayisaṇigeyâgi kuḷ-
ḷirdda-Mahadêva-Râya-Lakshmî-Nârâyaṇa-dêvarige koṭṭa âya-dâyada kramav ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: avak inituṃ mânyav endar anibaru neraduṃ ǁ
por̤avêr̤iṅg ele nûr̤umaṃ meṇasumann êlakki mukhyaṅgaḷaṃ |
ner̤a tâṃ sollagey ayvat end aḍakeyaṃ matt illi mâr̤âdaḍaṃ |
ter̤ug ayvatt ele kêṇikakk aḍakey îrond-ondan end endum î- |

div.head:
60
At Harihara, on a rock near Rudrapâda in the Tuṅgabhadra river.
div.p:
Śaka 1763 neya Plava-saṃ ǁ Chaitra-śu ǁ 1 ǁ śrî-guru-Dattâtrêya-Jôśi Mêsha .. Lakshamaṇa Giri-
maḍi Śejinâtha Panthali-Pâranâtha.

div.head:
61
At Harihara, on a stone in front of the Chilamagere-Basavaṇṇa temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ | śrî-prithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ parama-bha-
ṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ | śrîmat-pratâpa-chakravartti Jagadêkamalla-
Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam
re | srîmat-pratâpa-chakravartti-Jagadêkamalla-varshad aydeneya Dundubhi-saṃvatsarada Śrâvaṇa-
śuddha-paurṇṇamî-Bṛihaspativâra-sôma-grahaṇad andu Bhrânti-mûvattar̤a manneya-Aiharasan ây-
ayyan-aḷiya Mâcharasaruṃ tad-anuja Mallarasaruṃ Kâma ... harasanuṃ śrî-Harihara-dêvara
Kûḍalûralu tamma Hantumaṇṇina manneya geyyoḷage Beḷeyager̤eyim paḍuvalu Kêkarakoḷada ba-
.. teṅkalu tamma śrî-Yôgêśvara-dêvargge naivêdyakk endu dhârâ-pûravakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭa ereya keyi
mattar ondu 1 ǁ

Nandana-saṃvatsarada Chaitra-śuddha-pañchamî-Bṛihaspativâra-Pushya-nakshatra-vyatîpâta-yôgad-
andu Haḷḷavûru Mâcharasara mamma Îśvara-Dêv-arasaru śrî-Yôgêśvara-dêvargge munna Beḷvaḍi-
yalu tamma manneya geyyoḷage tâvu koṭṭa keyge pratipûravâgi Kûḍalûralu tamma manneya
keyyoḷage munna Mâcharasaru koṭṭa mattar ondar̤a hattira baḍaga-deseyalu kûḍi sthaḷa-
vṛittiyâgiy â-chandrârkka-sthâyiyâgi naḍavantâgi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭa ereya keyi mattar
eraḍu 2 antu mattaru mûr̤u 3 ǁ ür-oḍeya-pramukhay aśêsha-mahâjanaṃ nûr̤a-nâlvaruṃ śrî-Harihara-
dêvara mâlagâr̤arige mane yilladirddaḍe śrî-Yôgêśvara-dêvara bhûmiya maṇṇu mâr̤âṭavâgi Vasanta-
Râma-dêvara kayyalu dhâreyaṃ koṇḍu â-bhûmige pratipûravâgi śrî-Harihara-dêvara keyyoḷage
modala erehiṭṭeya gur̤uvada mommêreyalli śrî-Yôgêśvara-dêvara pâdârâdhakar appa Vasanta-Râma-
dêvargge dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭa ere mattaru 1 kamma 100 Yôgi-Nâgadêva ... Beṭṭada-
Gauḍager̤eya keḷage tamma aṃśadalli śrî-Yôgêśvara-dêvara ... dyakk endu dhârâ-pûrbbakaṃ mâḍi
koṭṭa keṅgâḍu kamma 250 ma .... hadêva Chaṭṭayyaṅgaḷu śrî-Yôgêśvara-dêvargge hû-dôṇṭakk en
.... pramukha-aśêsha-mahâjanaṅgaḷa sannidhiyalu .... ya hattire mûḍa-deseyalu nûr̤-ayvattu 150
kamma .... dêva-dânavâgi â-chandrârkka-sthâyiyâgi naḍavantâ ... dêvargge dhârâ-pûrbbakaṃ mâḍi
koṭṭaru ǁ ür-oḍeya-pra ... sha-mahâjanaṃ nûra-nâlvara sannidhiyalu sthaḷada-seṭṭe ... lligar ayvatt-
okkaluṃ śrî-Yôgêśvara-dêvargge naivêdya .... aṅgaḍiyalu are-vâna-pramâṇinalu akki saṭṭu ....
dîvigege gâṇadalu sollageya pramâṇinalu .... ge 1 vaṃ â-chandrârkka-sthâyiyâgi naḍavantâgi
dhârâ .... kaṃ mâḍi koṭṭaru ǁ suṅkada-heggaḍe Hariyapayya-nâya ... vâgi samasta-Bharata-neraviy-
anibaruṃ .... hoḷeya suṅkadalli tiṃ .... haṇavaṃ śrî-Yôgêśvara-dêvara naivêdyad abhigârakke â-
chandrârkka ...... vantâgi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭaru ǁ Dammapâḷa daṃ ... śrî-Yôgêśvara-
dêvargge Tâvareyahaḷḷiyalli dhârâ-pûr ...... ṭṭa-vṛittiy ondar̤oḷage Vasanta-Râma-dêvaru â-vûra ....
araḷiya-gaddeyalli kamma 220 hiriya-ker̤eya baḍa .... kamma 450 Nârâyaṇa-dêvara baḍaga-deseyalu
maneye ...... int initu-bhûmiyumaṃ śrî-Yôgêśvara-dêvargge sarvva .... vâgi kâd-ûḍuvantâgi
mêlâda-bhûmiymaṃ śrî-nija .... kumâra-gâladalu śrî-Yôgêśvara-dêvargge koṭṭa alliya ko ... ṇa
vonduvan â-vûra mahâjanaṅgaḷge pâda-pûjeyâ .. rmmamaṃ â-mahâjanaṅgaḷ â-chandrârkka-sthâyiy-
âgi naḍava .... (usual final verse).

div.head:
62
At Harihara, on a stone lying in front of the Basavaṇṇa temple.
div.p:
śrî śubham astu Prajôtpatti-saṃvatsarada Puśya-ba 10 lu śrî-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara Râvaji-Raṅgapp-
arasa-Jayadêva-mahâ-arasugaḷa kâryake kartarâda .. lâbhâra-Bhâna-Voḍêra kâryake kartarâda
Prasanna-Voḍêru Taḷavârake-Haḷi-nâyaki koṭa sati-âya umbaḷi-hola vokuḷada hola staḷa Chilama-
gere sthaḷa yidake tapidare tâyige aḷupidaru

div.head:
66
On copper plates in possession of Shanbhog Sîtârâmaiyya.
div.p: (Ib) svasti

śrîmatâṃ sakala-bhuvana-saṃstûyamâna-Mânavyasa-gôtrâṇâṃ Hâritî-putrâṇâṃ sapta-lôka-mâtṛibhis
Saptamâtṛibhir (abhir)abhivarddhitânâṃ Kârttikêya-parirakshaṇa-prâpta-kalyâṇa-paramparâṇâṃ
bhagavan-Nârâyaṇa-prasâda-samâsâdita-varâha-lâñchhanêkshaṇa-kshaṇa-vaśîkṛitâśêsha-mahîbhṛitâṃ
Chalukyânâṃ kulam alaṅkarishṇôr aśvamêdhâvabhṛitha-snâna-pavitrîkṛita-gâtrasya śrî-Puḷikêśi-
vallabha-mahârâjasya sûnuḥ parâkramâkrânta-Vanavâsy-âdi-para-nṛipati-maṇḍala-praṇibaddha-
viśuddha-kîrttiḥ śrî-Kîrttivarmma-pṛithivî-vallabha-mahârâjas tasyâtmajas samara-saṃsakta-sakalô-
ttarâ-pathêśvara-śrî-Harshavarddhana-parâjayôpalabdha-Paramêśvarâpara-nâmadhêyaḥ Satyâśraya-
śrî-pṛithivî-vallabha-mahârâjâdhirâja-paramêśvaras tat-priya-sutasya Vikramâditya-paramêśvara-
bhaṭṭârakasya mati-sahâya-mâtra-sa(II a)madhigata-nija-vaṃśa-samuchitôchita-râjya-vibhavasya
vividha-rasita-sita-samara-mukha-gata-ripu-narapati-vijaya-samupalabdha-kîrtti-patâkâvabhâsita-dig-
antasya himakara-kara-vimala-kula-paribhava-vilaya-hêtu-Pallava-pati-parâjayânantara-parigṛihîta-
Kâñchî-purasya prabhâva-kuḷiśa-daḷita-Chôḷa-Pâṇḍya-Kêraḷa-dharaṇîdhara-nûyamâna-mâna-sṛiṅgasya
ananya-samavana-Kâñchî-pati-maṇi-makuṭa-kûṭa-kiraṇa-salilâbhishikta-charaṇa-kamalasya tri-samu-
dra-madhya-vartti-bhuvana-maṇḍalâdhîśvarasya sûnuḥ pitur âjñayâ Bâlênduśêkharaśyêva Sênânîr
dDaitya-balam ati-samuddhataṃ Trairâjya-Pallava-balam avashṭabhya(ḥ) samasta-vishaya-praśa-
manâd vihita(n)-manônurañjanaḥ atyanta-vatsalatvâd Yudhishṭhitra iva Śrî-râmatvâd Vâsudêva
iva nṛipâṅkuśatvâd Paraśu-Râma iva râjâśrayatvâd Bharata iva Pallava-Kaḷabhra-Kêraḷa-
Haihaya-Viḷa-Mâḷava-Chôḷa-Pâṇḍyâdyâḥ yên Âḷuva-Gaṅgâdyair mmaulais sama-bhṛityatâṃ nîtâḥ
Vinayâditya-Satyâśraya-śrî-pṛithivî-vallabha-ma(II b)hârâjâdhirâja-paramêśvara-bhaṭṭârakas sarvân
evam âjñâpayati viditam astu vô’smâbhi[ḥ] shôḍaśôttara-shachchhatêshu Śaka-varshêshv atîtêshu
pravarddhamâna-vijaya-râjya-saṃvatsarê chaturddaśê varttamânê Harishapura-pratyâsannê Ka-
rañjapatra-grâmam adhivasati vijaya-skandhâvârê Kârttikê paurṇṇamâsyâṃ śrîmad-Âḷuva-Râja-
vijñâpanayâ Vâtsyasa-gôtrasya Śrî-sarmmaṇaḥ sômayâjinaḥ pautrâya Mâra-śarmmaṇaḥ putrâya Îśâna-
śarmmaṇê vêda-vêdâṅga-pâragâya Vanavâsi-maṇḍalê Eḍevoḷal-bhâge Kir̤u-Kâgâmâsi-nâmâ grâma-
sa-bhôgas sarvva-bâdhâ-parihârôpêtô dattaḥ Per-gGâgâmâsi-grâma-paśchima-bhâga-kṛitâkṛita-kshê-
traṃ cha tasya kshêtrasya sîmâ pûrvvôttara-dig-bhâgê Sirigâḷu-grâma-sîmni Pulivutu tata âgatya |
Kavvesurigoḷaṃ | tataḥ Perbbuttu | tata (III a) Âldore | tatô Âlgoḷa | tatô Nittakoḷa tataḥ prâg
gatvâ Nêr̤ilger̤e | tataḥ Kurupaker̤e | tataḥ dakshiṇa-diśam âvṛitya Arakaṭṭaṃ tad âgâmibhir asmad-
vaṃśyai[r a]nyaiś cha râjabhir âyur-aiśvaryyâdînâṃ vilasitam achirâṃśu-chañchalam avagachchhad-
bhir â-chandra-dharârṇṇava-sthiti-sama-kâlaṃ yaśaś chichîshubhis sva-datti-nirvviśêshaṃ paripâla-
nîyam uktañ cha bhagavatâ vêda-vyâsêna Vyâsêna

lg.l: svaṃ dâtuṃ su-mahachchhakyaṃ duḥkham anyasya pâlanaṃ |
dânaṃ vâ pâlanaṃ vêti dânât śrêyo’nupâlanaṃ ǁ

div.p: mahâ-sandhi-vigrahikaṃ śrî-Râmapuṇya-vallabhêna likhitam idaṃ śâsanaṃ ǁ

div.head:
67
On copper plates belonging to Shanbhog Râmakṛishṇayya.
div.p: (Nâgarî characters.)

lg.l: pâthaḥ-krîḍâ-sarâṃsy âsan yasya sapta mahârṇavâḥ ǁ
Harêr lîlâ-varâhasya daṃshṭrâ-daṇḍaḥ sa pâtu vaḥ |
Hêmâdri-kalaśâ yatra dhâtrî chhatra-śriyaṃ dadhau ǁ
akûpârâd apârâd vaḥ sa pâyâd Vâma-dêvatâ ǁ śrî ǁ
manôjña-kântâ-kucha-hâra-bhûshaṇaṃ sat-saṅgamô’bhûn mahitaḥ sa Saṅgamaḥ ǁ
* So in the original Hôrâ-siddhânta-vêdau dvau svîkṛitaikânanaḥ phaṇî |

div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-nṛipa-Śâlivâhana-śaka 1276 neya Vijaya-saṃvatsarada Mâgha-śudha 15
Chandravâra-sômôparâga-parvaṇi puṇya-kâladallu | śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara
dharma-mûrti Bukka-Râya-mahârâyaru | Kâsyapa-gôtrada Bôdhâyana-sûtrada Yajuḥ-śâkheya Hari-
haradêvapura-sthaḷada daivajñaru Mâdhava-Jôî̈saṅgaiyyagaḷa makkaḷu | Râmaṇṇa-Jôî̈saiyyagaḷige-
Koṭṭûra-châvaḍige saluva Uchchaṅgî-vêṇṭhad-oḷagaṇa Hariharadêvarapurada ûrumbâḍadoḷ iha chau-
grâmada bhûmi-madhyadoḷu | nâvu Miṭṭaligollage nirûpiśi kaṭṭisi koṭṭa Miṭṭaliganakaṭṭe-yandu-nâma-
dhêyakavâda grâmava(IIb)nu chatuḥ-śîmâ-sammatavâgi sa-hiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvaka-mâḍi
nidhi-nikshêpa-jala-pâshâṇa-akshîṇi-âgâmi-sidha-sâdhya-hebbârike-modalâda sakala-ashṭa-bhôga-têja-
svâmya-sahitavâgi yêka-bhôgadiṃ bhôgisuvad endu koṭṭevu | â-Miṭṭaligollanakaṭṭe-grâmada chatuḥ-
śîmâ-vivara (here follow details of boundaries) î-bage-chatuḥ-śîmâ-sammitavaṃ mâḍi śrî-Virûpâksha-
dêvara sannidhiyalli manaḥ-pûrvakadinda mâḍi-koṭṭanthâ dharma-śâsana vanu | â-chandrârka putra-
pautra-pâramparavâgi sukhadiṃ bhôgisuvadu ǁ (usual final verses) śrî-Virûpâksha
† In Kannaḍa characters.

div.head:
68
At Harihara, copy of the copper inscription in possession of the above Shanbhog.

lg.l: pâthaḥ-krîḍâ-sarâṃsy âsan yasya sapta mahârṇavâḥ ǁ
Harêr lîlâ-varâhasya daṃshṭrâ-daṇḍaḥ sa pâtu vaḥ |
Hêmâdri-kalaśâ yatra dhâtrî chhatra-śriyaṃ dadhau ǁ

tasya putras tu Liṅgâkhyô
* So in the original. dvau śâstrâdhipatir dharât ǁ

div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-nṛipa-Śâlivâhana-śake 1183 neya Dundubhi-nâma-saṃvatsara-Vaiśâkha-ba |
30 Bhânuvâra-sûryôparâga-parvaṇi puṇya-kâladallu | śrî-Pampâ-kshêtrada Virûpâksha-dêvara
sannidhânadali śrî-Hariharêśvara-dêvara sannidhânadali śrî-Hariharêśvara-dêvaru nirûpisalâgi śrî-
man-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara sarva-râja-rakshaka | dharma-mûrti Harihara-Râya-mahâ-
râyaru Śâṅkaripura-staḷada Viśvâmitra-gôtrada Âśvalâyana-sûtrada Ruk-śâkheya Râma-Dêvayagaḷa
makaḷu Liṅgarasarige Vijayanagarakke saluva Kôṭûru-châvaḍi-keḷagaṇa Vuchaṅgi-vêṇṭhed oḷagaṇa
Hariharada-sîmeyoḷ ihâ | Śâṅkaripurav emba grâmavannu śrî-Hariharêśvarana dêvâlayadali nirantara-
vêda-śâstra-pârâyaṇav âgabêk endu â-grâmavannu mahâjanaṅgaḷa hesarali prati-nâmadhêyav iṭṭu
koṭṭanthâ Śâṅkaripurad-â-grâmakke nîvû tat-tat-pûrvârabhyadindalu hebhâra-yajamânike muntâda-
svâstigaḷannu anubhavisikoṇḍu barutta yidali â-mahajanaṅgaḷa 60 vṛittigaḷa vaḷage nimigû vêda-
pârâyaṇakke 2 yaraḍu-vṛittiyannu sa-hiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvaka mâḍi koṭevu â-grâmada tat-
pûrvada chatuḥ-sîmâ-vivarâ | (here follow details of boundaries) î-bage chatu-sîmâ-mareyâde-
yoḷu nîvû nimma tat-pûrvadâ svâstiyannû italâgi vêda-pârâyaṇakke koṭṭa yaraḍu-vṛitti saha anu-
bhaviśikoṇḍu î-mahâjanaṅgaḷa vṛittigaḷige kâlântaradinda anyônya-toḍaku-bârada-rîti tidiṭu sura-
kshitadinda â-chandrârka-stâyigaḷâgi nimma putra-pautra-pârampariyâgi sukhadiṃ bôgisuvadu yandu
barasi-koṭṭa dharma-śâsanavû ǁ (usual final verses) śrî-Virûpâksha.

div.head:
69
At Nanditâvare village (Harihara hobli), on a lintel of the door of the Îśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya Saka-varsha 1142 neya Vikrama-saṃvatsarada Mârgaśira-suddha-pañchami-
Sômavâradandu Tâvaregeya śrî-Amṛitaliṅga-Mâṇikêsvara-dêvarge śrîmanu-maha-pradhânaṃ śrîkara-
ṇada beggaḍe Nâgaṇṇaṅgaḷa maga Mâṇikkaṇṇanu dêvara aṅga-bhôga-naivêdyakke dhârâ-pûrvvakkav
âgi biṭṭa gadde hiriya-ker̤eya keḷage gadde kamba 16 Jiguḷe-dâriyiṃ teṅkalu keṅgâḍu mattaru 1
Mallikârjjuna-dêvara keyyiṃ mûḍalu Haridreyiṃ teṅkalu naṭṭa kallu mûḍalu Vuriyaraḷi-mêre
mattaru 2 kamba 50 ............ ba 50 (usual final phrases) śrî-Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇa maṅgaḷa mahâ
śrî śrî ǁ

div.head:
70
At Bhânuvaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone in Patel Abbalûrappa’s house, in the fort.

lg.l: Harir avatu kiri-vapur vô yasya radâṅkûra-kôṭi-pîṭhâ saḥ |
ittu jasaṃ baḍedan ettaluṃ bittaradiṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ Yâdava-Nârâyaṇaṃ bhuja-baḷa-prauḍha-pratâpa-chakravartti śrî-
vîra-Râmachandra-Râya-vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivriddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-
târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi | śrîmanu-mahâ-pradhânaṃ sarbbâdhikâri Tipparasa-
ru | Saka-varusha 1197 neya Bhâva-saṃvatsarada | Mâgha-ba 12 Sô | Pushya-nakshatra | yôga
vyatîpâta | Bava-karaṇa saṅkramâṇadali śrîmad-anâdiy-agrahâraṃ śrî-Lakshmî-Nârâyaṇapuravâda
Bânavaḷḷiy-aśêsha-mahâjanaṇgaḷige | yâ- sthḷada sthaḷada ker̤eya dharmmakke | yavara prathama-sthaḷada
haḷḷigaḷaḷ âghâta-hala-putrikada dhanavanu | dhâra-pûrbbakaṃ mâḍi | yâ-chandrârkka-sthâyiyâgi
koṭṭanu | (usual final phrases)

lg.l: dêyaman itt iḷeyan âḷdan â-Tipparasaṃ ǁ

div.p: (usual final verse) śrî śrî śrî

svasti śrîmatu-Yâdava-Nârâyaṇaṃ bhuja-baḷa pravuḍa-pratâpa-chakravartti śrî-Râmachandra-Râyana
tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi śrîmanu-mahâ-pradhânaṃ sarvvâdhikâri Tipparsaru Râyana samakshadalu
Dhâtu-saṃvatsarada Śrâvaṇa-ba 12 Sô-saṅkrântiyalu Bânuvaḷḷiyâ-pravishṭa Hêḷeyahâḷu Elavaṭṭi
Jiguḷiya suṅka-nibandhiyanu yâ-sthaḷada yaśêsha-mahâjanaṅgaḷige dhârâ-pûrvvakav âgi koṭṭaru |

div.head:
71
At Niṭṭuru (same hobli), on a stone on the site of Kallêśvara’s temple.
div.p:
(The top portion is gone) svasti samasta-bhuvanâsrayaṃ śrî-prithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ para-
mêsvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâsraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmaṃ-Jayasiṅgha-Dêvaṃ
prithvî-râjyaṃ geyuttam ire ǁ svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-sabda ...... yaṃ śrî-prithvî-vallabhaṃ
Pallava-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ namôgha-vâkyaṃ Kâñchîpura-varêsvaraṃ śrîmann-Udayâditya-Dêva râjyaṃ
geyuttam ire Noḷamba-Pallava-Permanaḍi-Dêva ǁ Kadambaḷige-sâyirada baḷiya kampaṇa Kundûr-
el̤patar̤oḷagaṇa Kundûruṃ Bannikôḍuṃ Happavanahâḷuṃ Niṭṭûrumaṃ śrîman-nârggâvuṇḍa Ballayan
âḷuttam ire Saka-varsha 956 neya Yuva-saṃvatsarada yuttarâyaṇa-saṅkrântiyalu Ballêsvara-dêvargge
biṭṭa gal̤de dêvara muntana-ker̤eya kelage kamma 700 bel̤dale matta 7 dêvara keyoḷage maṭake sama-
bhâga stânakke Sôvarâsi-bhaḷan oḍeya ǁ Brahapuri-Nâraṇayage â-devasaṃ dhârâ-pûrbakadiṃ kâl-
garchi koṭṭa gal̤de kammaṃ 450 bel̤dale matta 7 ûr-ggavuṇḍan Er̤e-Chaṭṭayyan-oḷagagi biṭṭa
dharmma (usual final phrases).

div.head:
72
At the same village, on a stone lying near the western wall of Nâḍiga-Timmapa’s house.
div.p: (Nagarî characters)

î-staḷada jôisa .. âva ... Timmâ-bhaṭara Mâdhava-bhaṭarige Âdapa-nâyakaru koṭṭa Basavasamudrav
emba agrahârada śilâ-śâsana
* In Kannaḍa characters. śrî

div.head:
73
At Kûṇibelagere (same hobli), on a broken stone lying in front of the Kallêśvara’s temple.
div.p: ........ kan akku ........ gu ǁ (usual final verse).

svasti samasta-vastu-guṇa-saṃpannaṃ | (n)aparimita-śakti .......... rânanaṃ | bandhu-jana-
hṛidayânandanaṃ | vivêka-mu ...... janayaṃ | Śiva-prasâda-labdha-karttavyâpti-vaḷayaṃ | saka
.... nâmâdi-samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ śrîmat-Beḷkareya ...... yakaṃ elleya Kâvaṇada Nelagaṭṭa
koṭṭage pokka...... alli puṭṭidudaṃ Bhadrêśvara-dêvargge biṭṭa datti yantendaḍe .... bojaṅgaru
pâgavaṃ kuḍuvaru mattaṃ hattu-hêr̤i.... vaṃ kuḍuvaru (usual final phrases).

div.head:
74
At Haḷêhâḷu attached to Dêvara Beḷakere (same hobli), on a pillar of the raṅga-manṭapa of the Kalleśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Vijaya-saṃvachchharada Phâlguṇa-suddha-pâḍiva-Sômavâradalli Kali-yuga-Dhan-
vantari Vijaya-panḍitaru śrî-Kali-dêvarige nivêdyakke nandâ-dîvigegaṃ sîtâḷa-gaḍuge vasu-dhâregaṃ
aṅga-bhôga-raṅga-bhôgakkaṃ Sôvarâsi-gurugaḷige dhârâ-pûrbbakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭa bhûmi tâvu kaṭṭisida
Vijayasamudrada madhyada modal êriya keḷage gadde kamba 20 Chambeyager̤eya teṅkaṇa-kôḍiyiṃ
mûḍaluṃ teṅkaluṃ Hariharada vôṇiyiṃ paḍuvalu ere Gaṅgana matta 1 Kali-dêvara dêvâlyada pavuḷi-
yiṃ paḍuvaluṃ baḍagaluṃ 20 maneya nivêsaṇa purada sîme ǁ maṅgaḷa mahâ srî śrî ǁ

div.head:
75
On a vîrakal to the south of the same temple.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Saka varusha 120 . neya Byaya-saṃvatsarada Chaitra-śuddha 2 Sômavâradalu Chikka
Beḷukareya tur̤u hariyalu Śiva-lôka-prâptan âda Kur̤ubara Chanda-Gavuḍaṅge Bomma-Gavuda
Sôma-Gavuḍa Mâl̤i-Gavuḍanavaru koṭṭa keyi Bikkaragaṭṭada teṅkaṇa-kôḍiya huṇiseya vuṇḍige
kamba hattu kamba 10

div.head:
76
At Bannikôḍu (same hobli), on a vîrakal near the temple in the front of the village.
div.p:
Visu-saṃvatsarada su 7 Âdivâradandu śrîmatu Bannikôḍa Bîra-bôvana maga Bommaya-nâyakanu
â-Bannikôḍa tur̤uvanu mûḍaṇa Saṅgeya-nâyaka yâḷu kudure bandu koṇḍu-hôhalli tanna meyigali-
tanadalu yiṭṭu kabbunada kôla koṇḍu haridu tur̤uva maraḷichi sura-lôka-prâptan âdanu maṅgaḷa
mahâ śrî śrî

div.head:
77
On a stone near the temple in front of the same village.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-prithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêsvara parama-bhaṭṭâraka
Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷaka Châḷukyâbharaṇa śrîmatu-pratâpa-chakravarti Jagadêkamalla-Dêvara vijaya-
râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravardhamânav â-chandrârkka-târaṃ saluttam ire | śrîmatu

lg.l: * So in the original. Chôḷa-kshmâpâḷa-kôḷahaḷa bâhu-baḷôtpâḷa Nêpâḷa-Kâḷiṅga- |
Kauḷûta-kshôṇinâtharu kshaya-sameyav enalu mîr̤i mâr̤âmpara nir- |

div.p:
antu nija-nâma-grahaṇa-mâtra-pavitra-tri-bhuvaneyuṃ | âtmîya-kula-pâvaneyuṃ | (v)avanata-sakaḷa-
sapat[n]î-jana-niṭaḷa-kuṭiḷa-kuntaḷa-madhukara-nikurumba-chumbita-charaṇa-kamaḷeyuṃ patibratâ-
guṇôpârjjita-Arundhatî-nâma-vimaḷeyuṃ | râja-Nârâyaṇa-vaksha-staḷa-Lakshmî-niḷeyam appa śrî-
paṭṭad-arasi Sôvala-Dêvi ǁ

lg.l: sutar âgalu vîra-mâtṛitvamama dhareyoḷ tâney olu tâḷdu nindaḷu ǁ
dhavaḷa-chchhatrada taṇ-neḷalu negaḷda-râjya-śrîge tâṃ nilke dâ- |
ge vasam âdâgra-śrî-pâdaḷe nirmmaḷâsraya śṛiṅgârâsraya padmajâṇ- |
ḍam venalu permmeyan ântan î-Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-kshmâtaḷâdhîśvaranu ǁ

div.p:
antu svasti samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaru Uchchaṅgi-
nelevîḍinal irddu . Noḷambavâḍi-mûvattichchâsiramaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-sishṭa-partipâḷanaṃ geydu
sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyutam ire ǁ svasti râjya-bhara-nirûpita-mahâmâtya-padavî-
virâjita-râjamânônnata-prabhu-mantrôchchâha-sakti-traya-sampannaru Vâji-kula tiḷakaru Bhâra-
dvâja-gôtra-pavitrarum appa Chika-Bannikôḍa-vûr-oḍeyaran oḍambaḍisi munna naḍava dêva-dâna
hiriya-ker̤aya teṅkaṇa tumbina tudiya gadde kammav innûr̤-ayvattu baḍagaṇa tumbina modala-
gadde kammav innûr̤u beddale üra ûra -mundaṇa koṇḍada keḷage mattar ondu ûriṃ haḍuvalu mattar
ondu (right side) śrî-svayambhu-Kali-dêvara munde vôṇiyiṃ teṅka mattar ereḍu śrîmatu
Sô[va]la-Dêviyaru ǁ Saka-varshada 1087 neya Pârttiva-saṃvatsarada Puśya-
* So in the original. suddha-amavâse-vyatîpâta-
saṅkramâṇa-Sômavâradandu kulâbhivṛiddhiy âgalu śrî-svayambhu-Kali-dêvarggaṃ Mallikârjjuna-dê-
vara dhûpa-dîpa-nivêdya-nandâdîvige-jîrnnôddhârakkaṃ Beltur̤a gaḍimbadalu .. kugeṇa-gaḷeyali biṭṭa
gadde Mâvinaker̤eya Tâyivaḷḷadiṃ teṅka kamma êḷa-nûr̤u bêvina-koḷadiṃ baḍagalu beddale mattaru
eraḍu kamma nûr̤u ǁ svasti śrîmat-mahânâḍ eddu ûr-oḍeyara sannidhânadalu Mallikârjjuna-dêvarge
staḷa-bhaṇḍa hor̤a-bhaṇḍadalu hoṅge vîsava koṭar inituvaṃ śrîmatu Sôvala-Dêviyaruṃ ûr-oḍeyaruṃ ǁ
yama-nêma-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭâṇa-japa-samâdhi-sîla-guṇa-sampannar appa Jñâna-
sakti-paṇḍitarige dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi-koṭṭa sthânaṃ ǁ (usual final phrases and verse).

lg.l: * So in the original. chatu-sameyad âgamôktiyan |
Sivan orvvane karttu yanda Jñânasakti-munîndra ǁ

div.p: hiriya-ker̤aya Brahmeya hindaṇa-koḷana Brahmayana ni[v]edyake koṭṭa kamma nûr̤u ǁ

div.head:
78
At Koṇḍajji (Koṇḍajji hobli), on Nandî-Basavaṇṇa pillar near the Hanumanta temple.
div.p:
Śaka-varuśa 1289 Parâbhava-saṃvatsara-Mâgha-suddha 7 Guruvâ[ra]dalu śrî-vîra-Bukka-Râya
pṛithvî-râjyaṃ mâḍuvali Mudreya-Puṭṭa-ayyagaḷu śrî-Virûpâksha-dêvarige biṭṭa mattaru maṅgaḷa
mâhâ śri śrî

div.head:
79
At the same village, on a vîrakal in front of the Mallikârjjuna temple, on the tank-bund.
div.p:
svasti śrî Yâdava-Nârâyaṇa Mahadêva-Râyan Adaḷa-Kâva-dêvana mêle naḍuvali Vibhava-saṃ-
vachharadalu Kâva-dêvan kuḍe Pomaṇa-Nâyaka kâdi Siva-lôka-prâpta ǁ yî-kallige koṭṭa bhûmi
gadde kamba 100 beddalu eraḍu dina ....

div.head:
80
At Kaḍlabâḷu (same hobli), on a stone in Survey No. 28.
div.p:
.... rvvêśa samava .................... samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahâ......
.... mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmanta.... ka dînânâtha.... kalpa-bhûja ...... pôdya-vitta-nikuraṃbaka-
bandhana ...... neyaṃ satya-Râdhêyaṃ nija-kuḷa-sarasijâkara-taraṇi-kiraṇaṃ Kaustubhâbhara-
ṇaṃ nâmâdi-samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-sâmantaṃ ...... ru Châḷukya-Vikrama-varshada
25 deneya Pramâdi-saṃvatsarada Pushyad-amâvâsye-Âdivârad uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrânti-sûryya-grahaṇa-
nimittam âge śrîman-mahâ-prabhu Sânta-Gâvuṇḍana sannidhânadalu yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-
dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭâṇa-japa-samâdhi-śîḷa-sampannar appa śrîmatu Kâkambâḷa Naishṭika-
tapôdhanara śishyar appa Bâḷachandra-paṇḍitara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi Kaḍala-
bâḷa Mûlasthânada Kali-dêva-svâmiy-aṅga-bhôgakkaṃ yalli taḷa-bhaṇḍada perjjuṅkada dasavanda-
maṃ biṭṭaru (usual final phrases).

div.head:
81
At the same village, on a vîrakal in Survey No. 128.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Yâdava-Nârâyaṇaṃ bhuja-baḷa prauḍha-pratâpa-chakravartti śrî-Râmachandra-Râya-
vijeya-râjyôdayada 18 neya Sarvvajitu-saṃvatsarada Pushya-suddha-pañchamî-Bṛihaspativâradandu
śrîmanu mahâ .. râṇeya .. jagajeṭṭi vîra-Râma-dêvarâṇeyara magaṃ Bhôyi-Nâykara maga Purushô-
ttamanu bîrâri-Bhîma-dêvanu vûra koṇḍihen-endu ây-âḷu-kudure-sahita bandu kâdidalli vûra hindikki-
koṇḍu kâḷagava geddu svarggastan âdanu ǁ yâtana śrî-kâryya-karma-vupârakevu Bomma-Gavuṇḍana
maga Sôva-Gavuḍanû Haripa-Gavuṇḍanû Koṇḍañjiya dâriyalu Masaṇakavveya keyindavu paḍuvalu
mattaru vondanu koṭṭaru yidake yâru yahudu yilla yembavarige na .. ka naraka

div.head:
82
At the same village, on a vîrakal in front of the Vuḍasalavva temple.
div.p:
śrîmatu Kaḍalambhâḷa Sôva-Gâvuṇḍana besa-maga .. l̤a ...... tur̤uva magurchi dêvara śrî-pâdak
aydida âtana tammaṃ ... lliya-Miṭiga akkasâli Saṅkôja nilisida

div.head:
83
* The orthography of this in the original is very bad.
At Gaṅganarasi (same hobli), on a stone in the right wall in front of the Basavaṇṇa temple.
div.p: śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ | śrî-Hariharâya namaḥ |

svasti samasta-bhuvanâdhîśvaraṃ dêvâdhidêva paramêśvaraṃ Śaiva-Vaishṇavada bhêda-viddhvaṃ-
sanaṃ Mârkkaṇḍêya-vara-pradânavaṃ mâḷpa Tuṅgabhadrâ-pûrva-kûla-nivâsan enisida Kûḍa-
lûra śôbhâkar-advandva-rûpa tâḷdi Hariharaikyâvatâra Guhâsura-mada-vidâraṇaṃ Guhâsura-vaksha-
nikshêpa-charaṇâravinda-yugaḷaṃ svarga-martya-pâtâḷa-tri-bhuvana-pûjitaṃ bhakta-janâbhîsṭâ-
yata-siddhi-dâyakaṃ svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varsha 1483 Durmati-saṃvatsarada |
Mâgha-śu 15 Sômavâra-sômôparâga-puṇya-kâladalu śrîmad-râjâdhirâja paramêśvaraṃ śrî-vîra-
pratâpa Sadâsiva-mahârâyaru Vidyânagaradali sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ prṛithvî-râjyaṃ gaihutal-
ippa-samayadalu śrî-Harihara-dêvarige â-Sadâśiva-Dêva-mahârâyara Haḍapada Sindu-Gôvinda
sitagara-gaṇḍa davaḷâṅka-Bhîma Maṇinâgapura-varâdhîśvara Baiyyappa-Nâyakara makkaḷu Krushṇa-
ppa-Nâyakara kâryyakke karttarâda Vêlûra Kâḷappa-Nâyakara makkaḷu Mârgasahâya-Nâyakaru śrî-
Harihara-dêvara Lakshumî-dêviyara Pârvatî-dêviyara ratha-uchchahake Gaṅganarasiya-grâmavanu
dhârâ-pûrvvakavâgi biṭṭu kṛitârthar âdaru yî-dharmavanu pratipâḷisida puṇyâtmage aśvamêdhada
phalav ahudu yî-dharmavanu aḷida .... sige Tuṅgabhadrâ-tîradalu gô-brâhmara mâtâ-pitrugaḷa putra-
mahâ-śava-bhakshiśida-pâtakake hôharu endu barada silâ-sâsana ............

div.head:
84
At the same village, on a stone south of the Kallêśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ Kâḷâñjarapura-varâdhîśvaraṃ suvarṇṇa-
vṛishabha-dhvajaṃ ḍamaruka-tûryya-nirgghôshaṇaṃ Kaḷachuriya-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ kadana-
prachaṇḍaṃ mâna-Kanakâchaḷaṃ su-bhaṭar-âdityaṃ kaligaḷ-aṅkuśaṃ gaja-sâmantaṃ śaraṇâgata-
vajra-paṇjaraṃ pratâpa-Laṅkêśvaraṃ para-nârî-sahôdaraṃ Sanivâra-siddhi giri-durgga-mallaṃ chalad-
aṅka-Râmaṃ vairîbha-kaṇṭhîravaṃ niśśaṅka-mallaṃ nâmâdi-prasasti-sahitaṃ śrîmad-bhuja-baḷa-
chakravartti Tribhuvanamalla-Bijjaṇa-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam
â-chandrârkka-târaṃ saluttam ire ṭat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ

lg.l: gina-ter̤adinde chelvan oḷekoṇḍudu nirantara oppi tôr̤uguṃ ǁ
* This and the next verse are so in the original : but the metre is incorrect. negaḷdâ-Gaṅga-Gâṃvuḍan emba vibhugaṃ Lôkavvegaṃ puṭṭi mik- |
ka guṇakk âgarav âda Bamma-Gâvuṇḍana mahâ-sati Mâḷavvegaṃ puṭṭi gô- |
tra-pavitraṃ guṇa-ratna tâney enikum â-Gaṅga-Gâṃvuḍa-prabhu ǁ
pogaḷvaḍe Mâḷa-Gauṇḍana mahantikeyaṃ ninag êna pêḷven â- |
satiü Sâtikauvvegaṃ puṭṭi su-putra kolakke Kalla-Gau- |
ḍana vadhu Sôvi-Gauḍigevu puṭṭidan â-Hariyamma-Gâṃvuḍanoḷu mikka gau- |
ḍugaḷ ên ârttaparê samasta-guṇadoḷu saṃstutyadoḷu satyadoḷu ǁ
* So in the original. dâna-guṇakke kalpa-kujad aṇḍaḷ enippa mahânubhâve san- |
mâna-guṇakke tâne kaṇiy âdaḷ enipp Umâ-dêviya |

div.p:
śrîmatu Bijjaṇa-Dêva-râjyada Saka-varshada | sâsirada embhatta-mûr̤aneya Vikrama-saṃvatsarada
Pushya-suddha-dasamî-Âdityavâra-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkramâṇa-byatîpâtadandu śrîmatu Śaṅkhara-Nârâ-
yaṇa-dêvara Kûḍalûra Tuṅgabhadrâ-dêviya Brahmatîrtthada Arasiyaker̤eya Mâdêśvara-dêvar-aṅga-
bhôga-nivêdyada samasta-bhôgakke yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâṇa-japa-
samâdhi-śîla-guṇa-sampannar appa śrîmatu Jñânasakti-dêvara śiśyar appa Vâmaśakti-paṇḍitara
śiśyar appa Têjônidhi-paṇḍita-dêvara kâlaṃ Sênâpati-daṇṇâyakana arddhâṅga-lakshmi Mahadêvi-
daṇṇâyakitiyaru kachchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭa Mêvanaker̤eya keḷagaṇa gadde kamba 450 â-
ker̤eya paḍu-gôḍiya ereya bhûmi mattaru | Jîyargge maneya nivêśaṇa ondu (usual final phrases).

div.head:
85
On another stone, at the same place.
div.p:
svasti śrî pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-
tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrî-pratâpa-chakravartti Jagadêkamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarô-
ttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânav â-chandrârkka-târaṃ saluttu Kalyâṇapurada nelevîḍinoḷu sukha-
saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttuv ire ǁ

lg.l: * So in the original. vanadhi-parîta-bhûtaḷadoḷ endudan ollada râyar illa tan- |
nane śaraṇ endu jîvisada bhûbhujar illa samasta-vastu-vâ- |
hanavan anûna-kâñchanavan itt irad uddhatar illa jîy- |
enut anudinav eyde biṭṭi-vesageyyada jeṭṭigar illa nôrppaḍ ên |
anupamav âyto râjya-vibhavaṃ jagadoḷ Jagadêkamallana ǁ
krâyudha bâpp enutte pogaḷguṃ jagav î-Jagadêkamallana ǁ
aḷavig aḷumbav appa bhuja-garvvada Chôḷa-nṛipâḷan añji tal- |
laḷise taguḷdu Chôḷ-nelanan âḷ-nelan âgire mâḍikoṇḍa Hoy- |
saḷanan aḍarppi têjad esakaṃ migal âne-gavartta-goṇḍan âr- |

div.p: tat-pâda-padmôpajîviy enisida Vîra-Pâṇḍya-Dêvan-anvaya-khyâtiy ent endade ǁ

lg.l: d âruṃ sariy oḷare sakaḷa-mahimônnatiyoḷ ǁ
esakada Sôma-vaṃśajaroḷ ȧr ddore tannoḷ enippud ondu sâ- |
hasada nimirkke varddhisuva râjyad amarkke sukha-prapañchamaṃ |
pasarisi tôrkke vairigaḷa râjyada sârkke kaḍurppiniṃ vigur- |
bbisuvara mîseyaṃ suḍuva têjad aḷurkke dharitriyoḷ virâ- |
jisut iral uttarôttarav iḷâ-stuti-vettudu Vîra-Pâṇḍyana ǁ
tṛite tây Sôvala-Dêvi Saṅkarane deyvaṃ Vîra-Pâṇḍya-kshamâ- |
patiyaṃ Yâdava-vaṃśa-bhûshaṇanan inn ê-vaṇṇipaṃ baṇṇipa ǁ
gina ter̤adinde chelvan oḷakoṇḍu(du) nirantara oppi tôr̤ugu ǁ
p ellara chittakk avadhiyaṃ puṭṭisadê ǁ

div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvana-jan(n)a-saṃstûyamân[a]-nidhânanu | âtmîya-têjaḥ-puñ[ja]-rañjitan Îśvarâsthâ-
nanu |
* So in the original : perhaps a mistake for Śiva-samaya-dîpa-varttiyu. Śavasaya nidhi-n adîpadharttiyu | agaṇya-puṇya-mûrttiyuṃ prabhu-mantrôtsâha-sakti-traya-
ratnâḷaṅkâran â-vîra-lakshmî-śṛiṅgâra-hâranu Śûryyâṇḍa-nâtha-dêha-Rôha(ra)ṇâchaḷôtpanna-puruśa-
ratnanuṃ apâra-varmma-prayatnanu | Chandralêkhâvataṃśa-nivâsa-nirantarâtmana Vîra-Pâṇḍya-
nagarâtmanun enisi Sênâpati-daṇḍanâthanuṃ Châgeya-râjadhâniyoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadind
abhyudeyakk âvâsav âgirdda śrîmaj-Jagadêkamalla-varuśada 6 neya Rud[h]irôd(ha)gâri-saṃvatsarada
Kârttikeya paurṇṇamâsey Âdityavâravuṃ vitîpâtavu kûḍid-andina puṇya-tithiyoḷu śrîmach-Chhaṅ-
kara-Nârâyaṇa-dêvara Kûḍalûra Tuṅgabhadrâ-dêviya Brahmatîrthada Arasiyaker̤eya Kali-dêva-
svâmiy-aṅga-bhôga-nivêdyâdi-samasta-bhôgakke yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunâ-
nushṭhâna-śîḷa-guṇa-sampannar appa śrîmatu Jñânaśakti-dêvara śiśyar appa Vâmaśakti-paṇḍitara
kâlaṃ karchchi Śivârppaṇavâgi biṭṭa hiriya-ker̤eya keḷagaṇa gadde kamma 500 dêvara dêgulada
dakshiṇa-diśâ-bhâgada haraḷa-keyi mattaru 2 guṇḍu-galliṃ baḍagaṇa ereya bhûmiyoḷu mattaru 2
Jîyarggaṃ dêvara patreyan aḍakuva Śuśrikaṅga maneya nela saṇa 2 (usual final phrases and
verse) ôṃ namô

div.head:
86
On the back of the same stone.
div.p:
svasti śrîmanu mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-Dêvara râjyâbhyudaya-kâlada Hêmaḷambi-saṃ-
vatsarada Śrâvaṇa-ba 3 Âdivâradandu Viśu-saṅkramaṇadandu Arasiyaker̤eya svayambhu-Kali-dêva-
svâmiya nandâdîvigege â-chandrârkka-sthâyiyâgi Têjônidhi-paṇḍitara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvva-
kaṃ mâḍi biṭṭa gâṇa vondu (usual final phrases).

lg.l: negaḷd â-Gaṅga-Gavuṇḍan emba vibhugaṃ Lôkavvegaṃ puṭṭi mi- |

kka guṇakk âgaravâda
* So in the original : perhaps a mistake for Śiva-samaya-dîpa-varttiyu. Barmma-Gauṇḍanuvaṃ Śântaṅgav â-Śântika- |
vvegav old udbhavisirdda Kaleyanumaṃ pôlalke pêḷ mikka gauṇ- |
ḍugaḷ ên âttaparê samasta-guṇadoḷ saṃstutyadoḷ satyadoḷ ǁ
olaviṃ Sûryyâṇḍanaṃ karaṃ pogaḷadar âr ǁ
vara-sauchâchâradoḷ tannane pogaḷe jagaṃ mantradoḷ mantrigaḷ bitt- |
arisal tannaṃ nijêśaṃ pati-hita-guṇadoḷ merchchi kaikoṇḍu kûrtt â- |
darisal tannaṃ diṭaṃ tannavol anupamar âr embinaṃ kîrtti-lakshmî- |
varan âd Âditya-daṇḍâdhipana mahimeyaṃ baṇṇisal ballan âva ǁ

div.p:
Vâmaśakti-paṇḍitara magaṃ Kalyâṇasakti-paṇḍitaru yî-sâsanava sênabôva-Boppeya bareda kalu-
kuṭṭiga Maḷôja hoyda guru-prasâdaṃ

div.head:
87
On a third stone, at the same place.
div.p:
svasti śrî .... varuśada 1187 nêya Raktâkshi-saṃvatsarada Chaitra ........ dandu ǁ samadhigata-
