pañcha-mahâ-sabda Dvârâvatîsvaraṃ Vishṇu ..... suvarṇṇa Garuḍa-dhvajaṃ Yâdava .... ḷa-kalikâ-
vikâsa-bhâskaraṃ .... Mâḷava-Râya-mada ....
* So in the original. Gurjja-Râya .... Râya-sthâ .... ya nâmâvaḷî-samâ-
...... srî-cheṃ.... pravuḍha-pratâpa-chakravartti śrî-Mahadêva-Râya tat-pâda-padmôpajîviy a[ti]-
viśama-hayârûḍha-rêkhâ-Rêvantanuṃ para-baḷa-Kṛitântanum appa ǁ

antu vîra-parâkramaṃ Beï-Dêvan Uruvattiya .... Dêvana Kalla-Veggaḍeya sama[ra]-raṅgadoḷu kâdi
svâmi-bhṛityâchâradiṃ .... geldu svarggastan âda vîra-Beyi-Dêvana vîra-gallaṃ âtana kumâraṃ
Sôvi-Dêvanu Bikkigan-eppattakka talevaṇa tamma vaḷitada Arasiyaker̤eya svayambhu-Kali-
dêvaravara sanadoḷu nilsiy â-vîran-aṅga-bhôga...ga-bhôga-pûje[ga]m âhârakkaṃ â-sthaḷada Hanuma-
Gauṇḍa-Bomma-Gauḍaṅgaḷu mukhyavâgi koṭṭa bhûmi guṇḍu-kalla haraḷa-keyi Gaṅgana ka 20 teṅ-
kaṇa-holada dêvara keyya sâraṇa ere kaṃ 20 antu kamba 40 â-bîra-kallige â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-
baraṃ pratipâḷisuvaru maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî

div.head:
88
On a vîrakal to the south of the same temple.
div.p:
svasti sama .... Vikrama-Kannara-Dêva-vijaya-râjya .... Târaṇa-saṃvatsarada Âśviyuja .... śrî-
man-mahâ-pasâyitaṃ (rest illegible).

div.head:
89
On another vîrakal, at the same place.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Byaya-saṃvatsarada Kârttika-suddha 14 Maṅgaḷavâra bandu Arasiyaker̤eya Bamma-
Gâvuṇḍanû ...... nalu kâdi svarggastan âdanu (rest illegible).

div.head:
90
At Śâbanûru (same hobli), on a stone lying to the south of the Mâri-kaṭṭe.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâraka
Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷaka Châḷukyâbharaṇa śrîmat-Tribhvanamalla-Permmâḍi-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam
uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târam-baraṃ saluttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpa-
jîvi ǁ

lg.l: munisiṃ mâr̤âmpan âvaṃ Tripura-vijayigaṃ Sûdrakaṅgaṃ Suparṇṇî- |
karamaṃ beṅkoḷuvaṃ bhayaṅka ........ ṇaṃ Pâṇḍya-bhûpâḷakaṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-sabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Kâñchî-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ Yadu-
vaṃśâmbara-dyumaṇi su-bhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍam parichchhêdi-gaṇḍam Râjiga-
Chôḷa-manô-bhaṅgaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-pâdâbja-bhṛiṅgaṃ nâmâdi-praśasti-sahitaṃ ......
bhuvana ........ dakshiṇa-bhujâ-daṇḍan enisi ǁ

lg.l: gatanê Bhâskara-sûnu vikra .... naṃ śrî-Sûryya-daṇḍâdhipaṃ ǁ

div.p:
... anavarata-vinuta-sura-nara .... ghaṭita-pada-kamaḷa-yugaḷa śrîmad-Îśvara.. -pâdârâdhaka virôdhi-
nikurumba ...... gaṇḍa Pâṇḍya-maṇḍaḷika-sabhâ-maṇḍana prachaṇḍa-daṇḍanâtha ...... virâjamâna
satata-saṃ ... nâbhimâna ...... mantrôtsâha-sakti-traya-guṇa-gaṇa .... ta niyôga-Yaugandhara
nikhiḷa-dharmma-dhâraṇa ....... pâḷa-mastaka-khaṇḍana-prachaṇḍa-dôr-ddaṇḍa Pâṇḍya-maṇḍaḷika-
dakshiṇa ........ rggarvva-parvvatârûḍha nirûḍha-prauḍha-nitambinî-nikurumba-divya .... śrîmat-
Tribhuvanamalla parichchhêdi-gaṇḍa Pâṇḍya-maṇḍaḷika .......... śaraṇâgata-vajra-pañjara | mṛidu-
madhura ........ dâra-hita .... satata ...... daṇḍanâtha-kuḷa-kamaḷinî-vikâsana-sahasrakiraṇa |
vandi-jana-bharaṇa ...... tantri Sûryya-daṇḍâdhinâthaṃ ǁ

.......... Jina-stavana .... sampû .... pavitrôttamâṅga .... daradiṃ mukta .... yin urutara-
vajra .... karataḷa-rachiyind opputa .. n artthadiṃ bhâsvara-kântâ-ratnam e ...... ǁ

lg.l: maṇḍaḷiya .... daḍe ...... ker̤eyeḷu ........ ḍagal enar̤e .............. ǁ
sari nuta-Lakshmi tat-sadṛiśam â-priya-kâriṇi dêviy endoḍ î- |
paḍed artthaṃ kaḷḷariṃ dâyigarim aḷipariṃ bhûpariṃ kichchinindaṃ |
kiḍugaṃ tân ant ad êm śâsvatam eni .... śâsvataṃ marppen end â- |
gaḍe pûṇd iṃ pûrṇṇa-chandrânane Jinapati-sad-gêhamaṃ Sembanûroḷ |
kaḍu-rayyaṃ tân enal mâḍisidaḷ adhika-sad-bhaktiyiṃ Kâḷiyakkaṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samasta-vastu-vistâra-gôchara...... jamâna-Jinêśvara-charaṇa-sarasiruha-madhukarôpamâna-
kuṭiḷa-kuntaḷa-kaḷâpe mṛidu-madhura-satata-satya-vachanâḷâpe | śṛiṅgâra-virachita ...... janma-
bhûta...... mâna-Sûryya-daṇḍâdhinâtha-viśâḷa-vakshas-sthaḷa-sthita-lakshmî.... ne san-mâna-dâne
târa-hâra-Hara-hâsâ .. śaśi-viśada-kîrtti-virâjita-pravarddhamâna-guṇavati Padmâvatî-dêvî-labdha-
vara-prasâde Jina-pûjâ-vinôde dhavaḷa-viśâḷa-kumuda-.. nêtre gôtra-pavitre niśśaṅkâdi-guṇa-maṇi-
gaṇa-virâjite samyaktva-ratnâ[ka]re pañchâṇu-vrata-guṇâkare sakaḷa-vinêya-jana-chintâmaṇi
vanitâ-nikara-chûḍâmaṇi nâmâdi-praśati-sahitey appa śrî-Sûryya-daṇḍanâyakana piriya-daṇḍa-
nâyakitti Kâḷiyakkaṃ ǁ

lg.l: Jina-dharmmaṃ prâṇi-.. rmmaṃ tanag adu kula-dharmmaṃ Jina-svâmi deyvaṃ |
janakaṃ mikk Âytavarmmaṃ janani tanage Jakkavve bhavyarkkaḷ enduṃ |
tanag âptar tanna ta .... guṇi Kali-Dêvaṃ lasat-śauryya-dhairyyaṃ |
tanag îśaṃ Sûryya-daṇḍâdhipan ene taḷedaḷ kîrttiyaṃ Kâḷiyakkaṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmantâdhipati mahâ-prachaṇḍa-daṇḍanâyaka Châḷu-
kya-Vikramâditya-Dâva-sabhânargghya-vastu-nâyaka prabhu-mantrôtsâha-śakti-guṇa-maṇi-gaṇâ-
ḷaṅkṛita-śarîra | bhaya-lôbha ........ Tribhuvanamalla-Permmâḍi-Dêva-dakshiṇa-bhujâ-daṇḍa ripu-
kâḷa-daṇḍa | prasiddha-Sênavara-daṇḍanâtha-priya-putra châru-charitra | satata-dhârmmika-Dharm-
manandana | svâmi-priya-Marunnandana | Hara-charaṇa-kamaḷa .. saḷa-satatânata-madhukara |
sakaḷa-guṇâkara | samagra-vairi-kuḷa-kudhara-kuḷiśa-daṇḍa | samara-prachaṇḍa | durddhara-Durvvi-
nîta-daṇḍanâtha-vaṃśa-vana-kuṭhâra | saṅgrâma-dhîra .... âyad-âchâryya Mandara-dhairyya Ân-
dhrî-nîrandhra-kucha-kaḷasa-darppaṇa vandi-santarppaṇa Kuntaḷî-kuntaḷa-suvarṇṇa-kusumâbharaṇa
aninditâcharaṇa purushârttha-svârtthîkṛita-Jîmûtavâhana mâna-viḷasad-dhana satata-dâna-santarp-
pita-dînânâtha-yûtha nâmâdi-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîmad-Âditya-daṇḍâdhinâthaṃ ǁ

lg.l: prabhavar ppêḷ innar âr embinam esedapan Âditya-daṇḍâdhinâthaṃ ǁ
avaṭu-taṭam aṭati jhaṭiti sphuṭa-paṭu-vâchâṭa-Dhûrjjaṭêr api jihvâ |
vâdini Samantabhadrê sthitavati tava sadasi bhûpa kâsthânyêshâṃ ǁ

div.p: int enisida Samantabhadra-svâmigaḷa santânadoḷu ǁ

lg.l: êkatra guṇinas sarvvê Vâdirâja tvam êkataḥ |
tasyaiva gauravaṃ tasya tuḷâyâm unnatiḥ kathaṃ ǁ

div.p: avara śishyaru ǁ

lg.l: indôś cha kântam ati-vistṛitam ambarâch cha
bhûmêś cha bhûri jaḷadhêś cha gabhîram âśtê |
Mêrôś cha tuṅgam Ajitêśa yaśas tavôrvvyâṃ

div.p: int enisid Ajitasêna-bhaṭṭârakar-agra-śishyaru ǁ
ene negal̤da Mallishêṇa-Maladhâri-Dêvara śishyaru ǁ

lg.l: âḷâpaṃ bêḍa Nayyâyika nija-matamaṃ nachchadir sSâṅkhya mâṇ vâ- |
châḷatvaṃ salla Mîmâṃsaka toḍarad ele Bauddha pô pôgu vâdi- |

div.p:
svasti śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâlada 53 ya Kîlaka-saṃvatsarad uttarâyaṇa-saṅkramaṇad andu
śrîmat-Sembanûra stânâchâryya Śântiśayana-paṇḍitara kayyalu śrîmat-piriya-daṇḍanâyakiti Kâḷi-
kavvegaḷu dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍisikoṇḍu Pârśva-dêvara kûṭakkam dêvara bi .... pûjâriya biyakkaṃ
Halakaṭṭada keḷage biṭṭa gadde kamma 450 â-ker̤eya haḍuvaṇa-kôḍiyoḷage bel̤dale matta 1 int î-
dharmmaman âr orvvar alliya sthânâchâryyaruṃ Dêvaguttaruṃ.. nnirvvaruṃ besa-vakkaḷuṃ tappade
pratipâḷisuvaru mattaṃ sthâni .... ker̤eya keḷagaṇa garddeyuṃ adar̤a baḷasi beddaleyuṃ ........
maṃ pratipâ (rest illegible).

div.head:
91
On another stone at the same place.

lg.l: chita-kṛita-dânam ôgaḍisad udbhavad â .... le Sembunûra-nâḍ |
ati-hita-kâryyam endu ...... da baged-antire Mâghaṇandi .... ǁ

div.p: Arishṭanêmi-Siṃhana .... ṭṭârara śishyar Paṇḍita .... sidhige Âyvakan nir̤i ....

div.head:
92
At the same village, on a vîrakal to the east of the Kallêsvara temple.
div.p:
Ânanda-saṃvatsarada Vaisâkha-su .. Guruvârad andu śrîman-nâḷu-prabhu Kanava-Seṭṭiya maga
Koṇḍa-nambi yir̤idu mer̤edu kâdi halabaraṃ kondu sura-lôka-prâptan âda ǁ

div.head:
93
On a vîrakal to the north of the same temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-nâḷu-prabhugaḷa.... Kanava-Seṭṭiya Jakkayana maga Sâtaya
Krôdhana-saṃvatsarada Mâgha-sudha 3 Budhavârad andu śrîkaraṇada-Nâgaya Sâdhasiriyana baṇḍiya
hiḍivali kâdi yir̤idu mer̤adu sura-lôkake prâptan âda ǁ

div.head:
94
At Âvaragoḷa (same hobli), on a stone south of the Îśvara temple.
div.p:
(Upper portion is broken)...... Kûcharasar Uḍaṅgeya ...... mâḍuva mahâ........ hattu beddale
Gaṅgana mattar ondu ǁ svasti .......... n Uḍaṅgeya Mâyi-dêvanâ ...... mâḍuva mahâ-gaṇaṅgaḷa
parbbakke hiri-.... koṭṭa yereya kei Gaṅgana mattar ondu ǁ ghaṭa-sarppa...... mâ.. ya Mâi-dêvan
Âvaragoḷana Kannêśvara-dêvara sanniḍhiyalu ...... parbbakke Diûṭûralu koṭṭa keyi Gaṅgana mattar
ondu ǁ kṛitânta-.... Mâi-dêvan Âvaragoḷana Kannêśvara-dêvara sannidhiyalu mâḍuva .... parbukake
Karakoḷanalu koṭa gade kambav ainûr̤u ǁ maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî

div.head:
97
At the same village, on a stone in front of the Vîrabhadra temple.
div.p: .... Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ ǁ śrî-Kannêśvarâya namaḥ ǁ
(2 lines gone).

lg.l: ...... jñau dakshiṇa .. m upagatau pâtaḥ kshitiṃ da .... ǁ
.... n adhar-vvichêshṭitam ahô yan nâsti tad dîyate ǁ
hasta-dvayê cha tiḷakaṃ tv aniśâsanânâṃ ǁ
.. mê mahôtsavê dibyê dharmmaṃ prâkra...... ǁ

div.p: (rest gone).

div.head:
98
At Kakkaragoḷḷa (same hobli), on a virakal near the Kallêśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Vijaya-saṃvatsarada Chaitra-suddha-ashṭamî-Sômavârad andu Bidiyama-Gavuḍanu
Hulu-.... vûra jîva-danamaṃ koṇḍalli kâdi sattu svarggamaṃ paḍedan ad ent endaḍe ǁ abhimânaṃ
.. yitto .. Liṅgaṃ nuḍiyal prabhu ......... yalaṃ mechchi ....... kolveṃ hageyaṃ ǁ

lg.l: kûḍida Śiva-padama tur̤uva koṇḍuṃ chaladiṃ ǁ
pada-paṅkajadalli kûḍi sukhiy âgiru nîṃ ǁ śrî śrî śrî

div.head:
99
At Sârati (same hobli), on a stone in the wall of Jaḍiki Basappa’s house.
div.p:
svasti Saka-nṛipa-kâlâtîta-saṃvatsara-sataṅgaḷu sâ ...... yvetteneya Plavaṅga-saṃ- | Kârttika-sud-
dha-pâḍiva-Âdivârad-and uttarâyaṇa ... vyatîpâta-nimitta ǁ svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-
..... hârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ .... kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ
śrîmat-Traiḷôkyamalla-Dêvara vijaya .... m uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddha ...m â-chandrârkkam-
baraṃ saluttam ire ... samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-sabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ Kâñchî-pu .... râ-
dhîsvaraṃ Yadu-vaṃśâmbara-dyumaṇi su-bhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇi ........ maḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ parichchhêdi-
gaṇḍaṃ Râjiga-Chôḷa-manô-bhaṅgaṃ...... dâbja-bhṛiṅgaṃ śrîmanu mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ...... ḍya-
Dêvaru Noḷambavâḍi-mûvatt-irchchhâsiramumaṃ dushṭa .... pratipâḷanadiṃ Beltur̤uvina nelevîḍi-
noḷu sukha .......dadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire ǁ svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya .... nânushṭhâṇa-
japa-samâdhi-sîla-guṇa-sampanna ........ chayar appa śrîmatu Divyasakti-paṇḍita-dêvara ... sara-
ṇeyam ârppa ........ Divyasakti-paṇḍita-dêvaru ...... vîra-pratâ ........ Divya ............
.................. sûkshmanaṃ vyâpakanaṃ .............. Vâmasakti ...... sishyaru ....
................ Manu-vâkya .... Manasija ...... munivane............ tîrtaṅgaḷa ..........
piriya-ker̤eya naḍuvaṇa ........ svasti samasta-pra[sa]sti-sahitaṃ śrî ........ manneya-telagi....
.... yira-gaṇḍa toḷare .... Vatsa-râjaṃ vîra-vâ ........ para-nârî-pu ........ ǁ śrîman-mahâ ..
.......... chalake ............ vîra ................ verggaḍe Manneya .......... Kali-
dêva-svâ ...... yavara svata ........ mâḍisi .............. bhaktige ........ mige biṭṭevâgi
(rest effaced).

div.head:
100
At Chikka-Bidare (same hobli), on a 1st vîrakal in front of the Kallêśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Yâdava-Nârâyaṇa pratâpa-chakravartti vîra-Mahadêva-Râya-vijaya-râjyôdayadalli
Saka-varusha 1187 Krôdhana-saṃvatsarada Bhâdrapada-ba 10 Â | billâḷ Ammeya-Nâykanava(ka)ra
tâyiyanu Sâṅgaligeya-purada guḍḍara kaḷihuvalli Mallapuhâriya taḍiyalu kâdi lêsu-mâḍi biddanu.

div.head:
101
On a 2nd vîrakal at the same place.
div.p: śrîmatu tôrahatta-Javarâja-Pâyi-Nâyakana maga Lûyi-Nâyaka Gôve ..........

div.head:
102
On a 3rd vîrakal at the same place.
div.p:
svasti śrî Yâdava-Nârâyaṇa prauḍha-pratâpa chakravartti śrî-Mahadêva-Râyana śrîmanu mahâ-pra-
dhânaṃ sarvvâdhikâri Tipparasara bill-âḷu tôrahatta Ammeya-Nâyakara maga Mâi-Nâyakanu Nâlvattu-
bâḍada-ṭhâṇântarav âgiddali Prabhava-saṃvatsarada Mâgha-su 10 Gu-dalli Iṅgaḷêśara-Bâdavâḍiya
Râmanu yir̤idâyali Nâlvattu-bâḍada-ṭhâṇântaradali huyyalaṃ haridu (stops here).

div.head:
103
At the same village, on a stone to the south of the entrance of the Kallêśvara temple.

lg.l: Kannêśvaraṃ pratishṭhâpya tasya dharmmaḥ pratishṭhitaḥ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda Dvârâvatî-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ ...... vaṃsôdbhavaṃ suvar-
ṇṇa-Garuḍa-dhvajaṃ ari-râja-jagajh-jhampa Mâḷava-Râya-Madana-Trinêtra Gûrjjara-Râyabhayaṅkara
Teluṅga-Râya-sthâpanâchâryya ity-âdi-nâmâvaḷî-samâlaṅkrita ........ śrîmatu prauḍha-pratâpa-
chakravartti śrî-vîra-Kanhara-Dêva-vijaya-râjyôdaya .... pâda-padumôpajîvi ǁ

svasti śrîmanu mahâ-pradhânaṃ râya-daṇḍâdhipa ...... Hanuma-gandhavâraṇa Chauḍi-Seṭṭiyaru
Huliger̤eya nelevîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire tatu-pâda-padumôpajîvi ǁ

svasti samasta-guṇa-gaṇâla ... yôga .... kâryya-dhurandhara parama-viśvâsi vairi-vîra ........
śaraṇâ ...... pañjara râya-kumara Chôḷâvatâra ...... sûnu vikra .... virâjita Dinakara-taneya-vîra-
vitaraṇa Drôṇâchâryya .......... pramukha-nânâ-śastra-śâstra-viśârada dharmma-mêdinî-samu-
ddharaṇa-Varâ ........ nija-bhakti-vachhchhaḷa-śrî-kshêtrâdhipati-dibya-śrî-pâda-padmârâdhaka ...
dyumaṇi śrî-vîra-Kandhara-Râya-mandira-nija-sênâpati môhita...... ḍâyi-Dêvana suta billâḷ-Ammeya-
Nâyakanu Śaka-varshada 1179 tteneya Pai.... vatsarada Mâgha-śuddha 7 Âdityavârad-andu Noṇam-
bavâḍi-mûvatt-irchchhâsirada Ko ... r̤ar̤-oḷagaṇa Bikkigan-eppattar̤a Tuṅgabhadrâ-nadî-pûrbba-bhâ-
gada Durggattiya-pravishṭada Bidireyalli kan ... dêvara-pratishṭheya mâḍi â-dêvarige upahârakkevu
pañcha-parbbada śrî-ka ........ ger̤eya keḷage baḍagalû paḍuvalû sâgara ........ chatur-âśraya-
madhyadali Vatsûr-aḍeyaru Kaḷatiya ........ vâgi Meya-Nâyakanu Malla-jîya Kêsava-jiya ....
dhârâ-pûrbbakavâgi â-Kannêśvara-dêvarige koṭṭa bhûmi ... mattaru vondu 1 (usual final verse).
(usual final verses) maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî śrî-Kannêśvara-dêvara-purada gâṇa tôṭa mânya

div.head:
105
At Kundavâḍa (same hobli), on a stone lying in Halagappa’s garden.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-prithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvaraṃ Dvârâvatî-pura-
varâdhîśvaraṃ Yâdava-kuḷâmbara-dyumaṇi samyaktva-chûḍâmaṇi malaparoḷu-ganḍa nissaṅka Hoy-
saṇa-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvara śrîmatu-pratâpa-chakravartti-viajya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivriddhi-(m)â-
chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire | tad-viśâla-vaksha-sthaḷa-nivâsiniyar appa svastiy anavarata-
parama-kalyâṇâbhyudaya-phaḷa-sahasra-bhôga-bhâgini dvitîya-Lakshmî-samâneyaruṃ pratyaksha-
Pârvvatiyaruṃ patibratârundhitiyaruṃ śaraṇâgata-vajra-pañjareyaruṃ śrî-Sômanâtha-dêvara dibya-
śrî-pâda-padmârâdhakeyarum appa śrimad-abhinava-Kêtala-mahâ-dêviyaru svasti samasta-surâsura-
nara-garuḍôraga-yaksha-siddha-vidyâdhara-gandharbba-kinnara-kiṃpurushâdy-anêkânîka-maṇi-maku-
ṭa-ghaṭṭita-charaṇâravinda-yugaḷanum appa śrîmad-dakshiṇa-Saurâshṭrav enisida śrîmat-svâyambhu-
Sômanâtha-dêvara Kundavâḍada Sôva-Gaüḍa-Huḷḷa-Gaüḍa-Hariyama-Gaüdaṅgaḷaṃ Chinnagervikada
Bîri-Seṭṭiyara maga paṭṭaṇasvâmi-Saṅgi-Seṭṭi-Muṭṭi-Seṭṭigaḷge Budhavârada-santheya mâḍiy endu
niyâmisalu mahâ-prasâdav endu kaikoṇḍu Âryyavaḷey-ayinûrbba-svâmigaḷu mukhyavâda Noṇambavâḍi-
mûvatt-irtsâyirada śirômaṇi mahâ-râjadhâniy Uchchaṅgiya samasta-vaḷi-nakhara-mummuri-daṇḍa
ubhaya-nânâ-dêsi-nâlku-nâḍuṃ â-pañcha-maṭhada-tapôdhana-mukhyavâda ekkôṭigaḷuṃ asaṅkhyâta-
gaṇaṅgaḷuṃ hadineṇṭu-sameyamuṃ muntâgi Śaka-varushada 1140 neya Bahudhânya-saṃvatsarada
Mârggaśira-śuddha 2 Budhavârad-andu śubha-lagnadalu nanni-kambhavaṃ pratishṭhisi santheyaṃ
mâḍi | â-śrî-Sômanâtha-dêvargge biṭṭa âya (here follow details of gift) sarvva-mânya mummuri-daṇḍada
sthaḷadalli daṇḍa-dôsha ...... anyâyavaṃ sampâdi .... haḷarige drôhi nettaru-gayya baṇajiga
goṭṭadakke nanni-kambada munde hasumbeyan ikkidaḍaṃ Mâgaḷi-javaḷiyan ikkidaḍaṃ ant-int-endu
hi . ge hiḍide . ḍaṃ halarige drôhi î-dharmmamaṃ halaru pratipâḷisi pâlanâd a-chyutaṃ padaṃ emba
nyâyamaṃ kaikombudu | maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî akasege Hasumbihaḷi Nilaṅge vibhûti paṭṭaṃ kkaṭi
Śivapuri idan âlasa .. eva sura-lôkakke martya-lôkakke hor̤agu

div.head:
106
At Malebennûru (Malebennuru hobli), on a stone near the Bairê-dêva temple.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Sâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1450 neya Sarvadhâri-saṃvachharada Vaiśâkha-
śu 10 Guruvâradalû śrîmatu Adiyappa-Nâyakaru Maleyabennûra grâmada seṭṭi-paṭṭaṇâsvâmi-gauḍu-
prajegaḷige koṭṭa sâgina dharma-śâśanada kramav ent endare śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêś-
vara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-Krushṇa-Dêva-mahârâyaru sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geütidali
namma nâyakatanake pâlisida Maleyabennûra grâmadali nîü mâḍida ghaḷiyagaḷu khilavâgi mur̤idu
hôdavendu kêḷi kâṇike mêluvaṇa kabbina-suṅkavanû biṭeü yî-vivaravanu Harihara-dêvara stânika-
Chennapayagaḷa maga Hariyaṇṇanu hêḷalâgi sarvathâ biṭevu nîvu nimma putra-pautra-pârampareyâgi
â-chandrârkka-sthâyigaḷâgi sukhadalû ... endu koṭṭa sâgina dharma-śâśana yî-śâśanada sâgu-pramâ-
ṇakke âru aḷupidavarugaḷu tamma tande-tâyigaḷaṃ sâsir-vêdigaḷ apa brâhmaṇaraṃ sahasra-kapile-
yaṃ Gaye-Vâraṇâsiyali koṃ ...... teṅka-mukhav âgi biḍu-maṇḍeyali surâ-pânavaṃ sêvita-hôda-
vana pâpake hôharu (usual final verse) yî-śâśanava biṭṭa karta Adiyapa-Nâyaka-ayanavara su-putra
śrî-Bhairava-Nâyaka .... voppa .... śrî śrî

div.head:
107
On another stone at the same place.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1438 neya Yîva-saṃvatsarada Kârttika-śu 12 Śu-lu ǁ
śrî ...... pati śrî-Puruśôttama-svâmiya divya-charaṇa ............ parama-Mahêśvara parama-
Vaishṇava jagal-mûḷa-kâraṇa śrî-Puru .... durgâ-putraṃ trayî-samuddharaṇa vasundharâ ......
vaṃśâvalamba-stambhana darmma-rakshaṇayika .... mûla-parâkrama dâni ........ narapati-charita-
num ...........vindu-jana-viśrâṇakâ .... vâda-vachana-pratisamâpa .. saptâṅga-prajâ-jana-
santâpa-bandhana san-mitra-hrudayânanda Vaivasvata-Manu-vaṃśa-parâkrama Yikshvâku-kula-
pradîpa Râmachandra-charitâla .. karikâ .. kaṃ nyâyyâdi-biruda-virâjita-Kabalêśvara-mahâ-râjâ ...
śrîma . parama-bhaṭṭâraka rûpu-Nârâyaṇa niranta .. -vidya abhinava-Paraśu-Râma jitâri-samara
niśśaṅka-raṇa-raṅga Draviḷa-maṇḍalêśvara nava-Kandarppâvatâra mahânubhâva gaja-pati śrî-Pratâpa-
Rudra-mahârâyana kumâra śrî-Vîrabhadra-mahârâyaru Maleyabennûra sîmeya maduveya-suṅkava
biṭṭu koṭṭa darmma-śâśana śrî-Krushṇa-Râya-mahârâyaru sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyut-
iddalli namma nâyakatanakke pâlisida Maleyabennûra-sîmeya kâluvaḷi Liṅgadahaḷḷiya-sîmeya voḷag-
âgi namma aramanege saluvanthâ maduveya suṅkavanu śrî-Krushṇa-Râya-mahârâyarigevû namma
tande śrî-Pratâpa-Rudra-mahârâyarigevû namagevû dharmmav âgabêk endu śrî-Krushṇa-Râya-mahâ-
râyara nirûpadinda vutthâna-dvâdaśi-puṇya-kâladali â-chandrârkka-sthâyiyâgi naḍeyal endu sarvva-
mânyavâgi biṭṭevu (usual final phrases) yendu biṭṭa maduveya suṅkada darmma-śâśana (usual final
verses) yî-dharmmake sahâyavâda Bennûra .... Narasa .. yidake mukhyarâda Bennûra ... staḷada Ha-
daḍeya kulkaraṇikav-oḷagâda Kûlambiya-Doḍi-Goṇḍa Ku...... Malli-Goṇḍa Niṭûra-Barama-Goṇḍa
Bennûra-Sûri-Seṭṭi-voḷagâda gaüṇḍa-prajegaḷû tammoḷu yêkastarâgi mâḍidantâ darmma-śâsana
(usual final phrase) yî-śâsanava tîvida silpi Vîrôja śrî śrî śrî.

div.head:
108
At the same village, from a copy of copper inscription in possession of Hañchinamane-Subbâ-Joyisa.

lg.l: yasya krîḍâ-sarô mukhyaṃ svayaṃ sapta-mahârṇavâḥ ǁ
Harêr lîlâ-varâhasya daṃshṭrâ-daṇḍas sa pâtu vaḥ |
Hêmâdri-kalaśâ yatra dhâtrî chhatra-śriyaṃ dadhau ǁ
* So in the original. râjâ Hariharô jâtaḥ śrîmad-Vijaya-bhûpatiḥ ǁ

div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-śrîman-nṛipa-Śâlivâhana-śakha-varsha-śakhage iruva varsha 1327 nê Vyaya-
nâma-saṃ | rada Bhâdrapada-bahuḷa 6 Bhaumavâra-Kapilâ-yôga-puṇya-kâladallu Pampâ-Virûpâksha-
dêvara sannidhânadalli śrîman-mahârâjâ-paramêśvara dharmma-mûrtti Bukka-Râya-Dêva-Râyaru sva-
tantra-Kapi-gôtrada Âpastamba-sûtrada Yaju-śyâkheya Handarike-Sahasranâmada-Narasâvadhâni-
gaḷa pautrarâda Virûpâkshâvadhânigaḷa putrarâda Narasâvadhânigaḷige tiruchârya koṭṭa svâsti-
krama Vuchchaṅgi-vênṭhe-vaḷagina Koṭṭûru-śiṃhâsanakke saluva Bhânuvatî-paṭṭaṇa-sthaḷake Jigaḷe
Kundûru-Harosandra-muntâda gramânugrâmagaḷalli jôtishya-staḷa-purôhityâ yî-bagye nâgaḷa-bîjavari-
bhûmi sa-hiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvvaka yî-parvaṇiyalli nâvu koṭu yidhêve nimma putra-pautra-
pâramparyyavâgi anubhavisikoṇḍu bâhôdu yandu barasi-koṭṭa svâsti-bhû-dâna-śâsana-paṭṭige yide
sâkshi

lg.l: âditya-chandrâv aniḷô‘naḷaś cha dyaur bhûmir âpô hṛidayaṃ Yamaś cha |
ahaś cha râtriś cha ubhê cha sandhyê dharmaś cha jânâti narasya vṛittaṃ ǁ

div.p: (usual final verse) śrî-Virûpâksha.

div.head:
109
At Hiri-Hâlivâṇa (same hobli), on a stone north-west of the Îśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-prithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâra-
kaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara râjya ..... pra-
varddhamâna .... salutt ire .. adhigata-pañcha-mahâ ... śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla ....... saṅkathâ ..
............ mahâ-pradhânaṃ (6 lines effaced : then follow usual final phrases and verse) śrî.

div.head:
110
At Sirigêri (same hobli), on a stone south of the Kallêsvara temple.
div.p:
svasty Akâḷavarisha-Dêva śrî-prithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhi (6 lines gone) Saka-nṛipa-kâlâtîta-
saṃvatsara-sataṅgaḷ 893 nê saṃvatsara pravarttise tad-varishâbhyantara (7 lines effaced : then follow
usual final verses).

div.head:
111
At Vâsana (same hobli), on a stone in front of the Kêdârêsvara temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-prithvî-vallabha (4 lines gone) hâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara ...... chûḍâmaṇi
nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍa parichchhêdi-gaṇḍa Râjiga-Chôḷa-manô-bhaṅga śrîma .... Tribhuvana-
malla-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaru Noḷambavâḍi-mûvatt-irchchhâsiramaṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ
geyyuttam ire tat-pâda .... svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda ... hâ-sâmanta vîra ..... sarabha
...... kôḷâhaḷa vai (rest effaced).

div.head:
113
On a second stone at the same place.
div.p: (Upper portion is gone).

................ lôka-sa .............. bhûjâta-vîra-No........ baḷa-sâdhaka nâmâdi-samasta-
prasasti-sahita śrîma .................. ḷa Irugayya Ôsanaman âḷuttam ire | Châḷukya-Vikrama
.......... kha-saṃvatsarada Mârggasira-suddha 1 Sômavârad andu ........ mityavâgi ǁ yama-
nêma-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa ...... nushṭhâṇa-japa-samâdhi-śîḷa-sampannar appa .. ṭṭapaḷḷiya
Maru .. -dêvara | tat-putra Kaiyimâ-jîyage Ôsanada tîrttada Râmêsvara-dêvargge nava-kharmma-
khaṇḍa-jîrṇṇôddhâra-pûje-punaskâra-nimityamâgi anêka-paṇḍitara sannidhiyoḷu pâda-pakkhaḷaniyaṃ
mâḍi hastôdakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭevu Muguḷiyaker̤eya keḷage gal̤de mattar ondu .. ḷaker̤eya oḷage
bel̤dale mattaru mûr̤u idaṃ sarvva-bâdhâ-parihâramâge kâyd ......... (usual final phrases).

lg.l: ninag akk Indrana pempin-ant eseva saundaryyaṃ viḷâsaṅgaḷuṃ |
ninag akk âdiya-dêva-dêvan enip â-Brahm-âyu kaḷpântaraṃ |
ninag akk î-dharey-uḷḷinaṃ Iruga ninn î-kîrtti lôkaṅgaḷoḷ ǁ
pored âl̤daṃ kali vîra-Pallava-nripaṃ pint il̤du nôḍalke tâṃ |
parid ugrântakan-ante koṇḍu taleyaṃ bhaṇḍâramaṃ peṇḍiraṃ |
dhurak ant añjiye pôda Mârajana beṅkoṇḍ ârppum î-sauryyadiṃ |
.. rugaṃ Râvaṇa-vairi â .... n enipaṃ vairîbha-kaṇṭhîrava ǁ

div.p: (usual final verse) śrî-Kêtaṇana barepa

div.head:
114
On a third stone at the same place.
div.p:
svasti Saka-nṛipa-kâḷâtîta-saṃvatsara-śataṅgaḷ oṃbhainûr̤a-padinâlkaneya varishaṃ Nandana-śaṃ-
vatsaraṃ pravarttise Âhavamalla-Dêvaṃ prithuvî-râjyaṃ geyye svasti śamadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-
śabda mahâ-sâmanta Muḷgunda-sinda śrîmat-Jâtarasar Kaḍambaḷige-sâyiramumaṃ uttarôttaram
âge âḷuttire Bramhmarâsi-paṇḍitargge âmnâyadal âda Ôsanada tîrtthava kâlaṃ kal̤chi koṭṭaṃ
Pulluṇiya maryyâde Siriger̤e Posavûru Savaṇûru Kir̤ugêri ivu pûrvva-maryyâde idaṃ kâdâtaṅge
aśvamêdhaṃ tuḷâ-purusham il̤ḍa phaḷa (usual final phrases) śrî-Râjayyaṃ baredaṃ maṅgaḷaṃ (south
side) .... nadhiyam ... jaladhi ...... ṇiyabhâ .... ana puṭṭidaṃ ...na tîrtta Siri ..... aḷa Kailâsada
dorey ene negal̤d Ôsanada janmam ar̤iva-manujarum oḷarê

div.head:
115
On a vîrakal in front of the same temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Vijaya-Pâṇḍ[y]a-Dêvaru Noṇamba-[vâḍi]-
mûvattirchchhâsiramumaṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyvuttam ire ǁ svasti samasta-praśasti-
sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-sâmantaṃ Lakshmî-kântaṃ Toṇḍa-vibhâḍaṃ toḍare balgaṇḍaṃ aṇṇana gandha-
vâraṇaṃ mârkôla-bar̤a-siḍilu bigid-appuvaṃ ripu-sâmanta-Madana-Mahêsvaraṃ ari-biruda-sâmantara
śira-vajra-daṇḍaṃ ayyana .... mechche gaṇḍaṃ kaṭṭi-biḍuva sâmantara gaṇḍaṃ maṇḍaḷika-sâmanta
.. tîrtta...ḷavaṃ sâmanta-jagadâḷu duṭṭa-sâvantara niṭelva-mur̤ivaṃ mîr̤uva-sâvantara miduḷa sûsuvaṃ
gaḍiy-aṅka-Bhîmaṃ Uśanîśvara-dêvara pâdârâdhakaṃ bhuja-baḷa-sâdhakaṃ Vinâyaka-dêvara labdha-
vara-prasâdaṃ Bâya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Ôsanada sâmanta-Chaṭṭaya-Nâyakana maga sâmanta-Benavaya-
Nâyaka sâvanta-Huṇi ...na maga ...... Hariyamaṇayanuṃ Ôsanamumaṃ ko ..... Kokkalûrumaṃ
Hogeya ... yaṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire â-vûra .... sûḷeya Kâḷeya maga
haḍavaḷa-Be .. yanuṃ Chandeyanuṃ Kêteyanuṃ âḷtanavaṃ mâḍi nâlvaruṃ sattalige Prabhava-saṃ-
vatsarada Mâgha-bahuḷa 5 mi Sômavârad andu vîragalaṃ nir̤isuvalli Muguḷiyaker̤eya keḷage gadde
ka 100 teṅkaṇa holada ha.. keya Muttuga-Nâyakara maneya kaḷasa kannaḍi huvu tambula koḍeya ..
yint î-maryyâdeyaṃ â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ salisuvaru salisidavargge (usual final phrases) yî-
kallaṃ Kâḷi-Seṭṭi nilisida.

div.head:
116
On a second vîrakal at the same place.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbda-Śaka-varusha 1319 neya Yîsvara-sạṃvatsarada Pushya-suddha ..... Mude[ya]-hegga-
ḍeya maga Bayicheya-heggaḍe âtana maga Nuṅka-Gaüḍaâtana maga Hariya-Gaüḍa...Harihara-dakshi-
ṇa-dvâra Kêtâra-dêvara sannidhi ...... stamayavâda gha 10 kke svarggastan âda ǁ â-Hariya-Gaü ..
arasiyaru mahâ-sati bâyi-dê . Lakhumâyi agni-pravêśava mâḍi sura-lôka-prâptey âdaru âda-dina 11 kke
Ôsanada Hariya-Gaüḍana tamma Bayiche-Gaüḍa maga Kêta-Gauḍa kalla nillisi pratishṭeya mâḍidarû
maṃ śrî śrî

div.head:
117
On a third stone at the same place.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śaka-varusha 1304 neya Dundubhi-saṃvatsarada Phâlguṇa-ba 12 Âditya-
vârada dinadalli sûryya-vudayadiṃ mêle ghaḷi 9½ vombhattu-vare-ghaḷigeyalli pratishṭhe âyitû ǁ
śrîmatu Mudeya-heggaḍeyara maga Bayicheya-heggaḍeya maga Nuṅka-Gavuḍanu svarggastan âdanû
â-Nuṅka-Gavuḍana arsiyaru mahâ-sati Dêmâyi .......... mâḍi sura-lôka-... r âdaru ..........
Gavuḍanû ǁ mahâ ...... śrî śrî śrî .... Kêtâra-dêvarige vṛitti ........ môjeyali ikkuḷada dêva-bhûmi
dhârâ-pûrbbavâgi naḍasuvadu ǁ śrî

div.head:
119
At Nandiguḍi (same hobli), on a vîrakal near the Îśvara temple.
div.p:
svasthi Suvarṇṇavarsha-śrî-pṛithuvî-vallabha mahâ-râjâ paramêsvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ pṛithuvî-
râjyaṃ geye Barddhegaṃ Kadambaḷige-sâyiramuman âḷuttire Saka-nṛipa-kâlâtîta-saṃvatsara-sataṅgaḷ-
eṇṭunûr̤-ayvattera .. [Vi]kṛita-saṃvatsaraṃ pravarttise Gaṅga-vaṃsôdbhavaṃ Chandi .... ḷâḷe âtana
beḷavaḍicha alligaṃ kîl̤guṇṭhey âgi sa ...... ptan âda âtaṅgaṃ naḍamaṇṇi pannir-mmattar nnella-maṇṇi
kha .... vaka sûḷevaḷḷa .. l̤u idan al̤ida pañcha-mahâ-pâ ........ besageydavan

div.head:
120
At Haḷḷihâḷu (same hobli), on a stone standing against the wall of the gauda’s threshing-floor.
div.p:
(Upper portion is gone) matu śrî-vîra-Bukaṇṇa-Voḍeyaru pṛithuvî-râjyava âḷu .. gaṇḍara-gôva maleya-
maṇḍaḷikara gaṇḍa honna koṭṭu kudureya komba maṇḍaḷikara gaṇḍa mar̤e-okkavara kâva Buveya-Nâyka
maga Yibbeya-Nâykanu tamma tande dêva-lôkakke sandalli â-Yibbeya-Nâykanu tamma tandeya hesa-
ralli Buvasamudrav emba ker̤eya kaṭṭisidanu ker̤ege varaha ga 150 nu .. kkidanu tamma tandiyara
hesarali Halevâḷadali Buvêsvara-dêvara pratishṭeya mâḍisidudake ga 5 nu koṭṭanu â-Buvasamudra-
ker̤eya keḷage gadde .. 10 Halevâḷada-ûra-hittilalu beddalu 10 â-dêvarige koṭṭa a .... 2 ettu 3 ..
...... Mallikârju[na]-dêvara vitti ...... â-Buvêsvara-dêvara vitti ... nnaya-dêvara vitti yishṭanu
Bîrûra Siddhê-dêvara maga Vîrapage dhâre-pûrbbavâgi biṭṭa dharmma (usual final phrases).

div.head:
122
At Jigaḷi (same hobli), on a stone in the outer wall of the Raṅganâtha temple.
div.p:
svasti śrî prithivî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâraka Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷa-
kaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla .... vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivriddhi-pravar-
ddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-ba ... saluttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi .... svasti samadhigata-
pañcha-mahâ-śabda ...... śvara Kâñchî-pura-varâdhîśvara .... chûḍâmaṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mâr-
ttaṇḍa parichchhêdi-gaṇḍa Râjiga-Chôḷa-manôbhaṅga gaṇḍa-râya śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvara Râya-
Pâṇḍya-Dêvaru Kadambaḷige-
* So in the original. mûvattir-chchhâsiramumaṃ Bêtu .. nelevîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinô-
dadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi svasti samasta-praśasti-sahita śrîman-Mahâdêvara
pâdârâdhakaṃ para-baḷa-sâdhakaṃ nija-bhuja-vijaya-sâhasaṃ vijaya-kûrppa ...... | satyada
niḷaya | satya-Yudhishṭhira | parivâra-tu .... Râya-Pâṇḍya-râjya-samuddharaṇa | parijanâbha-
raṇan ahitara gaṇḍa | gaṇḍa-mârttaṇḍa | śrîmad-Adiyamarasaru | Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâlada 49
teneya Krôdhi-saṃvatsarada Chaitrad-amavâse-sûryya-grahaṇa-byatîpâta-Sômavârad andu Ela-
vaṭṭiya Sômêśvara-dêvara nivêdyakkam Nârâyaṇa-dêvara nivêdyakkaṃ nandâ-dîvigegaṃ tapôdhanar-
âhâra-dânakkaṃ śrîmad-Adiyamarasaruṃ perggaḍe-Ponnâṇḍaru ü̂r-oḍeya Chandimayya-Nâyakaru
Nâgabhûshaṇa-paṇḍitara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrbbakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭa modal-êriya gadde mattar
ondu beddale.. ya mattaru nâlku pû-dôṇṭa kammav innûr̤u (usual final phrases) Gaṅgâ-sâgara-Yamnâ-
saṅgamadoḷu Bâṇarâsi Gayey emb î-tirthaṅgaḷol âtma-kula-dvija-puṅgavanâ kuḷavan aḷidar int idan
aḷidaru (usual final verse).

div.head:
124
At Hadaḍi (Hadaḍi hobli), on a pillar in the enclosure of the Îśvara temple.
div.p:
(East face—8 lines effaced) .... taṃ Mânyakhêṭa .... pâda-padmôpajîvi samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-
śabda mahâ .... Châḷukya-sarmmanuṃ guṇa-ratnâkaraṃ satya-Kânînaṃ para-balad-Aṇuvaṃ drô-
hara sûlaṃ madaṅkale gaḷḷaṃ śrîmat-Pa (south face—about 20 lines effaced) yyaṅgaḷa ...... Gâ-
vuṇḍagaḷa .............. sâkshigaḷu ......... (usual final phrases and verse) î-śâsanamaṃ bareda
śrîman-ma . -verggaḍe Pallavâbharaṇa Brahmâdirâjara perggaḍe-Śânti-varmmayya (west face—about
20 lines effaced) .... pañcha-mahâ-śabda ... śrî .... kuḷa-tiḷaka ...... Kâñchî-pura-varêsvara śrîmat-
Traiḷôkyamallaṃ Nanni-Noḷamba-Pallava-Permmânaḍigaḷ Kadambaḷi .. (north face—about 10 lines
effaced) maṃ mâḍisi â-dêgulake koṭṭa gadde matta .... berddale matta .... sâkshi Padaḍiya-
Gâvuṇḍaṃ Nâgiyaṇṇanuṃ Bidi .. ma-Gâvuṇḍanuṃ Pa .. maṭa-sthâna (usual final phrases).

div.head:
125
At the same village, on a vîrakal in Voggâre Râmayya’s threshing-floor.
div.p: Hadaḍeya kur̤uba Er̤eka-Gauḍa Binnalager̤eya danava koṇḍu-hôhalli Âriyar-oḍane kâdi mararchidanu ǁ

div.head:
126
At Mudihadaḍi (same hobli), on a stone to the south of the Îśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśryaṃ srî-prithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâra-
kaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmaj-Jagadêkamalla-Dêvara râjyam uttarôttarâ-
bhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi samadhi-
gata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda Pallavânvayaṃ śrî-prithvî-vallabhaṃ Pallava-kuḷa-tiḷakan êka-vâkyaṃ Kâñ-
chî-pura-varêśvaraṃ śrîmaj-Jagadêkamallan-Irmmaḍi-Noḷamba-Pallava-Permmânaḍigaḷ Kaḍambaḷige-
sâyiramuṃ Kogaḷiy-aynûr̤uṃ Ballakunde-mûnûr̤uṃ Kuḍiyaparave-yel̤pattuṃ Kariviḍi-mûvattuṃ
pañcha-grâmeyumaṃ nidhi-nidhâna-nikshêpa-sahasradaṇḍa-modalâge dushta-nigraha-visishṭa-prati-
pâḷana-sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadin âḷuttum ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi samasta-râjya-bhara-nirûpita-
mahâmâtya-padavî-virâjamâna manônnata prabhu-mantrôtsâha-śakti-traya-sampannar appa śriman-
mane-verggaḍe Pallavâbharaṇa Brahmâdirâjar pPadaḍe-panneraḍuman âḷuttum ire Saka-varsha 958 ne
Îśvara-saṃvatsarad uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrânti-Âdityavârad andu Muduvadaḍeya ...... mâḍisida Brahmê-
svara-dêvargge Brahmavêdi-jîyaraṃ kâlaṃ karchchiy ü̂riṃ paḍuva doḍḍa-gaṭṭina keḷage biṭṭa gal̤de
mattar ondu berddale mattar ond (usual final phrases and verses) śrimat-Puḷiya-Sôvayya-Gâvuṇḍa
baradaṃ maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî

div.head:
127
At Śâgali (same hobli), on a stone in the enclosure of the Mallikârjuna temple.
div.p:
(Upper portion is effaced) vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêsvara parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-
kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhi-
vṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ salu ...... pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍa
...... nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa ..........śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva ...... śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara
...... Mâda-Nâyakaru ǁ svasti samasta-prasasti-sahitar appa śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara Manneya
...... bâḍad oḷagaṇa ...... ya mêlâḷikeya .. Mâda-Nâyakar âḷutt ire ǁ svasti samasta-prasasti-
sahitar appa śrîman-mahâ-prabhu Siṅga-Gâvuṇḍana Hampa-Gâvuṇḍan alliya samasta-prajegaḷa
........ svasti śrîmatu-Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâlada ...... Śubakritu-saṃvatsarada Mâgha-su 5
Bṛihaspati ........ uttarâyaṇada saṅkrânti-nimittam âgi | alliya sthânâdhipati divya-tapôdhanar
Jñânaśakti-paṇḍitara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi śrî-Mallikârjjuna-dêvara nivêdyakkaṃ
pûjârigaṃ piriya-ker̤eya keḷage biṭṭa gadde mattar ondu 1 berddale vûriṃ mûḍa Kanda-gaḷeya
dâriyiṃ baḍagalu mattal eraḍu (usual final phrases and verses).

div.head:
128
At Huvvinamaḍagu (same hobli), on a stone near the Kallêśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-prithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêsvaraṃ paramai
bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-
râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire tat-pâda-
padmôpajîvi samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ ..... -pura-varêsvaraṃ Yad-vaṃ-
śâmbara-dyumaṇi samyakta-chûḍâmaṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍa parichchhêdi-gaṇḍa Râjiga-
Chôḷa-manôbhaṅga śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-pâdâbja-bhriṅgaṃ nâmâdi-samasta-prasasti-sahi-
taṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvara Tribhuvanamalla-Pâṇḍya-Dêvar .......... Ballakunde-mûnûr̤u ..
...... sâsiramumaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷanadind âḷuttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi svast-
samasta-râjya-bhara-nirûpita-mahâmâtya-padavî-virâjamâna mânônnata prabhu-mantrôtsâha-sakti-
traya-sampannar appa śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ râyabâri-daṇḍanâyaka Mâ .... ṇṇayyagaḷu piriya-
Kêtaya-Nâyakara su-putra kula-dîpakam appa........ kiriya-Kêteya-Nâyakara (5 lines gone) yama-
niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâṇa-japa-samâdhi-śîḷa-sampannar appa Dêvarâsiya
putra Jñânaśakti-paṇḍitara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakam mâḍi śrî-Mûlastânada Kali-dêvaru
.......... dali bitṭṭa biṭṭa beddale mattar eraḍumaṃ śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâlada 32 neya Sarv-
vajitu-saṃvatsarada Mârggaśirad-amâvâse-Bṛihaspativâra-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkramâṇa-byatîpâta-nimityam
âgi biṭṭa dharmmaṃ (usual final phrases and final verse) Sarasvatî-gaṇada Sibhugôjana putra
Ikulôja

div.head:
129
At Lokkikere (same hobli), on the south-east pillar of the raṅga-maṇṭapa of the Îśvara temple.
div.p:
(West side) svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-prithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvara
parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ Dvârâvatî-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ Yâdava-kuḷâmbara-dyumaṇi samyaktva- chüḍâ- chûḍâ-
maṇi Malerâja-râja Malaparoḷu gaṇḍa a-sahâya-śûran êkâṇga-vîra Sanivâra-siddhi Giridurgga-malla
bhuja baḷa-Bhîma pratâpa-chakravartti Magara-rajya-nirmmûlanuṃ Chôḷa-râjya-pratishṭâchâryanum
appa Hoysiṇa-śrî-Sôvi-Dêvaru sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyam gevutirda Saka-varśa 1158
Durmmukhi-saṃvatsarada Śrâvaṇa-ba (south side) huḷad-amavâse-Âdityavâra-sûrya-grahaṇad andu
śrîmatu samasta-suṅka-sarbâdhikârigaḷum appa Mâvatana Nâgaṇṇa Baitayyana maga Râgha ....
Simmaya Kambarasa-daṇṇâyakaru śrîmatu-Kêtêśvara-dêvara nandâdîvigege âḍak-ele-suṅka ......
gevalli nibandhiyâgi koṭṭa gadyâṇav âr̤uvam âvaṅge suṅkâdhikârav âdaḍaṃ Bavaṇiya adhikâri-
gaḷuṃ Lokiyaker̤eya staḷada naḍav-adhikârigaḷuṃ salsi koḍuvadu (usual final phrases).

div.head:
130
At Gaṇḍamuktênahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone standing close to the enclosure wall of the Hanumanta temple.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Sâlivâhana-śaka-varshaṅgaḷu 1633 neya Khara-nâma-saṃ | Âśvîja-śu 10
llu Vâlmîki-gôtrada śrîmân-mahâ-nâyakâchârya Kâmagetti-Kastûri-Raṅgappa-Nâya[ka]ra pautrar âda
Medikeri-Nâyakara putrarâda Baramaṇṇa-Nâyakaru Âśvalâyana-sûtrada Bhâradvâja-gôtrada Nâra-
ṇappana pautranâda Lakshmîpati-putranâda Bokasta Nâraṇapage barasikoṭa agrahâra-dâna-patrada
kramav ent endare namma hirêrige puṇyav âgabêk endu nâyakaru namma râjyad-oḷagaṇa ... sîmê-
vaḷagaṇa Gaṇḍamu .. nahaḷḷiy emba grâmavannû yêka-bhôgya-agrahâra mâḍi...... sidake dhârâ-
pûrvvakavâgi .. Nâraṇapage koṭu yidhêve yî-grâmake saluva kâḍârambha-nîrârambha-nidhi-nikshêpa-
jala-pâshâṇa-akshîṇi-âgami-siddha-sâdhyaṅgaḷ emba ashṭa-bhôga-têja-svâmya .. nû ânubhavisikoṇḍu
nimma putra-pautra-pâramparya sukhadalli yirabêk endu barasi koṭṭa dâna-patra (usual final verse).

div.head:
131
At Kôlukuṇṭe (same hobli), on a stone in the yard of the Âñjanêya temple.

lg.l: Viśvêśaṃ Mâdhavaṃ Dhuṇḍiṃ Daṇḍapâṇiṃ cha Bhairavaṃ |
vandê Kâśîṃ Guhâṃ Gaṅgâṃ Bhavânîṃ Maṇikarṇikâṃ |
Harêr lîlâ-varâhasya daṃshtrâ-daṇḍas sa pâtu vaḥ |
Hêmâdri-kalaśâ yatra dhâtrî chhatra-sriyaṃ dadhau ǁ

div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śakha-varsha 1630 neya Sarvadhâri-nâma-saṃvatsarada Kârtika-
śudha 15 Sômavâra-sômôparâga-parvaṇi-puṇya-kâladallû | Vâlmîka-gôtrada śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâ-
chârya Kâmageti-Kastûri-Raṅgapa-Nâyakara pautrarâda Medakeri-Nâyakara putrarâda Baramaṇṇa-
Nâyakarû ǁ Âśvilâyana-sûtrada Haritsasa-gôtrada Honnâḷi Chika-Kâ .. ṇa-jôyisara pautrarâda Siṅgaṇa-
jôyisara putrarâda | Kâsîvâsi-Nârâyaṇa-Bhaṭṭaru Śaṅkkara-Bhaṭṭaru Śiva-Bhaṭṭaru tri-vargga-
rigû barasikoṭṭa grâma-śâsana-dâna-patrada kramav ent endare ǁ namma hiriyarugaḷige puṇya-
sukrutav âgabêk endu Kâsî-dharmakke nâvû âḷuvanthâ râjya Koḍaganûra sîmey-oḷagaṇa | Kôlukuṇṭṭe
yemba grâmavannû yî-paurṇamî-sômôparâga-parvaṇi-puṇya-kâladalû sa-hiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-
pûrvakavâgi | Śivârpaṇavâgi | tri-vâchâ-tri-karaṇa-yuktavâgi koṭṭu yidhêve | yî-grâmake saluva kâḍâ-
rambha-nîrârambha-nidhi-nikshêpa-jala-pâshâṇa-akshîṇa-âgâmi-siddhi-sâdhyagaḷ emba ashṭa-bhôga-
têjôpârjaneyiṃ nimma putra-pautra-pâraṃparya â-chandrârkka-sthayigaḷâgi Kâsî-puṇya-kshêtradalli
snâna-dêvatârchaneyaṃ mâḍikoṇḍu atithi-abhyâgata-santarppaṇa mâḍikoṇḍu sukhadall ihud endu
barasikoṭṭa grâma-śâsana-dâna-patrâ ǁ (usual final verses).

div.head:
133
At Maḷalakere (Mâyigoṇḍa hobli), on a stone south of the Îśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-prithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ
Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Traiḷôkya ...... samasta-bhuvana-stuta ......
.... pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja ...... chakôra-chandra pratyaksha ...... jara Châḷukya-
........ bhriṅga ... ya kumâra chamatkâra- ..... ṅganâ-bhujaṅga ...... siṅga śrîmat-Traiḷôkya ..
.. Kâḍambaḷige-śâsiramuṃ Kogaḷi ...... maṃ dushṭa-nigraha-viśishṭa-pratipâḷanadin âḷdu sukha-saṅ-
kathâ-vinôdadi râjyaṃ geyuttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-
pradhâna ....... śrîman-Manne ...... er̤a Kêsayya-Nâyaka ...... Nâyaka ........ heggaḍe .. râja-
pramukha-karaṇagaḷu Kaḍambaḷige-sâsirada kampaṇav ayva ...... baḷiy-agrahâra Maṇalaker̤eyaṃ
.... sale bandalliyu ............ rasu Saka-varsha 993 neya Virôdhikṛit-saṃvatsarada Vaiśâkha-
ba ................ saṅkrântiyuṃ dina-trayamuṃ kûḍida mahâ-tithiyoḷ alliya mûlasthâna ....
naivêdya-nandâ-dîvigegaṃ munne naḍad ondu-mattar ggaddeyuv eraḍa-mattar-bbeddaleyum allade
naishṭika-tapôdhanargge vidyârtthi-mâṇiyargge biṭṭa gardde mattar ondu bel̤dale mattar eraḍ
int î-dharmmamaṃ tappade pratipâlisuvud idam kiḍal îyade naḍayisidavargg âhârâbhaya-bhaishajya-
śâstra-dânagaḷaṃ kôṭi-liṅga-pratishṭheya mâḍisida phaḷam akkuṃ (usual final imprecatory phrases
and verses) mattaṃ dêvargg ür-mmadhyadoḷe naḍev ettu-gâṇav ondu kai-gâṇav ondu sûḷe-der̤e
nâlkuṃ mânyav int î-samasta-dharmmamaṃ pratipâḷisidavargge sahaśra-gô-dânamaṃ sahaśra-bhô-
janamaṃ Prayâgeyal brâhmaṇargge koṭṭa phaḷam akkuṃ

div.head:
134
At Hirê-Togalêri (same hobli), on a stone west of the Kallêśvara temple.
div.p:
(4 lines effaced) svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-prithvî-vallabha mahâ-râjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ
parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla.... m utta-
rôttarâbhivriddhi-...... sukha-saṅka (25 lines illegible) Pâṇḍya-.... sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ
geyuttam ire.... śrîmatu Sayambhu-dêvara divya-śrî-pâda-padma.... ralu śrîmatu Châḷukya-Vikrama-
kâlada 82 neya .... saṃvatsarada Pausya-suddha 5 miy-Âdivârad-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkramaṇa-vyatîpâta-
...... jayavâda-kâraṇadiṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Pâṇḍya-Dêvara pradhâna Muddarasaru Kâma ..
yaru Toḷagâlavariya .... dâyiganu .... â-baḷiya.... gaḷu paḍeda-vritti śrîmat-Togalêr̤ig uttara-diśâ-
bhâgada chatur-yyugaḍiṃ munnav âda...... m appa śrî-Sayambhu-dêvara sthânikar appa Vimaḷaśakti-
paṇḍitaraṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaru karadu sâsira-nâḍa Manneyaṃ Aṇṇamarasanuṃ
ippatta-nâlku bâḍada Manneya Mâkarasanuṃ â-sômayâji............ tigaḷ appa prabhugaḷu Sôma-
nâthayyanu Bhîma-Dêvayyanu Saṅkaṇṇanuṃ........ yâytavamanuṃ Kiriyâytavamanu . Kâchaṇṇa-
nuṃ berasi avara sannidhânadalu svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâṇa-
japa-samâdhi-śiḷa-sampannar appa Vimaḷaśakti-paṇḍitara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi
dêvargge .... dattiyâgi biṭṭa-dharmma piriya-ker̤eya modal-êri .. dêvara mundaṇa gadde mattar
eraḍu idariṃ paḍuva teṅka beddale mattaru nâlku dêvar-aṅga-bhôgake dêvariṃ teṅkaṇa puṇaseya
kaṭṭaṃ sarvva-namas-
* So in the original. Sivâya Dêvapurada.... hanneraḍu manneya nelada sâmya dêvara nanda-divige-
ge biṭṭa ettu-gâṇa ondu aḍakeya mara .... (usual final phrases and verses)

lg.l: aḷidaṃ meyy-aḷidan âtan ajagujig iḷida ǁ

div.p: yint enisi negalda bel-tur̤uvada .... Togalêri-sthânikar appa (rest illegible)

div.head:
135
On a stone in Siddappa’s threshing-floor, behind the same temple.
div.p: (The top portion is effaced).

...vâlayamumaṃ .. bêḍiparg ...r̤ipum enisi sale tari ... Kâḷidâsana putraṃ prabhu-senabôva-
Mârttaṇḍayya .. châkaṇabbeya putra svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-prithvî-vallabhaṃ mahâ-
râjâdhirâjaṃ paramêsvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ
śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandr-
ârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-sabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ Kâñchî-
pura-varêsvaraṃ Yadu-vaṃsâmbara-dyumaṇi su-bhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ pari-
chchhêdi-gaṇḍaṃ Râjiga-Chôḷa-manôbhaṅgaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-pâdâbja-bhriṅga nâmâdi-
samasta-pra[sa]sti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ Tribhuvanamalla-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaru Noḷamba-
vâḍi-mûvat-iś-chchhâsiramumaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-visishṭa-pratipâḷanadiṃ sukha-râjyaṃ geyyuttam
ire ǁ śrî-Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâlada 34 neya Virôdhi-saṃvatsarada Mârggasirad amavâsye-Brihaspati-
vâra-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkramaṇa-byatîpâta-nimityamâgi biṭṭa dharmma Attigêr-panneraḍar̤a baḷiya-
bâḍam Togalêr̤a uttara-disâ-bhâgade nelas irppa śrî-mûlasthâna-Sayaṃbhu-dêvara parisûtradal irppa
Mârttaṇḍêsvara-dêvarige dêva-dattiyâgi samasta-guṇa-sampannaṃ sujana-prasannaṃ vipra-kuḷa-viḷâ-
saṃ kîrtti-nivâsaṃ śrîmad-Arasara-perggaḍe uttama-Mêlûra Âḷiyâṇḍanuv alliya samasta-prabhuga-
ḷum irddu âchâryya-Vimaḷasakti-paṇḍitara kâlaṃ kaḷchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi dêvara nivêdyakkaṃ
nandâdîvigegaṃ dêvara mundaṇa piriya-ker̤eya motta modal-êriyalu biṭṭa koḷa gadde kamma 150
dêguladiṃ teṅka biṭṭa beddale kamma 450 yint î-dharmmamaṃ (usual final phrases and verses).

lg.l: bbegam â-Bhânujan-ante puṭṭi jasadoḷ dik-chakramaṃ meṭṭi jeṭ- |
ṭiga-Mârttaṇḍane tâne mâḍisidan enduṃ pêḷe Kaiḷâsamaṃ |
Togalerîl usirva ......... duritamaṃ gelvaṅge sannâhamaṃ ǁ

div.head:
137
At Mâyigoṇḍa (same hobli), on a vîrakal near Bûdi-Liṅgappa’s house.
div.p:
svasti śrî Yâdava-Nârâyaṇa pratâpa-chakravartti Hoysaṇa-vîra-Nârasiṃha-Dêv-arasaru râjyaṃ
geyyuttam irdda Svabhânu-saṃvatsarada Śrâvaṇa-su 7 Maṅgaḷavârad andu Koḍaganûra kali Mâra-
siṃha ari-mandadiṃ vivâdavâgi yittaṇḍamaṃ kâdi biddalli Malêbennûra Seṭṭivo-Nâyakana aḷiya
Mûkaṇa Baḷahada Karaḍibayalli kâdi svarggastan âdanu.

div.head:
138
At Bâḍa (same hobli), on a stone near the Âñjanêya temple.
div.p: śîmatu Mûtererâhuḷa ruvariya Râmôjana maga Vîraiyage bhûmi Chandrapanu koṭṭa gadde ...

div.head:
139
At the same village, on a stone near the Kôḍi-Basara temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-prithvî-vallabha ...... Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ ...... râjyam
uttarôttarâbhivriddhi-pravarddhamâna .............. ttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi svasti sama-
dhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvara Kuvalâḷa-pura-varâdhîśvara ...... gaṇḍa Râjiga-
Chôḷa-manôbhaṅga śrîma ...... lla-Dêva-pâdârâdhakanu śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaru
Noḷambavâḍi-mûvattir-chchhâsiramumaṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyuttire tat-pâda-
padmôpajîvi ǁ svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmanta vijaya.... kâminî-kântaṃ naṭa-
nagna-kathaka-gâyaka-dînânâtha-sandôha .... bhûshita-jagatî-taḷa-khyâtan a . bhuja-baḷâvaḷêpâ-
ṭôpôdrikta-ripu-nikurumba-kabandha-narttanâ-sûtradhâra saṅgrâma-dhîra pati-hit-Âñjanêya satya-
Râdhêya nija-kuḷa-sarasijâkara-taraṇi-kiraṇa Kusuvar-âbharaṇa Bijjêśvara-Barddegêśvara-dêva-
pâdâbja-bhriṅgan aṇṇana siṅga nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-sâmanta Dâkarasaru
Châḷukya-Vikrama-varshada 25 neya Vikrama-saṃvatsarada Mârggasirada puṇṇami Âdityavâraṃ
sôma-grahaṇa-nimittamâgi śrîmad-agrahâraṃ Bâḍad Allâlêsvara-dêvar-aṅga-bhôgakke tadu-grâmad
aḍake-yeleya davasâyada perjjuṅkada dasavandada ponnan Îśânaśakti-paṇḍitara kâlaṃ karchchi
dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭaru î-dharmmamaṃ suṅkamaṃ kaikoṇḍu naḍeva puṇya-purusharuṃ
mahâjanam ayvadimbar anukûḷar âgiy â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ sva-dharmmadiṃ pratipâḷi-
suvaru ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahâ-râjâdhirâja paramêśvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ
Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam
uttarôttarâbhivriddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpa-
jîvi samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Kuḷumba-pura-varêśvaraṃ Yedu-vaṃ-
śâmbara-dyumaṇi subhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍa paritsêdi-gaṇḍa Râjiga-Chôḷa-
manôbhaṅgaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-pâdâbja-bhriṅgaṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Tri-
bhuvanamalla-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaru Noḷambavâḍi-mûvatt-eraḍu-sâsiramaṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ
râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâlada 30 neya Pârtthiva-saṃvatsarad uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrân-
tiy-andu śrîmad-agrahâraṃ Bâḍada mahâjanada binnapadindam alliya piriya-ker̤ege koḍaṅgeyyâ .....
biṭṭa gardde matta 1 bittu-vaṭṭaṃ mattaralu khaṇḍuga 1 daṇḍa-dôshaṃ tavukuri tavudâya subûda
gûḷa-prâ[ya]śchittam tippe-su[ṅka]ṃ gâḍiya-suṅkaṃ ondu-gâṇaṃ int-initu ker̤eya-bhaṇḍiṅge biṭṭa
dharmmav (usual final phrases and verses) .... mane .... kula-kshaya .......... akku

div.head:
140
On another stone at the same place.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-prithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ
Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇam śrîmat-Traiḷôkyamalla-Dêvara râjyâbhivriddhi-pra-
varddhamânam uttarôttaram â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttum ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi samadhi-
gata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara Kuvaḷâḷa-pura-varêśvaraṃ Nandagiri-nâthaṃ mada-
gajêndra-lâñchchhanaṃ Padmâvatî-labdha-vara-prasâdaṃ Gaṅga-Kusumâyudhaṃ Nanniya-Gaṅgaṃ
jayad-uttaraṅgaṃ maṇḍaḷika-makuṭa-chûḍâmaṇi maṇḍaḷika-lalâṭa-paṭṭaṃ nâmâdi-samasta-prasasti-
sahita śrîmat-Traiḷôkyaṃalla-Châḷukya-Gaṅga-Permmanaḍi-Vikramâditya-Dêvaru Gaṅgavâḍi-toṃ-
bhattar̤u-sâsiramumaṃ sukha-saṅkatha-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttum ire Saka-varsha 981 neya
Vikâri-saṃvatsarada Mâgha-mâsada puṇṇame-Âdityavârad andu Kadaṃbaḷige-sâsirada baḷiy-agra-
hâraṃ Bâḍada śrî-Nârâyaṇa-dêvargge nivêdyakke illiya.. lada Êchikabbeya magaṃ Chittaṇḍam Piriya-
Kêta .. yakaru gaṇêriya ayguḷav edeya biṭṭa gel̤deya kamma 235 matta dêvargge nandâ-dîvige naḍe-
vantâge tiṅgaḷge ponna-hâga vaḍḍiyoḷ ûrgge kaḷuṃ-goṭṭa gadyaṇaṃ nâlku (usual final phrases and
verse)

div.head:
141
On the back of the same stone.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâsraya śri-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ
Satyâsraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrimat-Traiḷôkyamalla-Dêvara râjyam uttarôttarâ-
bhivriddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrâkka-târaṃ-bara saluttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajivitaṃ svasti
sarva-lôkâsrayaṃ śrî-Vishṇuvarddhana-mahârâja-Vijayâditya-Dêvar Noḷambavâḍi-mûvattir-chchhâ-
siramumaṃ sukha-râjyam gaiyuttam irava.... Kaṇiyasasariya Mâchayyanu Âli-Seṭṭiyu Nâgavarmma-
nu amara-perggaḍe Cheṇṇapayyanu avara kôlgâr̤a Gaṇapatiyu perjjuṅkada kaṇikâr̤a Rakkasa-Gaṅ-
ganum avaray aṇa Nambiyaṇṇanu avara phaḷihata Pâkaṇṇanuv int-ivar̤ il̤du Saka-varsha 986 neya
Krôdhi-saṃvatsarada Pushya-suddha-dasami-Âdityavâra-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrânti-vyatîpâtadandu Bâḍada
Śvayambhu-dêvargge ûra tôṭada .......... koyvali varshaṃ prati aydu-per̤a nandâdivigege
biṭṭaru

div.head:
142
On a side of the same stone.
div.p:
svasti śrîmad-agrahâraṃ Bâḍada mahâjanaṃ piriya-ker̤ege biṭṭa dharmmam ent endaḍe grâmada
âvud-ondu-prâyaśchitta daṇḍa-dôsha tavukuri tavudâyasa tippe-suṅkav inituṃ kereya-bhaṃḷige biṭṭa
dharmma (usual final phrases)

div.head:
143
At Kandagallu (same hobli), on a stone near the Kallêśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâraka
Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷaka Châḷukyâbharaṇa śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarô-
ttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ saluttam ire .............. n Âhavamalla (3
lines gone) śrî-kêḷî-sadanan abhi........ ṇḍaṃ ṛipu-râya-kumu ............ maṇḍaḷika-makuṭ a-chûḍâ-
maṇi vairi-maṇḍaḷa.......... varddhana-mahârâja Vijeyâditya .... Noḷambavâḍi-mûvattirchchâsira..
.. dushṭa-nigraha-viśishṭa-pratipâḷanadin âḷdu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire Saka-
varsha 925 neya Śôbhakṛit-saṃvatsarada Chaitra-śuddha-trayôdasi-Âdityavârad andu śrî .... rasara
samasta-pradhânara Kogaḷi-nâḍa Ka...baḷige-nâḍa prabhu-ga .......... nâḍoḷe svasti samadhigata-
pañcha-mahâ-śabda .................... tiśaya-virâjamâna śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ ......
vinirggata-sakaḷa ............ Prabhâchandra-Jinâlaya-samuddharaṇa ...... m enisirdda śrîmat-
Śrî nandi-paṇḍita-dêvara .. vasôma-bhaṭṭâraru piriyara-Gêtayyanuṃ perggeḍe-Kaṇṇayyanuṃ Bha-
ratayyanuṃ Hambi-Seṭṭiya Barmmayyanuṃ aḷiya-Gêtayyanuṃ modalâgi pâda-mûla-parivâra-nagara-
mahâjana-pañcha-maṭha-sthâna-gavuṇḍagaḷum antu tombattar̤u-sâsirbbarum il̤du Kadambaḷige-
nâḍa kampaṇa ..... mâvina-kandaṃ ge ........ muṇḍa ür-oḍeyaṃ Mâramayyaṅge dhârâ-pûrbbakaṃ
mâḍi yâva-kâlakkaṃ pûrâyaṃ hînâyam ennade varsha-nibandhadiṃ dharmma-vatthaḷeyâgi........
Mâghada-puṇṇamige koṭṭaru int î-mar yyâdeyaṃ tappade pratipâḷisuvar î-dharmmamaṇ tappade
pratipâḷisidargg âhârâbhaya-bhaishajya-śâstra-dânaṅgalaṃ kôṭi-Chaityâlayaṅga .. mâḍida phaḷam
akkuṃ idan aḷidaṅge Kopaṇa-tîrthamumaṃ rishiyarumaṃ Bânarâsiyoḷe kavileyumaṃ Brâhmaṇaru-
man aḷida mahâpâtakam akkuṃ (usual final verses) Śrînandi-paṇḍita-dêvara sva-hasta-likhitaṃ
maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî.

div.head:
144
At Baḷḷâpura (same hobli), on a stone lying in the enclosure of the Añjanêya temple.
div.p:
nirvighnam astu sosti śrî jayâbyudaya-Sâlivâhana-śa 1503 nê Viśu-saṃ[va]charada Âśaḍa-śuda 10 mî
Sômavârâ śrîmatu Santêbennûra Hanumapa-Nâyakara kâryya-kartarâda Mayikoṇḍada .... miypa-
Nâyaka .... Vîrêśorege amrutapaḍige Buḷḷapurada-grâmavanu (back) dâna-dhârâ-pûrvaka dâna-
dhâreyan eredu koṭṭeü sanâma ... nya haruva mariyade (stops here).

div.head:
145
At Chikka-Togalêri (same hobli), on a stone in the Siddha-Gauda’s field.
div.p: (The top portion is effaced).

.... Vâraṇâsiyalu gôvu konda-dôsake hôharu ...... yî-Tirumalêśa-dêva .... kali ...... bandu..
tanna........ kaṭisikoṇḍanu tanna sêveyanû........ na maga Tiruvala-dâsariyanu...... kêḷisi tanna
pûjeyanu mâḍuvahâge kaṭaḷeya mâḍikoṇḍanu yî-Tirumalêśa-dêvara amrutapaḍige gaddeyanu
keyyanu ...... dêva .... kaṭaḷeyanu mâḍi yî-śâśânada lipiyanu barasida adhikâri-Timmaṇṇagaḷige
sakaḷa-aiśvaryada ...... vâgali yî-Tirumalêśa-dêvaru nelasiy-ida grâmakke sakaḷa .... v âgali |
idar̤a nyûnâtiriktaü śrî-Tirumalêśa-dêvarige samarppayâmi maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî śrî yî-kelasav
ellaü Timmana nirûpadinda âyitu |

div.head:
146
At Doḍḍa-Mâgaḍi (same hobli), on a stone west of the village gate.
div.p: śrî-Hariharâya namaḥ |

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâli[vâ]hana-śaka-varusha 1441 neya Vikrama-saṃvatsarada Kârtika-śudha
1 lû Toremaleya-durggâdhipati Râmappa-râhuttara makkaḷu Murâri-râhuttaru Koḍaganûra Banada-
Śankhari-dêvêrige Mâgaḍiya-grâmavanû pratinâmadhêya Râmâpurav endu nêmisi dhârâ-pûrvakav
âgi dhâreyan er̤adu koṭṭeü yî-grâmavanu âr obaru apaharisal âgadu

div.head:
147
At Dyâmavanahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone in the pial of the garuḍa-kambha of the Hanumanta temple.
div.p: śrî-guruvê gati-matiḥ ǁ Vyâsa-Râyaru

lg.l: Harêr lîlâ-varâhasya daṃshṭrâ-daṇḍas sa pâtu vaḥ |
Hêmâdri-kalaśâ yatra dhâtrî chhatra-śriyaṃ dadhau ǁ

div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya | Śâlivâhana-śakha-varushaṅgaḷu 1638 neya | Durmukhi-nâma-saṃvachharada
Chayitra-śu 14 lû ǁ śrîmat-paramahaṃsa-parivrâjakâchâryyarâdâ śrîmad-Vaishṇava-siddhânta-pratish-
ṭhâpanâchâryarâdâ śrîmad-Râmachandra-dêvara divya-śrî-pâda-pad[m]ârâdhakarâda pada-vâkya-pra-
mâṇa-pârâvâra-pârîṇa sarva-tantra-svatantrarâdâ | śrîmad-Vyâsa-Râyaravara | vidyâ-siṃhvâsanâdhîś-
vararâda śrîmal-Lakshmî-Nârâyaṇa-tîrtha-śrîpâdaṅgaḷavara kara-kamala-sañjâtarâdâ | śrîmad-Raghu-
nâtha-tîrtha-śrîpâdaṅgaḷavara divya-śrî-pâda-padmaṅgaḷige | Vâlmîki-gôtrada śrîman-mahâ-
nayakâchârya Kâmagêti-Kastûri-Raṅgapa-Nâyakara pautrarâdâ Medakeri-Nâyakara putrarâdâ |
Bharamaṇṇa-Nâyakaru | barasi koṭṭa dharma-śâsana-dâna-patrada kramav ent endare | namma
hiriyarugaḷige sukrutav âgabêk endu nâvu âḷuvanthâ râjya Koḍaganûra sîmevaḷagaṇa... Dêmalavana-
haḷi yamba grâmavanû Kṛishṇârpaṇavâgi.... dati | yî-grâmake saluva kâḍâraṃbha nîrârambha | nidhi-
nikshêpa-jaḷa-pâshâṇa-akshîṇi-âgâmi-siddha-sâdhyaṅgaḷ emba ashṭa-bhôga-têja-svâmyaṅgaḷannu ..
śishya-pâramparyya | â-chandrârka-stâyigaḷâgi anubhavisikoṇḍu yi ... endu barasi koṭa śâsanada dâna-
patra ǁ (usual final verses).

div.head:
148
At Śaṅkaranahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone in the threshing-floor of Gauda-Niṅgappa.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Raktâkshi-saṃvatsarada Bhâdrapada-ba 10 lu śrîman-mâha-maṇḍalêsvara Râmê-Râju-
Koṇḍa-Râjai-Dêva-mahâ-arasugaḷavara kâryyake kartarâda Râüta-Râyaru Śaṅkharanahaḷi-Tiruveṅga-
ḷanâthage koṭa grâma-umbaḷiya śâsana Śaṅkharanahaḷi-grâmavanu svâmiya neyivêdya-dîpârâdhanege
salali endu dhârâ-pûrvakavâgi koṭeü (usual final phrases) Dânapa-Vîrarasara baraha yida paḍadâta
Lakhaṇaya.

div.head:
149
At Koḍaganûru (same hobli), on a stone east of the Kallêśvara temple.
div.p:
...... sta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-prithvî-vallabha mahâ ...... mêśvara parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-
kuḷa-tiḷa ........ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijeya-râjyam uttarô.... pravarddhamânam â-
chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire tat-pâda-padmô ........ samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda
mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara Kuḷumba-pura-varâdhîśvara Yadu-vaṃśâmbara-dyumaṇi su .... chûḍâmaṇi
nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ parichchhêdi-gaṇḍaṃ Râjiga-Chô...... śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-
pâdâbja-bhṛiṅgaṃ śrîman-mahâ.... Tribhuvanamalla-Paṇḍya-Dêvaru Noḷambavâḍi-mûvattirchchhâ-
śira ...... dushṭa-nigraha-viśishṭa-pratipâḷanadiṃ râjyaṃ ge...... mire ǁ śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-
kâlada 37 neya Nandana-saṃvatsarada Phâlguṇa-bahuḷa-amavâse-Budhavârad andu sûryya-grahaṇa-
muṃ vyatîpâtamuṃ kûḍi dina .. svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-mônânushṭhâna-
japa-samâdhi....guṇa-sampannar appa śrîmad-anâdi-agrahâraṃ teṅkaṇa.. yyâvoḷeya.... Koḍanganûr-
aśêsha-mahâjanakke pâda-pûje-dravyamaṃ koṭṭu chandrârkka-sthâyi ...... voḷagaṇa Vishṇu-dêvara
nivêdyakke samasta-guṇa-viśêshônnatar appa śrîman-mahâ-prabhu Kôṇeya Nâraṇamayyana putraṃ
Śrîdharayyaṅgaḷu Kur̤uvada bayalalu biṭṭa gar̤de kamma innûr̤-ippattaydu (usual final phrases) î-
śâsanamaṃ baredaṃ sênabôva-Muddaṇaṃ khaṇḍarisidan Ikkuḍôja

lg.l: mattaṃ bêḍidavargav ar̤idu mannisi sale pemp |
putraṃ prabhu negaḷdan îga Śrîdharamayyaṃ ǁ
mmikkavar end osedu dharaṇi baṇṇisut irkkuṃ ǁ

div.p: (usual final verse).

div.head:
150
On another stone at the same place.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhi (20 lines gone) śishṭêshṭa-jana ......
.......... pratâpa-Janârddanaruṃ ........ vajra-pañjararuṃ ........ êka-vâkya (8 lines gone)
putra Dâsimayyagaḷu koṭṭa gadyâṇa nâlku â-ponna-vṛiddhiyaṃ varshaṃ-pratiya siddhâyadoḷage
bêḍikoṇḍu naḍasuvaru .... mahâjanakke ...... â-chandrârkka .... samasta-vastu-guṇa-sampannar
appa śrîman-mahâ-prabhu hiriya ...... mayyagaḷa putraṃ Nâraṇamyyaṅgaḷu Kur̤uvada bayalalu
biṭṭa gal̤de kamma innûr̤-ippattaydu ǁ mattav aśêsha-mahâjanakke pâda-pûje-dravyamaṃ ......
śatrakke samasta-vastu-guṇa-sampannar appa śrîman-mahâ .... prabhu ta.. ya Nâraṇamayyaṅgaḷa
putraṃ .... Kur̤uvada bayalalu biṭṭa gal̤de kamma nûr̤a-hanneraḍuvare ǁ .... śêsha-mahâjanakke
pâda-pûje-dravyamaṃ koṭṭu chandrârkka-sthâyiyâgi ....... samasta-vastu-guṇa-sampannar appa
śrîman-mahâ-prabhu Hommaṭha-Mâchimayyaṅgaḷa putra Śrîdharayyagaḷu Kur̤uvada bayalalu
biṭṭa gar̤de kammaṃ nûr̤a-hanneraḍuvare ... ǁ mattav aśêsha-mahâjanakke pâda-pûje-dravyamaṃ
koṭṭu chandrârkka-sthâyiyâgi śatrakke samasta-vastu-guṇa-sampannan appa śrîmad-Uchchaṅgiya
.. Masaṇamaya ...... yara Mâchimayyaṅgaḷu ........ vare ǁ mattaṃ mahâ .......... Uchchaṅgiya
Mâchimayya ...... mahâjanakke pâda-pûje-dravya ........ yâgi śatrakke samasta-vastu-guṇa-
sampannar appa śrîman-mahâ-prabhu Tivikramayyaṅgaḷa magaḷu Mâḷikabbe Kur̤uvada bayalalu
koṭṭa gar̤de kamma ayvattâr̤uvare (usual final phrases and verse).

div.head:
151
On a third stone at the same place.
div.p:
........ svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śri-prithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-
bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ .... bharaṇa (7 lines gone) samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ ........
bhuvanamalla-Pâṇḍya-Dêva .......... mûnûr̤uma .......... dushṭa-nigra ha-viśishṭa-pratipâḷana-
dind âḷuttam ire ǁ tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ ..........
dâyaka dînânâtha-vandi-sandôha-kalpa-bhûjâta ...... khyâtan adhika-bhuja-baḷâvaḷêpô .... pôd-
vṛitta-ripu-nikurumba-kabandha-narttanâ-sûtradhâra saṅgrâma-dhîra pati-hita...... satya-Râdhê ..
nija-kuḷa .... taraṇi-kiraṇa Kusu .. r-âbharaṇa Bijjêśvara .... dêva-pâdâbja-bhṛiṅga aṇṇana-siṅga
nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-sâmanta-da ...... ǁ svasti yama-niyama-hôma-
svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-mônânushṭhâna-pârâyaṇa-japa-samâdhi-sîḷa.... ǁ .... r̤parigraha-bhûmi
.......... dharmma-samuddharaṇa mumukshugaḷu ...... kâma-byâmôha-vinir mmuktaru śrîman
mahâ-dêvatâ-pâda-paṅkajârâdhakaru sadânanda-saṃyuktaru mukty-aṅganârâdhakar ...... tapô
mârgga-nirataruṃ nirâpêksharuṃ nirmmaḷaru nirmmatsararuṃ nishkaḷaṅkaruṃ nissaṅgarum enisi ..
...... râjadhâniy appa ...... pura-varêśvara ........ paṇḍita-dêvar emba mahimônnatiyaṃ tâḷdi
...... paṇḍita-dêvara śishya ........ śakti-paṇḍita-dêvargge svasti śrî-Châḷukya-Vikrama 25 neya
Vikrama-saṃvatsarada .. Pushya-bahuḷa 10 daśami Âdivâram uttarâyaṇa-saṅkramaṇad andu śrîmad-
agrahâra-teṅkaṇ-Ayyâ .... lavâda Koḍaṅganûra Sômêśvara-dêvargge nandâdîvige ........ kâlaṃ
karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭa dharmmam (usual final phrases and verse) ..............

div.head:
152
On a fourth stone at the same place.
div.p:
svasti .... śri ...... dhirâja ...... bhaṭṭâraka ...... Dêvan â-samudra-paryyâpta-pṛithivi-râjyaṃ
geyyuttire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmantaṃ Châḷukya-sarvva-
jñaṃ guṇa-ratnâkaraṃ satya-Kânînaṃ pati-hita-Pavanajaṃ para-balad-Aṇuvaṃ drôhara śûlaṃ Modar-
kale gaḷḷaṃ śrîmat-Paḍi .. yyaṃ Kadambaḷige-sâyiramumaṃ (south side — 4 lines gone) dushṭa-nigraha-
śishṭa-pratipâḷanaṃ geydu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ .... ttiyoḷ âḷuttam il̤du Śaka-varsha 901 Vikra-
ma-saṃvatsaraṃ pravarttise tad-varshâbhyantara-Pushya-bahuḷa-bidige-Śukravârad andu Koḍaganûra
mahâjanakke kâlaṃ kal̤chi kayya dhâreyan er̤adu .... giyuṃ panneraḍu-gadyâṇadind oḷagâda
daṇḍamuṃ mûl̤gauḍi oḷdaṇdey a . yuma biṭṭaṃ â-mâḷeyoḷe â-chandra-târârkkaṃ-baraṃ naḍevudu
(usual final phrases and verse).

div.head:
153
At the same village, on a stone in the meadow.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ
Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷaka (7 lines gone) svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmantâdhipati
...... Śiva pâda-sêkhara nîti-ratnâkara ...... sujana-jana-Manôja ..... vîra .... samuddharaṇaṃ
pati-hita .... nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîmach-Châḷukya-Gaṅga-Permmâḍi Brahmâdhirâja-
pramukha ....... nûr̤u Ballakunda ..... nûr̤u Kogaḷiy-aynûr̤u Kada .... sâyiramumaṃ dushṭa-
nigraha-viśishṭa-pratipâḷaneyindam anubhavisutta ..... vara besadiṃ svasti Śaka-nṛipa-kâlâtîta-
saṃvatsara-śataṅga 979 neya Hêmaḷambi-saṃvatsarada Pushya-bahuḷa-daśami-Budhavârav-utta-
râyaṇa-saṅkramaṇad andu agrahâraṃ Koḍaganûra Vishṇu-dêvargge aynûr̤-ayvattu baḷḷiya-tôṇṭamu
âr̤u-nûr̤u-kamma gal̤deyum eraḍu matta...... yumaṃ nandâdîvigeg ondu-gâṇavumaṃ biṭṭar (usual
final phrases and verse).

div.head:
155
At Kabbûru (same hobli), on a stone near the Kallêśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭâra-
kaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷûkyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam
uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ Kalyâṇa-purada nelevîḍinoḷu
sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyvuttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-
śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Kâñchî-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ Yadu-vaṃśâmbara-dyumaṇi subhaṭa-chûḍâ-
maṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍa Râjiga-Chôḷa-manôbhaṅga śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-pâdâbja-
bhṛiṅga śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara Tribhuvanamalla-vîra-Noḷamba-Pallava-Permmânaḍi-Dêvara
tamma svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Kañchî-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ
Yadu-vaṃśâmbara-dyumaṇi subhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ parichchhêdi-
gaṇḍaṃ Râjiga-Chôḷa-manôbhaṅgaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-pâdâbja-bhṛiṅgaṃ śrîman-mahâ-
maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Tribhuvanamalla-Pâṇḍya-Dê[va]ru Noḷambavâḍi-mûvattirchchhâsiramumaṃ Sân-
taḷige-sâsiramuṃ Banavase-nâḍ-oḷagaṇa agrahâraṃ Tumbegana-Hosavûru-Elagatûr-oḷagâgi palavuṃ
kurttu vṛittigaḷa suka-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷanadi nidhi-nidhâna-
nikshêpa-sahasra-daṇḍa-modalâgi sâdhisutuṃ râjyaṃ geyvuttav ire śrîmanu mahâgrahâraṃ
Kabbura Vîrarâjêndra-chaturvêdimaṅgalatu mahâjana innûr̤-ar̤uvattu idu pûrvva-diśâ-bhâgada
Kali-dêvargge dêva-dattiyâgi Kaṭṭidabayala ûroḍeya-gauṇḍugaḷa mânya-sthânada baḍagaṇa-staḷa-
dalu mattaru innûr̤u-kamma gade Muduger̤eya keḷage innur̤u-kamma gade dêvara pachchima-
bhâgada bedale aravattaru dêvara uttaradiku-bhâ[ga]dalu tôṇṭa innur̤u idu mahâjana biṭṭa dharmma |
svasti śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-varshada 48 ya Śôbhakṛitu-saṃvatsarada Phâlguṇa-su 3 Budha-
vârad andu śrîman-mahâ-agrahâraṃ Karvvûra Gañjiger̤eyalu ondu mattaru gar̤dege mûḍaṇa Kali-
dêvargge nandâdîvigegaṃ nivêdyakka Maleyâḷa-Nârâyaṇa-moḷandale ippattu-gadyâṇa-ponnan ikki
chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluvantâgi mahâjanav aśêsav il̤du dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍikoṇḍu biṭṭa
bhûmi mattaṃ svasti śrîman-mahâ-agrahâraṃ Karvvûra piriya-ker̤eya modal-êriyalu penna-bayalalu
ondu-mattaru gal̤dege mûḍaṇa Kali-dêvargge nandâdîvigegaṃ nivêdyakka Tenuḷa-Kâmâṇḍaru
ippattu-gadyâṇa-ponnan ikki chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluvantâgi mahâjanav aśêsav il̤du dhârâ-
pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi ponna-koṇḍu biṭṭa bhûmi int î-stâna-mânyamaṃ śrî-Mûlastâna-Sh[v]ayambhu-Kali-
dêvarggaṃ Gavar̤êśvara-dêvarggaṃ dêvâleyamaṃ mâḍisi annam-uṇṇada-bratamaṃ pariṇamaṃ mâḍi
dêvara dibya-śrî-pâdamaṃ pûjisuttam ire Nityavinôda-chadurvêdimaṅgalattuṃ Siva-Brâhmâṇara
putra-pavitrey appa Kârekallay-Ammege Maleyâḷa-Nârâyaṇa-moḷandaleyanu Tenuḷa-Kâmâṇḍanu
dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭa dharmma ǁ (usual final phrases and verse) śrîmatu Kunta-dêvarggey
achaḷa-bhakutiyiṃ gandhamaṃ akshate-pushpa-dhûpa-d(v)îpa-nivêdyamaṃ tri-sañjeya kaṭṭaḷe pûje-
yaṃ mârppa samasta-guṇa-sampanneyar appa Tirukâḷatiya puṭṭida Kârekalla-Ameya putra Kunta

lg.l: mattaṃ bêḍidargam ar̤idu mannisi sale pemp |
vitra enalu negeḷdeḷ intu Kârekalla-Amme ǁ

div.p:
Sarasvati-gaṇa-dâsi Cheṅgôjana putra Ikkuḍâchâri eraḍu-dêvâleyamaṃ mâḍi sâsanamaṃ bareda |
* So in the original. Gaṅgânmûya ǁ

div.head:
156
At the same village, on a stone in Vîrabhadrappa’s field.
div.p:
(The upper part is defaced) svasti śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâlada ... neya Jaya-saṃvatsarada
Kârttika-śuddha 2 Sômavârad andu Noṇambavâḍi .... ttirchchhâsirad oḷagaṇa ........ sâyirada
Baḷiyûra .... sahitaṃ śrîmad-agrahâra-Kabbûra vâyâbya-diśâ-bhâgada bhûmiyali śrîmad-Avimuktêś-
vara-dêvara dêgulavaṃ mâḍisi kaḷasa-nirvvâṇa mâḍisi â-dêvargge snâna-pur̤pa-dhûpa-dîpa-nivêdya..
ṅga-bhôgakkaṃ â-vûra pûrvva-dakshiṇa-diśâ-bhâgada Gañjiger̤eya keḷage .... gardde mattar âr̤u ǁ
â-ker̤eya keḷage gaddeya baḍagaṇa .... kôḍiya nîruvariyaṃ tappisi .... hâḷa berddale mattar âr̤uṃ
śrîmad-Avimuktêśvara-dêvara parisûtrada samîpada teṅkaṇa-bhâgadalu âr̤u-maneya ...... samîpa-
dalu ...... innûr̤a-kamma nelamumaṃ int î-bhûmiya mâr̤i .... gadyâṇav eppattaydu ......
â-chandrârkka-târam-baraṃ sarvva-bâdhâ-parihâra-mânyavâgi kâd uḍuvudakke gadyâṇa nûr̤u antu
nûr̤-ippattaydu-gadyâṇa ponnumaṃ Kadambaḷike-sâyirada manneyaṃ Nâga .. yarasana śrîmad-
agrahâra-Koḍaganûra mahâjanav eṇbatta-nâlvara śrîmad-agrahâra-bâḍada mahâjanav ayvadimbara
Yeḷambêr̤a-vûr-oḍeya Châmaṇana Medakeriya Mâcha-Gâvuṇḍana Ke . ra Mâcha-Gâvuṇḍana Nel-
kundad Arasa-Gâvuṇḍana Togalêr̤i-vûr-oḍeyaṃ Saṅkaṇana Kaḷavûra vûr-oḍeya Sôvaṇṇana int inibara
sannidhânadalu śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara Mayyagoṇḍa-dêvaru agrahâra-Kabbûra vûr-oḍeya Barm-
ma-dêvayyanuṃ â-vûra mûliga Mâcha-Gâvuṇḍanuṃ mukhyavâgi alliy-aśêsha-mahâjanakke ...r ippatt-
aydu-gadyâṇa ... maṃ koṭṭu kâlu-garchchu dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍisikoṇḍu śrîmad-Avimuktêśvara-
dêvargge biṭṭa datti int î-śâsana-maryyâdeya Kabbûra mahâjanaṃ tappade pratipâḷisuva .. ǁ (usual
final phrases — rest illegible.)

div.head:
157
At Mallênahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone to the left of Mallappa’s house.

lg.l: Harêr lîlâ-varâhasya daṃshṭrâ-daṇḍas sa pâtu vaḥ |
Hêmâdri-kalaśâ yatra dhâtrî chhatra-śriyaṃ dadhau ǁ

div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varshaṅgaḷu 1650 neya Kîlaka-nâma-saṃvatsarada Kârtika-
śudha 6 yalu Vâlmîki-gôtrada śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchârya Kâmagêti-Kastûri-Medakeri-Nâyakara
pautrarâda Baramaṇṇa-Nâyakara putrarâda Medakeri-Nâyakaravaru | Pûtimâsha-Vaśisṭha-gôtrada
Âślâyana-sûtrada Bala-dêvagaḷa Śrînivâsa-bhaṭṭara pautrarâda Tirumala-bhaṭṭara putrarâda
Śâmâchâryarige barasi koṭṭa grâma-agrahârada dâna-patrada kramav ent endare namma hiriyaru-
gaḷige puṇya-sukrutav âgabêk endu nâvu âḷuva-râjya Koḍaganûru-śîme-vaḷagaṇa Mallaṇṇanahaḷi-
yamba grâma arûpavâgi yiddalli namma hesaralli Medakeripurâ-yamba-nâmâṅkita mâḍisi grâmâ
hâkisi yî-grâmavannû sahiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvakavâgi Kṛishṇârpaṇavâgi tri-karaṇa-tri-vâcha-
dinda nimage koṭṭu yidhêve yî-grâmake saluva-kâḍârambha-nîrârambha-nidhi-nikshêpa-jala-pâshâṇa-
akshîṇi-âgâmi-siddhi-sâdhyaṅgaḷ-emba ashṭa-bhôga-têjôpârjaneyê muntâdanu nimma putra-pavutra-
pâramparyavu â-chandrârka-sthâyigaḷâgi anubhavisikoṇḍu sukhadali yi .. d endu barasikoṭṭa agra-
hârada grâmada dâna-patrâ ǁ (usual final verses).

div.head:
158
At Vaḍêrahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone in the northern wall of the Kallêśvara temple.
div.p:
Dhâtu-saṃvacharada Chayitra-suda-pañchimiyalu śrîmatu Santêbennûra Yimmaḍi-Hanumappa-Nâya-
karu-ayanavara kâryakke kartarâda Âḍagereya Malaṇṇanu Keṇḍada-dêvarige vibhûti-muntâgi gaṇaṅ-
gaḷa sâkshiyâgi Santêbennûra Liṅga-dêvara-ayanavara .... Nâgappa-Nâyakara voppitadalu ......
samastara voppa ...... mâḍida sâsâna (some obscene phrases) yendu Malaṇṇa hâkisi .. sâsâna

div.head:
159
* This inscription is very much defaced.
At the same village, on a stone in the Kallêśvara temple.
div.p:
(The upper part is effaced) nniya ........ Châḷukya-Gaṅga-Permmanaḍi ........ Noḷambavâḍi 32
sâsiramuṃ .......... Saka-vari .. 963 neya ........ vinôdadind âḷuttav ........ mahâ-sâmanta
........ Châḷukya-Gaṅga-Permmanaḍi ........ Kadambal̤ige ........ Nâyaka ........ vatsarada
Kârttika ........

div.head:
160
At Hȧluvartti (same hobli), on a stone near the wall of the Âñjanêya temple.
div.p:
śrîmatê Râmânujâya namaḥ | svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śakâbdâḥ 1603 Durmmati-nâma-
saṃvatsarada Bhâdrapada-ba 10 lu śrî .... Tiruveṅgaḷachâ . rayanavarige ǁ râ ǁ Kâḍaṃ Chikaṇṇa-
Nâyakaru .... mâḍida Hâlavartti-grâma ...... (4 lines effaced).

div.head:
161
At Aṇaji (Aṇaji hobli), on a stone in Guḍḍappa’s dry land.
div.p:
svasti parama-Mâhêśvaraḥ mâtâpitṛi-pâda-bhaktaḥ Âtrêyasa-gôtraḥ Sôma-vaṃśôdbhavaḥ Ikshvâ-
kubhir api râjarshibhish kṛitâvâha(ḥ)-vivâhânâṃ Kêkayânâṃ kulê jâtaḥ Śivanandavarmmâ sva-
dêśasya kshayê Naṇakkâsa-Pallava-Râja-Kṛishṇavarmma-Râjayôḥ samarê tumulini pravṛittê Kṛishṇa-
varmma-Râja-sainyê bhagnê praśamita-hṛidayaḥ saṅkalita-saṅkalpaḥ kṛita-darbbha-śayanaḥ pavi-
tram abhyavahârayamâṇaḥ chira-kâlâvasthâyinîṃ kîrttim abhilashan śruti-smṛiti-vihita-śîla-guṇî
jânânaḥ manushya-bhôga-virakta-manâs svarggâvâpti-kṛitêkshaṇaḥ Indra-lôka-sukham akâmayata
â-chandra-târakam âtmanô vaṃśasya parama-śivaṃ vitanvan vîryya-śauryya-vikkrama-pratâpair
vvaśaś śauryya-karmma-paramparâ-ślâghâ-viśêshaṇa-viśêshitaḥ śûra-gaṇanâm abhimatâm abhigataḥ
abhigamyâpi sva-vaṃśa-sthâpaka-jana-puṇya-karmmaṇâ yuktaḥ yâvad yaśô lôkê vicharati tâvantaṃ
kâlaṃ purushaḥ divi nivasati pramudita-hṛidaya iti ǁ

div.head:
162
At the same village, on a stone in the Honnamma temple below the tank.
div.p:
svasti śrî samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda Dvârâvatî-pura-varâdhîśvara Vishṇu-vaṃśôdbhava su-
varṇṇa-garuḍa-dhvajaṃ Yâdava-kuḷa-kamaḷa-kaḷikâ-vikâsa-bhâskaraṃ Maḷaviya-mallay ahita-râya-
vura-salla Gurjara-râya-vâraṇâṅkusa Teluṅga-râya-sira-kamaḷa-nâḷôtpâṭana-kara pratijñe-Parasu-
Râma bhuja-baḷa-Bhîma mallâḷaṅkṛitay-ity-âdi-samasta-râjâvaḷi-virâjamâna śrîmat-prauḍha-pratâpa-
chakravartti śrî-vîra-Mahadêva-vijaya-râjyôdayada tat-pâda-padmôpajîvitaruṃ ativisama-haya-pra-
vuḍha-rêkhâ-Rêvantanuṃ para-baḷa-Kṛitântanuṃ giri-durgga-mallanu Sejavaḷa-kuvara-Nârâyaṇa-
nuṃ nirvvikuvara-jagad-daḷanuṃ nara-vîranuṃ râvutta-râyanuṃ śrîmatu-Mallinâtha-dêvara dibya-
śrî-pâda-padmârâdhakarum appa Hemmâḍi-Dêvarsara kumâra Viṭhala-Dêvarsararu biṭṭa dharmma
svasti śrî Saka-varurśa 1187 neya Krôdhana-saṃvatsarada Śrâvaṇa-śuddha-chaturddase-Sômavârad
andu payitrârôpaṇa-sameyadalu svasti śrîmad-anâdiya-piriy-agrahâraṃ (y)Anujaiya śrî-Sômanâtha-
dêvarige mahâjanaṅgaḷuṃ âsanna-chaü-gâve-samakshadalu srôtravanu biṭṭaru sarvva-namas-Śivâyav
* So in the original.
âgi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ biṭṭaru (usual final phrases).

div.head:
163
At the same village, on a stone near the Huchchappa-Voḍeyara maṭha.
div.p: ôṃ namaḥ Śivâya ǁ

svasti śrî samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-sabda Dvârâvatî-pura-varâdhîsvaraṃ Vishṇu-vaṃśôdbhavaṃ su-
varṇṇa-garuḍa-dhvajaṃ Yâdava-kuḷa-kamaḷa-kaḷikâ-vikâsa-bhâskaraṃ Mâḷaviya-mallay ahita-râyav-
ura-sa[l]la Gûrjara-râya-vâraṇâṅkusa Teluṅga-râya-sira-kamaḷa-nâḷôtpâṭana-kara pratijñâ-Parasu-Râma
bhuja-baḷa-Bhîma mallâḷaṅkṛitay-ity-âdi-samasta-râjâvali-virâjamâna śrîmat-prauḍha-pratâpa-chakra-
vartti śrî-vîra-Mahadêva-vijaya-râjyôdayada tat-pâda-padmôpajîvitaruṃ ativisama-haya-pravuḍha-
rêkhâ-Rêvantanuṃ para-baḷa-Kṛitântanuṃ giri-durgga-mallanuṃ Sejevaḷa-kuvara-Nârâyaṇanuṃ nirv-
vikuvara-jagad-daḷanuṃ nara-vîranuṃ râvutta-râyanuṃ śrîmatu-Mallinâtha-dêvara dibya-śrî-pâda-
padmârâdhakarum appa Hemmâḍi-Dêvarsara kumâra Viṭhala-Dêvarsaru biṭṭa dharmma svasti śrî
Saka-varśa 1187 neya Krôdhana-saṃvatsarada Śrâvaṇa-suddha-chaturddase-Sômavâradandu payitrâ-
rôpaṇa-sameyadalu svasti śrîmad-anâdiya-piriy-agrahâraṃ (y)Anujeya śrî-Sômanâtha-dêvarige mahâ-
janaṅgaḷuṃ âsanna-chavu-gâve-samakshadalu śrôtravanu sarvva-namaś-Sivâyavâgi
* So in the original. dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ
biṭṭara (usual final phrases) Vîra-Pâṇḍya .. vôṇiyalu kaṇi 2 Taḷavattiyalu kaṇi 1 Karabayalu are-kâṇi
Maṇalabayalu kâṇi 1 Haṭṭiyabayalu kâṇi 2½ Śiva-Brâhmaṇa-Saṅkhara-dêvara stânaṃ ǁ

div.head:
164
At Nîrataḍi (same hobli), on a stone near the north entrance of the Raṅganâtha temple.
div.p:
śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ nirvighnam astu ǁ Nîrataḍi-Ahubala-Nârasiṃha-svâmiya dêvasthânada
munde nillisida śâsanada vivara

svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhanana śakha-varuśa . 1619 sâvirada-aru-nûra-hattombhattaneyâ
voruśa (y)Îśvara-nâma-saṃvatsarada Mâgha-śudha 5 llu | Nîrataḍi-Ahôbala-Nârasiṃha-svâmiyannu
nûtanavâgi śilâ-mûrtiyannu mâḍiddakke barada śâsanada kramav ent endare | prâku Dhâtu-saṃ-
[va]charada Chaitra-mâsadallu Diḷḷi-Pâtaśaha-daṇḍu bandu dêvara dêvastâna-muntâgi binna-mâḍi hôd-
alli | Chinmanagiridurgada siṃhâsanavannu stira-sâmbrâjyav âgi âḷuvantha śrîman-mahâ-nâyik-
âchâryya Kâmagetti-Kastûrri-Medakerri-Nâyakara Baramaṇa-Nâyakaru | yî-Nirataḍi-Ahubala-Nâra-
siṃha-dêvara punaḥ-pratishṭheyaṃ mâḍisî dêvastânavannu jîrṇôddhâravannu â-chandrârka-stâyiyâgi
mâḍista sêve dêvara amṛitavuḍi-nandâdîpa(ra)kke koṭṭa dharma | Baramasâgarada sîmeya Yemme-
haṭṭige 2 ...... tôṭa .... śâsana hâkasi mâḍista dharma-sêve

div.head:
166
At Âlûru (same hobli), on a stone in the Îśvara temple in the enclosure of the Hanumanta temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâsrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêsvara parama-bhaṭṭâraka
Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarô-
ttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-sabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ Kuḍumba-pura-varêsvaraṃ Yadu-
vaṃsâmbara-dyumaṇi sûtra-chûḍâmaṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ parichchhêdi-gaṇḍaṃ Râjiga-
Chôḷa-manôbhaṅgaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaru Noḷambavâḍi-mûvattirchâsiramaṃ
sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire ǁ tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ svasti śrîman-mahâ-pra-
dhânaṃ daṇḍanâyakan Uchchaṃ .... tnameyya-jîvitada Kôṭey-Âtûra Nâgêsva .... śrîmach-Châḷukya-
Vikrama-kâlada 41 neya .... ki-saṃvatsarada uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrâ .... mâḍi mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvara Biṭṭe-
Dêvaru Malligeger̤eya .. yi biṭṭa mattar Vishṇu-dêvargge Mattikaṭṭada-keḷage biṭṭa gadde kamma
450 beddale mattar ondu | svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-sîla-sampannar appa sa[ka]ḷa-sâtra-pavitrar
appa Sadâśiva-dêvara kâlaṃ karchi ... Gâyuḍânu ar̤uvatokalu-sahitav âgi biṭṭa dharmma

div.head:
167
On a second stone at the same place.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja parama-bhaṭṭâraka Satyâśraya-
kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇa śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-
pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi .. svasti samadhi-
gata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara Kuḍumba-pura-varêśvara Yadu-vaṃsâmbara-dyumaṇi
sûtra-chûḍâmaṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍa parichchhêdi-gaṇḍa Râjiga-Chôḷa-manôbhaṅga śrîmat-
Tribhuvanamalla-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaru Noṇambavâḍi-mûvattirchchhâsiramaṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ
râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ

svasti pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmanta-vîra-śrî-kânta .. virôdhi-sarabha-bhêruṇḍa toḍare balu-
gaṇḍa vairi-nṛipa-shaṇḍa .......... n ubhaya-mahâ-maṇḍaḷan êkâṅga-vîra kâminî-jana-saha-
kâra-Kandarppa .. ḷeg-eyde-kûrppa raṇa-raṅga-nîr̤a ... r̤a jaya-siṅga ........ saṅgrâma-ghara ....
sahasa-sannâha ...... nivahamaṃ ...... mêr̤ege ..... marald ôḍi-pâḍisuva .... vîra bhuja-baḷa ..
...... gôva sauryyavaṃ mer̤ivam ǁ Triyambaka-dêva-pâdârâdhaka vairi-baḷa ...... dâbja-bhṛiṅga
nâmâdi-samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-sâmanta paḍavaḷa-Dugayyaṃ Châḷukya-Vikrama-
kâlada 17 neya Śrîmukha-saṃvatsara-Mâgha-suddha .. Brihavara-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrânti-nimittavâgi
... dêvargge ǁ ka ǁ .... tti sûkshma-chittan-amala-charitra nîn ar̤iye ......... nipa Sadâśiva ......
.. Sadâśiva-paṇḍita-dêvara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ koṭṭaṃ nâl-nûr̤a ........ mattaru |
Nâgêśvaradiṃ baḍaga haḍuva ............ (usual final phrases and final verse . rest illegible).

div.head:
168
On a third stone at the same place.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâra-
kaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-pratâpa-chakravartti Jagadêkamalla-Dêvara
vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttaṃ Kalyâṇa-
purada nelevîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire ǁ tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Kâñchî-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ Yadu-vaṃ-
śâmbara-dyumaṇi su-bhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ parichchhêdi-gaṇḍaṃ Râjiga-
Chôḷa-manôbhaṅgaṃ Jagadêkamalla-pâdâbja-bhṛiṅga-nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-
maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Jagadêkamalla-Vîra-Pâṇḍya-Dêvarasaru Noḷambavâḍi-mûvattîr-chchhâsiramumaṃ
dushṭa-nigraha-śiśhṭa-pratipâḷaneyin âḷd Uchchaṅgiya nelevîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ
râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire ǁ

lg.l: balatâ .... bhrama-bhâgiy andaḍe baḷikk ammamma pêḷ ondu .. |
jala .. bîḷuḍe sîre mailageyo pêḷ î-Pâṇḍya-bhûpâḷana ǁ
savan enduṃ taḷed irppa râjya-vibhavaṃ vidviḍ-nṛipâḷâṅganâ- |
avan inn âvano Vîra-Pâṇḍya-nṛipanaṃ viśvambharâ-bhâgadoḷ ǁ
kya-lalâmaṅg ittu tettu besan ên emb ok- |
balav âr aḷav amama Vîra-Pâṇḍyôrvvipanâ ǁ
vaṅ-geḍegoṇḍu Mêru-girig ôragey ambavol eyde nîḷdu tî- |
rtthhaṅgaḷin âda pâvana-mahad-vibhavakk eḍeyâgi dhâtrig Uch- |
chaṅgi virâjikuṃ negaḷda Pâṇḍya-nṛipâḷana râjya-varddhanaṃ ǁ
hêśvara-kôṭig îpsitavan îva mahâ .... vîra-Nâ- ǁ
gêśvara ...... vîra-pati Pâṇḍya-nṛipâḷakan oldu kîrttipaṃ ǁ

div.p:
Nâgêśvaran unnatav enipa ............ ner̤ed akkuṃ ǁ .... Pâṇḍyana ya ..... dvandvag er̤eyan
âvagam itta ǁ Dvandvager̤e perchchi .... haḍuvalu teṅka ..... daṇḍanâyaka ... ya ker̤eya keḷage
nivêdyakke biṭṭa gadde ..... Sôma...... sarvvâya dêvargge ... int inisuma sarvva-bâdhâ-parihâravaṃ
mâḍ ... int î-dharmmamaṃ pratipâḷisuva vîra ..... gâvuṇḍa (usual final phrases and verse).

div.head:
169
On a vîrakal to the east, in the same temple.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Âḷâda-Seṭṭiyara maga Bhûmâda-Seṭṭiyu âtana putran Âdiyaṇṇanuṃ Hariyama ...
palaraṃ.. padalu vadhisi gûḷiyu palaran ir̤iyalu vriśabhanuṃ tânuṃ tanna maganuṃ sura-lôka-prâptar
âdaru ǁ âyana makkaḷu Bammayyanuṃ Nâgayyanuṃ vîragallan ettisidaru ....

div.head:
171
At Hemmanabêtûru (same hobli), on a stone in front of the Siddhêśvara temple.
div.p: ôṃ namaś Śivâya ǁ

.. tiyaḷa Chaṅgaḷauve mechi âḷuvan iva Kâñchî-puravâ i .. tind idu mêdiniyoḷ adhika Hemmana-
bêtur̤a bakuta-janagaḷa arâdhaneyoḷu ǁ .. râya gra .. vâït idu Mêruvig eṇe-purusar ella sâr̤ida-
kâraṇa dhâruṇiy-oḷagaṇa jaṅgamad ârâdhaneïnd ayesa itî jagak ellaṃ ǁ svasti śrî samadhigata-
pañcha-mahâ-sabda Dvârâvatî-pura-varâdhîsvaraṃ Vishṇu-vaṃśôdbhava suvarṇṇa-garuḍa-dhvajaṃ
Yâdava-kuḷa-kamaḷa-kaḷikâ-vikâsa-bhâskaraṃ Mâḷaviya-mallay ahita-râya-vura-salla Gûrjjara-Râya-
vâraṇâṅkusaṃ Teluṅga-râya-śira-kamaḷa-nâḷôtpâṭanakara pratijñâ-Parasu-Râma bhuja-baḷa-Bhîma
.. llâḷaṅkṛita ity-âdi-samasta-râjâvaḷi-virâjamâna śrîmat-prauḍha-pratâpa-chakravartti śrî-vîra-
Mâhâdêva-vijaya-râjyôdayada tat-pâda-padmôpajîvitaruṃ sukha-saṅk(h)at[h]â-vinôdadiṃ pritvî-
râjyaṃ ggevuttam ire ǁ

svasti śrîmânu mahân-âḷva-prabhu Biṇichêḍa-kaligaḷ-aṅkusa Kala-Gauvuḍanu biṭṭa(d) dharmma svasti
śrî-Śaka-varśa 1188 Kshaya-saṃvachharada Chaitra-sudha-chaturddese-Sômavârad andu davanârôpa-
ṇada sameyadalu svasti śrîmatu Hemmanabêtur̤a Ḍiṅgaramallaya-dêvarige Kalla-gurugaḷa kâlaṃ
karchchi dhârâ-pûrbbakaṃ mâḍi chhatrake biṭṭa bhûmi Haraḷakaṭada hinde gade arevattaru â-teṅ-
kaṇa-kôḍiyalu arevattaru ere ǁ antu gadde beddalu ma 1½ yint î-dharmmavaṃ pratipâlisuvudu ǁ
svasti śrîmânu mahân-âḷva-prabhu Bidiraker̤eya Siṅga-Gauḍanu biṭṭa dharmma svasti śrî-Hemmana-
bêtur̤a Ḍiṅgaramâllaya-dêvarige hâlu-maṇḍagege biṭṭa bhûmi Nicheyagaṭṭada hindaṇa tanna gavuḍa
mânyidoḷage mûḍaṇa kaḍeyalu mataru 1½ yint î-dharmmavaṃ pratipâlisudu ǁ svasti śrîmatu Chiṇaṅ-
giya Kalleya-Nâyakana kumâra Bommeya-Nâyakanu biṭṭa dharmma svasti śrîmatu Hemmanabêtur̤u
Ḍiṅgaramâllaya-dêvarige chhatrkke biṭṭa bhûmi Goravagaṭada hinde Kali-dêvara kaḍahinahatte
baḍagaṇa kaḍeyalu kaḍahu oṃ 1½ â-ker̤eya paḍuvaṇa-kôḍiya teṅkaṇa nîr-ottinalli beddalu mattaru
1½ svasti śrîmatu Chiṇaṅgiya Piḷḷeya-Nâyakana kuvara Ammaṇa-Nâyakanu svasti śrîmatu Hemmana-
bêtûr̤a Ḍiṅgaramallaya-dêvarige Keṃvoṭṭeyali chhatrake biṭṭa dharmma vûra paḍuvalu ereya beddalu
mattaro 1½

div.head:
172
