On another stone at the same place.
div.p: ôṃ namaś Śivâya

svasti śrî samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-sabda Dvârâvtî-pura-varâdhîsvaraṃ Vishṇu-vaṃśôdbhava
suvarṇṇa-garuḍa-dhvaja Yâdava-kuḷa-kamaḷa-kaḷikâ-vikâsa-bhâskaraṃ Mâḷaviya-mallay ahita-râya-
vura-salla Gûrjjara-Râya-vâraṇâṅkusaṃ Teluṅga-râya-sira-kamaḷa-nâḷôtpâṭanakara pratijñâ-Parasu-
Râma bhuja-baḷa-Bhîma mallâḷaṅkṛita ity-âdi-samasta-râjâvaḷi-virâjamâna śrîmat-prauḍha-pratâpa-
chakravartti śrî-vîra-Mahâdêva-vijaya-râjyôdayada tat-pâda-padmôpajîvitaruṃ ativisama-haya-pravu-
ḍharêkhâ-Rêvantanuṃ para-baḷa-Kṛitântanuṃ Giridurgga-mallanu Sejevaḷa-kuvara-Nârâyaṇanuṃ Nir-
vvikuvara-jagad-daḷanuṃ .... Sâḷuva-nara-vîranuṃ râvuta-râyanuṃ śrîmatu Mallinâtha-dêvara dibya-
śrî-pâda-padumârâdhakarum appa Hemmâḍi-Dêv-arsara kumâra Viṭhala-Dêv-arsaru biṭṭa dharmma
svasti śrî Saka-varśa 1188 Akshaya-saṃvatsarada Chayitra-suddha-chaturddase-Sômavâradandu
davanârôpaṇada sameyadalu svasti śrîmad-anâdiya .. riy agrahâram Anujeya-pravishṭada haḷḷi Hem-
manabêtûr̤a mûla-stânada Kali-dêvarige aśêsa-mahâjanaṅgaḷu âsanna-chavu-gâveya samakshadalu
sôtravanu sarvva-namaś Śivâyavâgi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭaru ǁ Hemmanabêtûr̤a .. Siddha-
Mallaya-dêvarige Chayitrârôpaṇada parvvadalu chatrava naḍasuvantâgi Biṇichêḍa-holadalu Gavar̤eya-
kaṭṭiya hinde Kalla-Gavuḍa ... vâgi mattaru 1 nu dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭaru ǁ svasti śrîmanu
mahâ-pradhânaṃ Kûcharasa-Liṅgarasaru Siddha-Mallaya-dêvarige parvvadalu chatrava naḍasuvant-
âgi hiriya-Araker̤eya ..... keyya baḍagaṇa kaḍeyalu Mâra-Gauḍa mukhyavâgi mattaru 1 nu dhârâ-
pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭaru ǁ î-dharmmava pratipâlisuvaru chatur-vvêda-pâragar appa brâhmaṇarige śrî-
Gaṇgeya ......

div.head:
173
On a stone at the root of a tamarind tree behind the same temple.
div.p:
śrî ...... Yuva-śaṃvatsaradalu Bhâdrapada-śuddha 1 Bṛihavâra ... Chennanna Gaüḍaker̤eya ..n
Ântaka-Dêvara mommaga ... na Chennavîra-Dêvarige hola-maṭa ... nîḍida-bhiksha Aṇijêli ... li
hola-maṭa .... hola-maṭa .... n î-dêva-stâna-mânya śrî

div.head:
174
At Kuraḍi (same hobli), on a southern pillar in the Mailâra-Liṅgappa-pâdakaṭṭe in Giryaṇṇa’s threshing-floor.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu srushṭi-gatâbda Hêmaḷambi-saṃvatsarake varusha 1955884518 sanditu | Saka-varusha
1339 Hêmaḷambi-saṃvatsarada Kârttika-ba 2 Bu śrîmatu Kûraḍiya baḍagi Mallôjanu mâḍisida
sikhârakke maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî śrî ǁ

div.head: JAGAḶUR TALUQ.

1
At Biḷichôḍu (Biḷichôḍu hobli), on a stone east of the doorway of the Râmêśvara temple.
div.p:
........... rsha 1450 neya Virô .......... ṇya-kâladalu .................. Kṛishṇa-Râya-
mahârâya ...... sthaḷada bhaṇḍârada .. mma...... yanavara ma.............. sâmrâjya ....
.... kala-puṇyav âgabêk endu Kâṭûra Nâ ..... ayanavaru Biḷichêḍa mûla-stânada Râmeya-dêvara
viniyôgakke Biḷi ........ muda-râütara makkaḷu ........ raüta .... Biḷichêḍa-sîmeya Vâra.. ṭeya
staḷada Kôṭeya-grâma 1 nû koṭṭevu â-grâma âgumâḍikoṇḍu Râmeya-dêvarige nîü ........ yaraḍu-
hottina viniyôgavanû tappade mâḍisudu grâmakke saluva chatu-sîmeyanu âgumâḍikoṇḍu..........

div.head:
2
On a pillar in the verandah of the same temple.
div.p: śrî ...... nâya namaḥ ǁ śubham astu ǁ

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1475 neya Pramâdîcha-saṃvatsarada Phâlguṇa-
śu 5 lu śrîmatu Bayapa-Nâyakara Kṛishṇapa-Nâyakara kâryya-karttar âda Dammapa-Nâyakaru
Bili-Kurrubara śâsana-kramav ent endare namma Biḷichêḍa-sîmeyalu kurrubaru Benasâyarar-
ûrinalige kurri-derrey illa

div.head:
3
On another pillar in the same place.
div.p:
Râkshasa-saṃvachharada Chaitra-śu 5 lu śrîmatu Biḷichêḍa Râme-dêvarige Bêlûra Râmappa-Nâya-
karu stânika-Mâdêvapa ........ rige biṭa birâḍa-sarvamânya yidakke âr âdaru ..... vakalu-chârakke
horragu Vâraṇâsili gô-hatye mâḍida pâtakakke hôharu

div.head:
4
At the same village, on a stone near the Vighnêśvara temple in the fort.
div.p: śubham astu | namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1459 neya Hêmaḷambi-saṃvachharada Phâlguṇa-
ba 10 Âdityavâradalu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-Achyuta-Râya-mahâ-
râyaru pṛithvî-râjyaṃ geyiüttam iralu .......... yyanavara kâryyakke kartar âda Murâri-râüttara
.......... ṭaṇa-svâmi Brahm-Seṭṭi-muntâda seṭṭigaḷu .......... samasta-seṭṭigaḷige koṭṭa silâ-
śâsanada krama .................... paṭaṇaü khilav âgi hôgalâgi puna ........ mâḍi ......
ruśa 1 kke kaṭṭuguttige ........ kaü 1 kke ga 1 .................... varigeü ..............
.......... chandra-sûryyâdigaḷu uḷḷa (rest illegible).

div.head:
5
On a vîrakal near the fort gate.
div.p:
ar̤uvatt-okkala putra aynûrbbara gandha-vâraṇa Billa-mûnûrvvara pati maḍivaḷa-Kêta Hemmana-
Beltur̤uvina Kêta-Gâvuṇḍan-oḍane kâdi jaya-geydu satta Biṇṇachêḍa Ottacha-Gâvuṇḍana hiṭṭina ma..

div.head:
6
On a 2nd stone at the same place.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrîmatu pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêsvara parama-bhaṭṭâ-
raka Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷaka Châḷukyâbharaṇa (15 lines illegible) gôtra-pavitra ........... mâṇikya
Vallabha-Râyarasaruṃ ............ Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâlada 35 neya Vikriti-saṃvatsarada Pau-
shya-mâsada ........... byatîpâta-nimityamâgi svasti yama-niya[ma]-svâdhyâya ........ japa-
samâdhi-śîlar appa Jiṭhaṃgopa-da ........ paṇḍita-dêvara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ ..
........ nivêdyakaṃ nandâdîvigegaṃ jîrṇṇôddhârakaṃ (here follow details of gift and usual final
phrases and verse ; next follow some further grants)

div.head:
7
On a 3rd stone at the same place.
div.p:
(the upper part is effaced next follow imprecatory phrases.) yî-maduveya suṅkava biḍisida Kṛishṇa-
Râya-mahârâyara Aṭhavaneya Chennarasarige sahasra-gô-dâna kôṭi-kanyâ-dâna kôṭi-Aśvamêdha-yâga
kôṭi-yajñada phalavâgi ashṭa-putra bahu-dhana sakala-sâmrâjyavan âḷuvanu | yî-śâsanava baradâtaṃ
[Bi]ṇachêḍa-nâḍa sênabôga Maṅkaṇa .. ya-pati ...... ḍidavaru kammâr̤a Mâdôjana ........
bhugaḷu Basavôjana Dêmayyanu maṅgaḷa mahâ ..............

div.head:
8
At Chadurugoḷa (same hobli), on a stone at the entrance of the Kallêśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśva (about 20 lines are defaced) dadiṃ râjyaṃ
geyyutam ire svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmanta vijaya-lakshmî-kânta ........
........ śârddûḷa saṅgrâma-jattalaṭṭa ubhaya-râyara ................ n-aṅkakâr̤a sâmanta ..
.... ya-gaṇḍa ...... pura-varâdhîśvara sâmantâdhipati .......... pâdârâdhaka śrîmatu Vijaya-
Pâṇḍya-Dêva .................... koḷva Har̤uba ...... sâmanta-Bhîmana-chakra satya-Râdhêya
śaucha-Gâṅgêya nuḍidu pusiyal ...... gaḍa-kâr̤a dig-ari-gôṇṭekâr̤a mârkôla-Bhairava tata-vitata-
vâdya-ghana-saṅkîrṇṇa-râga-samuddharaṇa rasa-gîta .... kâr̤a sudha-dêśa ... ḷa viśama abhinava-
Bharata haya-Vatsa-Râja Mâhêśvara-gaṇâvatâra sarvvâbhyudayam appa sâmanta-Sôvi-Dêva-nâya-
kanuṃ Barmma-Dêva-nâyakanuṃ irddu Saka-variśa 1087 neya Pârtthiva-saṃvatsarada Puśya-
bahuḷa-chaṭṭi-Sômavâra-vyatîpâta-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkramâṇad-andu śrî-Vîra-Pâṇḍya-chaturvêdi-maṅ-
gaḷa Bitêri-pramukha-mahâ-agrahâraṃ svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânush-
ṭâṇa-japa-samâdhi-śîḷa-guṇa-sampannar appa śrîmatu aśêsha-mahâjanaṅgaḷa sannidhânadoḷu śrîmad-
.... dêśvara-dêvar-aṅga-bhôga-nivêdyakkaṃ khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhârakkaṃ | svasti ya[ma]-niya-
ma-nêma-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâṇa-japa-samâdhi-śîḷa-guṇa-sampannaruṃ sakaḷa-
budha-jana-prasannaruṃ dharmma-latâ-dhara-daṇḍaruṃ nirmmaḷa.. bhâ-prachaṇḍaruṃ sakaḷa-śâstrâ-
gamârtha-prachaṇḍa-chaturaruṃ châritra-nirataruṃ ity-âdi-nâmâvaḷî-virâjamânar appa Kâḷâmukha-
bratigaḷ appa śrî-Têjônidhi-paṇḍita-dêvara magaṃ Sarvvêśvara-paṇḍita-dêvargge sthânâ.... -sthânav
âgi sarvva-namasyav âgi kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭa Araker̤eya holada Goravagaṭṭada
keḷage eraḍu-ker̤eya nîra vaḷavant âgi koṭṭa gaddeya sîme ent endaḍe (here follow details of boundaries)

div.head:
9
At Asagôḍa (same hobli), on a stone south of the Śambhuliṅga temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ parama-bha-
ṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam
uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire | tat-pâda-padmô-
pajîvi samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Kâñchî-pura-varêśvaraṃ Yadu-vaṃśâm-
bara-dyumaṇi samya .... subhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ parichchhêdi-gaṇḍaṃ
Râjiga-Chôḷa-manôbhaṅgaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-pâdâbja-bhṛiṅga-nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-
sahita śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Tribhuvanamalla-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaru Noḷambavâḍi-mûvattirchchhâ-
śiramumaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷaneyiṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyuttam ire tat-
pâda-padmôpajîvi samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-sâmanta-Mallarasaru Noḷambavâḍi-mûvatt-
irchchhâsirada perjjuṅkaman âḷuttam ire samasta-vastu-guṇa-ratna-rachita-vivêka-ratnâkaraṃ nija-
kuḷâmbhôja-divâkaraṃ Madana-hara-pâdârâdhana-labdha-vara-prasâdaṃ kastûrikâmôdaṃ | śishṭêshṭa-
jana-santushṭa-phaḷa-bhârita-kaḷpa-bhûjaṃ sahaja-Manôja vitaraṇa-vinôda vikramôttuṅgan ayyana-
siṅgaṃ chatus-samaya-samuddharaṇa vairi-saṃharaṇa-nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîmat-
perggaḍe-Hemma-Seṭṭiyaru Kaḍambaḷige-sâsisarada pejjuṅkaman dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷane-
yind âḷuttam irddu śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâlada 35 neya Vikṛiti-saṃvatsarada Pushyad-amâ-
vâśye-Sômavâra-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrânti-vyatîpâtaṃ kûḍalu Asagagôḍa śrî-svayambhu-Kalidêva-svâmi-
dêvara aṅga-bhôgakkaṃ dhûpakkaṃ nivêdya-śrîkhaṇḍakam âgi tamma perjjuṅkadalu aḍakeya
pêr̤iṅge lakkhake bêḷeyuṃ eleya pêr̤u davasada pêr̤u bhaṇḍiya suṅkam-eḷagâgiy ûral-puṭṭida suṅkak
ellaṃ daśavandhama biṭṭu yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâṇa-japa-samâdhi-
śîḷa-guṇa-sampannar appa śrîmatu Dharmmakarttâra-paṇḍita-dêvara śishyaru vâdi-praḷaya-Kâla-
Bhairava-dêvara pâda-prakshâḷanaṃ mâḍi dhârâ-pûrvvakadiṃ koṭṭaru (usual final phrases and verse)
Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇana sva-hasta-likhita ǁ

div.head:
10
On a 2nd stone at the same place.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ
Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Traiḷôkyamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarôtta-
râbhivṛiddhi-pravardhamânam â-chandrârkka-târam-baraṃ saluttam ire tat-prasâdôpajîvi samadhigata-
pañcha-mahâ-śabda Pallavânvayaṃ Pallava-kuḷa-tiḷakan êka-vâkyaṃ Kâñchî-pura-varêśvaraṃ śrî-
man-Nârasiṅga-Dêvaṃ Kogaḷiy-aynûr̤u Kadambaḷige-sâsiramaṃ Ballakunde-mûnûr̤uman âḷuttam ire
tatputraṃ samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda Pallavânvayaṃ Kâñchî-pura-varêśvaraṃ śrîmat-kumâra-
Chôraya-Dêvar Uchchaṅgi-mûvattuman âḷuttam il̤du Kadambaḷige-sâsirada manneyaṃ śrîmatu
Nâgatiy-arasaruṃ tânu vondâg il̤d Asagagôḍa Svayambhu-dêvargge Saka-varsha 974 neya Vijaya-
saṃvatsarada Pushya-ba 13 Sômavâra-vuttarâyaṇa-saṅkrânti-vyatîpâtad andu yama-niyama-
svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâṇa-japa-samâdhi-sampannar appa śrîmatu Traiḷôkya-
karttâra-bhaṭṭârakara pâda-prakshâḷa[na]ṃ mâḍi dhârâ-pûrvvakadiṃ sarvva-namasyam âgi tri-
bhôgamaṃ khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-nava-karmma-nivêdyârthakkaṃ tapôdhanara vidyârtthigaḷ-âhâra-dânak-
kaṃ Mattikaṭṭavaṃ biṭṭar (here follow details of gift and usual final phrases and verses) idu Kâḷâ-
mukha-sthânaṃ Naishṭika-vêdi-karttara maṭaṃ |

lg.l: Mêruvin il̤d Umâ-patiye dakshiṇa-bhâgada bhûmiyalli tâṃ |
sâram id end id îy-Asagagôḍinoḷ intu Svayambhuv âgi Kar- |
stârade Îśvarâlayaman ettisidar ddhareg ên apûrvvamô ǁ
ên end abhivarṇṇipe san- | mânada niravadya-dâni Karttâra karaṃ ǁ
bhâraṃ pirid end ahi | charaṇârâdhaneg eyde peḍegaḷaṃ pasarisuvaṃ ǁ
ê-vêḷvud aṇṇa tapad î- | bhâvaneyaṃ karmma-bandhamaṃ kiḍisiye sad- |
bhâvade Śivanaṃ chittadoḷ | âvagam avayavade tâḷdidar kKarttârar ǁ

div.p:
svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭâṇa-japa-samâdhi-sampannar appa śrî-
mach-Chi ..........nda-Bhuvana .... ra-paṇḍita-dêvaru Raüḍiga-Mubbôjana maga Abbôjaṅge
Mattakaṭṭa-ker̤eya keḷage sûtra-dhâritanakke koṭṭa gadde (here follow details of gift and final phrases).

div.head:
11
At the same temple, on a 3rd stone.

lg.l: Kâma-dhvaṃsa kapâli mâli Girijâ-prâṇêsan îśaṃ Sivaṃ |
prêmaṃ kaymige Sa(ya)mbhu-nâthan olid î-sâvanta-Mâchaṅgey â- |
Hêmâdrî-ravi-chandran uḷḷina .... ishṭârttha-saṃsiddhiyaṃ ǁ I ǁ
prîtiyoḷ eyde tîvi gaganâṅgaṇadoḷ sale rañjisuttav î- |
... ulidâḍi parbbidudu sâvanta-Mâchana kîrtti dhâtriyoḷ ǁ 2 ǁ
sâhityadâ kaṇi (from here the inscription is much defaced)

div.p:
usuvar-âdi .. na ................ vandyane a .. ma Sambhu-svâmiyoḷ aśêsha ...... bare sitaga-
sâvantâṃ ............ prabhugaḷa ........ paṭṭadante ...saṃyoḷ iṭṭa lalâṭada chandranaṃ ......
tri-bhuvana-sêbyav emba kaṭhi-sûtrada pâṅgina .. oppi tôr̤idavu ǁ baḷi tiru ........ uppara ..
.......... mane yidud embina kuru-paṭâgradind . ḷi naḷiyuttad embina garagiga...... naya pra-
bhuve sâmanta-Mâchigan êr̤i tôr̤idaṃ ǁ
(stops here).

div.head:
12
At the same place, on a 4th stone.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha ........ râja-paramê .......... Satyâśraya-
kuḷa-tiḷaka Châḷukyâbharaṇa ...... malla-Dêvara vijaya-râjya .......... târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam
ire ...... padmôpajîvi svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ ............ mahâ-prachaṇḍa-
daṇḍanâyakaṃ âsthâna ........ kuḷa-kumudinî-śarach-chandraṃ ...... Surêndraṃ ..........
sujana-bandhu-mitraṃ parâṅganâ-putra ........ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva .......... nâmâdi-
samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ ? Bhâṇasu-verggaḍe-daṇḍanâyaka ............
vârddhi-Lakshmiya sama ...... sampanna .... mêlâḷkeyu ........ para.............. dushṭa-
nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷa ................ | tad-pâda-padmôpajîvi ........ malla ........ dhipati
mahâ-prachaṇḍa-daṇḍanâyaka .............. dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷanadind âḷuttam ire
tad-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ samasta-praśasti-sahita śrîman-mahâ-sâmanta Sindharasaru Noḷambavâḍi-
mûvattirchchhâsirada vaḍḍarâvuḷada suṅkaman âḷuttam ire avara besadi samasta-râjya-bhara-
nirûpita-mahâmâtya-padavî-virâjamâna mânônnata prabhu-mantrôtsâha-śakti-traya-sampannar appa
śrîmat-perggaḍe-Râchamayya-Nâyaka Kadambaḷige-sâsi ...... Kogaḷiy-aynûru ...... geya perggeḍe-
tanadi dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷanadinda ........ Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâlada 33 neya Sarvva-
dhâri-saṃvatsarada Pushyad-amavâsye-Bṛihaspativâra-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrânti-vyatîpâta kûḍal Uch-
chaṅgi-mûvattar̤a baḷiya Asagagôḍa śrî-svayambhu-Kalidêva-svâmige tamma ........ Kaviḷagâve
manneyada ke ............ pêl̤ enal eraḍu-vîsama Traiḷôkyakarttâra-paṇḍita-dêvara śishyaru
Bhuvanakarttâra-paṇḍita-dêvara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭar (usual final phrases
and verse).

div.head:
13
At the same village, on a vîrakal near the tank sluice.
div.p:
svasti śrî Dasavammarasara maga Biṇayitan âḷe Asagagôḍa gâmuṇḍa Asaga-Kâḍachana maga Kâḍa-
vâsa Kittûra tur̤ugaḷo . kâdi sa ......

div.head:
14
At Dêvikere (Biḷichôḍu hobli), on a stone near the Basavaṇṇa temple.
div.p:
Śrîmuka-saṃvachcharadalu Dêviker̤eya Haśubeya-Gauḍugaḷa maga Muḍaṇa-Gauḍa Basavaṇa-Gauḍa
Kâṭaṇa-Gauḍa Haligaṇa-Gauḍugaḷu tâü tamma guru-purâṇada bagge Sagaru-dêvarige koṭa mânyada
hola

div.head:
17
At Kallênahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone in the Hanumanta temple.
div.p: śubham astu | namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śakha-varushaṅgaḷu 1637 neya Manmatha-nâma-saṃvatsarada
Vaiśâkha-śu 15 yalu | Vâlmîki-gôtrada śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâcharyya Kâmagetti-Kastûri-(tasturi) Raṅ-
gappa-Nâyakara paütrar âda | Medakeri-Nâyakara putrar âda | Baramaṇṇa-Nâyakarayyanavaru Âślâ-
yana-sûtrada Viśvâmitra-gôtrada Asagôḍu-staḷada śyânabôgaru | Narasappana pavutran âda | Acha-
pana putran âda | ugrâṇada Raṅgapage baraśikoṭṭa agrahârada grâmada śâsanada kramav ent
endare | namma hiriyarugaḷige sukṛitav âgabêk endu | nâvu âḷuvanthâ râjya | Biḷichêḍa-sîmey-oḷagaṇa
Kallênahaḷḷi-grâmavannu yî-pavurnavumi-sômôparâga-puṇyakâladallu sa-hiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûr-
vakavâgi koṭu yidhêve | yî-grâmake saluva kâḍârambha-nîrârambha-nidhi-nikshêpa-jala-pâśâṇa-akshî-
ṇi-âgâmi-ashṭa-bhôga-têjas-svâmyagaḷanu nimma putra-pautra-pâramparyyaü | â-chandrârka-sthâyi-
gaḷâgi anubhavisikoṇḍu sukhadali yi .. d endu barasikoṭṭa agrahârada grâmada śilâ-śâsana ǁ (usual
final verses) maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî

div.head:
19
At Basavanakôṭe (same hobli), on a vîrkal by the side of the Basavaṇṇa temple.
div.p:
svasti Saka-nṛipa-kâlâtîta-saṃvatsara-sataṅgaḷ eṇṭu-nûr̤a ippat-ombhattaneya Prabhavam emba
varisham abhyantaram âge Akâlavarisa pṛithuvî-râjyaṃ geyye Kâsikajjana besa .. Siri .... ya-
paḷḷiyo kudurege kâpal̤du Er̤eyappena paṇame kâdi satta Nâgavarmma ka .. kol̤jâ .... Mattamma
Ajavarmma Gaṅgara besade.. ṇḍachî e.... gaja Nol̤ambake kâdi sattoḍe Sirûra munna Gaṅga kalla..
goṭṭolel̤i Kâsikajja Nâgavarmma ...... Ajavarmmana kalla Nol̤ambar suṭṭoḍe ivvergge î-kallu
naṭṭudu kalvû .... vettiṅge âr̤uma ............ matta ............ vargge pannir-matta

div.head:
20
At Ujjappavaḍêrahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone in the ruined village.
div.p:
śrî Viḷambi-saṃvacharadalu Vujaniya Telugu-baḷa Ujapa-dêvara mammaga Sidapa tegisida bâvi
gaüḍa-mânyedoḷage ardha-mânye koṭadu

div.head:
23
At Medakerepura (Sokke hobli), on a stone in the Âñjanêya temple.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varushaṅgaḷu 1576 Manmatha-saṃvatsara-Chaitra-śu 10 lu
śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâryya Kastûri ........ Nâyakaru | Uruvakoṇḍe-Bommaiyyage (names of
villages) 5 grâmada madhyadallu | Kaṇakupe-Daḷavâyi Chinnaya pârupatyagâr̤a Timmapa | Bommayage
kaṅke-bhûmi ...... | Bommanahaḷḷi .... koṭṭa bôjage âya umbaḷiy aidu ..

div.head:
24
At Kṛishṇâpura (same hobli), on a stone on its vacant site.
div.p: śubham astu | namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1472 neya Sâdhâraṇa-saṃvacharada Phâlguṇa-
ba 30 lû sûryôparâga-puṇya-kâladalû śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-
vîra-Sadâśiva-Râyarû Vidyânagaradalû ratna-siṃhâsa[...]râgi pṛithvî-râjyaṃ gaiütt irutaṃ Hastinâ-
vatiya vaḷitada Pâṇḍya-nâḍa Uchchaṅgi-vêṇṭyake saluva Biḷichêḍu-sîme-voḷagaṇa Hosaker̤eya prati-
nâmav âdanthâ Kṛishṇasamudrada haḷḷigaḷu Gaurâpura-haḷḷigaḷu 17 saha sarvamânyada agrahârada
śilâ-śâsanava barasida śâsana-karttu kandâchârada Lakshumaṇa-bhaṭṭaru sadâ sêve (usual final
verses) śrî

div.head:
26
In Jagalûr (Jagalûr hobli), on a stone in the roof of the Jôgî-dêva temple.
div.p: Jagalûra-nâḍa kula-karaṇi Puṭayapanu kaṭisida dêva-stâna

div.head:
27
In Jagalûr (same hobli), on a stone on the way to Nâyakanahaṭṭi.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka 1590 neya Kîlaka-saṃvatsarada Jyêshṭa-śu 15 lu Mada-
keri-Nâyakaru Sajalanîḍa Peṇṇayyaṅge koṭṭa billa-mânya.

div.head:
29
At Mushṭûr (same hobli), on a stone in front of the Kallêśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda Pallavânvaya śrî-pṛithivî-vallabha Pallava-kula-tilaka śrîman-
Nol̤ambâdhirâjâ .. yyappa-Dêvaṃ Noḷambavâḍi-mûvattirchâsiramuman âḷuttire Vikramam emba
saṃvatsaraṃ pravarttisuttire Paduma .......... Aṇṇayyan âḷe Muṭṭuvura .... mbara datti dêgulam
aḷidoḍe .. Javayyana .... kabbeya magaṃ dêvara dâsa Nâthavarmman î-dêgulamaṃ kaṇḍa-pîṭha-
pâṇivaṭṭa-sahitaṃ kallôḷ mâḍisidaṃ dêguladoḷ âd î-śilâ-ka .... llavaṃ maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî

div.head:
30
At Kallêdêvarapura (same hobli), on a stone north of the Kallêśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-vastu-vistîrṇṇârṇṇava-pûrṇṇa-chandranuṃ | nirantara-sukumâra | .... sadasiya vibhava-
Vibudhêndranuṃ | chañchach-chandrikâ-prakâśa-vikâśa-sudhâ-dhâvalya-mâṅgalya-saṃspûrtti-kîrtti-
lakshmî-kântanuṃ | yâchaka-nikâya-nandana-vana-Vasantanuṃ | pârâvâra-sañchâra-châru Mêru-
mahîdhara-dhairyâvaḷambanuṃ | bhakti-sakti-vadana-padma-parimaḷa-rôrambanuṃ | Saiva-samaya-
saṃvarddhana sakaḷa-samaya-samuddharaṇa sarbbâgama-sârbbabhaumanuṃ | pañcha-mudraâ-vara
vara-tapô-nishṭhâ-nikâmanuṃ | nabya-kâbya-châṭu-nâṭaka-gîta-vâdya-nṛityâdi-chatushshashṭi-kalâ-
pravîṇanuṃ | samuchita-satya-vachanânusandhâna-Râma-bâṇanuṃ | bâṇa-Bâṇâsura vîra-kaṭaka-
.. dra | Bhadrakâḷa-Mahâkâḷa-Kâḷa-Kâḷakaṇṭha | Nandinâtha-Hari........ Guha-Râvaṇa-Râma-Bhî-
ma-Nârâyaṇâdi-dêva-gaṇa-guṇa-kîrtti-karṇṇâvataṃsanuṃ | saraṇa-jana-manas-sarôja-râjahaṃsanuṃ |
Chêra-Chôḷa-Nambi-Nambi | Chikka-Kakka-Chenna-Honna-Biṅka-Basava-râja-Bhôjâdi-marttya-lôkada
mahâ-gaṇâchâra | dharâ-bhâra-dhaurêya-dik-kuñjaranuṃ | dûśaka-dhûrtta-dhûmakêtu śaraṇâgata-vajra-
pañjaranuṃ | ......mar̤ad er̤agada mânava-dêvanuṃ | kaksha-kaṇṭha.....vakshôttamâṅga-liṅgaika-saṅga-
sadbhâvanuṃ | anna-dâna-kanyâ-dâna-suvarṇṇa-dâna-bhû-dâna-gô-dâna-vastra-dâna-sâstra-dâna-
sarbba-dâna-vinôda-nissîma siddha- .. manuṃ | dharmmârttha-kâma-môksha-chatur-vvidha-puru-
shârttha.. tta-mahimâbhirâmanuṃ | kâma-krôdha-lôbha-môha-mada-matsarâhaṅkâra-dûra | nishpanna-
nityâtma-tatva-svarûpanuṃ dayâ-naya-prabhâva-nirmmaḷa-kaḷâpanuṃ | rasa-rasâyana-ghuṭikâñjana-
mukhâñjana-mûḷikâ-nikâya-vasya-vâda- ..ya-stambha-voḍḍâmara-mahêndrajâla-Haramêkhaḷâdi-pra-
pañcha-vidyâ-siddha- ............ padmanuṃ | rûḍha-gûḍha-dibya-dêbyâpûjita-râjita-pâda-
padmanuṃ | Âdiga...... nâtha | chaturaṅgi-nâtha | Gô .. akhanâtha | ............ nâtha | kâhaḷi-
nâvi | Surppâṇanâtha | lôka-nâtha nara-nâtha pantha-pamâṇa-ghushṭanuṃ yantra-tantra-mantra-
svatantra nidharshana | ratnâdarshanaṃ | kandakha-pâya-kambaḷi-pâya-bhûdhara-pâya-mâhalu-pâya-
tantra-pâya-gupta-pâya-nâḍa-pâya-pûja-pâyâdi-sâmagriya sâmartthya-kaḷâ-vallabhanuṃ | durgguṇa-
durâchâra- ........ vallabhanuṃ | jôḷipâḷiya ...... vajrâ ........ parama-.. shṭi aṇimâdy-ashṭa-
guṇai[śva]ryya-siddha-sampannaruṃ | ................ yaka-guṇa-santsannanuṃ spashṭâshṭâdasa-yôga-
pîṭhâchâryya-chakra-Chakradhara | siddha-siṃhâsana . vêshṭita-yôga-paṭṭa-yôga-daṇḍa | yôga-pâduka |
yôga-mudra-bhadranuṃ | sajjana-janâraṇya-puṇya-varêṇya-kâruṇya-samudranuṃ | ................
saṅghaṭṭa-sphuṭa-sahaja-liṅga | maṅgaḷa-niḷaya-jaṅgamâvatâra | śrî-sa .... Mallinâthanuṃ | kala-
..... kaḷaṅka .......... prasanna | bhû-chara-Kalinâthanuṃ | tribhuvana-parijana-pârijâta vara-
guru-Śiva-yôgi śrîmatu yôgi-chakravartti Pra ...... dêvarige (usual final verse) .... śrîmatu Dêva-
gi .. samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha | mahârâjâdhirâja paramêsvara | parama-bhaṭṭâ-
raka | Dvârâvatî-pura-varâdhîsvara Vishṇu-vaṃśôdbhava Yâdava-kuḷa-kamaḷa-kaḷikâ-vikâsa-bhâ-
skara | (y)ari-râya-jaga-jhampha apratimalla ahita-râya-vura-salla Gujara-Râya-vâruṇâṅkusa | Teluṅga-
Râya-śrî-kamaḷa-mûḷa-nâḷôtpâṭanaka .. | .......... Varâṭa-bhûpati-Kâkala-Dêva | Raṅga-kshibuṇi-kshôṇî-
vallabha-Jâjala-Dêva | kari-ghaṭâ-saṅghaṭa ........ ksha-prâjya-râjya-hara | Trukshûpara-mêdinî-
samuddharaṇaika-mahâ-Varâha | .. sama-giri-durgga-pranâḷa-niḷayâprabaḷa-Bhôja-bhûpâḷa | Vyâ-
.. vatî-vidhraṇaṃ vihaṅga | râja-Ballâḷa-Râya-latâ-kanda | sindhûra-marddana Mâḷava-kshitipati-
matta-mâtaṅga-nirdaḷana-pañchânana gambhîra-bîra-prachaṇḍa-Paṇḍâra-Lakshmî-Dêva-tri-kuḷa-kuḷa-
kântâra-mûḷana-vraṇârddava-daṇḍa-ity-âdi-samasta-râjâvaḷi-mâḷâḷaṅkṛita-śrîmat-prauḍa-pratâpa-cha-
kravartti-śrî-vîra-râya-Râmachandra-Dêva-râjyôdayada | Saka-varuśa 1201 neya prajôtsâhavâda
...... Pramâthi-saṃvatsarada | Âsvayija-suddha 15 sôma-grahaṇadali | Sômavâradali | Hasisâva-
nikachâṅki-dêva sâhasôttu ...... | râya-kumara-Nârâyaṇa javadaṇḍa-Murâri parama-viśvâsi mahâ-
durggâdhipati śaraṇâgata vajra-pañjara Khoṇḍe-Râya maleya-maṇḍaḷikara gaṇḍa satyava tappuva
râyara gaṇḍa Hemâḍi-Dêvanu | tanna saṃvaraṇeya sthaḷadoḷage Koṭṭûru-vrittiya (after details of gift)
âkara-srôta-nidhi-nidhâna-nikshêpa sarvvâbâdhe parihâravâgi | akshîṇi-âgâmi-purassaravâgi â-Râma-
chandra-Râyanindavu kuḷava kiḍsi | śâsanava tandu ........ pâdake â-Hemâḍi-Dêvanu parama-
bhaktiyiṃ dhârâ-pürvvakadinda............ Koṭṭûra-nâḍa Vaḍarênahaḷḷiya prabhu Yisara-Seṭṭiya
(others named) ...... mûvatara râja-guru Mûḷeya ...... dêvara .............. gaḷa mundiṭṭu koṭa
sâsana (usual final verses) ...... Sâragapâṇi | śrî-Yôginâtha ǁ

div.head:
33
On a stone south of the same temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha ...... râjâdhirâjaṃ paramêsvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭâ-
rakaṃ Satyâśraya .......... su-bhaṭa-chûḍâmani Malerâja-râja Malepa ...... kadana-prachaṇḍan
asahâya-sûran êkâṅga-vîra Sanivâra-siddhi giri ............ gara-nirmmûḷa Chôḷa-pratishṭhâ-
châryyaṃ nissaṅka .............. Hoysaṇa-vîra-Sômêśvara-Dêvaru Noṇambavâḍi-mûvatt ......
...... Gaṅgavâḍi-tombhattâr̤u-sâvira .................... Magara ............ Chôḷa-Pâṇḍiya-
râjyakke naḍadu dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-prati ...... samudrada nelevîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôda-
diṃ ............ chakravarttiya śrî-pâda-padmârâdhakaruṃ tat-pâda-padmô ........... bharaṇaruṃ
svasti samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ śrîman ........ śrî .... svaymbhu ........ ṇa sva ...... dêvara
labdha-vara prasâda ............nûra Nârasiṅga-Nâyakaruṃ Mallayya-Nâ.............. Sûḷugalappa ......
.... dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷanadiṃ ........ kathâ-vinôdadiṃ .......... nûra nelevîḍinoḷu
râjyaṃ geyuttav irddu .......... du-dinada dharmma-prasaṅga .......... dânada mahâtmyeya ..
...... dêvara mahâ ...... Bemmattanûra ...... durgga .................. svayaṃbhu-Maṇa-
ḷêśvara-dêvara aṅga-bhôga-raṅga-bhôga .... nandâ-dîvige ........ jîrṇṇôddhârakkaṃ Saka-varshada
1157 neya Manmatha-saṃvatsarada .............. saṅkrânti-vitîpâta ...... dandu svasti yama-
.......... svâdhyâya-.......... maunânushṭhâna-japa-samâdhi-sîla-guṇa-sampa ............
........ sakala-Śivâgama-nîti ............ ṇâdi-dîkshe ...... pratishṭhâ .......... pâda-padmâ-
râdhaka............ kti-paṇḍitara kâlaṃ toḷadu .............. mattanûra .......... kasamu-
drada kâlu ................ sahasra-daṇḍa .... modalâgi sarvvâbâdhâ ............ â-chandrâ-
rkka ........ yâgi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭa (rest contains details of gift and usual final phrases)

div.head:
35
At Baramasamudra (same hobli), on a stone south-west of Virûpâkshappa’s house.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varushaṅgaḷu 1727 ne Krôdhana-saṃ- | rada Śrâvaṇa-ba 3
Sômavâra mahâ-maha .. na maṭhaṃ .. ḷu yidhîte

div.head:
36
At the same village, on a stone in the survey No. 137.
div.p:
śrî Soravakaṃ Sidhaliṅgêśa Mahêśa ǁ râ ǁ Kâmagêti-Kastûri-Medakeri-Nâyakanavaru Paridhâvi-
nâma-saṃ[va]chharada Jyêshṭhina ba 7 lu Baramasamudrada kôṭe mâḍidake | Gaḷḷelôra Chindilaya
.. maḍikoṭa
* So in the original. manasoti manâsoti â-chandrârkka .. uḷanaka bûmi-sura-chandrâdigaḷu uḷḷannaka soti
uṇḍukoṇḍu .......... kôṭeyoḷu bâḷa mâḍikoṇḍu sukhadim bâḷôdu yida mâḍi koḍuta nâḍi-gaüḍa ga
...... gaüḍa gurave

div.head:
37
At Siddammanahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone behind the image in the Añjanêya temple.
div.p:
svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha sâ 1605 neya Raktâkshi-saṃvatsarada Mâgha-
śu 10 lu Siddâpurada grâmavannû śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâryya Kâmagetti-Kastûri-Chikaṇṇa-Nâya-
karu stira-râjyav âḷutt iralâgi pârupatyagâra Bûtaina Vîraṇṇanavaru tanna strîyaḷa Siddhauvan-
avara hesaralu grâma .. maṭha-dêvastâna Aṇabûra staḷada vaḷagaṇa (after details of gift) yî-dêva-
stânada guḍiyu Prajôtpatya-saṃvatsaraṃ mugidu yî-guḍi kaṭṭidava Mañchâla-Basavayage 1 ga ...
hola-mânyava koṭṭu ..............

div.head:
41
At Nibbagûru (same hobli), on a stone in the varandah of the Âñjanêya temple.
div.p: śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ | śubham astu |

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varuśa 1448 neya Vyaya-saṃvachchharada Chayitra-śu
15 lu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha śrî-Kṛishṇa-
Dêva-Râya-mahârâyaru sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ pṛithvî-râjya geyuttirddu śrîmatu Râsyapa-
gôtrada Âśvalâyana-sûtrada ârshêya-kshatriyarâda Viśvanâtha-râüttara makkaḷu Raṅganâtha-râüttaru
śrî-Jamadagni-ṛishi-îśvarara âśramavâda .... tor̤eya tîrada śrî-Kallinâthapura-varâdhîśvara śrî-Kalli-
nâtha-dêvara sannidhiyali śrî-Kṛishṇa-Dêva-Râya-mahârâyarige dharmav âgabêk endu brâhmaṇa-
bhôjana shaḍ-darśana-modalâdavarige satrava naḍavadake koṭṭa grâmada dharmma-śilâ-śâsanada
kramav ent endare śrî-Kṛishṇa-Dêva-Râya-mahârâyarû namage nâyakatanakke pâlisida Jagaḷûra
śîmey-oḷagaṇa Nibugûranu Kâśyapa-gôtrada Âśvalâyana-sûtrada Areya-Kshatriyarâda Viśvanâtha-
râüttara makkaḷu Raṅganâtha-râüttaru śrî-Jamadagni-ṛishîśvarara âśramav âda Hanator̤eya tîrada
śrî-Kallinâtha-dêvara sannidhiyali śrî-Kṛishṇa-Dêva-Râya-mahârâyarige dharmav âgabêkendu Brâh-
maṇa-bhôjana shaḍ-darśana-modalâdavarige satra naḍavadakke sahiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvvakav-
âgi â-chandrârka-sthâyiyâgi satra naḍayabêk endu dhâreyan er̤adu Jagaḷûra-sîmey-oḷagaṇa Nibugûra-
grâma 1 nû dhâreyan er̤adu koṭevâgi â-Nibugûra-grâmada chatus-sîmeya vivara (here follow details of
boundaries) yint î-chatus-sîmey-oḷaguḷa nidhi-nikshêpa-jala-pâshâṇa-akshîṇi-âgâmi-siddha-sâddhya-
ashṭa-bhôga-têja-svâmya ker̤e-kuṇṭe-aṇe-achchukaṭṭu ...... tôṭa-tuḍike-samasta-suvarṇâdâya sakala-
dhânyâdâya .......... taḷavârike .............. hunise-mar̤ada rokka magga ..............
uppina-môḷeya rokka kraya kaḍḍâya biṭṭi birâḍa kâṇike sa .. sakalôtpatti samasta-vali-saha
sarva-nishpatti ...... kavâgi Kâśyapa-gôtrada Âśvalâyana-sûtrada Areya-Kshatriyarâda Viśvanâtha-
râüttara makkaḷu Raṅganâtha-râüttaru śrî-Kṛishṇa-Râyarige puṇyav âgabêk endu śrî-Jamadagni-
ṛishîśvarara âśramavâda Hanator̤eya tîrada śrî-Kalinâtha-dêvara sannidhiyali brâhmaṇa-bhôjana
mûvattayidu shaḍ-darśana śûdra-satra nâlvattar̤a mariyâdeyali satra naḍavadakke Jagalûra sîmey-
oḷagaṇa Nibugûra-grâma-vondanû śrî-Kalinâtha-liṅga-prîtiyâgi tri-vâchâ dhâreyan er̤adu koṭṭev âgi â-
chandrârka-sthâyiyâgi satra naḍayabêk endu koṭṭa grâma-dharma-śilâ-śâsana yî-dharma-satravanu
naḍasida puṇyâtmana śrî-pâdava śirasâ vahisikombeü (usual imprecatory phrases and verses). śrî

div.head:
44
At Suḷḷuvôbanahaḷḷi, (same hobli), on a stone in Guru-Siddappa’s back yard.
div.p: śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ Sidhaṃ .........

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1685 neya Svabhânu-saṃvatsarada ............
.......... Lakaṇṇa-Nâyaka (rest effaced).

div.head:
45
At Reḍḍihaḷḷi, (same hobli), on a stone near the western wall of the Âñjanêya temple.
div.p:
śrî Sâlivâhana-saka-varusha 1498 neya Dhâtu-saṃvatsarada Âśvîja-su .... Sanivâradali râja-śrî-
Kâmagêti-Kastûri-Raṅgappara daḷavâyi Baramapanavaru Jagalûra Virakta-maṭhake Keṅgappa-Nâ-
yaka ........ baḷige Basavaṇṇanavaru ...... vaha Karaḷahaḷḷi (rest illegible).

div.head:
46
At Kasavanahaḷḷi, (Kasaba hobli), on a stone near the village entrance.
div.p:
svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varushaṅgaḷu
* So in the copy. 1655 Rudhirôdgâri-nâma-saṃvatsarada Śrâ-
vaṇa-śuddha-daśamiyalu Vâlmîki-gôtrada śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâryya Kâmagêti-Kastûri-Raṅgappa-
Nâyakara pautrar âda Baramaṇṇa-Nâyakara putrar âda Medakeri-Nâyakaravaru Śiñjinî-gôtrada
Baṭṭara-Bâgûra Timmappana pautrar âda Puṭaya-putrar âda Vârijanâbheya Sinnayage Baramayage
saha barakoṭa dâna-patrada kramav ent endare nâû nâü âḷuvanthâ Jagalûra-sîme-voḷagaṇa Kasavanahaḷḷi-
grâmavannu agrâravâgi koṭṭu idhêve yî-grâmakke saluvanta kâḍârambha-nîrârambha-nidhi-nikshêpa-
jala-pâshâṇa-akshîṇi-âgâmi-siddhi-sâdhyaṅgaḷ emba ashṭa-bhôga-têjôpârjaneyannu nimma putra-
pautra-pârampare anubhavisikoṇḍu baruûdu yendu barasi koṭṭa dâna-patra. (usual final verse).

div.head:
47
At Koṭṭa, (same hobli), on a stone near its hillock.
div.p:
Piṅgaḷa-saṃvatsarada Vayiśâkha-śu 10 lu śrîmatu Anâyaka-ayanavara kâryyake kartarâda Nâgappa-
Nâyakaru tôṭada Uchchappa-Oḍêrige koṭṭa sista-kramav ent endare namma nâḍa ...... make-
mâgaṇige saluva Biḷachôḷu-sîmey-oḷagaṇa Koṭṭada Vîrabhadra-dêva ....... parinaya-vâdya ......
nayivêdyavâgi ........ ma-Nâyaka-aya .............. nimma dêvara ............ ne-Nâyakaru
biṭṭa dêvara ..... yidake Channi-Nâyakaru biṭṭa dêvara mânyavâgi ........ keya mânya yellavanû
sarvamânyavâgi biṭṭu ........ mâḍikoṇḍu .........dûva avasara .......... sukhadali yiharu
(usual final phrases).

div.head:
48
At the same village, on a stone behind the Vîrabhadra temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 14 .. 6 neya Svabhânu-saṃvatsarada
Kârttika-ba 5 Bṛi-yalu Vâraṇâsiya Sidha-bhikshâ .... -Voḍeyara âjñâdhârakarum appa Bhadra-
Dêva-Voḍeyara âjñâdhârakarum appa Aruvattokkala sambandha Sadâśivayôgi-Voḍeyara makkaḷu
Channayôgi-Voḍeyaru Koṭṭada Vîrabhadra-dêvarige Siḍuba-Nâyakaya bhaktiyiṃ sâshṭâṅgav er̤agi
poḍavaṭu ...... nandâdîvigege koṭṭa da .. saluva gaṇâchârada honnanû nivêdyakke nitya-niya-
makke naḍavudu ...... adakkâgi sarva-namasyavâgi â-chandrârkan-uḷaṃ-bara hindinavaru (6 lines
illegible) koṭṭa barabakke Chann-Oḍeyarasa.

div.head: MOḶAKÂLMURU TALUQ.

1
At Dêvasamudra (Dêvasamudra hobli), on a stone east of Gaṅgâdharappa’s house.
div.p:
śubham astu | svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-saka .......... Piṅgaḷa-saṃvatsarada Śrâvaṇa-
ba 8 lu śrîman-mahâ ............ paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-vîra-Sadâśiva-Dêva-Râ ......
.... paṭaṇadalû ratna-siṃhâsanârûḍhar âgi pṛithvî-sâ ........ yiral âgi śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara
aḷiya Râma ...... arasugaḷû dharmma-pârupatyada mêle Viṭhala-dêvara guḍiya lekha .. ra guḍi-śilâ
śâśana-pratiyanu barasi tarisi ...... chitayisi â-sâsana-pra .... Kṛishṇa-Dêva-mahârâyaru Pramâ-
dîcha-saṃvatsara-Śrâvaṇa-śu 1 lu ...... sida grâma (other villages named) antu kâluvaḷi-chaü ....
kâluve saha staḷa-suṅka adakke saluva staḷadinda ettida ...... ḷadinda bandu staḷadalu mâḍida
hêrugaḷige saluva suṅka kaḍivâru .... kaḍivâru aṅgaḍi-magga piñjaṇigaru asagaru saha ......
nâḍa daḷavârike horabaḷi hulubanni baṇajigara yettina .... r̤iṅge uppina-môḷeya .......... saha
samarpisiy iralâgi amṛitapaḍige sallade ........ luptam âyita ...... jayantî-puṇya-kâladalû Sadâ-
śiva-Râya-mahârâya ...... râjaya-dêva-mahâ-arasugaḷige puṇya ............ vara amṛitapaḍige
samarpisi ko ...................... saru kaṭṭida grâma ...... (back) ...... daya-Śâlivâhana-
śaka-varusa ........ gaḷa-saṃvatsarada Âśvîja-mâsadalu śrîma .......... paramêśvara śrî-vîra-
pratâpa śrî-vîra-Sadâśiva-ma ...... paṭṭaṇadalu śrî-Bîrê-dêvara amṛitapaḍige saluva .... ruvâḍi
uppina-môḷe ..... (villages named) modalâda-grâmagaḷa staḷa-suṅkakke saluvanta kaḍivâru aṅgaḍi-
kaḍivâru magga-kaḍivâru gâṇa ...... rasa uḷa deri ...... hora-baḷa baṇa (stops here).

div.head:
2
At the same village, on a stone near the Âñjanêya temple.
div.p:
śubham astu svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varuśaṅgaḷu 1484 neya Dundubhi-saṃvacha-
rada nija-Śrâvaṇa-ba 5 lu śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêsvara râjâdhirâjâ râja-paramêsvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa
śrî-Sadâsiva-Râya-dêva-mahârâyaru ratna-siṃhâsanârûḍharâgi prithvî-râjyaṃ geyitaṃ yiralu śrîman-
mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara aḷiya Râmarâjaya-dêva-mahâ-arasaru śrî-Viṭhala-dêvara amṛitapaḍige saluva
Dêvasamudrada ................ pâlisiral âgi Dêvasamudrada ..............

div.head:
4
At Muraḍi (same hobli), on a stone behind the Basava temple.
div.p: śrî-Râmachandrâya namaḥ śubham astu

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varshambulu 1478 aguneṭi Naḷa-saṃvatsara-Jyêsṭha-śu 15
lu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-Sadâśiva-mahârâyalu Vidyânagara-
mandu ratna-siṃhâsanârûḍhulai pṛithivî-sâmbrâjyaṃ chêyuchuṇḍagânu | śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalê-
śvara Râmarâju-Viṭhalarâju-Tirumalaiya-dêva-mahârâjulugâru śrîmad-yajanâdi-shaṭ-karmma-niru-
tulaina Râyadurgaṃ-śîmaku chellêṭi Muruvuḍiki pratinâmamaina Bukkarâyapura sarvamânyapu agra-
hâraṃ aśêsha-vidvan-mahâjanulukunu daṇḍaṃ peṭṭi yichchina dharma-śilâ-śâsana-kramam eṭl-
annanu | Sadâśiva-mahârâyalu mâku nâyaka-kâryânuku pâliñchina Râyadurgaṃ-sîmaku chellêṭi
Muruvuḍiki pratinâmamaina Bukkarâyapuram agrahârânuku mêmu sarvamânyaṃ chêsina vîvaraṃ mî-
agrahâramandu ...... anyâyaṃ...rokhaṃ...vunnârani mîru mâ ........ ...... janâlu | mî-agrahâram-
andu ........ talâri kânuku achche ............... mî-agrahâramandu kshêtra ........ sêsêanduku
puchchukô .... kâṇikalunnu | yivi-modalainavi mâni .... agrahâramandu ..............chêrina ...
modalainavâṭini Viṭhalarâjayyavâru ...................... sahiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvakaṅgâ
yichchina-sarvamânya chandrârka-târaṃ | yi-dharmmamunaku yevvaru........ .... anubhaviñchu
................... ani yichchina dharmma-śilâ-śâsana ǁ (usual final verses) maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî

div.head:
5
At Karaḍihaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone in front of the Hanumanta temple.
div.p: śrî-Râmachandrâya namaḥ śubham astu

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana śaka-varshambulu 1478 aguneṭi Naḷa-saṃvatsara-Jyêshṭha-śu 15
lu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-Sadâśiva-mahârâyulu Vidyânagara-
mandu ratna-siṃhâanârûḍhulai pṛithvî-sâmbrâjyaṃ chêyuchuṇḍagânu śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara
Râmarâju-Viṭhalarâju-Tirumalaiya-dêva-mahârâjayyagâru śrîmad-yajanâdi-shaṭ-karma-niratulaina
Râyadurgaṃ-sîmaku .......... raḍipalleku pratinâmamaina Harihararâyapuraṃ sarvamânyapu
agrahâraṃ aśêsha-vidvan-mahâjanâlakunu daṇḍaṃ peṭṭi yichchina dharma-śilâ-śâsana-kramam eṭl-
annanu Sadâśiva-mahârâyalu mâku nâyaka-kâryânuku pâliñchina Râyadurgaṃ-simakuchelleṭi Karaḍi-
palleku pratinâmamaina Harihararâyapuraṃ agrahârânuku sarvvamânyaṃ vêsina vivaraṃ mâ-agra-
hâramandu .... gauṇḍulaina .......... vunnârani mîru mâtô cheppaṅgânu .. mâ-lekkhalaku
samanitiñchi mî-agrahâramandu mîru talâri-kânuku achchê ........ mî-agrahâramandu kshêtrâdi-
bhôgâlu sêseanduku puchchukoni vuṇḍe kâṇikalunnu yivi-modalainavi mânitimi | mî-agrahâramandu
tappu chêsinavârivalla vachchina aparâdhaṃ mâlunnu mî-agrahâramandu dêvastânaṃ charuvu-
kuṇṭa-kâluvaluku vêsukonêṭaṭṭugâ ...... yivi-modalainavi annim Viṭhalarâjayyavâriki puṇyaṅgânu
...... puṇya-kâlamandu dhâra-chêsi yichchina sarvamânya-dharma-śilâ-śâsanaṃ (usual imprecatory
phrases and verses).

div.head:
6
At Siddhâpura (same hobli), on a stone in front of the Hanumanta temple.
div.p:
śubham astu svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-saka-varushaṅgaḷu 1477 neya Râkshasa-
saṃvachharada Chaitra-ba 6 lû śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêsvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-vîra-
Sadâśiva-Dêva-mahârâyarû ratna-siṃhâsanârûḍharâgi prithvî-râjyaṃ gaiütt iralû | Râmarâjaiyya-
navarige Timmôja-Koṇḍôjanû binnahaṃ mâḍalâgi Râmarâjaiyyanavarû Sadâśiva-Dêva-mahârâya-
rige binnâhaṃ mâḍi Râyaru âḷu .. vanthâ chatus-sîmeyalu nâyinda-kelasi Timmôja-Koṇḍôjanavara
kulada nâyindarige biṭṭi birâḍa sidhâya kandâya Mahânavami-paujina â.. bhikshe...sahâyada nelavanû
sarvamânyavâgi pâlisidev endu śâsanava hâkahêḷi nirûpava koṭṭarû yî-mariyâdêli .. byûri-Kôna-
râjayya-dêva-mahâ-arasu Hâ.. da nâyindarige sarvamânyav âgi śâsanava pâlisidarû (usual imprecatory
phrases). nyunâksharam adhikâksharaṃ vâ yathâ .... likhita-pramâṇam iti

div.head:
7
At the same village, on a rock in Pûjârinâyaka’s field.
div.p: (Nâgari characters).

.............. saṃvatsara-Mâ .. -suddha-paurṇameyalu Châvappa .... tamma Chauḍappagaḷa
Mallâ .. rige koṭṭa sâsana Dêva-Râyara nirûpadi Jeṭôgi-Râmaya-dêvarige .. Rudrâbhishêkavanu
naîvêdyake ga .... dina samarpisuvadake koṭṭa ga ........ chaḷe-marada holava .. dharmakke
(usual imprecatory phrases).

div.head:
8
At the same village, on the Chikkaṇṇoḍêra baṇḍe.
div.p:
svasti śrî ja[yâ]bhyudaya-Śâli ........ Virô[dhi]krutu-saṃvatsarada Kârtika 15 lu ..............
.... Kônaya-dêva-mahâ-arasugaḷu .................................... Sadâśiva-Dêva-mahâ-
râyaru Vidyânagari .................. Umêśvaraṇṇanû .... kôṇanavarû sandu mâḷeyan ikida
.... Koṇaga-dêvaru Saṅkaka ............ navaru ...... ru 1 kere .. voḷage nâlku-mâru sama-
chaükadalu eraḍu-moḷa udda kuṇṭe nîra maṇṇu tegadu kaṭṭe bada ...................ḷage hâkuvadu
yî-mariyâdeyalu môḷen ikki nimma kâyake saḍalu ......... nimma putra-pautra-pârampariyâgi
sukhadalu anubhavisuvadu yidakke niü prâku koḍuva guttige rokka biṭṭi birâḍu krayâdâya ......
vechcha birâḍa gaüḍa-sênabôva-âyagâr̤arige koḍuva uppu sahâ enisi sarvamânyada śilâ-śâsana
(usual imprecation).

div.head:
9
At the base of the same rock.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1471 neya Virôdhikrutu-saṃvatsarada Kârtika-
śu 15 lu Hânyada hebbâra Bôlârapa (others named) samasta-praje-gaüḍa .......... muntâda
uppâr̤arige koṭṭa uppina môḷeya sarvamânyada śilâ-śâsanada kramav ent endare Geṇabûra Hiriya-
Kôna-râjayanavaru nimage koṭṭa śâsanada mariyâdeyalû uppina môḷeya sarvamânyavanû naḍasi
bâheü yidakke nimma biṭṭi-kaṭaḷi-kraya-kandâya-sidâ[ya]-kaṭu-birâḍa ............ namma âyagâ-
r̤arige koḍuva .......... aramarre mâḍi châḍiya hêḷidaru (usual imprecatory phrases) ........ koṭṭa
dharmma-śâsana .. Chikka-Yallapa (others named) .... koṭṭa uppu oka 1 kaḷahalu .. biṭṭu hôdarû
.............. palavarige naḍasôdu ...........

div.head:
10
At the same village, on a rock north of the Râmachandrêśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti Śaka-nṛipa-kâḷâtîta-saṃvatsara-sataṅgaḷ 944 neya Dundubhi-saṃvatsarada Aśâḍhada ....
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda Pallavânvaya śrî-prithvî-vallabha Pallava-kuḷa-tiḷakan amôgha-
vâkya Kâñchî-pura-varêsvara śrîmaj-Jagadêkamalla-Noḷamba-Pallava .......... Kapiliyal âsanaṃ
geydu râjyaṃ geyyutt iralu svasti ripu-nṛipa-jaga ...... nna sañjâta-nûta-vîra-lakshmî-lakshita-bhuja
...... dôrddaṇḍa nuḍid-ante-gaṇḍa chalava ........ yasaka ...... svâmi-bhṛitya .......... putra
bhṛitya-chintâmaṇi satya-parâyaṇa ........ para-bala-dhûmakêtu ...... dîrggha-tapô ..........
ghaṭa-sarppa ahita-kuḷa-kâlânaḷa arasa .................... śrîmanu ......................
tri-bhôgâbhyantara-siddhi-yôgâ .......................... dharmmakke .......... sarvvakkaṃ
.................................. yarasu aśvâ........ khaṇḍugada bhûmi ........ Karu-
kâcharige khaṇḍuga ............

div.head:
12
At the same village, on a vîrakal lying in the jâli hola.
div.p:
śrîmatu Yâdava-Nârâyaṇaṃ pratâpa-Hoysaṇa-chakravartti śrî-vîra-Pallâl̤a-Dêvaru Hâneyada kôṭeya
sâdhyaṃ mâḍi Vijayagiriy-emba-hesara paṭṭaṇava mâḍi pṛithvî-râjyaṃ mâḍutt iralu mahâ-pasâyi-
taṃ Hulivânada sâvanta Śi .. śeya-Nâyakan-avve Honnakka-Nâyakiti svarggsthay âdalli Ma .. ya ..
kitti Honni siḍi-taleya goṭṭu sura-lôka-prâptiy âdalli chandrârkkam uḷlanna ... sthira-sthâyiyâgi
nilisida kallu

div.head:
14
At the same village, on a rock near the Yemme Tammana guṇḍu.
div.p: (Brahmi lipi).

Suvaṇṇagirîtê ayaputasa mahâmâtâṇaṃ cha vachanêna Isilasi mahâmâtâ ârôgiyaṃ vataviyâ
Dêvâṇaṃ piyê hêvaṃ âha adhikâni a . ti . yâ . vasâni ya ha upâsakê nô tu khô bâḍha pakaṃte
husaṃ êkaṃ saṃva .. sâ.. kê tu khô saṃvachharê yaṃ .... ghê upayîte bâḍhaṃ cha mê pakaṃtê
iminâ chu kâlêna .. misâ samâ . mu .. Jaṃbu-dî .. misâ dêvêhi pakamasahi iyaṃ phalê nô hiya
sakê .... nêva pâpô .. vê kâmaṃ tu khô khudakêna pi pa .... na vi .. ula .. svagê sakê ârâdhitavê
se .... ya i . ṃ sâvaṇê sâvitê yathâ khuda .. mahâptâ cha imaṃ pakamêyu ti aṃtâ cha ......
ṭhitîke cha yaṃ pakamê hôtu ...... vaḍhisiti vipulaṃ pi cha vaḍhisiti a .... yam vaḍhisiti iyaṃ
cha sâvaṇê.................... taviyê ............ hyitavyaṃ śachaṃ va . yaṃ imê dhamma-gu
...... ha . ma........ âchariyê apachâyitaviyê su .......... sâ pôrâṇa .... tî dîghâvusi cha
hêmêva . têvâsinê cha âchariye ............ thârahaṃ pavatitaviyê .............. êsa tathâ
kaṭaviyê cha Pa ............ ṇa
* This word is in Kharôshṭi characters.

div.head:
15
At the same village, on a rock north of Pâpâsâni’s wet land.
div.p:
śrî-Virûpâksha-dêvarê gati śrî-Kriyâśakti-dêvara Dêmaṇa-voḍeyara śiśu-makaḷu Huvi-Śeṭiya makaḷu
Ba-Śeṭṭiyaru kaṭṭisida ker̤e .. Saṭiya voppa śrî-Banada-Saṅkhari-tâyê gati

div.head:
16
At the same village, on a tomb stone near the basti.
div.p:
śrî-Mûla-saṅghada Balôtkâra-gaṇada........ Mâdhava-dêvara guḍḍa Hampa-Gaüḍana maga Baramara-
Gaüḍana Chakki-Gaüḍiya nisidhi

div.head:
17
On a second tomb stone at the same place.
div.p: svasti śrîmatu .......... dêvara guḍḍa ........ raṇa-dêvana Muddaveya nisidhi

div.head:
18
On a third tomb stone.
div.p: svasti śrîmatu ......dha-dêvara guḍḍa Kabbi-Śeṭiyara maga......Mâḷayana nisidhi

div.head:
19
On a fourth tomb stone.
div.p: Masili-Śeṭi aṇa Mali-Śeṭiyara nisidhi

div.head:
20
At the same village, on a stone in the raṅga-maṇṭapa of the Triśaṅkêśvara temple in the Brahmagiri hill.
div.p: svasti śrîmatu Bahudhânya-saṃvatsarada Śrâvaṇa-suddha 3 ...........

lg.l: ddâmaṃ Hed[d]or̤e-mêrey âge .......... n âḷdan âtaṅg ati- |
paduḷade Bhôga-bhûpatige paṭṭaman .... oykane kaṭṭe vairi-jâ- |
ṭṭidud ari-dêśadoḷ bhaya .. saṃ maḍu-gaṭṭidud âgaḷ âvagaṃ ǁ
bhâgadoḷ â-Nṛigaṃ maguḷe puṭṭidan â-Nahusaṅge matta ja- |
nmâgamav âdud â-Raghu chaturttha-yugôdbhavan âdan embinaṃ ǁ

div.p: antu puṭṭi lalâṭa-paṭṭadoḷu paṭṭamaṃ taḷedu ǁ

lg.l: taḍeyade Roddamaṃ Kaṇiyakallan aḷumbade Śîru-nâḍan î- |
kaḍu-gali Bamma-bhûpan olaviṃ paripâḷisi matta mâṇdanê |
Maḍiyame-nâḍa Humbuḷige Luṅke Nasumbu Noṇambavâḍi Râ.. |

div.p:
antu para-maṇḍaḷaṅgaḷan uravaṇiyind ottikoṇḍu Roddada Gôvaṃ khaḷa-Sahadêvaṃ nigaḷaṅka-mallaṃ
ripu-hṛidaya-sallaṃ baṇṭara bâvaṃ Bammi-Dêvaṃ saradhi-parivêśhṭita-dharaṇiyaṃ paripâḷisutte
sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadin[d] ire tadîya-pâda-mûla-parigrâha-vṛittiyumaṃ pradhâna-pratipattiyumaṃ
paḍedu naḍev anvayadoḷu ǁ

lg.l: vinaya-nidhânan endu vimaḷânvayan endu vivêkiy endu Kâñ- |
chanagiri-dhairyyan endu kavi-bândhavan endu kaḷâ-pravîṇan en- |
d anupama-dâniy end akhiḷa-saṃstutan end abhirâman îtan end |
anunayadinda baṇṇisuvud âgaḷuv Ajjanan î-jagaj-janaṃ ǁ
paded âdi-Varâhana radanada | moneyoḷu nimiśam irddud eḷe santatam ip- |
pudu karaṇad Ajjamana kon- | tada moneyoḷu Kaṇiyakalla-nâḍ anit-anitu ǁ
â-negaḷd Ajjana sati chan- | drânane gaja-gamane vṛitta-kuche Tippaman â- |
Jânakiyan Arundhatiyaṃ | mânini naguvaḷu patibratâ-guṇadinda ǁ
chanan ânandade petta garbbad odaviṃ Daityêndranaṃ Bhânu-nan- |
dananaṃ Khêchara-râjanaṃ Śibiyan â-Mândhâtanaṃ petta taj- |
jananî-saṅkuḷa-dôshamaṃ kaḷedu koḷvaḷ kappamaṃ Tippamaṃ ǁ

div.p: ant apratimam enisid oppaman appukeyda Tippamâmbikeya suputran enisi ǁ

lg.l: saradhiya guṇpan urbbareya sairaṇeyaṃ sura-saiḷad ondu su- |
sthirateyan Indra-mantriya kaḷâ-kusaḷatvaman ondu mâḍi Paṅ- |
karamayan âdan ent enisidaṃ karaṇâgraṇi mantri-Bîchaṇaṃ ǁ
ored îtaṃ pati-bhaktan end ar̤idu Barmmôrbhîśvaraṃ koṭṭoḍ â- |

div.p: (rest gone).
(2nd piece) antu nija-pati-prasâdâyattanuṃ dhîrôdâttanum enisi pempu-vaḍeye |

lg.l: .... vinde Bemma-mahipaṃ besanaṃ kuḍe mantri-Bîchan ud- |
dhurataram âge beṭṭugaḷan oṭṭ.... d ene tandu vajra-pañ- |
jaramane koṭṭan îgaḷ ene Hâniyakaṃ Niḍugallan eyde nâḷ- |

div.p:
antu Kammaṭada Bîcha nirmmisida permmeyind asiya-gasaṇiyuṃ dûveya bevasamuṃ dunduveya
dandugaṃ mâḍi.. ṇiyataṃ kuṭamuṃ huri maṇale bharavasamuṃ toḷalkeyuṃ baḷalkeyuṃ kâḷegad
ûḷigamuṃ kanisinoḷam ill enisi ǁ

lg.l: asadaḷav emma tôḷ-valamum âḷ-valamum diṭav endu kâduv ond- |
esakade band arâti-nivahaṃ suralôkaman eyde matte bhê- |
disi kolavêḷku matt avaran embavol aḷḷ ir̤iyuṃ ...... v â- |
gasaman aḍurttu Hâniyada kôṭeyuv î-Niḍugulla kôṭeyuṃ ǁ
javadiṃ Bîcha-chamûpan ikkisida durggâḍambaraṃ gêḷdu Pa- |
llavan aḷḷâḍidan Andhran audhana-vol âdaṃ bechchi Karnnâṭan ant |
avam end â .... n Aṅga-Vaṅga-mahipaṃ beṅgoṭṭaḍ ôrante Mâ- |
ḷavan âḷâdapan endaḍ aḷki taḷaridaṃ Yâdavaṃ .... davaṃ ǁ
dâniyu.. vuditôditam ârjjitam âge pempu-vett î- |
mâna-nidânan ikkisidan int idu nôḍe śiḷâ-taḷâksharaṃ ǁ

div.head:
21
On a boulder known as Akshara-guṇḍu, north of the Brahmagiri hill.
div.p: (Brahmi lipi)

Suvaṇṇagirîtê ayaputasa mahâmâtâṇaṃ cha vachanêna Isilasi mahâmâtâ ârôgiyaṃ vataviyâ hêvaṃ
cha vataviyâ Dêvâṇaṃ piyê âṇapayati adhikâni aḍhâtîyâni vasâni ya hakaṃ...... nô tu khô bâḍhaṃ
pakaṃtê husaṃ êkaṃ savachharaṃ sâtirêkê tu khô saṃvachharaṃ yaṃ mayâ saṃghê upayîtê bâḍhaṃ
cha mê pakaṃtê iminâ chu kâlêna amisâ samânâ munisâ Jambu-dîpasi misâ dêvêhi pakamasa hi iyaṃ
phalê nô hîyaṃ sakyê mahâptênêva pâpôtavê kâmaṃ tu khô khudakêna pi pakamamiṇêṇa vipuḷê
svagê sakyê ârâdhêtavê êtâyaṭhâya iyaṃ sâvaṇê sâvâpitê .......... mahâptâ cha imaṃ pakamê ..
aṃtâ cha mê jânêyu chiraṭhitîkê cha iyaṃ pa .......... iyaṃ cha aṭhê vaḍhisiti vipulaṃ pi cha vaḍhi-
siti avaradhiyâ diyaḍhiyaṃ vaḍhisiti iyaṃ cha sâvaṇê sâvâpitê vyûthêna 256 sê hêvaṃ Dêvâṇaṃ piyê
âha mâtâpitisu susûsitaviyê hêmêva garutvaṃ prâṇêsu drahyitavyaṃ sachaṃ vataviyaṃ sê imê dham-
maguṇâ pavatitaviyâ hêmêva aṃtêvâsinâ âchariyê apachâyitaviyê ñâtikêsu cha ka .. ya.. rahaṃ pava-
titaviyê êsâ pôrâṇâ pakitî dighâvusê cha êsa hêvaṃ êsa kaṭaviyê cha Paḍêna likhitaṃ lipikarêṇa
* This last word is in Kharôshṭi characters.

div.head:
23
At Roppa attached to the same village, on the Gaurî-guṇḍu.
div.p: (Nâgarî characters)

Śaka-varsha 1129 daneya Prabhava-saṃvatsara-Vaiśâkha-mâsa-kṛishṇa-paksha-ashṭamyâṃ Śêma-
dinê dattaṃ śrî-Gôvind-Râyanu

div.head:
24
At the same village, on a rock near the Baḍakala-kuṇṭe.
div.p:
śrî-Brahmêsvara-üru Chika-Khallaya Roddada Gôva Nigaḷaṅka-malla Bemma-Dêvage naluvaru tauu- tann-
jaru Frammarige chaturu-muka-ghatidante gha(ṭi)daru Bijaṇa-Dêva Baira-Dêva Maṅgala-Dêva
Bavantiga-Dêva tamma naluvaru biṭṭa dharmma Sukumâra-paṇḍita pratiṭṭeyaṃ mâḍi Saviya âr̤um-
bâḍada râja-guru Dêvêndra-guruvige Bijaṇa-Dêva .. kuma .. dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭa dharmma
pratipâḷakaru seṭiguta Chandi-Seṭi (others named).

div.head:
25
* The orthography of this in the original is very bad.
At Santêgôvi (same hobli), on copper plates in possession of Diḍige Îśvaraiyya.
div.p:
(I b) śrî-Virûpâkshana padavê gati śrî-Komâra-svâmi-padâravindavê gati śrî-Bâṇarâvi-Mukyaprâṇa-
nâtha-svâmi-śrî-pâdaṅgaḷê gati Basavêśvaranê gati śrî-Maruḷepa .. dayamâḍi pâlisi yî-svâsti koṭanta
kramav ent endaḍe śrî svasti jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varuśaṅgaḷu 1587 neya Viśvavasu-nâma-
saṃvachharada Kârtika-śudha 10 Sthiravâra-Svâti-nakshatra-śubha-dinadi śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâr-
yya yimmaḍi-gaḍiyaṅka-Bhîma Soṇḍûru-Guḍukôṭe-Bâṇarâvi-râja-râjêśrî Bôri-Nâyika-Bommava-Nâgati-
yavaru Hara-guru-bakti-âchâra-kriyâ-dharma-svarûpigaḷ âda nâlku-maṭada hirêru râ ǁ Âridri-maṭada-
Attîta-dêvaravaru maṭada Mahêśvaraiyanavaru Stavara-maṭapati Gaṇa .... śrî-Mukyaprâṇanâtha-
dêvaru-svâmi-(II a) pûjâri Hire-Dâsappa paṭṭaṇade seṭi Yîrappa kômaṭigara Timmappa gandhaviḍi-
Yîrappa Gudhi .. ya pârapategâra Śînappa Lakshmipati staḷada gauḍa-śânabhôgaru hanneraḍu-mandi
âyagâraru nâyikaru daḷavâyi-gurikâraru yakkaṭṭigaru staḷa-parastaḷa-seṭṭi-savudri samasta-daiva-
bara-ballidaru mukântradallu yî-grâmada akasâlike svastivâna pottadâra Satyappanu Kembâvi-
Yîrappa-Appaṇṇanavarige tanna Bâṇarâvi-sîme mûvattu-mûru-haḷi akasâlike-pottadârike-svâstiyannu
koṭa kramav ent endaḍe râjêśrî-doregaḷa rastina haṇavanu yetti â-Satyappana maneyalli yillada
pakshadallu âtana mane Viṭlapuradalli yida-kâraṇa divâṇada ra-(II b) stina haṇavanu Yele-Kem-
bâviyavara maneyoḷage yiḍal âgi rastina pottada chîlavanu Kembâviyavara maneyanu kaḷaru yiḷebiddu
aramane rastu hâki gaṇṭu kaṭṭi yikkidanta pottada chîlavanu kaḷaru kaddukoṇḍu hôgalâgi â-
Satyappa râjeśrî-karttarige hêḷida mâtu svâmi Kembâviyavara maneyoḷage dêvaravara rastina haṇa-
vanu .. yiṭuyidêvu yîga Kembâvi Yîrappa Appaṇṇanavara kêḷidare râjêśrî-aramane rastina haṇa-
kaḷivili hôyitu yendu âḍuta yidâru yidake dêvaravaru nîvê tarisi avaranu vichâra-mâḍi yilla vuṇṭu
yembadanu dêvaravaru kêḷiriy enalâgi râjêśrî-doregaḷu tamma hujûru sâmadikaru pârapategâra
(III a) kasabe-gauḍa grâmânugrâmagaḷa gauḍaru śânabhôgaru nâḍigaru hanneraḍu-mandi âya-
gâraru nâḍa kulakaraṇi nâyakaru daḷavâyi paṭaṇa-seṭi savudri maṭa-mahatu samasta-hirêru kirêru
daivada mukhântradalli râjêśrî-doregaḷu akasâlêya Kembâvi-Yîrappa-Appaṇṇanavara hiḍitarisi
mâtanâḍasalâgi avaru âḍida mâtu dêvaravara aramane raste-haṇavanu namma mane kaḷaru iḷebiddu
kadukoṇḍu hôdaru yenalâgi râjêśrî-daṇigaḷu â-mâtu kêḷi maha siṭâgi nimma maneyoḷage yiṭanta
divâṇada rastu hôdadu tapu yendu nâṇya .. ga 120 varaha-daṇḍa tegadukoṇḍaru mattu râjêśrî
doregaḷu tamma chitti antaḥkaraṇakke tandu sâmadikaru pârapategâra gauḍa śânabhôgaru (III b)
samastaru kûḍi nâvu baḍavaranu yaraḍu-kaṇṇu kâṇade daṇḍa tegadukoṇḍivi yendu vaḷa sûkshme-
yali vûra-taḷavâra Sômi-Nâyaka nâḍa-taḷavâra Jâbi-Nâyaka avar-ibaru bûmige kâvandarâdavara
karasi nîvu yî-kaḷavina vichâravanu sôdisi yâva-kaḍelâdaru yî-kaḷavu hiḍadu havudu mâḍiri yendu
râjêśrî-daṇigaḷu tâkîdi-mâḍi hêḷalâgi matu âru-tiṅgaḷige ûra-taḷavâra Sômi-Nâyika nâḍa-taḷavâra-
Jâbi-Nâyakanavaru â-kaḷatanavanu bêdisi nija-nispatti mâḍi â-Satyapana mêle horisi râjêśrî-dore-
gaḷige â-Satyappana vapasalâgi adanu vichâraṇe mâḍi kêḷalike â-Satyappana maga râjêśrî-daṇigaḷa
rastina haṇa kadukoṇḍu hôgi tanna śûḷige vaḍive vasta mâḍi (IV a) koṭa ayibu sikalâgi yî-tapu â-
Satyappana mêle yî-kaḷavu hottitu yendu nâvu dharmavannu kaṇṇu-kâṇade baḍavara saṅgaḍa daṇḍa
tegadukoṇḍivi yendu yî-rokavanu Satyappana mêle tîrisikoḷi yendu râjêśrî-daṇigaḷige gauḍa-śânabôgaru
mûvatu-mûru-haḷi-svastivânaru samasta-daivada .... dharma hêḷalâgi â-Satyappana râjêśrîgaḷu
kêḷalâgi svâmi nanagênu âdhâra yillav endu tanna Bâṇarâvi-sîme mûvatu-mûru-haḷi
akasâlike-pottadârike-svâstiyoḷage arda-pâlu svâsti koṭṭên endu âḍal âgi râjêśrîgaḷu gauḍa-śânabôgaru
hanneraḍu-mandi âyagâru samasta-daiva-sanmatadinda Kembâvi-Yîraṇṇa-Appaṇṇanavarige akasâ-
like-pottadârike-svâstiyanu kotu yidanu Bâṇarâvi-kasabê-grâmânugrâmagaḷa âya beḷisi mede hore so-
(IV b) pe âḷitti-kâḷu haḷigaḷavaḷage yidanta mânyagaḷu Âvinamaḍavinakere hindaḷa mânyada gade
yishṭu-svâstiyannu sarva-daiva-sanmatadinda koṭṭu yidanu â-chandrârkavâgi anubavisikonḍu aṇṇa-
tammagaḷa hâge vûṭa mâḍikoṇḍu bahudu namma vaṃsha nintare yivaru vûṭa-mâḍuvadu yivara
vaṃsha nintare nâvu vûṭa-mâḍuvadu yendu barasi-koṭa patravu yî-haṇavanu Kembâvi-Yîrappa-
Appaṇṇanavaru koṭu yidaru yivaribar allade matu yivara vamshada aṇṇa-tammagaḷige yî-svâsti
kâraṇa yillavu yidake sâkshigaḷu (names of witnesses) râja-râjêśrî-Maruḷe-arasugaḷu pâlisi daya-
mâḍi-koṭanta svâsti â-chandrârkavâgi anubavisi vûṭa-mâḍikoṇḍu-bahudu (VI a) yidu barada
kasibe Bâṇarâvi-sîme mûvatu-mûru-haḷi gauḍa-śânabôgaru hanneraḍu-mandi âyagâraru bara-
ballidaru samasta-daivadavara sarvara-sanmatadind âta Bâṇarâvi-sîme śânabôga Lakshmapati-
suhasta-barahavu Satyappana vapitavu chalavâdi Giriyappa mâdigara sâkshigaḷu (named).

div.head:
26
At Râmasâgara (same hobli), on the Nâgarapaḍe-guṇḍu on the Jaṭṭiṅga Râmêśvara hill.
div.p:
Saka-varsha 954 neya Âṅgira-saṃvatsarada śrî-Jayasiṅga-Dêva râjyaṃ geyvandu Kâñchî-pura-varês-
vara.... besadi . ḷḷi ...................... da pu .. ra ........ britya Chi ... ma-daṇḍanâyaka
Gaṅgaya A .. varmma (rest effaced).

div.head:
27
On a second stone in the same place.
div.p:
svasti Saka-nṛipa-kâḷâtîta-saṃvatsara-śataṅgaḷ 883 Dundubhiy emba saṃvatsaraṃ pravarttise Sîte-
yaṃ Râvaṇan uye Jaṭâyu kâdi sattalli Râma-pratishe geydalli Uṇaṃ dêgulavaṃ mâḍidaḍe yiṭṭageya
dêgulamaṃ kaḷedu kaḷaśa-nirmmâṇaṃ Liṅgasiva-jîyar bbhikshâ-vṛittiyindaṃ kalla dêgulamuṃ
dêgulaṅgaḷumaṃ samayisi koṇḍaṅgaḷumaṃ kaṭṭisidar idar̤a bhûmiya sîme (here follow details of
boundaries) idam aḷi, koṇḍâtaṃ Vâruṇâsiyumaṃ kavileyuṃ Śrîparvvatamuman aḷidaṃ ......
Mâḷirâsiganu Mo . jîyara mechchi 1 guyyaḷaṃ 3 matta keyyumaṃ biṭṭar abhimânugaḷ emba Goggi
tanna manneya .. Bîvôjaṅge biṭṭaṃ maṅgaḷaṃ (usual final verse).

div.head:
28
On a third stone at the same place.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvana-stuta-mahâ-mahimôda . dayôllasita Pallavânvaya śrî-prithvî-vallabha mahâ-
râjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ vîra-Mâhêśvaraṃ vidagdha-viḷâsini-vilôchana-chakôra-chandraṃ praty-
aksha-Dêvêndraṃ râjavidyâ-bhujaṅgan aṇṇana-siṅgaṃ śrîmat-Traiḷôkyamalla-Nol̤amba-Pallava-
Permmâḍi-Jayasiṅga-Dêvar Gondavâḍiya por̤a-vîḍinal sukhadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyutt ire Saka-varsha 993
neya Virôdhikṛit-saṃvatsarada Phâlguṇad amâvâse-Budhavâraṃ Balgôḍi-tîrttha-stbânada Râmêśvara-
dêvargge Kaṇiyakal-mûnûr̤ar̤a baḷiya bâḍa Baṇekallaṃ sarvva-namasyam âgi Amṛitarâsi-jîyargge
dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭar (usual imprecation).

div.head:
29
On a stone in the wall of the Sûryyana guḍi on the same hill.
div.p:
svasti śamasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâr-
akaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukhyâbharaṇaṃ śrî-Traiḷôkyamalla-chakravarttiya magaṃ sama-
sta-lôkâsraya samasta-bhudha-janâsrayan Âhavamallan-aṅkakâraṃ śrî-Vishṇuvarddhana-mahârâjaṃ
Vijayâdityaṃ Noḷambavâḍi-mûvattirchchâsiraman âḷuttam ire Kampiliya-nelevîḍinoḷu sukhadin arasu-
geyyuttum Śaka-varsha 986 neya Krôdhi-saṃvatsarada Vaisâkhada puṇṇame-Sômavâradandina gra-
haṇa-parbba-nimittade Balgôḍiya tîrtthada śrî-Râmêśvara-dêvargge naivêdyakaṃ khaṇḍa-sphuṭika-
kaṃ paruker̤aṅga-bhôgada sûḷeyarggaṃ allippa tapôdhanarggaṃ vidyâ-dânakaṃ Dêvêndra-paṇḍit-
argge dhârâ-pûrvvaka mâḍi Kaṇiyakalu-mûnûr̤ar̤-oḷagaṇa bâḍaṃ Dâki Vaḍuḷuke-eppattar̤-oḷagaṇa
kir̤iya-Dâki vaḍu-chagi ver̤apla palavari matta 30 vattu ivu sarvva-namasyam âgi â-chandrârkkaṃ-
bara salge ǁ î-dharmmaman aḷidavanuṃ oḍambaḍuvanuṃ koṇḍaṃ anumu ............

div.head:
30
On a flooring stone in the mahâdvâra of the Râmêśvara temple on the same hill.
div.p:
Virôdhi-saṃvatsarada Pushya-sudha-pa[u]rnami-Maṅgaḷavâradalu śrî-Jaṭaṅge-Râmaya-dêvarige
Râmanâtani-nâma ...yana siśa Kônêri magaḷu Râmanâthani-go .. yaḍa Kanakabe va .... paḍalike
samarpisi namana mâḍidaḷu

div.head:
31
On a copper plate belonging to the same temple.
div.p:
śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ | svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Sâlivâhana-śaka-varsha 1309 Kshaya-saṃvatsa-
rada Kârtika-suddha-pâḍyadalu śrî-Vîrabhûpati-Voḍeyaru Jaṭâṅgî-Râmai-dêvarige amṛitapaḍi-aṅga-
raṅga-bhôgakke koṭṭa-dharmma-śâsana â-Râmai-dêvarige namma aramaneyalu koḍuva-kaṭalege â-
Râmai-dêvara sannidhiyalu hiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvvakav âgi dhâreyan eradu samarpisi-koṭṭadu
(here follow details) antu Pratâpa-gadyâṇa 400 kkaṃ Jîyarahaḷiyanu Jaṭâṅgi-Râmayi-dêvarige amṛita-
paḍi-aṅga-raṅga-vaibôgakke dhâreyan eradu koṭṭevâgî î-Jiyarahaḷiya chatus-sîmeya uḷaguḷa nidhi-
nikshêpa-jala-pâshâṇa-akshîṇi-âgâmi-siddha-sâdhyaṅgaḷ emba ashṭa-bhôgavanu â-chandrârka-sthâyi-
gaḷ âgi sukhadim bhôgisûdu sthâna-mânya-pûrva-mariyâdeyandu koṭṭa-dharmma-śâsana | śâsanada
Muddaṇâchârige vṛitti ondu (usual imprecatory phrases) śrî-Râmanâtha

div.head:
32
On another copper plate belonging to the same temple.
div.p:
śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ | svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varshaṅgaḷu sâvirada munnûra
aivatt-âraneya Ânanda-saṃvatsara-Âśvayuja-bahuḷa-daśamiyalu śrîmatu Dêvarâya-mahârâyaru Jaṭâṅ-
gi-Râmaya-dêvarige poḍavaṭṭu koṭṭa-dharmma-śâsana Râyaru Mâchanahaḷiya bêṭege bijeyamâḍi
chittayisidalli Râmaya-dêvara daruśanake chittayisiddalli â-Râmaya-dêvarige prâku Râyadurga-châva-
ḍiyim prâku saluva-amṛitapaḍiya kaṭṭaleya â-dêvastânake saluva ippattu-varahana huṭṭuvaḷi ondu
grâmavanu koḍahêḷi sammukhada niruûpadim Arasappagaḷa appaṇeyim â-Jaṭâṅgi-Râmaya-dêvarige
prâku saluva-amṛitapaḍiya kaṭṭelege Ânanda-saṃvatsarada Âshâḍha-śuddha-pâḍya-ârabhyavâgi koṭṭa-
du Vîraṇṇana guttage-mâḍuttâyidda Hâveda-nâḍa Saṅgebôvana kâluveya kôru suvarnnâdâya sâmya
saha â-kâluveya chatus-sîmege saluva nidhi-nikshêpa-jala-pâshâṇa-akshîṇi-âgâmi-siddha-sâdhyagaḷ
emba ashṭa-bhôga-têjas-svâmya-sarvvôtpatya-samasta-bali-sahitavâgi â-chandrârkka-sthâyigaḷâgi
sukhadim bhôgisuvadu yandu koṭṭa-dharma-śâsana | (usual final phrases) śrî-Virûpâksha

div.head:
33
On a rock behind the Bhôgêśvara temple on the same hill.
div.p:
svasti Sakha-varshaṃ 963 Vishu-saṃvatsarada ...... mâsada Bṛihaspativâraṃ chaturddasiy-utta-
râyaṇa-saṅkrânti ...... aṅka Mallarasaṃ Râmêsvara-dêvargg âgi ............ sarvvamânyam âgi
dhârâ-pûrvvaka koṭṭa .......drârkkaṃ salvudu (usual imprecation).

On a rock in the way to the Râmêśvara temple on the same hill.

ya hasaṃ ............ yê .............. ti ................ ṇa ........ ni ................
kaṃ ........................ chha ..................................................
cha .................................... la ...................... sa................
pulam pi ...................... yaḍhiyaṃ ............................ thêna 256 hêmêva
................ tâpitusu ........ sitaviya hêmêva ............ ânêsu .......... hyitavyaṃ
sachaṃ vataviyaṃ ê ................ hêvaṃ pavatitaviyâ ............ na te ........ tava ....
............ taviya hêmêva âchariyê antêvâsinâ ............ râṇâ paki .......... sitaviya ..
vê .............. chariyaṃ .. a .... achariya ñâtikâ tê ........ ya ............ titaviyê êsâ ..
ra pakitî dîghâ ...... cha hêmêva ê .................. vati .......... yê hêvaṃ mê Dêvâṇaṃ
piyê .................. kaṭaviyê .. paḍêna li .................. karêṇa

div.head:
35
At Râmasâgara (same hobli), on a rock by the side of a jârbaṇḍe.
div.p:
Śrîparvatada Bichavati-Voḍeyarû Bayalahuliya Liṅgaṇṇa-Voḍeyaru Bichavati-Voḍeyaru koṭa ....
.. mânya

div.head:
37
On a rock near the tank on the Moḷakâlumuru hill.
div.p:
Śidhârti-saṃvatsarada Mâga-ba 10 śrîmanu mahâ-nâyakâchârya ........ Kastûri-Mallappa-Nâyaka-
navara tâyi Lakshmammana gati hesara kere

div.head:
39
On a rock in the tank on the same hill.

lg.l: kañjaraṃ puri têdraṃ cha mahôdâḷi sadâḷikâ |
Kâḷidâsa lidâ hôma chandram tê ripu-rañjakaṃ ǁ

div.head:
40
In Moḷakâlmuru (kasaba hobli), on a stone west of a rock behind the Mallikârjjuna temple.
div.p:
svasti Saka-nṛipa-kâḷâtîta-saṃvatsara-sataṅgaḷ 910 neya Sarvvajit-saṃvatsarada Pushya-mâsad amâ-
vâsyê-grahaṇadandu śrîmad-Ajavarmmarasanuṃ Mâḷiyabbarasiyuṃ tammage jîya Kappaḍiyara kâlaṃ
karchchhi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭa vṛitti eppattar̤a baḷiya Eḍiyûra guyyal ondu â-guyyali tanna
pratishṭe mâḍida Luṅkêsvara-dêvarggaṃ .... dêvarggaṃ Mâḷikabbarasi Tumbura beḷada bôginalu
Eḍeyûra poladoḷ biṭṭa mattar panneraḍu pannâya koḷa gal̤deyaṃ biṭṭaḷ (usual imprecatory phrases).

div.head:
41
On another stone at the same place.
div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-sabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara Banavâsi-pura-varâdhîsvaranuṃ ari....
.....dêva .................. yaśvamêdha-yajña ............ vîkshaṇa kadana-pra ............
para-pariṇataru ............................................ maṇḍala ................
.......... na-vandi-jana-kalpataru sûryya-prabhâvaḷi ...... baṇṭara bâ .......... Râma.... śara-
ṇâgata-vajra-pañjara nuḍidante gaṇḍa gaṇḍa-bhêruṇḍa kaligaḷ-âbharaṇa vairi-saṃharaṇa śrîmatu
Luṅkêśvara-dêvara divya-śrî-pâdârâdhaka-nâmâdi-samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ śrîmanu mahâ-maṇḍaḷê-
śvaraṃ parama-Mâhêśvararum appa Bañcharasa-dêvaru Tribhuvanamalla-Permmâḍi-Râya-Dêvara
râjyada 10 neya Vikrama-saṃvatsarada Kârttika-suddha 1 Sômavâra-sûryya-grahaṇadandu Luṅkeya
kôṭeyalu sukhadiṃ râjyaṃ geyivuttam irddu śrî-Luṅkêśvara-dêvar-aṅga-bhôga-nivêdya-jîrṇṇôddhâ-
rakk endu â-sthânapati-Jñânasakti-Sarbbêsvara-paṇḍitargge sarvva-namasyav âgi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ
mâḍi biṭṭa datti (details of boundaries) yint î-chatus-sîmê haḷḷiy-ashṭa-bhôga-têjas-svâmya-sahita
Luṅkey-eppattaraluṃ grâmadalu gadyâṇa 1 (here follow details of gift and usual final phrases).

div.head:
42
On a stone west of a rock behind the same temple.
div.p:
svasti Saka-nṛipa-kâlâtîta-saṃvatsara-sataṅgaḷ 910 tteneya Sarvvajit-saṃvatsarada Bhâdrapada-
mâsad êkâdasi-Bṛihaspativârad andu śrîmat...... ḍey-Ajavarmmana râjyadoḷ nâḍa mâḍida dhar-
mma .................... panneraḍu ....................

div.head:
43
At Nâgasamudra (same hobli), on a stone behind the Hanumanta temple.
div.p:
śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ śubham astu svasti śrî jayâbyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1477 neya
Râkshasa-saṃvachchharada Chayitra-ba 6 lu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa-
śrî-vîra-Sadâśiva-Dêva-mahârâyaru ratna-siṃhâsanârûḍhar âgi pruthvî-râjyaṃ gaiüttiralû Râmarâj-
aiyanavarige Tammôjanu Koṇḍôjanu bandu binnahaṃ mâḍalâgi Râmarâjaiyanavaru Sadâśiva-
Dêva-mahârâyarige binnahaṃ mâḍi râyaru âḷuvanthâ chatus-sîmeyalu nâyindara-kulôtpanna . Koṇ-
ḍôjanavara kulada nâyindararige biṭṭa Birûra sidâya kamba ma .................. sahâyada nela-
vaṃ sarvvamânyav âgi pâlisidêv endu śâsanava hâka hêḷi nirûpava koṭṭaru yî-mariyâdêli ......
........ râjaiya-Dêva-mahâ-arasu Nâgasamudrada nâyindarige sarvvamânyav âgi śâsanava pâlisi-
daru yidake âr obaru aḷupidarigu (obscene phrases) nyûnâksharam adhikâksharaṃ vâ yathâsarvvaṃ
likhitaṃ pramâṇam iti ǁ

div.head:
45
At the same village, on a stone behind the Veṅkaṭramaṇa temple.
div.p:
śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ ............ svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Sâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1477
neya .............. ba 10 Sukravâradalu śrîman-mahâ .............. mêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa-
Sadâśiva-Dêva-mahâ ........... n ârûḍhanâgi prithivî-râjyaṃ geyiüttaṃ ........ man-mahâ-maṇ-
.......................... râjayada ............ ravâgi yi .......... varu Nâgasamudrada
grâmada Timmaṇa-Gaüḍa ........ sênabôva-Raṅgappa ......... râda samasta-pra ............
sthiravâg iruvantâgi (rest effaced).

div.head:
47
At Haḷe-Daḍagûr (same hobli), on a stone in Taḷavâra Hanuma’s field.
div.p:
Śakha-varsha 993 neya Virôdhikṛitu-saṃvatsaradandu svasti śrîmatu Daḍigûra Kali-dêvargge Nîla-
kaṇṭha-jîyargge śrîmatu gaḍi .. Bhîma nuḍidu-mattenna ni .... de-malla ........ ṇa ...... dêva
panneraḍu-mattar kkeyuma .......... (usual imprecatory phrases).

div.head: CHAḶḶAKERE TALUQ.

1
At Nâyakanahaṭṭi (Nâyakanahaṭṭi hobli), on a stone lying in the Huṇisêmarada-koppalu near Jagaḷur road.
div.p: Hachavaḷiya Channaṇṇanu Aṇḍidaṇḍigeya Liṅgaṇṇa-Vaḍayarige nîḍida maneda kaṭale ûla

div.head:
2
At Timmappaiyyanahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone on the Bokkasada Timmappaiyyana-guḍḍa.
div.p:
śrî-Paramêśvara ǁ Krôdhana-sañcharada Kârttika-śu 13 llu Haḍi-Mallappa-Nâyakara komâ[ra]
Kastûri-Mallappa-Nâyakaiyyanavaru Râmoḍêra maga Jaṅgama Chennayage . Timmayanahaḷi-maṭake
koṭṭa mânya-sthala Mutta-gauḍu śânabôvaru 12 âyagâru

div.head:
3
At Taḷak (Taḷak hobli), on a stone south of the Mûlasthânêśvara temple.
div.p:
śubham astu svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-saka-varushaṅgaḷu 1482 Sidhârti-saṃvachchharada
Mâgha-ba 10 śrîman-mahâ-nâ .. kâchârya Haratiya ... Viṭhaṇa-Nâyaka-ayyanavaru Taḷukina gauḍa-
sênabôvaru Doḍêriya-sîme hadinâlku-sthaḷada gauḍa-sênabôvaru Harati . Mâraige...... pâla kereya
........ koṭṭa-mariyâdeyali śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchârya .... gaḷu .... Yallappa-nâykarige ....
mânyavâgi koṭṭa (rest illegible).

div.head:
4
At Doḍḍa-Uḷvarte (same hobli), on a vîrakal near the southern wasteweir.
div.p:
svasti Saka-varisham êḷanûr̤a-tombhattâr̤aneya saṃvatsara-Jêshṭa-sudda-Maṅgaḷavâramuṃ dasami-
yuṃ Ul̤alamar̤iyya okalamaga Kambhayya Nâgayebbeya maga Mâreyya Koṭṭûra tur̤u-goḷal aṇmi satta
Honna ......

div.head:
5
On another vîrakal at the same place.
div.p:
svasti .... bda pṛithuvî-vallabha śrî-Siṅgappottara Kali-Nol̤ambadi-arasa râjya .. da ........ ttam-
muttirvvaru .. r̤iyâtandipa Râman nija daṇḍi gajaripu-bikrama .. mmaṇṇanaṃ sattudaṃ kê ....
yaḍeyâ .... da .. paribinaṃ pâyisidônam palavum biḷiyambuṃ cha.. mum jaṭṭigeyuṃ koḷe to
.......... du svarggam êr̤idoṃ

div.head:
6
At the same village, on a vîrakal near the southern wasteweir.
div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mâ-sabda Pallava-kulânvayaṃ śrîmat-Aṇṇayya .. Bîra-Noḷamba râjyaṃ
geyye prachaṇḍa-daṇḍanâyakana magaṃ Goggi Ul̤almar̤iyan âḷutt ire üra ûra hari-bandu kâdo mar̤e-vok-
ônaṃ kâdu kal̤ippi vairi-balakke idiran naḍedu sattu yasavaṃ paḍedaṃ ....

lg.l: eḍe maḍagade pogal̤e tâgi taḷt ir̤idu yasaṃ |
paḍe matu.. l âytu bhuvanad oḷaguṃ por̤aguṃ ǁ

div.p:
daṇḍanâyakan Tikkapayyana magaṃ Kontada Goggi ür-al̤ivinoḷ sattaṃ.. kaṇ .. bandu tâgal â-kshaṇa-
doḷe mârkoṇḍu poṇardu talt ir̤idu maḍidan î-Gôggi .. int eṇey âva .. man î-bhavanaṃ idaṃ besagey-
daṃ Kellôjaṃ

div.head:
7
On a 2nd vîrakal.
div.p:
svasti śrîmat-Kali-Nol̤ambadi-arasar amarâlayaâ vôge ayiguḷav iḍe maṇṇu Nol̤ambadi-arasar pa ...
geydâr î-rûpugaḷanu ga ...... maṇṇuṃ salisadoṃ Vâraṇâsioḷ sâsi .. vileyuṃ sâsirvvar pârvvarumâ
konda lôkakke sandôr akke

div.head:
8
On a 3rd vîrakal.
div.p:
svasti śrî Permmanaḍigaḷ nava-râjyaṃ geye Duggamâr êr̤e ârpp ommige el̤tare munidu prâpta-pañcha-
mahâ-śabda pṛithuvî- .... bha Siṅgappottara Kali-Nol̤ambadi-arasarâ Permmanaḍigaḷ besase besaṃ
bettu pottandu mêg el̤tandu kâdido kâḷegadandu .. lôkake .......... ḷiyim bandir ttamuttirvva-
ruḷ piriyâtam bikkuḷḷi-vigraha-daṇḍi vîra-siṃhâsaniga paḍimallaṃ nôḍi komara Ma ........ yâm
poyisi ir̤idoḍe tannam palavum biḷiyambu jaṭṭigegaḷum basam al̤ivina koḷi tâṃ sattu tanna ....
baḍedu svargga-lôkada surâṅganeyaroḷ nerado

div.head:
9
At the same village, on a stone in Ajja’s temple in the Shanbhog’s wet land.
div.p:
svasti samasta-śrî-jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-sakha-varushaṅgaḷu 1475 neya Pramâdîcha-saṃ-
vaścharada Âśâḍa-su 1 Śômavâra śrîman-mâhârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa-
Sadâsiva-Dêva-mahârâyaru chatu-saradhi-vaḷeyîkṛitavâgi sukavâgi pṛitvî-râjyaṃ gaivuttiralu
śrîman-mahâ ... ḍalêsvara Râmarâju-Viṭhalaiyya-dêva-mahâ-a .... bhuja-pratâpa śriman-mahâ-
maṇḍalêsvara Mâ ...... Tirumala-Râja-ayyanavaru Doḍḍêriya nâḍa-gavuḍa Bavara-Seṭṭiyavarige
Uralavaratiya-ker̤eyoḷa .... hantiya mûḍaḷa-sthaḷadoḷage hattu-koḷaga mâ .... nu sarvvamânyavâgi
phala-puspavanu anubha .... du koṭṭa mânya î-mânyavanu (usual imprecatory phrases).

div.head:
10
At Olase (same hobli), on a stone lying in the Karîbhâvi-gaḍḍe field.
div.p: Îśvara-saṃvarsada Bhâdrapada-su 14 .. śrî-Mâṇikaṅga-râüḷara guḍi âyita 2½ Bayichakkana sostigi

div.head:
11
At Malanahalli (same hobli), on a vîrakal near the Îragâra-guḍi.
div.p: svasti śrî Bejjapavara maga Baḍiyaṇṇa .. mevana śûḍi maḍido

div.head:
12
On another vîrakal at the same place.
div.p:
svasti śrî teṅkana ker̤e gaṭṭisida Kaliyamma-gavuṇḍana mamma Puṭṭi .... ra abhichinandu satta
Dêvaṇṇa kula-gujjâ pa .. ja .. kalla nilisida

div.head:
13
At the same village, on a rock on the bank of a channel.
div.p:
śubham astu śrî Bêvinahaḷiya śrî-Tiruveṅgaḷanâthana pura-varga Mailênahaḷi-grâmadalu Hagare-tor̤eya
kâluveya tarahadakâgi śrî-Tiruveṅgaḷanâthana sthânika-âyanavara śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchârya Harati-
Chikapa-Nâya .... Elapa-Nâya .... yanavarige koṭṭa mânya dasavanda .... ya muḍa .... Bâtiya..
mânya kha 1 gadeya 10 ...... baḍagalu dasavanda ........ ra munde gade kha 1 svâmigaḷa guḍiya
........ kha 1 ........ dasavanda ........ dêvara pâlu 10 palisali ânubha........ sal uḷavaru

div.head:
14
At the same place, on another rock.
div.p:
Durmati-saṃvacharada Kârtika-mâsadalu śrîmatu-Haratiya ........ nâyakaru âyanavarigu Bêvina-
haḷiâ sthânika-âyanavari . na Mâtâḷa-Chikaya Mayalênahaḷiya Malaṇa-gaüḍana maga Sô .. vaṇa ..
.... châ-grâmada Hanumanta-dêvarige koṭṭa mânya kâluveya Harati-ker̤eya hin.... neṭṭa kalla
(rest illegible).

div.head:
16
At Kaśavagonḍanahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone near the ruined Mûga-Basappa temple.
div.p:
svasti śrî Châ[ḷu]kya-Vikrama-varushada 40 kaṃ Vyaya-saṃvachcharada Âśâḍa-sudda-pañchami-
Sômavâra śrîmanu-mâhâ-manḍaḷêsvaran Iruṅgoḷa-Chôḷa-mahârâjâ .. vinda mâḍi sukha-sankathâ-
vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyveli pa ... Chaka-gauḍana tamma Chellamana Peḍaürayyana maga Bammige
sa ......

div.head:
17
At Guḍehaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone north of the village gate.
div.p: (The top portion is effaced).

yi-patra hêḷi barasidâta Hanumaiya kaḍasidâta Mâchana-gavuḍa yidanu nirmisida Gunḍebaḷi-
Sonnari-Chikkaṇa

div.head:
21
At Ôbaḷâpura (same hobli), on a stone to the south of the Siddha-Râmêśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛitvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêsvarṃ paramêsvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭâ-
rakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-pratâpa-chakravartti Jagadêkamalla-
Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târam-baraṃ sukha-saṅ-
kathâ-vinôdadiṃ Kalyâṇada-nelavîḍinoḷu râjyaṃ geyvutam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ svasti sama-
dhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaran Or̤eyûr-ppura-varâdhîśvara nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mâr-
ttaṇḍa nuḍidante-gaṇḍa dînânâtha-vandi-bṛinda-santarppaṇa maṇḍaḷika-mukha-darppaṇa ripu-maṇḍa-
ḷika-kudhara-sañchûrṇṇita-vajra-bâhu-daṇḍa nara-lôka-gaṇḍara gaṇḍa bahu-kaḷâ-pariṇata-Chatur-
mmukha
* So in the original. samastayka-Śaṇmukha bhaya-lôbha-durllabha jayâṅganâ-vallabha Mandara-dhairyyan
apratihata-sauryya chatu-śashṭi-maṇḍaḷika-śiras-khaṇḍana nija-râjya-lakshmî-mukha-maṇḍana Hara-
charaṇa-kamaḷa-bhṛiṅga sâhasôttuṅga Gôvindara-Dêvan-aṅka-kâr̤a raṇa-raṅga-nîr̤a Roddada gôva
khargga-Sahadêva nigaḷaṅka-malla bhîtaraṃ kolla mar̤ev-uge-kâva baṇṭara bâva nâmâdi-samasta-
prasasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaran Iruṅgoḷa-Chôḷa-mahârâjara putra svasti samadhigata-
pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaran Or̤eyûr-ppura-varâdhîśvara ripu-maṇḍaḷika-sarabha-bhê-
ruṇḍan ahitara gaṇḍa sishṭêshṭa-janâbhîshṭa-phaḷa-pradâyaka jaya-lakshmî-Kusumasâyakan êkâṅga-
vîra Madanâvatâra ripu-kuḷa-kuruṅga-kaṇṭhîrava raṇa-raṅga-Bhairava daśa-diśâ-praśâḷa-varttita-kîrtti
subha-lakshaṇa-lakshita-mûrtti saṅgrâma-Râma vairi-sâmâja-Bhîma ari-maṇḍaḷika-jîmûta-nirgghâta-
vâta lôka-vikhyâta-śatru-maṇḍaḷika-pannega-Vainatêya sauch-Añjanêya Siva-charaṇa-kamaḷa-saṭchara-
ṇa mahimey-âbharaṇa śrîmad-Iruṅgoḷa-Dêvana siṅga sakaḷa-guṇa-tuṅga Roddada gôva khargga-Saha-
dêva nigaḷaṅka-malla bhîtaraṃ kolla mar̤ev-uge-kâvan ar̤uvattu-nâlvar-mmaṇḍaḷikara tale-goṇḍa-
gaṇḍa nara-lôka-gaṇḍara gaṇḍan Immaḍi-baṇṭara-bâva nâmâdi-samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-
mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Vîra-Noṇamba-Jagadêkamalla-Malla-Dêva-Chôḷa-mahârâjaru Rodda-nâḍu Sire-
nâḍu Har̤uve-nâḍu Kaṇiyakalu-nâḍ initumaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷanaṃ mâḍi sukha-saṅ-
kathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyvuttav iddu śrîmach-Châḷukya-chakravartti-Jagadêkamalla-varshada 10
neya Prabhava-saṃvatsarada Chaitrad-amavâsyey-Âdityavâra-sûryya-grahaṇadandu Sire-nâḍ-oḷagaṇa
Sirivoḷala śrî-Râma-dêvara pratishṭey-appa śrî-Râmêśvara-dêvar-aṅga-bhô-(back)-ga-
* So in the original. raṅga-sphuṭita-
jîrṇṇôddhârakkaṃ snâna-nivêdyakkaṃ tapôdhanar-âhâra-dânakkaṃ Udyôga-Râma-paṇḍitara kâlaṃ
karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi sarvva-namaśyavâgiy â-Sirivoḷala kereya keḷage modal-gâla garddeya
hanneraḍu khaṇḍugada bayalu â-ker̤eyiṃ mûḍa-voladal irppatta-nâlku-mattaru-keyyamaṃ biṭṭar
adara sîme (here follow details of boundaries and further gift).

svasti śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Jagadêkamalla-Malli-Dêva-Chôḷa-mahârâjara piriy-arasi Balli-
Dêviyaru Sirivoḷala-ker̤eyan âḷutta ker̤eya kibbayala śrî-Kali-dêvarige snâna-nivêdyakkaṃ Têjôrâsi-
paṇḍitara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭa gardde dêvara munde khaṇḍugav eraḍu
dêvariṃ paḍuval âr̤u-mattaru keyya biṭṭar (usual final phrases and verse) Oḍager̤eyiṃ mûḍa tôṇṭa
mattar ondu ǁ svasti samasta-guṇa-gaṇâḷaṅkṛita Śiva-charaṇa-kamaḷa-bhṛiṅganuṃ chatus-samaya-
samuddharaṇanum âhârâbhaya-bhaiśajya-śâstra-dâna-vinôdanuṃ śrî-Râmêśvara-dêvara pâdârâdhaka-
num appa śrîmad-Araha .... ṭṭeya Bîchi-Seṭṭigaṃ Chavuḍakabbegaṃ puṭṭida su-putraṃ ......Mâchi-
Seṭṭi śrî-Râmêśvara-dêvara Vishṇu-dêvargge jîrṇṇôddhâra ...... mâḍisi parivâra-dêvaraṃ mâḍisida
maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî

div.head:
22
On the northern pillar of the raṅga-maṇṭapa of the same temple.
div.p:
(South face) śrî svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ pṛitvî-vallabhaṃ parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ parama-kalyâṇa
î-stânada gurugaḷ-âdiya ........ ḷekar̤u jaṅguḷiyaṃ kâüti ...... lu magan Eṇa ........ tanuma
bisikoṇḍa ........ hanneraḍu-kaṇḍuga hu (3 lines illegible) akkiya nivê[dya]vaṃ munnûr̤a-
ar̤uvatu haḷavigeyaṃ kaṭṭi dêvara kaiya .. prasâda âgi Mali-Dêvarasa bakutiyaṃ .. biṭa-.. gi
Râme-dêvaraṃ kâlaṃ toḷadu dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi śarvva-na .. raṃ mâḍi (details of gift and its
boundaries) int î-vṛittiyaṃ haḍadu iṭageyaṃ kôṭê-bâgil-vuḍa int î-Sivâlyâ .... Sisapuraṃ mâḍi in î-
lôkadal iren endu sanyâsadiṃ Kaviḷâsake hôda ǁ

div.head:
25
At Chaḷḷakere (Challakere hobli), on a stone near Ujjê-Mallamma’s well.
div.p:
Śâlivâhana-śaka-varushaṅgaḷu 1536 neya ...... saṃvatsarada ...... śu 15 lu śrî-Veṅkaṭapati-
Râya ........ śrî-Baira ...... Nandyapa-Nâyaka-ayanavara komâra Yimmaḍi .... Nâyaka-ayana-
varu .... Chaḷakere-Honna-gauṇḍa Yîcha-gauṇḍa ............ Timma-gauṇḍana ...... Liṅgaya-
gauṇḍa...... ḍu endu .... Chaḷakere-gauḍike tammadu endu Aya-gauṇḍana.... devu endu ga 24..
.... vaṇḍige nilaü ........... Râma-gauṇḍanavara maga Kônêriyapanavarige gauḍikênu ..........
Liṅgi-Seṭiya maga ........ śênabôva-Timmaṇṇa Chaḷakereya sênabôva Aṇṇayana ...... Timmaṇ-
ṇa Chaḷakereya Giriyapana maga Honnôjiya ...... sâmi Liṅgi-Seṭi maga ...... ya-Seṭi Hacha ....
vala-Seti ...... lapaya yint-ivar-ubhayânumatadiṃ baredâta Bommarasayanu .... śâsana śrî śrî..
pûrva Kurubara Honna-gauṇḍana gauḍikey endu ........ modalu-hola mêre naḍadaku Timma-
gauṇḍa .......... Cheḷakere-gauḍike.........

div.head:
26
At Doḍḍêri (same hobli), on a stone to the north of the village.
div.p: Bommasamudrake paḍuva Timmalâpura Bîrê-dêvara grâma amṛitapaḍi parva-bhôgakke koṭa

div.head:
27
At the same village, on a vîrakal in front of the ruined Vîrabhadra temple.
div.p:
.......... Viśvâvasu-saṃvatsarada ...... Adivâradandu śrîmatu Sôma .......... ka Bhimmatan-
ûriṅge dâḷiyan iṭṭu ...... valli Bhimmatanûravara............ Do...ya Bivaliyya........ -Saṭṭiya
Mâḷeya .......... le prâptan âda ǁ

div.head:
32
To the east of the same village, on a stone lying in the Government waste land.
div.p:
śrî-Râmâ Sôbhakṛitu-saṃvatsarada Kârtika-ba 10 lu Sômavâradalû .... râja ...... ri Baramaṇṇa-
Nâyakaru-ayyanavara .. ḷu pârupatyagâra Dâsaṇṇa Aṭavaṇa-Kariyapanavara pârupatyadalû yî-Bhu-
saṇṇanû bandu Hirê-Madure-gauaḍa Râjayyage hâki-koṭṭa mânya bedalu hola ma 1 vandanu â-
chandrârkavâgi putra-pautra-pârampareyalû anubhavisikoṇḍu sukadalû yîhadû yida baradâta Gose-
kerê-śâna .... garasayana .... maga Puṭayana barahâ ǁ

div.head:
33
At Chikka-Madhure (same hobli), on a pillar in front of the Mallêśvara temple.
div.p:
(South side) .... Vîra ...... samasta-Jagatuṅga-Prabhûtavarsha-pratâpâvalôka .... vallaha pṛithivî-
râjyaṃ geyye svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda śrî-pṛithivî-vallabha Siṅgha-.. tta-Râjara priyât-
maja samasta-bhuvana-vikhyâta pañcha-mahâ-sabda śrî-pṛithivî-vallabha paramêśvara Pallavadi-
yaran Nol̤ambaḷge-sâsiramun Nirggunda-nâḍu-mû-nûr̤uman âḷe âtana priya-patni Gavagaṇabbe
Madarikallan âḷuttuṃ Vishṇu-pâdam oluduṃ saṅkrântiyoḷ Prêmâra-Nâga-Mârabe mâḍisida Śivâ-
layakke (details of gift) koṭṭar idarkke sâkshi (here follow names of witnesses and usual final phrases)
(East side) svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda Pallavânvaya śrî-pṛithivî-vallabha Siṅgha-Pôta-
rasara magaḷdir Śrî-mahâ-dêvirarasi Permmânaḍigaḷa arasiyara tâyi Nol̤amba-Mâdave âḷe î-nâḍa
paramêśvara Pallavâdhirâjaran âḷe śrî-Mâdaveyar-âḷ Bisaman-embô mane-magati âta naṭṭa kalake
or-mmattu-keyya koṭṭor adakke vakrar̤ appo (usual imprecatory phrases and names of witnesses)
enibara ubhaya-sammatade .......... ida baradô prajâ-mitra-A.. ḷana Gâva .. Chhara-gâvuṇḍa
praje ittodu okkald ondu kaṭṭaḷaṃ or-mmora bhatta ǁ svasti śrî-Bêvige-Muttarasara maganu
Poleyamman Madarikallan âḷuttuṃ Bisamarasara dêgulake koṭṭa keyyu pannir-mmatta (usual final
phrases) idakke .. sâkshi e .... ûra prajeyuṃ (the stone is broken).

div.head:
34
On the same pillar.
div.p:
(West side) svasty Akâla ...... pṛithivî-vallabha ... svarasya putrêṇa svasti .. masta-Jagatuṅga-
Prabhûtavarsha-pratâpâvalôka-Śrîvallaha pṛithivî-râjyaṃ geyye svasti samasta-bhuvana-vikhyâta
pañcha-mahâ-śabda śrî-pṛithivî-vallabha paramêsvara Pallavâdhirâjan Nol̤ambâḷge-sâsiramun
Nirggunda-nâḍu-mû-nûr̤u Ir̤igalvâḍi-mû-nûr̤u Gaṅgavûra-mûvattu Nelliguṇḍi-panneraḍuman âḷuttu
.. le avara priyâtmajan Pallava-Mallan Madarikallû Toṇḍûrumalchar-panneraḍu Ammavaḷḷi-panneraḍu
Kôl̤ur-ppanneraḍu Gaṅgavura-muvattuman âḷe âtan-ayvir Gavagaṇabbe Madarikalloḷ Gavagaṇêśvaram
embudu Śivâlayama mâḍisida adake koṭṭa pramâṇa (here follow details of gift) ....... (North face) ..
........ vantara sishya Kôl̤ûra Nakharêsvarada Vinîtâtmachâryyara sishyar pParamêśvara ....
.... (usual imprecatory phrases and verses ; and details of further gift).

lg.l: svaṃ dâtuṃ su-mahach chhakyaṃ puṇyam anyasya pâlanaṃ |
dânaṃ vâ pâlanaṃ vâpi dânâchchhrêyô’nupâlanaṃ ǁ
yô’nya-dattâṃ sva-dattâṃ vâ harêd bhûmiṃ narâdhipaḥ |
sa pachyatê’ kshayaṃ kâlaṃ narakêshu kramêṇa tu ǁ

div.head:
35
At Paraśurâmapura (Parasuramapura hobli), on a pillar on the tank bund.
div.p:
svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varshaṃ
* Śaka 1046 = Krôdhi ; Virôdhikṛit = 1054. 1046 neya Virôdhikṛiti-saṃvvatsarada Chaitra-
śu-śrî-Râmanavamî-puṇya-kâladallu śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara Gôbûra Avubaḷêśvara-Dêva-mahâ-
arasugaḷu śrî-Chennakêśvara-dêvara sannidhiyalu tamma tande Avubaḷa-Râjayyagu tamma tây-
Narasammanavarigu puṇyav âgabêk endu Kôṭeyakereya hiriya-kereyoḷage hulumani-kâvalinu biṭṭu
gô-danagaḷu kerevoḷage meyidu nîranu kuḍidu hulu-nîranu darmma-kerênu biṭṭevu (usual im-
precatory phrases) endu kere-kâvalu biṭṭa silê-sâśana

div.head:
36
At the same village, on a dîpamâlê-kambha in front of the Channakêśvara temple.
div.p:
.......................... Nandana-saṃvatsarada nija-Vaiśâka-śuda 5 lu Harati-Ayimaṅgaḷa-staḷa-
da Karmmaiyanavara sisyanu Vaḍavinaya ...... maga Timmoppana ...... maṇṇanu majanada bâvili
Garuḍa-kambada sêveya mâḍi ......

div.head:
37
On the image of Garuḍa, in front of the same temple.
