div.p:
(Right side) śrîman-mahâ-nâykachâryya bâsige-tappuva-nâykara gaṇḍa mar̤e-hokkare kâva Kôṭe-
ker̤eya Abbe-Nâyaṅkara tamma Kâṭeya-Nâyakara maga Malleya-Nâyaṅ (left side) karu Saka-varuśa
1313 neya Prajôtpatya-saṃvachchharada Kârttika-ba 5 Sô śrî-Garuḍa-dêvaru śrî-Hanumanta-
dêvaru yibbaranu mâḍisi pratishṭeyaṃ mâḍisidanu maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî śrî

div.head:
38
At the same village, on a copper plate in possession of Veṅkaṭarâma-Sâstri.
div.p: śrî Sârvâḍêśâ ǁ namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ

svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-saka-varushaṅgaḷu 1660 neya Kâḷayukti-nâma-saṃvatsarada
Mâgha-śu 15 Sômavâra-puṇya-kâladalu Âpastamba-sûtra-Âtrêya-gôtrôdbhavar âda śrîman-mahâ-
nâyakâchâryarâda Harati-Niḍagalu-Yimmaḍi-Hoṭeṇṇa-Nâyakaraiyanavara prapautrar âda vîra-
Hoṭeṇṇa-Nâyakaraiyanavara pautrarâda vîra-Timmaṇṇa-Nâyakaraiyanavara putrar âda Harati-Niḍa-
galu-Hoṭeṇṇa-Nâyakaraiyanavaru Âpastamba-sutrar âda Yaju-śâkhâdhyâyigaḷ âda Haritasa-gôtrôd-
bhavar âda Ayyaṇâvadhânigaḷa prapautrar âda Yallâvadhânigaḷa pautrar âda Veṅgâvadhânigaḷa putrar
âda Apâvadhânigaḷavarige sûrya-sômôparâga-puṇya-kâladalu namma mâtâ-pitṛigaḷige ananta-sukṛita
akshaya-puṇya-lôka prâptav âgabêk endu sa-hiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvakavâgi koṭanthâ agrahâr-
ada dâna-śâsanada kramav ent endare namma Niḍagalu-durgake saluvantâ Maṅgaḷavâḍada grâmada
hôbaḷiyalu Buḍusugoṇḍanahaḷiy emba grâmavannu agrahâra mâḍi sarvamânya ǁ

yamba dharma-śâstra-prakâradali namma mâtâ-pitṛigaḷige puṇyavâgi namma kulada svâmi Sârvâḍ-
êśvarage arpitavâgi namma kulada svâmi Vêṅkaṭêśvarage arpitvâgi koṭanthâ dâna agrahâradali
nimma putra-pautra-pâramparyadalu nimma sva-vṛittiyalu â-chandrârka-sthâyigaḷâgi namage âśîrv-
âda-mâḍikoṇḍu sukhadali anubhavsi-koṇḍu yihadu yandu baraśi-koṭa dâna-śâsana sahi (usual final
verses) Harihara-bhakta
* Written in the seal.

div.head:
39
At Kôṭegere (same hobli), on a vîrakal in the Ajjanaguḍi.
div.p: (Nâgari characters).

śubham astu svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka 1474 neya Paridhâvi-saṃvatsarada Phalguṇa-
śuddha 5 yalu śrîmatu Kôṭekereya gauḍara Baira-gauṇḍana Bomma-gauṇḍana maga Bîra-gauṇḍana
makaḷu Keñcha-gauṇḍa-Kera-gauṇḍagaḷu namm-aṇṇa Belali-gauṇḍage .... vâgi .. ralâgi vîra-
svargav âgabê ...... vîra-galla nilapidake ......

div.head:
40
At Chauḷûru (same hobli), on a stone in the paṭêl’s land, behind the tank-bund.
div.p:
svasti śrîmat-Paṇḍita-jîyyara makkaḷ Viḷḷêśvara-jîyyar paḍuvaṇa tûbaṃ mâḍisi î-bayala bittuvaṭama
(back) biṭṭar idakke al̤ipidava î-ker̤ayan aḷava idaṃ paḍedu koṭṭa Nâgayya

div.head:
41
At Gaurasamudra (same hobli), on a stone in Tirakappa’s dry land.
div.p:
Sureya-Nâyakana ûra-kâḷagadali hinde hatti ku[du]reya echchu kaṭharade tividaru Sômana-Bommeya-
Nâyakana makkaḷu Mâḷeya-Bommayaṅgaḷu bîru-galu ........

div.head:
42
On another stone lying in the same dry land.
div.p:
...Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1325 neya Svabhânu-saṃvatsarada Âshâḍa-ba 1 Guruvâradalu śrîma tu
śrîman-mahâ-nâyaṅkâchâryya yeḍada-kâla châchi balada-kâla sâmbrâṇi-raṇava kaṇḍu mana sanduṃ
nâyakara gaṇḍa para-daḷa-vibhâḍa para-sênâ-Bhayirava Pulusumâmiḍiya Chanda-bôvana Kâme-Nâyak-
ana maga Chennappanu tanna voḍeyana munde Nâgârjunana-kôṭeya.. li sama[ra-]raṅgadali kâdi mera-
du dêvalôkadali dêvara pâdakke sandan endu Chanda-bôvana tamma Nâyakanu tanna maga Chenn-
appana hesarinali vîra-stambava pratishṭeya nilisi yî-kambava mâḍida Bôgôjaṅge Pulusumâmiḍiya
ker̤eya .. koṭṭhali ..............

div.head:
43
At Mahadêvapura (same hobli), on a stone in the eastern wall of the Vîrabhadra temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêsvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭ-
ârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam
uttarôttarâbhivṛi[ddhi-prrvar]ttamânam â-chandrârkka-târam-baraṃ saluttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpa-
jîvi svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Or̤eyûra-pura-varâdhîśvara Kali-
kâla-....Chôḷa-kuḷâmbara-[dyumaṇi] saṃyakta-chûḍâmaṇi kadana-prachaṇ ḍan udaya-mârttaṇḍaṃ Tu-
hinakara-vaṃśôdbhavaṃ taruṇa-kâminî-jana-Manôbhavâ Karṇâṭî-karṇṇa-ratna-mêkhaḷâḷaṅkâra Sa-
rasvatî-maṇi-hâra vibudha-jana-mitra Kâśyapa-gôtra Roddada gôva khaḷga-Sahadêva nigaḷaṅka-malla
bhîtaraṃ kolla svasti śrîmat-Sarvvadhâri-saṃvatsarada Śrâvaṇa-suddha 5 Bṛihaspativâradandu śrî-
man-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Tribhuvanamalla-Mali-Dêva-Chôḷa-mahârâjaru bhaṇḍâri-Kêtaṇage Maṅ-
gapôṭiyalu mûḷiga-vṛittiyâgi koṭṭa-kramav ent endaḍe Maṅgapôṭiya ker̤eya keḷage khaṇḍuga hanneraḍu
tôṭa-sthala khaṇḍugaṃ mûr̤u Râ.. ralu khaṇḍugav eraḍu Hanni-mattara keyi Iṇḍikeya gaddey appuda-
nu bhaṇḍâri-Kêtaṇana makkaḷu-makkaḷu-taradal umbantâgi sarvva-bâdhâ-parihârav âgi ây-agrahârada
Brâhmaṇa-vṛittiy-oḷagaṇa vṛittiy-âgi koṭive î-vṛittiyan â-chandrârkka-târam-bara bhaṇḍâri-Kêtaṇa[na]
makkaḷu-makkaḷu-tara[da]l umbanu (usual final phrases) dêvarige biṭṭa gadde khaṇḍugav eraḍu tôṭa-
staḷad kamba nûr̤ur̤alu khaṇḍu ondu nâlku mattaru kayi-gâṅadali ondu ǁ

div.head:
45
At Kâmasamudra (same hobli), on a stone lying near the Mailâra-dêva temple.
div.p:
svasti śubham astu ǁ ........ bhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka .......... 1475 neya Pramâdîcha-saṃ-
vatsara...... śrîmatu Kâmasamudra ...... dali gauḍanu koṭṭa kânâchiya śâsana Kâmasamudrada..
...... dêvara pûjeyanu Kariyapana maga ...... koṭa sambanda Mailâra-dêvarige saluva kâṇâchi-
ker̤eya keḷage... Vîrabhadra-dêvara mânyada hoṅge saluva gade kha 13 bedalu kha......nada ken-nela-
svâmyava.... danu anubhavisikoṇḍu Mai .... dêvara pûjê-dhûpa-dîpa-naivêdya-muntâda dêvatâ-pûje-
yanu .... â-chandrârkka-stâyigaḷ âgi putra-pautra-pâramparey â .... sukhadali anubhavisûdû endu
Nâgi-Dêvana ..... yapa Kariyapana maga Malla-goravage koṭṭa silâ-śâsanaû .... baredâta sênabôva
Mallarasanu ǁ

div.head:
46
At the same village, on a stone to the right of the Vîrabhadra temple.
div.p:
svasti śrî.... jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varuśaṅgaḷu sâ 1468 neya Parâbhava-saṃvachharada
Jêshṭa-ba 13 Gu-dalu śrîmanu-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara vîra-pratâpa Sadâsiva-mahârâyaru
pṛithvî-râjyaṃ gaiüttiralu śrî .......... kumâra-Nâyaka ........ lli râjya ...... Kâmasamudra
........ dêvarige sarvvamânya...... ya dharmma . saṇa Baiyapa-Nâyaka............ yaka-âyya-
navarigu ka 50 ...... 5 Nâyaka-ayyanavarigû ...... du Vîrabhadra-dêvara amrita-paḍige naiyi.....
ke Kâmasamudrada (4 lines gone) Kâmasamudrada kâlvê-keḷage .............. 3 î-sarvvamânya
.. âyi-gu..........â-chandrârkkav âgi sarvvamânyadali naḍasuvad âgi (usual final phrases) śubham
astu | Timmaṇa-Nâyakaru Koṇḍaṇa-Nâyakaru tamma tandegaḷige puṇyav âgabêk endu Vîrabhadra-
dêvarige sarvvamânyav âgi biṭṭu koṭṭa hola .... yake...... darmma-śasana-kallu śrî

div.head:
47
On a second stone.
div.p:
śubham astu svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâha-śakha-(varuśaka) varshaṅgaḷû 1480 neya Kâḷâyukti-
saṃvatsarada Chayitra-śudha 7 lû śrîmad-râjâdhirâja râja-paramêsvara vîra-pratâpa Sadâśiva-mahâ-
râyaru pṛithvî-râjyaṃ gaiütiralû Baipa-Nâyakara kumâra Krushṇapa-Nâya-ayanavarige puṇyav âga-
bêkendu śrîmanu-mahâ-nâyakâchârya bhâśege tappuva nâyakara gaṇḍa mare-hokare kâva
Kunduru ... ya Koṇḍaṇa-Nayara komâra Tirumala-Nâyakaru Kâmasamudrada kererya modạlu-gade
hodida paḍuvalu mûgaḷa.. -bâḷa gadenu sôma-sûrya-garuṇa-puṇya-kâladalu Vîrabhadra-dêvara amru-
tapaḍige koṭeü (usual final phrases) yendu koṭa silâ-sâsanâ ǁ ....

div.head:
54
At Matsyasamudra (same hobli), on a stone lying in the Bîrêdêvara-gudra.
div.p: śubham astu | namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ

svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1481 neya Siddhârtthi-saṃvatsarada nija-
Âśvîja-śu 10 lû śrîmatu Hêmâdri-mahâ-Mêruvina dakshiṇa-dig-bhâga Jambudvîpa-laksha-ipataidu-
sâvira-yôjanada madhyad â-Kuntaḷa-dêśâdhipatyake saluva Tuṅgabhadrâ-tîradiṃ Pampâ-pati srî-
Virûpâkshana nirûpadiṃ Vidyâraṇyara nâmadhêyadiṃ Harihara-Râyaru kaṭṭisi pra .... yâgi ninta
Vidyânagarî-siṃhâsanake karttar âda śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-
Sadâsiva-Dêva-mahârâyaru sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ dharmma-pratipâlaneiṃ sukha-râjyaṃ geiutt-
iralu śrîmanu-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvar Râma-Râju Tirumalarâjai-Dêva-mahâ-arasugaḷa kâryyake karttar
âda śrîman-mahâ-.. kshaṇa-gaṇa-prajeg adhîśar âda | Mukkaṇa-mûrtiyoḷu sâlôkya-saurûpya Aṅga-Vaṅ-
ga-dêśada arasugaḷa koḷâhaḷa Nâga-lôka-Nâga-kannikâ-sahôdara bilu-vidyâ-prachaṇḍa kaḍu-vêṇṭe-kâra
kapaṭav-ilada Bêḍa Tiruvâḷa-giri-dêva . nâdya-nilaya Sivarâtrê-sthira-santôshi munnûra-aivatu-gôtrada
eṇṭu-nûra-aivatu manneyar âda...pavakki...niṃ raṇa-kaṭhâri-râya chaluvara gaṇḍa mare-hokara kâva
mârântara koluva bhâshege-tappuva-nâyakara gaṇḍa Kôṭekereya Abbeya-Nâyaka-Bomme-Nâyakara-
vaṃśôdbhavar âda Haratiya-Hiriyoḍeyara Chikapa-Nâyakara komâra Hoṭeṇṇa-Nâyakaru Kâśyapa-gô-
trada Bôdhâyana-sûtrada Yaju-śâkheya Hampeya śrî-Virûpâksha-dêvara stânâpati Liṅgappaygaḷa mak-
kaḷu Veṅkaṭayyage śrî-Virûpâksha-dêvara nitya-naivêdya-nandâ-dîptigâgi koṭṭa bhû-dânada grâma-śîlâ-
śâsanada kramav ent endare śrîmanu-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara Râma-Râju-Tirumalarâjai-Dêva-mahâ-
arasugaḷu namage amara-mâgaṇige pâlisida Râyadurgada râjyada Kêṭeker̤eya vêṇṭeyake saluva
Doḍêri-sîmeya Madvasamudrada staḷada Chaṭiyakambhad-oḷagaṇa Chitagoṇḍanahaḷḷiya grâmavanû
sadya-parichchhêdavâgi śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâryya Haratiya Hoṭṭaṇa-Nâyakaru Kâsyapa-gôtrada
Bôdhâyana-sûtrada Yajuś-śâkheya Hampeya śrî-Virû[pâ]ksha-dêvara stânâpati Liṅgapagaḷa makaḷu
Veṅkaṭâdrige śrî-Virûpâksha-liṅgana nayivêdya-nandâ-dîptige adhika-Âśvîja-śu 15 sômôparâga-puṇya-
kâladalû Tuṅgabhadrâ-tîradalu sa-hiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvvakav âgi dhâreyan eradu
koṭṭevâgi â-Chittagoṇḍanahaḷiya grâmake saluva chatus-sîmeya voḷagâda grihârâma-kshêtra-nidhi-
nikshêpa-jala-pâshâṇa-akshîṇi-âgâmi-siddha-sâdhyaṅgaḷ emba ashṭa-bhôga-têja-svâmya-sarvvôtpatti-
samasta-baḷi-sahitavâgi (here follow particulars of donee, as above) śrî-Virûpâksha-dêvar̤ige naivêdya-nan-
dâ-dîptigâgi śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâryya Haratiya Hoṭaṇa-Nâyakarû tri-vâchaü dhâreyan eradu
koṭevâgi nîü nimma putra-pautra-pârampareyâgi â-chandrârkka-sthâyigaḷâgi sukhadallû anubhavi-
suüdu endu hâkisida naivêdya-nandâ-dîptiya dharmma-silâ-śâsana (usual final verses).

div.head:
56
At the same village, on a vîrakal in front of the Îśvara temple.
div.p:
vasti śrî Aṇṇeya pṛitivî-râjyaṃ geytuvire Dar̤ivinada Kayta Emmayyana taleya koṇḍîn endu ûr-
al̤evina pesurade yul̤chuvalli ........ da Kaytana ... dal̤avan ir̤iduvin endu Râjapura .... kavayaroḷa
.... ûra gajava ......

div.head:
57
At the same village, on a stone in Chaṭlayya’s kapile land.

lg.l: śubham astu ǁ namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ

div.p:
...... Piṅgaḷa-saṃvatsarada Srâvaṇa-śu 15 lu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-
pratâpa śrîmatu ................ kâryake kartar âda śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara Râma-Râja-Tiru-
malarâja .............. Haratiya ..............

div.head:
58
At Gôśîkere (same hobli), on a stone in the village gate.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varushaṅgaḷige saluva 1633 nê Khara-nâma-saṃvatsarada
Kârtîka-śu 10 lu śrîman-mahâ-Kâmageti-Kastûri-Medekere-Baramaṇṇa-Nâyakaraiyana apaṇeyalu
bokasta Timmapana pârupatyadalu Gôsîkere.. Jaladhi-gauḍana maga Chikkaṇṇa-gauḍa mâḍista ......
ku kôṭê kottaḷa agaḷu ........

div.head:
59
At the same village, on a stone behind the Mailâra-dêva temple.
div.p:
śrîmatu Naḷa-saṃvatsarada Kârtika-ba 10 lu śrîman .. nâyakâchârya Harattiya Timmaṇa-Nâyakaru
akasâle-Nâgapana maga Timmaṇṇage koṭadu Boka .... mânya ...... ḍage .... śâsana śrî śrî

div.head: HIRIYÛR TALUQ.

1
At Aimaṅgaḷa, (Aimaṅgaḷa-hobli), on a vîrakal in front of the Kambhada-dêva temple in the old fort.
div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda Pallavânvaya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha Pallava-kula-tilaka êka-
vâkyam Ir̤iva-Nol̤amba śrîmad-Ulipayyana maga Nanni-Noḷambana biṭṭa Brahma-dêyam Ayyapa-
maṅgala Sippasintey arddha-baḷadoḷ bâḷuttire svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâman-
tâdhipati śrîmat-Pañchâla-Dêvana perggeḍe Guṇḍayyaṃ Paduvagarey-aynûr̤ar̤a bhôga-pati Ayyapa-
maṅgaḷamaṃ pûrvva-maryyâde dappi akramaṃ geyye svasti Śaka-nṛipa-kâlâtîta-saṃvatsarada
śataṅgaḷ eṇtu-nûra tombhattêl̤aneya Yuva-saṃvatsarada Kârttika-mâsada suddhaikâdaśî-Sôma-
vâradandu Śrîvatsa-gôtraṃ yûr-oḍeya Mâramayyana maga Êchayyan ir̤idu koṇḍu perggaḍe
Guṇḍayyaṅge kshame-goṭṭa stitiy ent endoḍe Ayyapamaṅgaḷada pûrvva-maryyâdeya baḷanaṃ biṭṭu
koṭṭaṃ

div.head:
3
At same village, on a stone near a tamarind tree in the fort.
div.p:
śrîmatu lôka-prasiddha Aralagôna-dêvara nija-nâma Kâśi-Śivaliṅga-dêvaru ajâta-viraktan â....
.. raṇa-sat-purushar âda viraktrig allade .......... lladu yî-maṭha nannadu tannad end âḍuv-
avara bâyoḷige .............. yidu virakta-maṭhave yandu Aimaṅgalada gauḍa-sênabôva-nâyaka
pârapatyagâra maṭha mane jaṅgama-dêvaru seṭṭi mahâ-nâḍu-praje-muntâdavara madhyadali shaḍ-
aṅga-liṅga-samyôgânubhâva-chatuḥ-patra-kañjântarâḷâtta liṅga-nistaraṅga-yukta mahânubhâva-
mûrtti Râchavaṭṭi-dêvaru nirnayamâḍi Muddu-Vîraṇṇa-Seṭṭi mahâ-nâḍininda mûla-vi ...... hosa-
tâgi mâḍisidaru Aimaṅgaḷadalli vokkaḷa Kallakuṇṭeyalli yim-baḷa Aralagônalli gadde yarê-kennela ǁ
(usual final verse) Ânanda-saṃvatsarada Chaitra-mâsada saptamî-Sukravârada ....

div.head:
6
At Hemaḍâḷu, (same hobli), on a stone in the Basavaṇṇa temple.
div.p:
śrîmad-râjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa-śrî-vîra-Veṅkaṭapati-Dêva-mahârâyaru sukha-
dim pṛithvî-saṃrâjya gaiüttiha-samayadalu Śâlivâhana-saka-varusha 1514 neya Nandana-saṃ-
vatsarada adhika-Âshâḍha-śu 1 lu śrîmaṃ maha-pürvâchârya râya-dûshakara gaṇḍa mânava-
Mahâdêva śrî-Śâravâḍa Yîśvaraiyagaḷu | â-Yîśvaraiyagaḷa komâra Chenna-Dûḷêśvaraiyagaḷu | â-
Dûḷêśvaraiyagaḷa komâra Chenna-Hoṭṭêśvaraiyagaḷu | â-Hoṭṭêśvaraiyagaḷa komâra Chenna-Basavêśva-
raiyagaḷu â-Basavêśvaraiyagaḷa komâra Chenna-Keñchêśvaraiyagaḷu â-Keñchêśvaraiyagaḷa komâra
Chenna-Yimmaḍi-Basavaṇṇoḍeyara komâru Chenna-Keñcha-Alamboḍeyaru yâ-Alaṇṇoḍeyara komâra
Keñcha-Yisarappa-voḍeyaru â-Keñcha-Yisarappa-voḍeyara komâra Chenna-Hoṭṭe-Yîśvaraiyagaḷa śish-
yaru makkaḷu | śrîman-mahâ-nâyaṅkâchâriya bhâshege-tappuva-nâyakara gaṇḍa | mare-hokkara kâva |
Kôṭekereya Kibbana Kâmi-Nâyakara komârru Abi-Nâyakaru komâra Kâmi-Nâyakaru | â-Kâmi-
Nâyakara komâra Guḍḍada Brahma-Nâyakaru | â-Brahma-Nâyakara komâra Hoṭṭeṇṇa-Nâyakaru â-
Hoṭṭeṇṇa-Nâyakara komâra Yimmaḍi Bîraṇṇa-Nâyaka Yimmaḍi-Brîraṇṇa-Nâyakara komâra Yîśvara-
Dêvi-Nâyakaru â-Yîsvara-Dêvi-Nâyakara komâra Basavi-Nâyakaru â-Basavi-Nâyakara komâraru
Mummaḍi-Brahma-Nâyakaru | â-Mummaḍi-Brahma-Nâyakara komâra dore Haratiya Yîśvara-Dûḷ-
appa-Nâyaka â-Dûḷappa-Nâyakara komârru Duṇḍapa-Nâyakaru â-Duṇḍappa-Nâyakara komâru
Lakshmîpati-Nâyakaru | yî-Lakshmîpati-Nâyaka-komâra Haratiya Chikka-Raṅgappa-Nâyakaru |
tamma śrî-guru Hoṭṭe-Yîśvaraiyagaḷa simhâsanada maṭakke amṛita-bhôgapaḍige salabêkendu nâvu
namma tri-karaṇa-śuddhavâgi dhârâ-pûrvakadinda koṭṭa dâna-paṭṭeya kramav ent endare | namma
nâyakatanakke saluva Râyadurgada vêṇṭeyake saluva Haratiya-sthaḷadoḷagaṇa Hemmaḍihâḷ emba
grâmavannu Hoṭe-Îśvaraiyagaḷa śrîpâdaṅgaḷige dharmma śâsanavâgi arpisidevu â-Hemmaḍihâḷa-
grâmada chatus-sîmeyoḷagâda kere kôṭe kaṭṭê kâluve erekavaru goḍugeyalu aṇe achchukaṭṭu kâḍâr-
ambha bîḷaḍavi taru tṛina modalâgi â-grâmadali yiha dâya-aḷuü-âyâya.... trike-nidhi-nikshêpa-jala-
pâshâṇa-yakshîṇi-âgami-siddha-sâdhyaṅgaḷ emba ashṭa-bhôga-têjas-svâmyav-oḷagâgi â-Hemmaḍihâḷa
grâmavanu tamma śrî-va.... â-Hoṭe-Îśvarayagaḷa pâdakke ...... arpisidevu | yî-dharma śâsanada
puravargakke tamma vaṃśadali âvan obban âdaru pararu âvan obbanâdaru âgali â-Hemmaḍihâḷ
emba purada grâmadali adara sîmeyalli âvadu-gondakke aḷupi .... (usual imprecatory phrases) int
appu dharma-śâsanakke pûrvadalli uṇṭâda granthârthadalli anukûlisidantha su-kṛityavanu apahari-
sida pâtakavanu â-ślôkada arthavanu vichârisikoṇḍu naḍisuvudu (usual final verses)..............

div.head:
7
At Pâlavvanahaḷḷi, (same hobli), on a stone in the Hasankhân’s field.
div.p:
śrîmatu Piṅgaḷa-saṃvatsarada Jêshṭa-śu 5 Budhavâ .. śrîmatu râja-śrî Timmaḷa-Nâyakaravarige
vandu avântra baralikkâgi î-sîmêli kivuḍa-Mâdayanavara aṇṇa-tammagaḷa karekaḷivi yî-maliḍi kâyal-
andare kâdi ........ mechige yî-dore-vûḷigada Mâḷa-Seṭi (others named) bôvara ...... visi vuḍugare-
gaḷu mâḍi jaya-jaya annisi koḍisida bhûmi yidake hôgi ............ (left side) Aksâlêra Mudaiya

div.head:
13
At Vaddikere, (same hobli), on a stone at the boundary of Erahaḷḷi.
div.p:
svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya Śâlivâhana-śaka-varuśaṅgaḷu 1542 neya Raüdri-saṃvatsrada Bhâdrapada-
śu 7 ya Śukravâradalu śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchârya bâśege-tappuva-nâyakara gaṇḍa mare-vokara
kâva .............. Raṅgappa-Nâyakanu .................. ra-râjya-.......... uttiralu śrîman-
mahâ-nâyakâchâryarâda ........ grâmada nâḍa praje muntâdavara bâraki ........ baḷi grâmada
gauḍa âvina-Bôra-gauṇḍana maga Sêna-gaüda â-Sêna-gauṇḍana makkaḷu Hiriya-Giriya ........
goṇḍa-gauḍagaḷigu Ayimaṅgaḷada-grâmake saluva Vadikereya-gauḍa Mâḷi .... kana maga Chika ..
.............. mere saha ................ Nâyakanu gauḍa-sênabôvada Agimaṅgaḷada-grâmava
............ yanu gauḍa-sênabôvaru tamma chaugâ .... vake sasana baradu ubhaya-sammathadi
anu .... Giriya-goṇḍage ............ rudrâksheya (rest effaced).

div.head:
14
At Mallappanahaḷḷi, (same hobli), on a stone in Timma’s field at the boundary of Karivôbanahaḷli.
div.p:
svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâ ...... ka-varuśa 1365 neya Dundubhi-saṃvatsarada Asvîja-su
14 A śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-pâramêsvara ari-râya-vibhâḍha chatus-samudrâdhipati śrî-vîra-
Bukka-Râyana kumâra Harihara-Râyaru Vijayanagarada paṭṭaṇadoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-prasaṅgadiṃ
râjyaṃ geyuttidali śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâryya mar̤e-vokkara kâva bhâsege-tappuva-nâyakara
gaṇḍa Koḍakeya Âdeya-Nâykara makkaḷu Kâmeya-Nâykaru Bommeya-Nâyakaru avara heggaḍe
.. yaṇṇaṅgaḷu Aṅkasamudra-nâḍa stiravâgi ...... tamma Haratige ................saṃvâdav âdali
yî...yarugaḷ ar̤itu nâlku dêsada chaügâtiyava ...... Haratiya .... goṇḍu ............ goṇḍa
heṇḍeya hottu naḍada sâsana maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî śrî yî-sâsanava barada Mâyôja â-Chavuḍa-
gaṭṭada gaüḍage koḍasidake .... Bala-gaüḍa ....

div.head:
16
At Yarabahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone in Bhûtapurada Giriyaṇṇa’s field.
div.p:
śrîmatu Krôdhana-saṃvatsarada Bhâdrapada-su 10 Â-dandu | śrîmutu pratâpa-chakravartti Hôśaṇa-
śrî-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvarsara śrîmanu-mahâ-pradhânaṃ Bêbeya-daṇṇâykaru Karaḍiker̤eya Peruma-
gaüḍana magaṃ Nâgeya-nâykaṅge koṭṭa nettaru-goḍagiya kramav ent endaḍe Kambala-Dêvanu
Huḷi-er̤an ir̤idu hôhali Bêbeya-daṇṇâ[ya]karu huyelâ bandudaṃ Moḷala-munde kâdidali â-Nâge [ya-nâ]-
ykana tamma Jakkeya-Nâykanu â-kâḷadali kâdi sameya-mâḍi bidan âgi Nâgeya-nâykaṅge koṭṭa
nettaru-koḍagi (here follow details) chandra-sûrir uḷḷannakaṃ (usual imprecatory phrases).

div.head:
17
At Harati (same hobli), on a stone north of the Vîrabhadra temple.
div.p:
.................... śrîmanu-mahâ-Mallikârjuna-dêvara ............ śrîpâda-padmaṅgaḷige mukya
...... śrî-Vîraśaiva ........ -Bhikshâvati-ayyanavaru tamma guru-svâmi Sidha-Bikshâvatige puṇyav
âgal endu Haratiya Vîrabhadra-dêvara Hara-Mandara-Parvata-dêvarige paḍige koṭṭa bhikshâ
Harati Kari-voḍêra maga Vîraṇṇa-vodêrige nirûpava koṭṭu hâkisida sâsana Sidha-Bhikshâvati tamma
kṛipeya pâlisida dâna-pratishṭege (usual imprecatory phrases.)....................

div.head:
18
At the same village, on a stone in Maṭhada Prabhayya’s field.
div.p:
Vibhava-saṃvatsarada Jêshṭa-śu 1 Maṃ śrîmanu-mahârâja Ballâḷa-Râya sukha-râjya geyvalli śrîmanu-
mahâ-pradhânaṃ Bêbeya-daṇṇâykara besadiṃ Alatoṭiya Kanneya-Nâyakanu Tavanidhiya Nâga-gav-
uḍaṅge Keṇḍanaker̤eya chatus-sîme-voḷagâgi koṭṭa sarbba-koḍagi maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî

div.head:
19
At the same village, on stone pieces in Śidda-Nâyaka’s field near the tank bed.
div.p:
.............. Chândra-mânê ............................ svasti śrî jayâ .. daya-Śâlivâ-
hana-........ 1626 ne Târaṇa-saṃva...... da Mâgha-śuddha 5 .......... râja-śrî-Ha ........
Aparâjarsaiyanavaru Harati-Bôti-Channanu Harati-muttigeyalu vû.. horaṭu taḷe-mêle biddu jagaḷadali
mṛitavâgalâge koṭa rakta-koḍige-mânyada holavannu yi .... vobanu anubhavisikombadu

div.head:
22
At Uppârahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone in Patel Raṅgaṇṇa’s field.
div.p:
śubham astu | svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varushaṅgaḷu 1476 ne Ânanda-saṃvatsarada
nija-Âshâḍha-śu 12 Gu lu | śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa-Sadâśiva-Râya-
mahârâyaru Vidyânagaradalu pṛithvî-râjyaṃ gaiyuttaṃ yiralu Ambaliger̤eya śrî-Tiruveṅgaḷanâtha-
dêvarige Kâśyapa-gôtrada Âpastamba-sûtrada Yajuś-śâkhegaḷâda śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara a-
prati(ka)malla Sûrya-vamśâdhîśvarar âda Manubôla-Aübhaḷa-Râjagaḷa pautraru Veṅgaḷa-Râjagaḷa put-
raru Pâpai-Dêva-Chôḷa-mahâ-arasugaḷu śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara Râma-Râju-Viṭhalai-Dêva-mahâ-
arasugaḷa komâraru Tirumala-Râjagaḷu tamage vumbaḷiyâgi nilisida Râyadurgada râjyada Gôsiker̤eya-
nâḍoḷagaṇa Haratti-staḷakke saluva Uparikarahaḷḷige prati-nâmavâda Veṅgaḷâpurav emba grâmava-
nu tamma tandegu Veṅgaḷa-Râjagaḷige puṇyav âgalendu â-grâmake saluva chatus-sîmevoḷagaṇa
ashṭa-bhôga-têjas-svâmyavanu | â-grâmada sthaḷa-suṅkavanu | â-grâmada hulu-banni rokkava sahav
âgi dhâren er̤adu â-chandrârka-sthâyi âgi .......... hâge Ambaliger̤eya ûra Tiruveṅgaḷanâtha-
dêvarige Veṅgaḷâpurada grâmavanu samarpisteü ǁ (usual final verse).

div.head:
23
At Siḍlaiyanakôṭe (same hobli), on a stone in the Brahma-dêva temple.
div.p:
śubham astu Sâlivâhana-śaka-varuśa sâvirada ayivatta yeṇṭaneya
* Plavaṅga = 1590 ; 1058 = Naḷa. Plavaṅga-saṃvachchharada Phâl-
guṇa-śudha 10 lu śrîmatu Siḍulayanakôṭe-Kâṇâchiya-Gaüḍugaḷu kaṭṭisida Brahma-dêvaru yî-guḍiya
katisidanthavaru Siḍulayanakôṭada Gauḍajana mommaga Siriya-Goṇḍa Chikayanu avara chika-
apa...... Lakayanu yî-guḍiya kelasavanu kalukuṭika Pôlôjanu â-chandrârka-stâyiyâgi yirali

div.head:
25
At the same village, on a stone in Vâlêkâra-Sidda’s field.
div.p:
śubham astu ...... yâbhyudaya ........ śaka .... 1496......saṃvatsarada ... kha-śu 15..... rada-
lu śrîmatu Haratiya sthaḷakke saluva Siḍalayanakôṭada .. paśchima-bhâgada ke ...... bahu-kâla-
da .... ḍadu .... bannapa .... salâgi Haratiya staḷada cha ...... grâmada gauḍa-sênabôvaru
prajegaḷu śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchârya bhâśege-tappuva-nâyakara gaṇḍa mare-hokara kâva Haratiya
Padaṇa-Nâyakarige binnhaṃ mâḍi â-ker̤eyanu kaṭisi nammagaḷa â-ker̤eya keḷage ...... kala-tûbina
...... kaṭisi (rest effaced).

div.head:
26
At Bidarakere (same hobli), on a stone in front of the Doḍḍa Hanumanta temple.
div.p:
śubham astu Sarvajitu-saṃvatsarada Vayiśâkha-śu 15 lu śrîmatu Harati guru Chikapana maga Chika-
Sidapanu Bêḍarahaḷḷi-Mariyaṇṇanu Giriyaṇa ........ Râjayana maga Kônapage koṭṭa śâsana Bidara-
kere Hanumanta-dêvaranu pûje-mâḍikoṇḍu yidake banda svâstinu ûṭamâḍi sukadali yihadu modalu-
pûje mâḍikoṇḍu yidake (rest effaced).

div.head:
27
At the same place, on a second stone.
div.p:
Kôṭada gauḍaru Baudânya-saṃvatsarada Pusya-ba 1 lu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râjeśrî Hañchcha-
Saṭi ...... kâryake kartarâda Chikka-Timmaṇa .. ḍa-gaüḍanu Bidirakere-Hanumanta-dêvarige ..
..... koṭṭa gadde hola .............. vanu nâü koṭeü ........................

div.head:
28
At Dharmapura (Dharmapura hobli), on a stone in front of the Police Station.
div.p: ôṃ namaḥ Śântinâthâya ǁ

svasti śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara pûrva-dakshiṇa-paśchima-samudrâdhipati Hindû-
râya-Suratrâṇa bhâshege-tappuva-râyara gaṇḍa śrîmat-pratâpa-chakravarti śrî-vîra-Dêva-Râya-
mahârâyaru Vijayânagarada nelevîḍinoḷ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttum ire

lg.l: âdarisale Niḍugalla-ma- | hâ-durggaman âḷdan osedu Gôpa- chamüpaṃ chamûpaṃ ǁ

div.p: ...... Gôpaṇana yaśas-sura-bhûjada bîja-râjiy andadin (rest effaced).

div.head:
29
At the same village, on a stone in the Śânabôga Subbarâyappa’s wet-land.
div.p:
..... 1466 neya Krôdhi-saṃvachharada Kârtika-suddha 1 dalu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramê-
śvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa-Sadâśiva-Dêva-mahârâyara nirûpadinda śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêsvara Râma-
Râjayya Viṭhalêśvara-Dêva-mahâ-arasugaḷu nâyindarige koṭa śâśana.......... nimage...... nâluku
bêḍige .. nu uṇṭâdanû nâü nimage sarva-(back) ........ (usual imprecatory phrases). (left side) yî-
......vanu pûrva-mariyâde anubhavisuvudu śrî-Virûpâksha.

div.head:
30
At the same village, on a vîrakal in Subbaṇṇa’s field below the tank.
div.p:
svasti śrîmanu-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara Tribhuvanamalla bhuja-baḷa ........ Dêva-Chôḷa-mahârâjara
vaṃśâvatâra daḷavâya .... vaṇa-heggaḍeya aḷiya Mârasiṅga-heggaḍeya .. ga .. sa-veggade ......
.. baḍivârada Kasavaḍiya kôṭeya........................ Dêva-Chôḷa-mahârâjaru kâdidali ....
Bûvaṇa-heggaḍe Bêgeya-sâhaṇiya dhâḷiya kudureya kâḷega kiḍivi sara-lôka-prâpta

div.head:
31
At the same village, on a vîrakal in Horakere-Gauḍa’s field.
div.p:
Saka-kâlaṃ eṇṭunûr̤a tombatta nâlkaneya Prajâpati-saṃvatsaraṃ pravartise Bhṛiṅga-gâvuṇḍana
marmmaṃ Gâvuṇḍayyana kallu

div.head:
33
At Sakhre (same hobli), on a stone in the tank bund.
div.p:
svasti śrî Mahêndraṃ pṛithuvî-râjyaṃ geye Mar̤ugar̤eyar Chittappa ker̤eyaṅ kaṭṭisi (here follow-details
& usual imprecatory phrases).

div.head:
34
At Vêṇukalluguḍḍa (same hobli), an a stone in front of the Basavaṇṇa temple.
div.p:
śubham astu svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varushaṅgaḷu 1475 neya Pramâdîcha-saṃ-
vatsa...... 5 lu śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêsvara ......Ayaṇa-Vîraliṅga-Dêvaru................ śrîman-mahâ-
maṇḍalêsvara (4 lines effaced) haḷḷigaḷa gaüḍugaḷu-muntâda ........ muntâdavaru Gôsiker̤eya
Liṅgada-Vîrayana makaḷu Ayana-Madakareliṅga-Vîraya (back) ge koṭa kalina sâśanada kramav ent
endare nâü nimage koḍu-vartane varusha-varushaṅgaḷu varusha 1 ke tiṅgaḷu 12 ke Guḍḍada-sîmege
saluva (here follow details) yishṭanu nînu kâṇâchiyâgi mâḍikoṇḍu sukhadalu yihadu yî-śâsanava
koṭa ârambhavâgi nîn allade ma .............. nîne voḍambaḍisi kaḷuhuvudu endu koṭa dharma-
śâsana.

div.head:
35
At the same village, on a second stone in front of the Basavaṇṇa temple.
div.p:
śubham astu svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Sâlivâhana-śakha-varushaṅgaḷu 1470 neya Kîlaka-saṃvachch-
harada Mârgaśira-śudda 1 lu śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara Prattikoṇḍa Koṇḍaya-Dêva-mahâ-arasugaḷu
Guḍḍada Giriya-goṇḍage koṭṭa kaṭṭu-koḍagi-mânyada sâśana namma Guḍḍada-sîmey-oḷaguḷḷa Gûḷeyada
ker̤e voḍedu khilavâgi hôgalâgi nâü ninage â-ker̤eya keḷage kaṭṭu-koḍagi-mânyavâgi maṇu yikuḷa-
gaddênu koṭeû koṭeü (usual imprecatory phrases).

div.head:
36
At Kaṇḍênahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a copper plate in possession of Paṭeḷ Dâśe-Gauḍa’s son Gaṅgê-Gauḍa.
div.p:
Chenna-Kêśava-râyana vapita ǁ śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchârya Harati-Aaimaṅgaḷa-Tippaḷa-Nâykâchâr-
yaru svasti vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śakha-varushambalu
* Śaka 1439 = Dhâtu ; Vijaya = 1456. 1439 Vijaya-saṃ ǁ rada Pushya-ba
10 llu Dharmapurada sammatu mavuje Kaṇḍehaḷi Bâlana-gavuḍage barasi-koṭṭa dâna-śâsanada
nirûpa Kaṇḍehaḷi-grâmada nâlku niṭu kôṭe ga 250 .. yinnûru-aivatu-varahada varigu lâguvaḍu
muṭisi iruvadarinda kâmagâr̤i ninna mârîphatu mâḍida Vaḍḍara-Irana-bôyige kaḍaga sa 1 sarapaṇi
sa 1 chiṭapâgu 1 papuḷḷi-achchaḍa 1 saha inâmu koṭṭu î-grâmada-paṇikaṭṭu âyagâru śânabôga
Paṭaraṅgapa taḷavâra Vôbâ bêgâra Dâsa Timma âyagâru saha namma mokta nînu bandu
namma staḷadalli ar̤ike mâḍikoṇḍu (back) namma appaṇê-prakârakke mar̤iyâdi saha naḍasi iruva-
dakke sadari-grâmada staḷada gavuḍakeyannu ninage nêmisi śâsana-nirûpa apaṇe-koḍisi iditu idakke
yâru drôhakke biddarê Kâsiyalli gô-hatya mâḍi .... nûru-mandi Brâhmarige visha hâkidaṅge avara
tâyi tandege visha hâkidaṅge sar̤i | î-Kaṇḍehaḷḷi-grâmada staḷada gavuḍike Noṇabara Bâlana-
gavuḍana vaṃsha-parampariyavâgi taḷavâru-bêgâru-vagaire ninna makkaḷâgi naḍasikoṇḍu anubha-
visuvadê sar̤i | yidakke (here follow names of witnesses).

div.head:
37
At Abbinahoḷe (same hobli), on a stone near the Eḷumandy-akka temple.
div.p:
svasti śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ ar̤uvattâṛu-maṇḍaḷikara tale-goṇḍa gaṇḍa Dânava-Murâri Iruṅ-
goḷa-Dêva ........ Niḍu-nelevîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire Saka-
varsha 1169 neya Plavaṅga-saṃvatsarada Chaitra-ba 10 Sô vishu-saṅkramaṇadandu suṅkada
Bâgeya Bemmayyanu suṅka maga ...sârigeyalli Abinavoḷalai śrî-Râmanâtha-dêvara akhaṇḍa-dîpa-
naivêdya ........ rige. ǁ (usual imprecatory phrases and verse).

div.head:
39
At Sûgûru (same hobli), on a copper plate in possession of Paṭêl Rudrê-Gauḍa.
div.p:
śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâryya Harati-Aimaṅgaḷa-Tipaḷa-Nâyakâchâryaru svasti śrî vijaya-Śâlivâhana-
śakha-varushambulu
‡ 1235 = Paridhâvi ; Plavaṅga = 1230. 1235 nê Plavaṅga-saṃ[vacha]rada Kârtika-ba 5 llu Guḍḍada-nâḍinoḷagaṇa Sûg-
uru-Doḍḍa-Dâmana-gavu[ḍa]ge baraśi-koṭṭa dâna-śâsana-nirûpa | Sûgûru-Kôṭe nâlku niṭṭu ga 200 σ 0
akshâradalu yiṇnûru-varaha lâguvaḍu muṭiśi kaṭṭiśidarindâlû kâvagâri ninna mârîpatu mâḍida Vaḍa-
na Yîrana-bôyige hûvina-hachaḍa 1 chiṭapâgu 1 ........ beḷḷi-kaḍaga sa 1 sarapaṇi sa 1 saha yinâmu
goṭṭu yî-grâmada paṇikaṭṭu ayigâru syânubôga Doḍa-Saṅgappa taḷavâra Chiga-Bêṭiga bêgâra
...... Vôba vagairê ayigâru saha namma mokkata nînu bandu samustânadalli ............ koṇḍu
namma appaṇê-prakârake mariyâdi saha naḍaśi yiruvadakke sadari-grâmada staḷada gavuḍikeyannu
ninige nêmiśi nirûpa appaṇê koḍiśi yi...ku munde yî-grâmada staḷada gavuḍike ninnadu alla yandu
yârâdaru drôhakke biddare Kâśiyili nûru-gô-hatya mâḍidaṅge nûru-mandi-Brâhmarige visha-hâkid-
aṅge (back) avara tâyi-tandige visha-hâkidaṅge yî-nirûpada dâkhale-prakârakke ninnalli śâśvatavâgi
yirutapudu tâmrada śâsanavannu baraśigoṭṭu yidara ......âyagâru-vagaire-hesarugaḷu hâkiśi yinnu
munde vikalpa-mâḍade satya-pramâṇagaḷu baradu yî-nirûpa tâmrada śâsana saha koṭṭu yidheyâgi yî-
Sûgûru-grâmada staḷada gavuḍike Doḍa-Dâmana-gavuḍa nanna vaṃśa-pârampariyâgi taḷavâru-
bêgâru-vagaire ninna makkaḷâgi naḍaśikoṇḍu anubhavisuvade ............ śâsana yî-divasa appaṇê-
koḍśi yidhe ... vandidaru śithilavâdaru yî-tâmbrada śâsana ninnali yiṭakoṇḍu staḷa anubhavisu-
vadu yendu baraśi koṭṭa sâdhana sahi (names of witnesses.)

div.head:
40
At the old village site of Hiriyûr (same hobli), on a stone in front of the Virabhadra temple.
div.p:
Naḷa-saṃvatsarada Puśya-śu 1 lu śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara Râma-Râjaya Er̤adimma-Râjayanavara
kâryyake karttarâda Kâmagêti-Timmaṇṇa-Nâyakaru Hiriyûra tammaḍiyarigû dêva-dâya-Bramma-dâ-
yadavarigû sarvvamânyada śâsana nimma dêvastânavanû pûje-mâḍikoṇḍu Er̤adimma-Râjayyage
puṇyav âgabêkendu prâku ter̤uva rokavanû sarvamânavâgi biṭeü (usual imprecatory phrases).

div.head:
41
At Hiriyûr, on a stone in pial of the Dooḍḍapêṭe daḷavâyi’s house.
div.p:
(Mostly defaced) yâda Chinnapa-Nâyakara kâryyake karttar âda Mallapa-Nâyakaru Hiriyûru-
sîmeya upalikarige koṭṭa .......... nîvu namma hi ......................

div.head:
42
At the same village, on a stone in front of the Veṅkaṭaramaṇa temple.
div.p: śubham astu Prâṃhaṇan âdanthavanu Tirumala-dêvara tîrtha-prasâdavanu valladavanu Châṇḍâla

div.head:
44
On a third stone at the same place.
div.p:
śubham astu svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Sâlivâhana-śakha-varshaṅgaḷu ........ neya Krôdi-saṃ-
vatsarada Kârtika-sudha ........ maharâjâdhirâja ...... pratâpa-śrî-vîra-Sadâsiva-mahâ ......
pṛithvî-râjyaṃ geyiüttam ...... śrîman-mahâ .... râjâdhirâja ...... śâsanada kramav ......
śîmege salu .......... sîmege purva ......

div.head:
46
On a stone north of the Têra-Mallêśvara temple in the old-village site.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varushaṅgaḷu 1554 neya Âṅgira-saṃvatsara (4 lines effaced)
Pañchâḷa-dêvarige ...... sâsanada krama yent endare .............. yiṃ paḍuvaṇa-bâgilu-tanaka
mâḍida-mêreyoḷage śubha-śôbhana-meravaḷige mâḍikombudu yendu mêre mâḍida ...... śâsana
śubham astu

div.head:
47
On another stone at the same place.
div.p: śubham astu

svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varushaṅgaḷu 1489 neya Prabhava-saṃvatsarada Mâga-
śu 14 Maṅgaḷavâradalu śrîman-mahârâjâdhiraja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa-śrî-Sadâśiva-Râ-
yaru Vidyânagariya paṭṭaṇadalu prithvî-râjyaṃ geyutt iralu śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâcharyya bhâśege
tappuva râyara gaṇḍa mare hokara kâva Harati ........ yaka-ayanavara komâra Keñchapa-Nâya
...... mân-mahâ dêvâdhidêva Hiriyûra Tiramala ............ Hiriyûra .......... staḷavan sa-
hiraṇyôdaka-dhâ ............ puṇya (2 lines effaced) pâdake samarppisida dharma ............
seṭṭige kâṇâchiyâgi .......... (usual final verses and phrases).

div.head:
52
At Sômêrahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone in the front of the Sômêśvara temple.
div.p: śrî-Sômanâthâya namaḥ |

śrîmad-abhinava-Jambû-dvîpakke paśchima-diśâ-bhâgadal idda Kâreyapaṭṭanav emba mahâ-nagaravanu
daivâdhînadinda śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêsvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa-Harihara-mahârâyaru ir̤i-
dalli â-Kâreyapaṭṭaṇada Pâyaṇṇagaḷa madavaḷige Kâmâyiâ maga Jakka-Dêvagaḷu saha tâyi-makkaḷu
âyivaru bandalli avaranu Kandiker̤eya Bayireya-Nâyakaru koṇḍu bandu pâlisidalli â-Jakka-Dêvagaḷa
kula-svâmi Saürâshtra-Sômeya-dêvara nirûpadinda â-Jakka-Dêvanu Hiriyûra dakshiṇa-diśâbhâgadalli
yiha Medder̤a-haḷav emba nadiyanu Kali-yuga-Saka-varusha 1339 Hêmaḷambi-saṃvatsarada Mârgga-
śira-su 10 Gu-dina taṭâka-pratishṭeyanû mâḍi alli tamma tâyi-tande pâlisida svâmi Bayireya-Nâyaka-
rigeü puṇya-lôka-prâptiy âgabêkendu yî-taṭâkadalli â-Sômêsvara-dêvaru prasannanâgi nelasidanu
â-Jakka-Dêvagaḷa .... Kâmâyigaḷige daivâdhînadinda avasâna-kâlaü .... Plavaṅga-saṃvatsarada
Mâgha-ba 14 | Śu-dina .... dhyânavâgidda Phâlguṇa-śu 4 Gu-dina .... śrî-Sadâsivana sannidhige
sâyujya-padavanu ........ Sômê-Dêvara sannidhiyalu Jakka-Dêvanu âta .... tishṭeyanu mâḍi
Pâlguṇa-su 15 Sô-dina ........ koṭṭa dêva-dâya-Brahma-dâya ...... â-chandrârkkav âgi naḍav ...
(usual final phrases & verse).
maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî

lg.l: lâvikaś cha varâhaś cha mahishî kuñjaras tathâ |
upadêshṭâ cha dâtâ cha shaḍ êtê svargga-gâminaḥ ǁ

div.p: śrî-Sômêsvarana tammaḍi Kêta-jîya

div.head:
53
At Gaudanahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone near the village gate.
div.p:
svasti śrî vijeyâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varuśaṅgaḷu sâ 1678 neya | Dhâtru-nâma-saṃ | Vayasâkha-
śû 1 Stiravâradallu | Vâlmîki-gôtrada śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâryya | Kâmagetti-Kastûri-Medakeri-Nâ-
yakara pautrar âda Kastûri-Dugapa-Nâyakara putrar âda Râjâ-Medakeri-Nâyakaravaru ...... vara
hesarallu Hiriyûrallû mâḍisihya anna-chhatrada maṭhake namma hiriyarige puṇya sukr̤itav âgabêk
endu nâv âḷuvanta râjya Hiriyûra-sîmey-oḷagaṇa Gauḍanahaḷi-grâmavanu Sivârpitav âgi koṭu yidhêve
yî-grâmake saluvantâ kâḍârambha-nîrârambha-nidhi-nikshêpa .... âgâmi-jala-pâshâṇa-muntâda
ashṭa-bhôga-têjôpârjaneyannu sûryya-chandrâdigaḷ ihya pariyantara sukadinda anubhavisikoṇḍu
sukadinda yihyadu yandu barasikoṭa dâna-patrâ sahi (usual final verse).

div.head:
56
* This inscription is much defaced.
At Âdirâḷu (same hobli), on a stone to the south of the Âñjanêya temple.
div.p:
......... meya .... Śâlivâhana ..... saṃvatsara ......... gaṇḍa mâ ...... yagaḷa komâra .......
.... gaḷa komâra Chennavâḍîśvaraiyagaḷa ..... yagaḷu ...... Chennavâḍîśvaraiyyagaḷu â-Basavê-
śvaraiyyaga ................... ayagaḷa komâra Chenna-Keñchêśvaraiya ...... Chenna ....
Basavaṇṇ-oḍeyaru â-Basavaṇṇ-oḍeyaru ........ Mârayana komâra ............. yara komâ-
ranu ............... mahâ .....................komâ .....................................
Nâyakara komâra ............... komâra .... yakara komâ ...... â-Basavi-Nâyakara........
.. nâyakara komâra Abhaṇṇa-Nâyakaru Abhaṇṇa-Nâyakara komâra........ â-Chennappa-Nâyakara
komâra Yimmaḍi-Keñchappa-Nâyakaru ....... â-Keñchêśvaraiyagaḷa ..... sâsanada ma .......
nâü namma tri-karaṇa .....dhârâ-pûrvakadinda koṭṭa .....kramav ent endare namma nâyakatana-
ke saluva Râyadurgada ...... yake saluva Hiriyûra sîmege saluva va Ta .... staḷad oḷagaṇa
..... emba grâmavanu Keñchayîśvaraiyagaḷa śrîpâda-padma ..... nama .... sideü â Hâdirahâḷa-
grâmada chatu-sîmey-oḷagâda kere kuṇte .... guyyalu-aṇe-achukaṭu-kâḍârambha-bîḷu-aḍavi-truṇa-
modalâda â-grâmadalli suvarṇṇâdâya-suṅka-aḷivu-anyâya-aputrike-nidhi-nikshêpa-jala-pâshâṇa-akshîṇi
âgâmi-sidha-sâdhyaṅgaḷ emba ashṭa-bhôga...... ḷagâgi â-Hâdirahâḷa-grâmavanu tamma tri-vâchâ
â-Keñcha-Yîsvaraiya ...... rpisideü yî-dharma-śâsanada .... (usual final phrases & verse) int apa
dharma-sâsana .... granthadali apaharisida pâtakavanu slôkada dharmma vichârisi naḍasuvudu.

div.head:
57
At Ânêsidri (same hobli), on a stone near the village gate.
div.p:
śubham astu ǁ svasti śrî jayâ(d)bhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śakhâbda 1643 neya Plava-nâma-saṃvatsarada
Âśvîja-śu 10 lu śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâyya Kâmagêti-Kastûri-Baramaṇṇa-Nâyakara Medakeri-Nâya-
karaiyyanavara appaṇeyalu Komâra-Chikaṇṇanavaru bandu chaügrâmada gauḍa-âyagârara sannatad-
inda kavi-Kônappana agrahâra Ânêsidâri-hola-mêre śâsanake â-chandrârkkam astu pûrva-datta agra-
hâra ǁ sakalarû nirnaya mâḍitu ....... tôridu.

div.head:
58
At the same village, on a stone south-west of the fort.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śakha-varusha 1609 ra Prabhava-saṃvatsarada Chaitra-śn
10 lu modalu pûrvadali Kr̤ishṇa-Râyaru pâlisidanthâ Ânêsidâri-agrahârada grâmakke neḍisidanthâ
śilâ-sâsana Ânesidâri-Mâra........... dali ǁ śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchârya Kâmagêti-Kastûri-
Medakeri-Nâyakaraiyanavaru jîrṇôdhâra mâḍi dhârâ-pûrvakav âgi silâ-sthâpane mâḍikoṭṭu pâlisi-
danthâ-dharma Ânêsidâri-agrahâra â-chandrârka-sthâyiyâgi koṭa-dharmake (usual imprecatory
phrases).

div.head:
59
At Toresâl-Nâgênahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone built into a wall in front of the Timmappa temple.
div.p:
svasti śrî vijaya-... Śâlivâhana-śakha-varuśa 1599 ya Piṅgaḷa-saṃvatsarada Phâlguṇa-śu 14 Sôma-
vâradalu Tirupati Peda-jîyaraiyanavarige Kâmagêti-Kastûri-Chikaṇṇa-Nâyakaraiyanavaru tamma
tandegaḷige dharmav âgali .... Nâgênahaḷḷi-grâmavannu dhârâ-dattav âgi koṭantâ sarvamânya ...
Râmânuja-kûṭake mânya

div.head:
60
At Upaḷagere (same hobli), on a stone built into a wall in front of the Timmappa temple.
div.p:
śubham astu svasti śrî jayâ(d)bhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varsha 1612 nê Prmôdûta-samvatsarada
Kârttika-ba 14 lu śrîman-mahâ-nâyka Kâmagetti-Kastûri-Raṅgappa-Nâyakaru Kâsî-vâsi Bhaima-bha-
ṭṭarige Kâsî-dharmakke sarvamânyav âgi Vuppuligere-grâmavannu namma mâtâ-pitr̤igaḷige gatiy âgal-
endu śrî-Râmârpitadali yêkabhôgyadali barasikoṭṭa-śâsana yî-dharmake tapidavaru Kâsîge tappida
hâge .. śrî ..

div.head:
62
At Yaradakaṭṭe (same hobli), on a stone in the roof of the raṅga-maṇṭapa of the Raṅganâtha temple.
div.p:
Durmati saṃ ǁ Chaitra .... 5 lu Raṅgasvâmi-guḍi kaṭisidu ǁ gauḍa .. ǁ Raṅgaṇṇa | pûjâri-Tôkaṇṇa-
mukhântra Śâlivâhana-śaka-varushaṅgaḷu 1723 nê Durmati-saṃvatsara-Chaitra-ba-5 ...... Liṅ-
gaṇa bhakti hattu-vakalara bhakti

div.head:
64
At Mêṭikuraki (same hobli), on a stone built into a pial in front of the Hanumanta temple.
div.p:
Chitrabhanu-saṃvacharada Phâlgu[ṇa]-bahuḷa...lu â-Besaṇi-ayyanavaru maduve su.. v ilavendu Meṭi-
kur̤ikege hâkisida vir̤a-koṇḍake tanna apamânava tanna sariya-nâyakage koṭṭa ... hâruva .... konda-
pâpake hôharu

div.head:
66
At the same village, on a vîrakal beside a bastion near the road.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śaka-varusha 1320 neya Bahudhânya-saṃvatsarada Mârggasira-ba 4 Guru-
vâradalu śrîmannu-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa ........ daṇṇṇâyaka ....
prabhu ...... ppa-daṇṇâyaka

div.head:
70
At Huvvinahoḷe (Javanagoṇḍanahaḷḷi hobli), on a stone in Survey No. 1.
div.p:
... mâdi-saṃvatsarada .... ga-śu 1 lu śrimatu .... pa-chakravarti Ho .... śrî-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêva..
Dôrasamu ......... mahâ-sâmantâdhipati Hoḷakala .... ra-nâḍa halaru .. gaüḍana maga .... me-
Nâya.... hesariṅge koṭṭa koḍagi-hola va ........

div.head:
74
At Nâkîkere (same hobli), on a stone east of the Hanumanta temple.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya Śâlivâhana-śaka-varushagaḷu 1646.... Viśvâvasu-nâma-saṃvatsarada Mâga-
śuda 12........ śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâcharyya Kâmagêti-Kastûri-Baramaṇṇa-Nâyakara Medakeri-
Nâyakaru Tirumale Penagoṇḍe Râmâchâryyara Srînivâsâchâryyarige Horakeri Dêvapurada sîme
Nâkikere yamba grâmavannu dhârâ-pûrvakav âgi agrahârava mâḍi dhâreya .. koṭṭu silâ-sthâpane-
yannu mâḍisi ......

div.head:
75
At Raṅgasamudra (same hobli), on a stone in Nârasi Raṅga’s land below the tank.
div.p:
(Mostly effaced) śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ .... śrî jayâbhyudaya-Sâlivâhana-śaka-varushambulu
* 1467 = Śôbhakṛit ; Svabhânu = 1446. 1467
agunêṭi Svabhânu-saṃvatsara-Mârgasira-ba 5 .........śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja ...... pratâpa-
śrî-vîra ....... hârâ Vijênagara ........ pṛithvî-râjyaṃ ...... gânu .................. yarulaina śrîmani
mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara ...... nikshê...... śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâryya Kâmagetti-Hanumi-Nâyaniṅgârik-
.... Kâmagetti-Timma .... yaḍuṅgâru śrîmatê Râmânujâya namaḥ | śrîmad-vêda-mârga-pratishthâ-
panâchâryya parama-haṃsa-parivrâjakâchâryya vêdântâchâryyulaina śrî-Mâlyavantaṃ Râmânuja-
jîyyalu-ayyavâriki Kâmagetti-Hanumi-Nâyaniṅgâri komâruḍu Kâmâgetti-Timmaṇa-Nâyaniṅgâru tam-
mulaina ........ Râjaiya Tirumla-Râjayya ...... puṇyamugânu Uthâna-dvâdasi-puṇya-kâlamandu
Hampâ-Virûpâksha-dêvuni sannidhi .... śrî-Mâlyavantaṃ ........................

div.head:
76
On the left side of the same stone.
div.p:
dînikini śrî nad-vêda-mârga-pratishṭhâpanâchâryya parama-haṃsa-parivrâjakâchâryya vêdântâchâr-
yyulaina śrî-Mâlyavantamu Râmânuja-jîyyalu-ayyavâriki dhâra-pôsi ichchina bhû-dâna-dharma-śâsana-
kramam eṭḷu anenu mâ-nâyaṅkatânaku Sadâsiva-Dêva-mahârâyaluṅgâru pâliñchina Kuntaṇa-dêśamu
Chitrahaḷi-sîmalôni Nandana...sômastaḷamulôni Arakere-grâmamu dhârâ-pûrvakaṅgânu istimi.. śrî-
man-mahâ-nâyakâchâryya Kâmagetti-Hanimi-Nayaniṅgâri komâruḍu Kâmugetti-Timmaṇa .. Nâyani-
gâru tama taṇḍri Hanimi-Nayanigâriki puṇyam ayi .... ṅgânu śrîmad-vêda-mârgga-praṭishthâpanâ-
châryya parama-haṃsa-parivrâjakâchâryya vêdântâchâryyulaina śrî-Mâlyavantamu Râmânuja-jîyyalu-
ayyavâriki tri-vâchakaṅgânu Tuṅgabhadrâ-tîramandu Arakere-grâmamu dhâra-pôsi istimi gâna â-
grâmânanu kaligina nidhi-nikshêpa-jala-pâshâṇa-akshîṇi-âgâmi-siddha-sâddhyambulugânu ashṭa-
bhôga-têja-svâmyaṅgânu nîrârambhamu kâḍârambhamu sakala-suvarnna-âdâyamunnu cheruvunu
tôṭalanu ...... phala-rukshâlu sahagânu dhâra-pôsi istimi gâna mî-śishya-pâramparyyamuṅgânu â-
chandrârka-sthâyiṅgânu sukhâna anubhaviñchchi sukhâna uṇḍêdi (usual final verse).

div.head:
77
At Kôḷâḷu (same hobli), on a stone lying in Bhîmana-Kariya’s field south-west of the village.
div.p:
svasti Śaka-varsha 953 neya Prajâpati-saṃvatsaraṃ pravarttise tad-varishâbhyantarada Paushya-
śuddha-pañchami-Âdityavâramun-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrântiyandu Koḷḷapâl̤a Guṇḍaveyara Mâra-gauṇḍanu
âtana tamman Er̤eyappanum il̤du Mâger̤eyara Vaṭṭapuyyana kâlaṃ karchchi teṅkaṇa-peladoḷ
râjâ-mâna pannir-mmatta-keyyanu Pâdagigaṭṭada kel̤aga .. sala .. maṇṇuvaṃ koṭṭar ...... grâma-
dharmma î-dharmmava kiḍisidâtaṃ kavile .... Bâṇarâsiyuvan al̤i ......

div.head:
79
At Kânbêhaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone in the Âñjanêya temple.
div.p:
svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varuśa 1491 neya Śukla-saṃvatsarada Śrâvaṇa-ba 10 lu
śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâryya Ha[ra]tiya Abbaṇa-Nâyaka-ayanavara komâra Keñchappa-Nâyakaru
śrîmân-mahâ-dêvâdhidêva-.... Râmê-dêvarige koṭṭa grâmada śâsanada paṭṭeya kramav ent
endare śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara-Râma-Râja-Tirumala-Râjaya-Dêva-mahâ-arasugaḷavaru namage
amara-mâgaṇike pâlisida Hîriyûra sîmege saluva kaṇuveya keḷagaṇa Kânubheyahaḷḷiya grâmavanu svâ-
miya amṛita-paḍi-nai[vê]dyakke âgabêku yendu namma Abbaṇa-Nâyaka-ayyanavarige puṇyavâgabêku
endu sahiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvvakavâgi koṭṭevâgi â-grâmake saluva chatu-śîmey-oḷagaṇa nidhi-
nikshêpa-jala-pâshâṇa-akshiṇi-âgâmi (ni)-siddha-sâddhyaṅgaḷ emba ashṭa-bhôga-têja-svâmyavanu
svâmige dhârey eradu koṭṭeü endu koṭṭa dharmma-śâsanada paṭṭe (usual final verse and phrases)
Keñchapa-Nâyakara baraha |

div.head:
80
At the same village, on a stone near Kariya’s field.
div.p:
Śâlivâhana-śaka-varuśaṅgaḷu 1641 Vikâri-saṃvatsarada Pauśya-ba 30 sûryya-grahaṇa-puṇya-kâla-
dalû Halava-Nâyakaraiyyanavaru | Keñchavalanâ maga Chiga-Tammaṇṇage Sivârppitavâgi koṭṭa
gade tôṭa

div.head:
81
At Kañchîpura (same hobli), on a stone in the enclosure of the Allanâtha temple in the tank bed.
div.p:
Sarvajitu-saṃvatsarada Jêshṭha-bahuḷada 1 ḍyadalu Guruvâra śrî-mahârâjâdhirâja-Chiṇṇapa-Nâya-
kara grâmadoḷ uṇṭâda Alaṇa-dêvaru Tirumale-dêvaru Hanumanta-dêvaru Araḷihaḷali gade-beddalu
parushê-kâṇike dêvara naivêdya-dîpake âr âdar aḷipidare Vâraṇâsîli gôva konda pâpakke hôha

div.head:
85
At Chikka-Karpûrakaṭṭe (same hobli), on a stone in the Añjanêya temple.
div.p: śubham astu | namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varśaṅgaḷu sâ 1492 neya Pramôda-saṃvachharada Âśâḍa-śu
12 lû śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâryya Haratiya Keñchapa-Nâyakaru Kañchi Allâḷanâtha-dêvarige | Araḷi-
hâḷa-staḷakke saluva Chika-Kapuradakaṭe-grâmavanu samarpisideü yidake âru tapidaru tamma tande-
tâya Vâraṇâsiyali konda pâpake hôguvaru yendu hâkida dharmma-sâsana śrî śrî śrî

div.head:
86
At Chaḷḷakere (same hobli), on a vîrakal near the Îśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śaka-varśa 1204 Viśu-saṃvatsarada Mârggaśira-śu 1 Â ǁ .. mmalûra-
kalliṅge Mummaḍi .... gaya-Nâya[ka]nu etti bandalli.. Chaḷaker̤eya âḷugaḷu .. Kêtamalla-Seṭiya
maneya kur̤ubara Jakkaya-Nâyakana maga Tippeya-Nâyakanu Kabûra.... nalu tividu svarggastan
âda .... gallu ....

div.head:
87
On a stone near the same temple.
div.p:
śrî-Kallinâtha śaraṇu svasti śrî jayâbhyudayaś cha Śaka-varsha 1235 neya Pramâdîcha-saṃva-
tchharada Kârttika-śuddha 1 Â ǁ svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ
Dvârâvatî-pura-varâdhiśvaraṃ Malerâja-râja Maleparoḷu gaṇḍa râya-hulirâya gaṇḍa-bhêruṇḍa nis-
saṅka-pratâpa Hoysaṇa-bhuja-baḷa-śrî-vîra-Nârasiṃhva-Dêvarasara suputra śrî-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvara-
saru Dôrasamudrada nelevîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ prithuvî-râjyaṅ-gaiyyuttam irddalli śrî-
manu-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Voḍeya-Viñjha-Dêva-Râṇeyarige Huḷiyar̤a-nâḍu saṃvaraṇege barad
iddalli śrîmanu-mahâ-Huḷiyar̤a-nâḍa prabhu Hegger̤eya Honna-gauḍana maga Kalla-gauḍana
kainda śrîmanu-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Voḍeya-Râya Viñjha-Dêva-Râṇeyaru srîmanu-mahâ-pradhânaṃ
Addureya Allappa-daṇṇâyakaru śrî-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvarige hodakeyanu mâḍi śrî-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvaru
Huḷiyar̤a-nâḍ-oḷagaṇa Chaḷḷaker̤eyanu Kalla-gauḍaṅge koḍagiyâgi koṭṭu dêvara śrî-hastad oppa râyasa-
nirûpadiṃ aramaneya arasâḷugaḷû Baichaya-sâhaṇiyaru Dêveya-sâhaṇiyaru mund iṭṭu Chaḷḷaker̤ege
naṭṭa kallina chatus-sîmeya kramav ent endaḍe (here follow details of boundaries) int î-chatus-śîmey-
oḷagaṇa-gadde-beddalu-nidhi-nikshêpa-jala-pâshâṇa-akshiṇi-âgâmi-ashṭa-bhôga-têja-svâmya-śeśe-sid-
dhâya-aḷiü-anyâya-kir̤ukuḷa-tappu-tauḍi-vol̤agâda-samasta-baḷi-sahitaṃ â-chandrârkka-târam-baraṃ
putra-pautrâdigaḷige saluüdu paṭṭa-baddha-putrôtsâha yêtar̤oḷaṃ kêḍ illade dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi-
koṭṭa koḍagiya śâsana (usual imprecatory phrases and verse) int appudakke śrî-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvara
svahastad oppa śrî-Malaparoḷu-gaṇḍa Viñjha-Dêva-Râneyara sva-hastad oppa srî śaṅkha ǁ Huḷiyaṛa-
nâḍ-oppa srî-Bhîmanâtha-vinaya-nidhâna-Vishṇu-dêvara maga Sôvappana baraha

div.head:
88
Copy of copper śâsana in possession of Maskal Shânbhog Sidda-Râmayya.
div.p: śrîr astu śôbhanam astu |

svasti śrî viayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śakâbdâḥ varshaṅgaḷige saluva 1510 ne Sarvadhâri-saṃ | rada
Phâlguṇa-śu 3 llu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara śrî-vîra-râja-pratâpa śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêś-
varar âda śrî-vîra-Veṅkaṭapati-Râya-svâmigaḷu Hiriyûra- sthḷada sthaḷada syâ ǁ Tipparasaiya Kare-Vîrayyage
barasi koṭṭa dâna-paṭṭeya kramav ent endoḍe | î-Vîrayyanu namma sêve mâḍalâgi Keñchaṇṇa-Nâyakaru
ivara pûrva-vartamâna binnnahaṃ binnahaṃ mâḍalâgi î-Vîrayya mâḍidantha sêvege mechchi svâsthiya pâlisi-
dantha vivarâ namma râjyada âsthânakke naḍavantha Hiriyûra-sthaḷântaragaḷa vivarâ Hiriyûra-stha-
ḷa 1 kke grâma 53 Bagganaḍuvina sthaḷa 1 kke grâma 11 Hosûru sthaḷa 1 kke grâma 21 Gavuḍana-
haḷḷi sthaḷa 1 kke grâma 10 Kurubarahaḷḷi-sthaḷa 1 kke grâma 13 Lakkihaḷḷi sthaḷa 1 kke grâma 7
Basâpaṭṭaṇada sthaḷa 1 kke 14 Aruḷihaḷḷi sthaḷa 1 kke grâma 7 Tavanidhi sthaḷa 1 kke grâma
12 Bukkâpaṭṇadasth aḷa 1 kke grâma 26 Yikkanûra sthaḷa 1 kke grâma 11 antu staḷa 11 kke grâma
185 kke saluvantha kaṭṭe-keḷage salluva mânyada gaddegaḷu (here follows the list) yî-prakâra svâsti-
yishṭ anubhavisikoṇḍu putra-pautra-pârampareyâgi chandrârkka-sthâyigaḷ ir̤uva paryantaradallu
ihudu yandu barasikoṭṭa dâna-paṭṭeya sâsana

div.head: HOḶALKERE TALUQ

1
At Hoḷalkere, on a copper plate from Seṭṭara Nâgappa.
div.p: śrîmat-pañcha-kalyâṇa-vaibhavâya namaḥ ǁ

svasti śrî yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-maunânushṭhâna-japa-tapa-samâdhi-sîla-guṇa-sampanna
rum appa ôṃ ...... kaḍiyâṇa-parigrahâdityaruṃ madhyâhna-kalpa-vṛiksharum appa Pâriśvasêna-
bhaṭṭâraka-svâmiyavaru | Hoḷalakereya śrî-Śântinâtha-dêvara jîrṇṇâlayamaṃ .. ddhâramaṃ mâḍisi-
daru ǁ śrî-Mûla-saṅghada Vodaṇṇa-Gauḍa-muntâdavaru mâḍisida dharmmavu vighnavâgiralu â-
gauḍara sat-putrarâda Sômaṇṇa-Gauḍa Śântaṇṇa-Gauḍa Âdaṇṇa-Gauḍa-muntâdavaru | Pratâpa-
Nâyakarige nûru-gadyâṇavan ikki bêḍikoṇḍuddu Hiriya-kereya hindaṇa-tôṭamuṃ gaddeyumaṃ
beddalamaṃ nammavara maneya-kâṇikeyumaṃ sarva-bâdhâ-parihâravâgi śrî-amṛita-paḍige guru-
gaḷa âhâra-dânakke Śaka-varsha 1076 neya Śrîmukha-saṃvatsarada Mâgha-śuddha 10 Śukravâra
biṭṭa datti ǁ yidakke dêvatâ-mahôtsavada vivara | Bhâva-nâma-saṃvatsarada Vaiśâkha-śuddha-
tadige-Sômavâra vimâna-śudhi vâstu-vidhi nândî-maṅgala dhvajârôhaṇa bhêrî-tâḍana aṅkurârppaṇa
brahachchhântika mantra-nyâsa aṅga-nyâsa kêvala-jñânada mahâ-hômâ | mahâ-snapanâbhishêkake
agrôdaka-prabhâvaneyannu kalaśa-prabhâvaneyannu mâḍisi puṇyôpârjjaneyannu mâḍisikoṇḍaru |
varshaṃ-prati akshaya-tadi[ge]yalli naḍeyuva mahôtsava-prabhâvanege .... ashṭâhnika-parvvagaḷige
Śrâvaṇa-paurṇṇamî-vutsavakke Bhâdrapada-śuddha-chaturddaśi-Anantana-nôhi-kalaśa-prabhâvane
mahâ-ârâdhane-muntâddakke | Kârttika-mâsadalli Kṛittikôtsavakke Mâgha-ba-chaturddaśiyallu
Jinarâtre-mahôtsavakke | chatus-sime-vivara | tôṭakke mûḍalu Hire-kere | teṅkalu heddâri | paḍuvalu
neṭṭa-kallu | baḍagalu huṭṭare | gaddegaḷa chatus-sîmege nâlku-dikkigu nâlku-mukkoḍe saha
nâlku-neṭṭa kallu | beddalu-bhûmigu idê-guritu | sujanaru yî-dharmmava naḍesikoṇḍu baruvadu |
(usual final verses) śâsanakke bhadraṃ bhûyâd varddhatâṃ Jina-śâsanaṃ ǁ

div.head:
2
At the same village, on a stone west of the Śântêśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti ya[ma]-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-maunânushṭhâna-japa-samâdhi-śîla-guṇa-sampannaruṃ .....
kaḍiyâṇa-pa .... ha kramâ ..... ruṃ madhyâhna-kalpa-vṛiksharum appa Pârśvasêna-bhaṭṭâraka-
dêvaru Hoḷalaker̤eya Śântinâtha-dêvara jîrṇṇa-Jinâlayôddhâravanu mâḍisida turggâ ... hulirâya-
gaṇḍa-bhêruṇḍa Pâṇḍya-Râya-pratishṭhâpanâchâryya gaja-vêṇṭêkâ .. śrîmaṃ-mahâ-pratâpa-chakra-
vartti Hoyisaṇa-śrî-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvaru Vi ..... paṭṭaṇadoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ
geyyuttam iralu tat-pâda-padmôpajîvigaḷ appa śrîmanu-mahâ-pradhâna ..... daṇḍanâyakara kumâra
Sôme-daṇṇâyakaru hiriya-Ballaḷa-daṇṇâyâkaru Bemmatûra-paṭṭaṇadoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ
râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire avara maneya Baḷa .... nâyaka va ...... nâyaka Nârâyaṇa mechchi mechche-
dana-gaṇḍa nâ .... nâyakara gaṇḍa mûr̤u saṅgaṇa râvuttara gaṇḍa śrîmanu-mahâ-sâmantâdhipati
Bâḍad .. se-Nâyakana maga mîseyara gaṇḍa Bâḍada .... pe-Nâyakanu Hoḷalaker̤eya .. vira-
vṛittiyâgi ... taṃ viddalli Śaka-varsha 1136 neya Śrîmukha-saṃvatsarada Phâlguṇa-su .. Bṛihas-
pativâradalu Hoḷalaker̤eya Śântinâtha-dêvarige nityô .... vâgi biṭṭadu Hiriya-ker̤eya hinde hola-
...... koḷaga ................ Haṭṭanada .......... vṛitti ..............................

div.head:
3
At the same village, on a stone to the left of the fort entrance.
div.p:
śrî svasti sama .....śrî-pṛithvî-valla ............ ja-paramê .......... śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-
Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravardhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ salu ....
Kalyâṇa-purada nelevîḍi .... sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ ge .. tatu-pâda-padmôpajîvi ......
.................................. Vikrama-varshada padinêḷa .... Śrîmukha-saṃvatsarada
Vaiśâkha ...... Sômavâradaṅdu Poḷalaker̤eya basadiya dêvara ........ hannondu-haṇavina lekhade
tiṅgaḷu-diṅgaḷiṅge suṅkadiṃ biṭṭa paṇadinda ǁ svasti śrîman-mahâ-sâmanta Dâkarasaru Noḷamba-
vâḍi-mûvattirchchhâsirada hejjuṅkaman âḷuttaṃ Poḷalaker̤ege bijayam geydu alliya basadiya dêvara
pûjege tiṅgaḷu-diṅgaḷiṅge suṅkadiṃ koṭṭoḍ î-sampattu ǁ (usual final verse).

div.head:
4
* This inscription is much defaced.
At the same village, on a stone attached to the wall of the Śaṅkara temple.
div.p: (2 lines gone)

âta...mâtya-kuḷa ....... vâge baḷikka Bijja .... taḷamaṃ bhuja-baḷa ........ nṛipan âtana ......
.. khyâtadin âḷda .... nṛipaṃ Yadu .....vallabhaṃ ǁ
âtan anvayav ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: dore-vaḍedam nijânvayadoḷ Atriya nêtrade Sôman âdan â- |
...... sittu Pâṇḍya-kulam int uditôditam âda vaṃśa .. ǁ
sava .... Râya-Pâṇḍya negaḷdan oḍeya Pâṇḍyânujaṃ Vîra-Pâṇḍya ǁ
âtan-anuja ...... Vijaya-Pâṇḍya Kâmaṃ .. vana ...... giyoḷ avana ........ ǁ
lîleyoḷe Vijaya-Pâṇḍya .......... sale baḷiya vinû ........................ ǁ

div.p: âtan-anvayav ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: Vinayâdityaṃ negaḷda | .... tma-sutan Er̤eyaṅgan erayar enel |
...... ḷedaṃ Vi- | shṇu-narêndraṃ prâjya-râjya .. tat-sati saj- |
.... pati-hite viḷasaj-jâṇe Padmala-Dêvi .. nate pempu migil..... ǁ

div.p: tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi |

âtan-anvayav ent endoḍe ǁ sallalitâṅgi...... kânteyiṃ...... negaḷda Huḷḷeya Koḷḷiya...... Pallava-
vaṃśa-vardhana .... puṇyalô .. jâta .... Nâyakana sati Hôchale ... vara ... râgraṇi Ho ......
Huḷḷeyaṃ vikramôddâmaṃ Babbeya-Nâyakaṃ ........ tyâyaṇâgrajâte...... Honneyagaṃ guṇa-
prêmâḷaṅkṛite Chandiyakka pati-....

lg.l: khyâtam enal per̤ar ddoreye Pallava-vaṃśa-sudhâbdi-Sômanoḷ ǁ

div.p: .... bhuja-bhujaṅga ...... asuhṛid-dharaṇipara prâṇa-vâyu va ............................. ǁ

lg.l: kadanadoḷ îtan embud eḷe maṇḍaḷikâgraṇi .. ra-sômanaṃ |

div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Yâdava-Nârâyaṇaṃ ...... Hoysaḷa-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâ-
bhivri.... rddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire śrîman-Nârasiṃha-Dêvara śrî-pâda-
padmôpajîvi ǁ

* As this part is very much defaced, it has been found impossible to put these into verses. Vanajâkśhaṃ.. ya .... lk enituṃ ........ | .............. arddhâṅganey âdar ..... nujaṃ śrî-
Hariharan ene pempu .... ghana-śauryya ...... têjadoḷ vitaraṇadoḷ ...... nuta-satyad êḷgeyoḷ
dhṛitiyoḷ .......... nûrmmaḍise tâḷdidan Aṇṇeyan-udgha-kîrttiyiṃ .. varêṇya ... bhûmi-prakâśaṃ ǁ
parimaḷa-kusu ............ baḷasida-banavaṃ ǁ alleya ...... chaturdaśa-śâstra ............. entu
nôḍalu Hoḷalaker̤e tad-urbbî-jana-stôtra-pâtraṃ ǁ śrîman-nâḷ-prabhu ............ udgha-kîrtti ....
........ guṇa-prêmaṃ Mâchayan abdhi-sambhṛita-yaśaṅg .... guṇa-nidhi Râmaṃ sannutav î-Hola-
laker̤eya ............... Mâcha-Gâvuṇḍa .......... alliya...... Kalla-Gauṇḍa Oḍḍanalâḷa Bôrê-
Gauḍa Hôkundada-Rayana ................ Dôga-Gauḍa lakkasa ............. dharmma-byômâ-
mṛita...... Nâkiyaṇan-agraja-prêmaṃ śaraṇâgata-rakshâmaṇi ...... ǁ srîmad .. vanabaliya Râma
.......... uditaṃ Kâma-nibhaṃ .... siṅgaṃ Mukunda-pada-yuga-bṛiṅgaṃ ǁ (1½ line effaced)
...... śrîman-mahâ ...... parama-viśvâsi bâhattara niyôgâdhipati ...... śrîmad-Aṇṇamarasaru
Hoḷalaker̤e ...... Hebbaḷḷi ........ dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷanaṃ ........ ttam irddu
Saka-varsha 1139 neya Îśvara-saṃvatsarada Pushya-śuddha .... uttarâyaṇa-saṅkramaṇa-vyatî-
pâta-sôma-grahaṇa .... Hoḷalaker̤eya śrî-Svayambhu-Kali-dêvar-aṅga-bhôga-raṅga-bhôga-khaṇḍa-
spuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhârakkaṃ Kôḍiyahaḷḷiyaṃ sarvva-bâdhâ-parihâravâgi Mûka-jîyara magaṃ .. yama-
niyama-svâdhyâya-pramukha-sakaḷa................ Śaivâgama-yukta ................

div.head:
5
On a second stone in the same place.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâraka
Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷaka Châḷukyâ ...... śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya ........ pravard-
dhamânam â-chandrâ .... salutta Kalyâṇa-purada nelevîḍinoḷu su............................
.............. taṃ .. ra-Nâyaka ...................... bijayaṅ-geydu Poḷalaker̤eya ..............
dêvara pû ......... vina lekkade tiṅgaḷiṅge ....................

div.head:
6
At the same village, on a pillar in the verandah of the raṅga-maṇṭapa of the Gôpâla-Kṛishṇa temple.
div.p:
svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varuśa 1490 neya Vibhava-saṃvatsarada Jêshṭa-śu 1
śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-vîra-Sadâśiva-Râya-mahârâyaru
pṛithvî-râjyaṃ geyiütt iralu śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara Aḷiya Râma-Râjaya-Dêva-mahâ-arasugaḷu
Turukara râja-kâryyakkâgi astamânav âgalâgi paṭṭaṇa siṃhâsana râjya dêśav ellâ keṭṭu khilav âgal
âgi | râjeśri-Tirumala-Râjaya-Dêva-mahâ-arasugaḷu śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchârya Kâmagettiya Meda-
keri-Nâyakarige amara-mâgaṇige pâlisida Hoḷalaker̤eya sîmeyanu tamma mayiduna Gulliyapa-
Nâyakarige umbuḷiyanu pâlisalâgi â-khilavâgi-hôda Hoḷalaker̤eya ............ la śrî-Madana-
Gôpâla-Kṛishṇa-svâmi-dêva-Brâhmaru punaḥ-pratishṭeya jîrnôddhâravanu mâḍi Gôpâla-Kṛishṇa ....
...... avanu dharmma-dati Gulliyapa-Nâyakanu pratipâlisidakke barada dharmma-śâsana Gulli-
yapa-Nâyakanu hostâgi Hoḷalaker̤eya (rest illegible).

div.head:
7
At the same village,
* Supplied by the people of the place. copy of a copper plate in the Gôpâla-Kṛishṇa temple.
div.p: śrîmad-Bhaktapâla śrî-Pomboḷala-Vêṇugôpâla ǁ

lg.l: Harêr lîlâ-varâhasya daṃshṭrâ-daṇḍas sa pâtu vaḥ |
Hêmâdri-kalaśâ yatra dhâtrî chhatra-śriyaṃ dadhau ǁ śrî

div.p:
svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śakha-varushaṅgalu 1490 neya Vibhava-saṃvatsarada Jêshṭa-
śu 5 Maṅgaḷavâradallu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara vîra-pratâpa vîra-Sadâśiva-mahâ-
râyaru pṛithivî-rajyaṃ gaiyutt iralû śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara Aḷiya Râma-Râjaiyya-Dêva-mahâ-ara-
sugaḷu turuttu râja-kâryyavâgi astamânav âgalâgi | paṭṭaṇa siṃhâsana râjya dêśav ellâ keṭṭu khiḷav
âgalâgi | râjeśrî-Tirumala-Râjaiyya-Dêva-mahâ-arasugaḷu srîman-mahâ-Kâmagetti-Kastûri-Meda-
keri-Nâyakarige amara-mâgaṇige pâlisida-mêle khilavâgi-hôda Hoḷalaker̤eya śrîmad-Bhaktapâla-
śrî-Vêṇugôpâla-Kṛishṇa-svâmi-dêva-Brâhmaru punaḥ pratishṭheyaṃ jiṇṇôddhâravaṃ mâḍi tat-pûrva-
dali Janamêjaya dêvatâ-pratishṭhe Vishṇuvardha-Râyara bhû-pratishṭhe Kṛishṇa-Râyaru Râma-Râ-
jaiyanavaru jirṇṇôdhâraṇe Kâmagetti-Kastûri-Medakeri-Nâyakaru sârôdhâraṇeyaṃ mâḍi śrî-Gôpâla-
Kṛishṇage saluva archakaru śrîmat-Pâñcharâtrada Atrê[ya] sa-gôtrada Bôdhâyana-sûtrada Yajuś-
śâkhâdhyâyigaḷâda Yaṅkâṭâchâryya-dîkshitarige dhârâ-dattavâgi sahiraṇyôdaka-pûrvakavâgi Kṛish-
ṇârpaṇavâgi koṭṭu yida grâma-svâsti pûrva-mariyâdiyannu namma maiduna Gulliyapa-Nâyakana
mukhântradalli bhûmiyannu aḷasi nôḍisi pratipâlisida kramav ent endare archana-vṛittige Śudarśana-
Pâñchajanya-śilâ-stâpaneyâda grâma-bhûmigaḷu archakarige Bhîmâ-agrahâra 1 aṅga-raṅga-vaibha-
vakke Vamalâpuri-grâma 1 yî-kasabeyallu yiruva gade-bedalu-bhûmigaḷu vivara hattu-sêrina-mâna-
dalu bîjavari hattu-pâdada aḷate-kôlu pramâṇa (here follow details) yivu parva-tithigaḷa mânya-
gaḷu yî-śîme kasabeyalli yiruva vartane varahâ 1 kke koḍabêku .. yada haṇavinalli aḍige-parichâra-
karu mantra-pushpada jana sanmârjanê-jana palaki-sattige-sûrepânadavaru huvinavaru saha yivarige
sambaḷa yidaralli arittu koḍuvadu ninta haṇavinalli ratha-alaṅkâra-vâhanagaḷie alaṅkâra-vastra-
âbharaṇagaḷige baḷasuvadu | arasugaḷa kai-uttâra (here follow details, and other grants) yivu nava-
dhânyadalu koḍabêku | santê-pasige mûle-vîsa sahâ koḍabêku yandu barasi koṭṭa sârôdhâra-tâmra-
śâsana sarvamânya pûrva-mariyâdiyannu â-chandrârkavâgi namma Kâmagetti-vaṃśakke puṇya
baraliy endu barasikoṭṭa dharma-śâsana (usual final phrases and verses) śrî-Râma yî-śâsanavannu
yâva dhoregaḷu vôdisidarû pratipâlisidarû punaḥ dêvastânadalli maḍagisuvadu śrî

div.head:
11
At Hoḷalkere, on a second stone to the left of the Tûgadale-Gaṇapati.
div.p:
svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Sâlivâhana-śaka-varuśa 1468 nê Parâbhava-saṃvatsarada Âsâḍha-ba 1....
vâradalu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa-śrî-Sadâśiva-Dêva-mahârâyara
nirûpadinda śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara Râma-Râjayya kelasi-Kaṇḍôjage tâv âḷuvantâ sarva-dêśa ..
........ navâgi .................... (back) mânyavâgi...... gaḍiya Timmappa-Nâyakara......
sênabôya................................ aṭṭu-jana mukhyavâgi voppi koṭṭa śâsana (here follow
usual imprecations) yî-dharmava pâlisidavarige maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî Virûpâksha

div.head:
13
At the same village, on a stone in the hedge of Sânabhôga Kṛishṇappa’s garden.
div.p: (3 lines effaced) namag olaviṃ bhaktiyaṃ mâḷke santaṃ ǁ

lg.l: Saḷan emb urvvîśan orvvaṃ Śaśakapurada Vâsantikâ-dêviyaṃ niś- |
Saḷa yene baḷiya...... pâḷa.......... d âhavadoḷ ǁ

div.p:
(19 lines effaced) Saka-varsha .... neya Pârthiva-saṃvtsarada Pushya-suda .. Brahavâradalu ......
.... byatîpâ .................. śrîmatu Yâdava-Nârâya ................ chakravartti-Hoysaṇa
vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvana paṭṭada piriyarasi .. mala-mahâdêviya .... kumâra .. rasiṃha-Dêva ..........
.... hitaṃ śriman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ sarvâdhikâri .................. Dâvaṇṇa-daṇḍanâyakan
śrîman.... dyaksha-dêvâ ............ śrimatu Hoḷalaker̤eya nâḷ-prabhu ........ cha-Gauḍanu ..
.............. svâmi Nambiyâḷa-Seṭṭi (others named) int ivaru mukhyavâgi samasta-prajegaḷu
svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-japa-samâdhi ......... rappa śrîmatu Vidyâdhara-
svâmigaḷigaṃ ................................śrî-Nârâyaṇa-dêvara ............ga śrîkârya ..........
.. râ-pûrvvakam âgi koṭṭa kramav ent endaḍe | (here follow details and usual final verses).

div.head:
14
On a second stone in the same place.
div.p:
śrî-gurubhyô namaḥ .............. nôpakâri hâri hiraṇya-vapuśaḥ.............. raṇa-dêva-dêva
trailô .... śaraṇâ-...... nirâlambana ................ Purushôttamaḥ ǁ śrîmatu sâśvata......
...... Mukunda-.... (3 lines effaced) pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâ.... śvara parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ
Yâdava-kuḷâmbara .... ḍâmaṇi Ma.. paroḷu gaṇḍa Male-râ.... kadana-prachaṇḍa êkâṅga-vîra Sani-
vâra-sidhi Giridurgga-malla śrî.... tâpa-chakravartti Hoyisaḷa-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêva.......... Padma-
la-mahâdêviyaruṃ kumâra-Nârasiṃha-Dêvaruṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geytam ire Śaka-
varsha 1131 Śukala-vatsarada Śrâvaṇa-ba 10 Â śrîmanu-mahâ-pasâyitaṃ........ râda heggaḍe śrî-
Padma-Nârâyaṇa-dêvara mundaṇa hokharaṇeya ...geḷsa dêvara vupahârakke Hiriya-ker̤eya keḷage
gadde sa 2 kaṃ .... vîḷaykaṃ tôṭav ondu î .. inisuvaṃ â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ salisuvantâgi
gavuḍuga.. mukhyavâgi.... Bhalâditya-dêvara śrî-pâdârâdhakarum appar Vidyâdhara-prabhugaḷigaṃ
avara tamma .... ya Mâdhava-dêvaṅgaṃ dhârâ-purvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭa datti (usual final verses
and phrases) maṅgala mahâ śrî

div.head:
15
At Dummi (Hoḷalkere hobli), on a stone in the north enclosure of the Virabhdra temple.
div.p:
śubham astu svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1457 neya Vijaya-saṃvatsarada
Śrâvaṇa-bahuḷa 1 Śthiravâradallu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja Achyuta-Râya-mahârâyara dakshiṇa-
bhujâ-daṇḍanâda Kṛishṇappa-Nâyakara kâryyakke karttarâda Mallarasayyanavaru Dummiya-sîmeyan
âḷuva samayadeḷuṃ Dummiya-pura-varâdhîśvara śrî-Vîrabhadra-dêvara amṛita-paḍigâgi Dummiya
Nirâśraya-maṭhada Keñcha-Vîraṇṇoḍeyaru koṭṭantha mûlê-vîsada vivara pûrvadalli Dummiya
gauḍa-paṭṭaṇa-svâmi-prajegaḷu mahâ-nâḍu-oḷagâgi namage biṭṭu-koṭṭantha mûle-vîsadoḷage ardha-
pâlanû î-sakala-janaṅgaḷig ellâ dharmmâbhivṛiddhiy âgabêk endu koṭṭanthâ mûle-vîsada dha-
rmma-śâsana (usual imprecatory phrases).

div.head:
17
At the same village, on a stone built into the south wall of the raṅga-maṇṭapa of the Îśvara temple.
div.p: śubham astu

śubham astu svasti śrî jayâ.... ya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1456 neya salu.. ya-saṃvatsarada Chai-
tra-śudha 5 lû śrîman-mahâ.. dhirâja râja-paramêśvara pûrvva-dakshiṇa-paśchima.... drâdhîśvara
śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-Achyuta-Dêva-Râya ..... râyaru pṛithvî-râjyaṃ geyiüt iralu avara .... padinda
avara kâryyakke karttarâda Chiṇṇapa-Râya.... kâryyakke karttarâda Mâṇikayana nirûpadinda Malla-
.... yanavara nirûpadindalû saṭṭigaḷu gavuḍa-prajega .. samastar ellarû maduveya suṅka uppârava
nânâ-va .... jâtigaḷige sarvvamânyavâgi biṭṭadakke (usual final phrases) .... mastar ellarige binna-
haṃ mâḍi maduveya suṅka .... ravanû sarvvamânyavâgi biḍisidavaru ..... mmiya paṭṭaṇa-svâmi
Malli-Seṭṭiyara .... kkaḷu pattaṇa-svâmi Vîri-Seṭṭiyaru śubham astu....................

div.head:
20
At Guṇḍêri (same hobli), on a stone in front of the Vîrabhadra temple.
div.p: śrî

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka 1461 nê Vikâri-saṃvatsarada Chaitra-śu 10 Stiravâradalu
śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara pûrvva-paśchima-dakshiṇa-samudrâdhipa śrî-pratâpa-
Achyuta-Râya râjyaṃ gêyiütt iralu avara kâryyakke kartarâda Achyuta-Râya-Malli . ṇa-ayyanavarii
ge samastâyu-śrîy-âbhivṛiddhiy âgabêk endu Chavuḍappa-Nâyakara nirûpadinda Kasava-râvutaru
Guṇḍêr̤a śrî-Vîrabhadra-dêvarige amṛita-paḍigâgi tôṭavanu koṭṭu â-tôṭakkû modala hola-gaddenû
sarvvamânya (usual final phrases and verse).

div.head:
21
At the same village, on a stone in the old village site.
div.p: śrî

svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varuśa sa 1481 Sidhârti-saṃvachharada Pushya-śu 1 Śu-
kravâra-Makara-śaṅkrânti-puṇyakâladallu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa-
Sadâśiva-Râya-mahârâyaru pṛithvî-râjyaṃ gaivuttiralu avara haḍapada Era-Kṛishṇappa-Nâyakara ma-
kkaḷu Veṅkaṭâdri-Nâyakaru Bhakta-vatsala Guṇḍêr̤a Channa-Kêśava-dêvarige archana-vṛittige koṭṭa
grâma-śâsana Sadâśiva-Râyaru namage amara-mâgaṇige pâlisida .. Bâgûra-sîmege saluva Guṇ-
ḍêr̤a kâluvaḷi Narasâpurada grâmavanu pratinâmadhêya-Veṅkaṭapurav endu kaṭisi namma tandege
puṇyav âgabêk endu svâmi-śrîpâdakke dhâren er̤adu arppisidenu â-grâmada chatus-sîmey-oḷagaṇa
ashṭa-bhôga-têjas-śvâmyagaḷanu âgumâḍikoṇḍu nanna kṛitârtthana maḍûdu yendu koṭa dharmma-
śâsana (usual final verses and phrases).

div.head:
23
On a stone in the Kallakambhada-hâḷu in the boundary of Guṇḍêri and Mâḷênahaḷḷi.
div.p:
svasty Akâḷavarisha-Dêva-śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha-mahârâjâdhirâja-paramêśvara-parama-bhaṭṭârakara
vijaya-râjyam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ salutt ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-
śabda mahâ-sâmantaṃ dal̤a-vôḍe gaṇḍ Andra-mmaṇḍaḷâṇman Ujjeni-bhujaṅgaṃ śrîmat-Sûdrakayay
Kaḍambaḷige-sâyiramuman dushṭa-nigraha-viśishṭa-pratipâ .. na nidhi-nidhâna-sahaśra-daṇḍam-mo-
dalâge sukhadin âḷuttire Saka-nṛipa-kâḷâtîta-saṃvatsara-sataṅga .. 1 ttondeneya Vibhava-saṃvatsa-
raṃ pravarttise tad-varishâbhyantara-Chaitra-suddha-pañchameyuṃ Bṛihaspativâradandu Siḍilaṅka-
Râmana mâḍisida dêgula Siḍilêśvarakke śrî-Divyaliṅgi-bhal̤ârargge Sûdrakayyaṃ kâlg er̤eye Siḍi-
layyaṃ kâlaṃ kal̤chi Kûravâḍi-mûnûr̤ara baḷiya Lôkâyta-vol̤aluṃ Guṇḍêr̤oḷ irppatta-nâlku mattar-
kkariya-keyyaṃ modalêriyoḷ sâyira-baḷḷiya tôṇṭamuv eraḍu . ṇamun dêgulada munde nâlvattu-maneya
n[iv]êsanamumaṃ Kâkambâl̤a Kambhaiyyanu Sâyira-nâḍa prabhugaḷum Ayyvatt-eṇṭ-agrahâramum
ar̤iye sarbba-bâda-parihâran dêva-bhôgaṃ mâḍi koṭṭar (usual final phrases and verses).

śrî-Kerasigaṃ Nanniya-Sindaṃ ...Kandarppan daṇḍ ôḍe gaṇḍaṃ Lôkâyta-vol̤oḷada nelavâl̤a-sâmya-
muvaṃ Raṇaja-vol̤ala bayala .... ra maṇṇoḷag ir-mmattar-kkeyyumaṃ kabbada keyy ondu Divya-
liṅgi-bha...rgge sarbba-bâda-parihâraṃ dêva-bhôgaṃ mâḍi koṭṭan î-Sindara dharmmav idaṃ Sinda-
vaṃśadoḷ ârâdoḍaṃ pratipâḷi .. kâvudu ǁ

div.head:
24
At Mâḷênhaḷḷi (same hobli), on a pillar in the verandah of the Raṅganâtha temple.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śalivâhana-śaka-varusha sâ 1405 neya Śôbhakṛitu-saṃvatsarada Kârtika-
śu 15 Bu lu śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêsvara Timmaya-Dêva-Chauḍa-mahâ-arasugaḷu Chin .. tanaka-
la-nâḍa voḷagaṇa Nuleyanûra-sthaḷada Mâḷênahaḷiya Tirumale-dêvara aṅga-raṅga-bhôga-nayivêdya-
na (stops here).

div.head:
25
At the same village, on a stone in the sânabhoga’s field.
div.p: ôṃ namaś Śivâya

........ Magadha-Pâñchâḷa-Nêpâḷa-Barbara-Saurâṭa .. rada-Karahâṭa .. Kâsmîra-Gurjara-Sindhu-
Draviḷa .............. prasiddhâvanîśvararaṃ Chaḷu ..... śvara ...... svasti śrî pṛithvî-vallabha
mahârâjâdhirâja paramêsvara parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbhraṇaṃ śrî-
mat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravardhamânam â-chandrârkka-
târaṃ-ba .... sa ...... tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ

lg.l: śrîyuṃ vâkku śrî .......... ya .. śrîyum uttuṅga-kîrtti- |
śrîyuṃ .. jisutta pra ...... ḷa . pamaṃ .... vijaya- |

div.p:
svasti sa ......... mahâ ...... svaraṃ Yâdava ...... bara-dyumaṇi ...... chûḍâma .... ḷa-mâr-
ttaṇḍa ...... ṭi gaṇḍa ............ na ...... Pâṇḍya-Dêvara .......saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ
geyyuttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmanta jaya-
vadhû-kântaṃ haya-Vatsarâja gaṇikâ-Manôjan achaḷita-dhairya ......... sauryya śishṭêshṭa-vibudha-
gâyaka-nâyaka-naṭî-vṛinda .....samasta-j...... sampu .. chandrahâsaṃ para-ba .. bala-ku .....
daksha-dakshiṇa-bâhu-daṇḍa kûḍi tappuvara gaṇḍa .. ṇa vairigaḷa gaṇḍa-prachaṇḍa Madana ....
taṅga sa ...................... vairi-dâvaṃ ................. Pâṇḍya ........ r̤a ............
Mârayyan-aṅkakâr̤a supu ................. Kêtayyaṃ Chintayya ...............................
.................. poḷalaṃ ......... dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâla ............... diṃ râjyaṃ
geyyuttam i .... tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ....... nâḷ-prabhu Chaṭṭa-gâvuṇḍana ............ lla-gâvuṇḍa
....... gâvuṇḍa ............m irddu Mûlasthânada Kali-dêvarggaṃ Mâchêśvara-dêvargge naivêdya-
...... pavitra-mâṭa-kûṭa-raṅga-bhôga .........jirṇṇôddhârakkaṃ śrî-kâryyamaṃ mâḍuvantâgi ...
... magaṃ ..... magaṃ ........... Sôma ....... kramaṇa-vyatîpâta ...... sûryya-grahaṇadandu
Sôma-jîyana karadu kâlaṃ toḷadu dhârâ-pûrvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭa hiriya-ker̤eya ...... ṇa-gadde mû-
gaṇḍuga...... de mû-gaṇḍu ........ keyi mattar ondu .......... du tuḍike ondu | (usual final phrases).

div.head:
28
At Sâdarahalli (same hobli), on a stone in the enclosure of the Virûpâksha temple.
div.p:
........ śraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja ......... Dvârâvatî-pura-varêsvaraṃ Makara-
râjya-nirmmûla ...... pratishṭhâchâryya ........ pratâpa-chakravartti ...... vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêva
.... râjyaṃ geyyuttire śrîma ................ ka-varusha 1126 neya Raktâkshi-saṃvatsarada
Aśvîja su 1 Budhavâ ............ deya-Nâyakana maga Nâga ......................

div.head:
30
At Âḍanûr (same hobli), on a stone in the front of the Îśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti Saka-nṛipa-kâḷâtîta-saṃvatsara-sataṅga 886 Raktâkshi-saṃvatsara pravarttise tad-varishâbhy-
antarada Pôsha-suddha-pañchamiî-Brihaspativâram-uttarâyaṇada-saṅkrântiyandu śrîmat ... ḷôkayya
Kadambaḷige-nâḍu-sâyiramumaṃ nidhi-nidhâna-nikshêpa-sahasra-daṇḍaṃ-modalâgey âḷutt ire śrîmat-
Kannayya Âḍanûran abhyantara-siddhiyâge Êḷaṃ Gauḍaḷaṃ Sâyirada Komara-gadyâṇamuman aṇu-
ṅginoḷ âḷuttire avar-abbegaḷ śrîmat-Bi .. yabb-arasiya Kântêśvaram endu Umâ-Mahêśvara-dêvara
pratishṭhe-geydu Amṛitarâsi-bhaṭârara tôṇṭamum Areyaker̤eya keyyuṃ Kir̤iya-ker̤eya gâvuṅḍagaḷa
...................... âdud ellamaṃ sarvva-parihâraṃ biṭṭôr idakke sâkshi (witnesses named)
int inibaruṃ sâkshiyâge koṭṭar ivar-ubhaya-sanmathadoḷ baradoṃ Chellapayyaṃ (usual final verses
and phrases).

div.head:
31
At the same village, on a stone in front of the Îśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya 1294 Virôdhikṛi ........ Vaiśâ ................ 7 Â | ..............
Nâyakara ............................................... bâla khâte Mâdapa-Nâyaka ...... Balla-Nâykana
kumâra ...... dya-Nâyka Âḍanura prajegaḷu Kuḍahûra ...... na magaṃ ........ magoṇḍanahaḷi
.......... Chaṭiya-Nâyka-gavuḍu-prajegaḷu kûḍi puna........ koḍagiya koṭṭu vîragalla naḍsidaru
â-ke .. ge avarâ.... arasugaḷu aṇipidare surâ-pânava sêvisidavaru barada baraha Âḍanûra sênabôva
Kasapana baraha maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî ǁ

div.head:
32
On a vîrakall in the same place.
div.p:
svasti Saka-nṛipa-kâḷâtîta-saṃvatara-sataṅgaḷ 890 ttaneya Prabhava-saṃvatsaraṃ pravarttise tad-
varshâbhyantara sa.. tta Mâgada sudda-pañchamî ....... vâradandu ... châru-châritra-naya-vinaya-
sampannar appa Âḍanûr ..... bâsa-chala .... gaṇḍaṃ ............ ge koṭṭa .. puṭita ..........
...... ra-lôkak eydidaṃ ....... ilâḷge ...... kalla nirisidaṃ

div.head:
33
On a stone south of the same temple.
div.p:
svasty Akâḷavarisha-Dêva-śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâraka
chalakke nallâta ........ Kannara-Dêvana sakaḷa-râjyam uttarôttaram â-chaudrârka-târaṃ......
.. ttire tat-pâda-padmôpâjîvi svasti Saka-nṛipa-kâlâtita-saṃvatsa.... ga 887 Krôdhana-saṃvatsaraṃ
pravattise tad-varshâbhyantarada Pausha-saptami Âdityavâraṃ-uttarâyaṇada-saṅkrântiyandu svasti
sa ... ta-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmanta dal̤am ôḍe gaṇḍa Permmâḍi ........ ya baṇṭa para-
bala-kêsari kûṭaṅ koṭṭ uṇḍan abhimâna-saḷḷaṃ bisa.... raṇaṃ birudara gâḷaṃ Ujjeniya bhojaṅgaṃ
śrîmat-Goggiyamma ..... kayyaṃ Kaḍambaḷige-nâḍu-sâyiramuṃ Tivul̤-nâḍoḷ aydu-nâḍumaṃ ....
na-nikshêpa-sahasra-daṇḍaṃ-modalâge dushṭa-nigraha-viśishṭa-pratipâḷanadiṃ...... ttil̤du mayduna-
Gaṇṇayyana Kannêśvarakke Guñjiyanûr̤a nûr̤-ayvatt-ar̤e .... jâmuramaṃ biṭṭu-koṭṭa dattiyaṃ svasti
brata-niyamôpavâsa Gaṅgâ-jaḷa-dhauta....... pavitra-gôtra kṛitôttamâṅgeyar appa śrimat-Kannayan-
abbegaḷ Poleygabbe.....śrîmat-Sûdrakayyaṃ Âḍanûra piriya-ker̤eya kel̤age hent .........ge teṅkaṇ-
eraḍu kaḍabana nâlku-mattar kkeyyaṃ Śânti-bhaṭârargge ...... ra mûvar-ggauṇḍaru Kâkambâḷa
Kambhayyanuṃ pañcha-maṭa-sthâpanamumam...... r̤iya kâḷaṃ kal̤chi koṭṭar

div.head:
34
At Nulenûr (same hobli), on a stone standing against the wall of the Âñjanêya temple near the village gate.
div.p:
(16 lines effaced) Gaṅgaṇṇa ........... yanûra Mâcha-gauṇḍanu...... Nânâ-Dêsi-mukhyarappa ..
.... malla ........... bhaṭṭar̤u-sâsirada ........ ker̤eya paṭṭaṇa .... Kêti-Seṭṭiya ............gaḷu-
muntâgi ..... Hoḷalaker̤eya vittiya Nuliya ..... kramav ent endaḍe ǁ svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śaka-
varusha .. 44 neya Chitrabnânu-saṃvatsarada Chaitra-su.. Â-vâradandu â-ûra .......... prabhu-
gauḍugaḷu ........... ayyaṅgaḷige .... ṭṭaṇa-svâmitanavaṃ koṭṭa .... ge mânya-umbaḷiyaṃ ....
...kramav ent endaḍe (here follow details & usual imprecatory phrases) Mâchêśvara-dêvarige saluva
santeya âya ....... ḍake aravana ǁ eleya hêr̤iṅge 50 .... mûlege bhatta yim-mâna uppu yim-
mâna hasubeg eraḍaḍake î-dharmmava halaru naḍasidaru ǁ

div.head:
37
At Lôkadoḷalu (same hobli), on a vîrakal near the Siddêśvara temple south of the waste-weir of the tank.
div.p:

div.p:

śira-ba 13 lu śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâryya Kâmageti-Kastûri-Baramaṇṇa-Nâyakara Medakeri-Nâya-
kara komâra Kastûri-Raṅgappa-Nâyakara kâ ... Medakere-Nâyakaru Horakere-Raṅgadhâmana
Daḍige-dâsaru | Kaṅgaḷa-Raṅgadâsana vaṃśada Honni-Keñchi makkaḷu Daḍige Dasterige Horakere-
Dêvarapurada ka(ṃ)sabeyalu bedalu-bhûmi bîjavari se 83 na σ 3 hattu-varahada hola mânyada
holavannu pâlisiyidhêve putra-pautra-pâramparyyavâgi anubhavisikoṇḍu bahadu soppina tôṭa kaṇa

Gauḍanakaṭe-hola śrî

div.head:
56
At Hirê-Yammiganûru (Bharamanâyakanadurga hobli), on a stone standing against the south wall in the verandah of the Kallêśvara temple.

lg.l: eḷeyaṃ pâḷisutuv ippar avar âdiyoḷuṃ ǁ
bhavan ant â-Râya-Pâṇḍyaṃ baḷika Noḷeya-Pâṇḍyâvanîpâḷakaṅg ud- |
âḷa-nṛipâḷan âḷdan uditôditav âda Noḷambavâḍiyaṃ ǁ

div.p: .......... ya .. nt endaḍe ǁ

châ ...... gepa .. sha ...... tikâmala-dêviya ...... di .. rali ho ............ leyadi berasi ....
kâdu .. poyi seḷeyind ene munipa ...... Saḷa ...poydu Hoysaḷan âdaṃ ǁ

lg.l: lîleyin intu puṭṭida ...... na râjyavan unnati-vettu tâḷdidaṃ |
migil ene .. va Pâṇḍya-nâḍoḷ atiśayav enip Em- |
eḷeg Emmiganûra vṛitti sogayisi tôrkkuṃ ǁ
râvatiya samânav eseva sompina pempiṃ ǁ

div.p: â-manneya .. nvayav ent endaḍe ǁ

svasti samasta-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvaraṃ Dvârâvatî-pura-varêśvaraṃ Yâ-
dava-kuḷâmbara-dyumaṇi samyaktva-chûḍâmaṇi Malerâja-râja Maleparoḷ gaṇḍa kadana-prachaṇḍan
asahâya-śauryya Śanivâra-siddhi Giri-durgga-malla chalad-aṅka-Râma niśśaṅka-pratâpa Hoysaḷa-
râya vîra-Nârasiṃha-Dêvaru Dôrasamudrada nelevîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyu-
ttav ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ

lg.l: jana-nâtaṃ Nârasiṃha-kshitipati negaḷd î-Rebbachaṃ têjavant â- |
jana ........ Nârasiṃhaṃ Surapati .. va ... yindaṃ .. Rebbachaṃ tâṃ |
jvaḷa-têjaṃ Râghavaṃ sundaran e .... chakradoḷ viśvarûpaṃ |
........ dîpaṃ sakala-guṇa-sad-artthaṃ Śaṅkaraṃ tâṃ kṛitârtthaṃ ǁ
. mmiga .. dharmma-guṇad unnatiyaṃ taḷed intu kîrtti-vet- |
.... kîrttiyaṃ paḍeda Rudrane dhanyan iḷâ-taḷâgradoḷ ǁ
dhareyoḷu Rudranavol âru jasavaṃ paḍedar ǁ
Mêruva pempan ambudhiya gumpan Anantana .. ryyavaṃ kaḷâ- |
ṭige guṇa-yukte Kâdavege puṭṭidan intu Biyâḷa-nâmadiṃ |
nûroḷu Biyâḷa-Gêti-seṭṭi guṇa ...... n ene kîrtti .. |

div.p:
ant Emmiganûr-oḍeya Jakkarasaru Biyâḷa-Gêta-seṭṭi (others named) intu samasta-prabhu-gâvuṇḍu-
gaḷuṃ adhikâri-Râghava-Dêva-Pampayyaṅgaḷu-mukhyavâgi Śakavarusha 1142 neya Vikrama-
saṃvatsarada Jêshṭad-amâvâse-Sômavâra-sûryya-grahaṇadandu Hiriy-Emmeganûra śrî-Svayam-
bhu-Kali-dêvara aṅga-bhôga-raṅga-bhôga-pâtrapâvuḷa-Chaitra-pavitra-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhâra .... gi
Handiganahaḷḷiyanu yama-niyamânushṭhâna-sampannarappa Amṛitarâsigaḷa putra Bîmarâśigaḷa
makkaḷu Brahmaśivamâḷa-gurugaḷa pâda-prakshâḷanaṃ mâḍi dhârâ-pûrvvakamâgi koṭṭaru â-haḷḷiya
sîmey âvud endaḍe (here follow boundaries) ...... koṭṭa ǁ svasti samasta-vas[u]ma[tî]taḷâkhyâta-
Gaṅgânvaya pratâpa-Mâhêśvara Nandagiri-nâtha ma .. Mândhâtaṃ nanniya-Gaṅga jayad-utta-
raṅga mada-gaja-lâñchhana viniyôga-kâñchana Padumâvatî-dêviya labdha-vara-prasâdanuṃ kaṇ-
ṇambin-âta yesuvar-âditya sayi-gôla-Pârttha hariyarasaṅgaṃ ...... Dêviya .... huṭṭida Bamma-
rasa-Dêvaru Bhîmarâsi-gurugaḷa pâda-prakshâlanaṃ mâḍi .. dhârâ-pûrvakavâgi koṭṭa pûrvva-datti ǁ
prathama-sthaḷada gadde tumbina modalalu Gaṅgana gaḷeyalu .. mattaru 1 Biyâḷa-Kêti-Seṭṭigaṃ
Chikkaüvegaṃ puṭṭida Kêśava-Seṭṭi koṭṭa gadde kamba (here follow details) śrîmatu Pâṇḍya-nâḍa
hejjuṅkada heggaḍe Ruddaṇyanu Emmeganûra vṛittiya davasâyada suṅkadoḷage śrî-Svayambhu-Kali-
dêvara nandâdîvigege biṭṭa ga 3 (further details and usual final phrases).

Bhûriśravaṃ kâyvara-Java prabalad aggal̤i ripu ........ uttaraṅga (right side) .... ratha ....

and verses).

60
