ḷeyara-Dêvayya .. sasa vil̤du dêva .... sîma-gal

div.head:
62
At the same village, on a stone in the enclosure of the Âñjanêya temple.
div.p:
śrî-śûli-Mallikârjjuna-dêvara śrî-pâdavê gati svasti śrî[ja]yâbhyudaya-Sâlivâhana-śaka-varuśa 1462 nê
Sârvari-saṃvacharada dvitî[ya]-Asva[yu]ja-su 10 lu râjâdhirâja paramêśvara vîra-pratâpa-Achyuta-ma-
hârâyaru Vidyânagarav emba mahâ-paṭṭaṇadali simvasana .... sukha-râjyaṃ gaiütta .... goṭṭu pu ...
ḷagaṇ .......... sarvvamânyavâgi pâlisidev emba nirûpadindalu avara kâryyake kârtarâda Penugoṇḍeya
Vîrappa-Nâykanavara nirûpadinda avara .... Hiriya-Mallappaṇṇa-ayyanavaru Jâjûra sîmeya
maduveya suṅkava sarvvamânyavâgi biṭṭadake subham astu avara kâryyake kartarâda ...... rappa
gaüḍugaḷu sênabôgu paṭṭaṇa-svâmi.... praje halaru svâmigaḷu maduveya suṅkavanu sarvvamânyavâgi
biṭṭudakke subam astu yî-maduveya-suṅkavanu sarvamânyavâgi samastarige binnahava mâḍi biḍisi-
davaru Dummiya paṭṭaṇa-svâmi Mâḷi-seṭṭiyara makkaḷu nâḍa-paṭṭaṇa-svâmi ... sade yâru maduveya
suṅkavanu sarvvamânyavâgî biṭṭudakke (usual imprecatory phrases).

div.head:
63
On a second stone in the same place.
div.p:
śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ svasti śrî [ja]yâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śakha-varuśada Durmmukhi-saṃvatsa-
rada Chayitra-su 10 lu śrîmatu Jâjûra sîmege saluva Jâjûra staḷada kelasêrige Basavâpaṭaṇada
Havâladâra Bâba-sâhêbara bage jamînadâra Triyambaka-Sakhaji-paṇḍitara kârakiradiyalu hudâra
Aṇṇâji-pantaru Jâjûra sênabhôgarâdantha Mâdayyana maga Sadâśivayana maga Chikaṇṇa (others
named) saha yivaru pûrvadalli râyara kâladalli sarvamânyarâgi naḍadu baruttidaru yittalâgi
............ bêḍike yendu chinivânava koṭṭu baruttiddaru ada nâvu sarvamânyavâgi biṭṭevu (usual
final phrases).

div.head:
65
At Muttagadûr (same hobli), on a stone near the Kallêśvara temple.
div.p:
śrî svasti samasta-bhuvana-vallabhaṃ śrî-pṛithivî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvaraṃ parama-
bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-ku .... lôkyamalla-Dêvaru Bandaṇikeya-Ghaṭṭadali sukha-saṅkathâ-vinô-
dadiṃ râjyaṃ geyye svasti samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ Nârasiṅgha-Dêvaṃ Kadambaḷige-sâyiramuman
âḷuttire Saka-varisha 974 neya Khara-saṃvatsarad-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrântiyandu ...... vase .. Dêvar
appa Gaṅgarasanu Bimandarasanu tamma .... ruviṅge tamma Râcharasaṅge ker̤eya kaṭṭisi mûvatt-
âr̤u ...... ṅge modalêriyalu koṭṭa mânya gadde mattar ondu (here follow details of gift &c., and usual
final phrases) ............ biṭṭa datti

div.head:
66
At Gañjigaṭṭe (same hobli), on a stone near the gate of the Gâdri temple.
div.p:
śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ śrî-Râmachandra.................. Śrîmukha-saṃvatsarada ..........
Nâyaka-ayyanavarige puṇyav âgal endu ...... Kariyappa-Nâyakaru Gâdaripâli-Nâyaka-svâmige koṭṭa
Gañjigaṭṭe-grâma .. chandra-sûryyar uḷḷa pariyantradalu (usual imprecatory phrases) yî-svâmige
stânika .... ba pûjâ ...... pûjâri baradâta Muttakadûra staḷada sênabôva ........................

div.head:
67
At the same village, on a stone outside the Kampaḷa-Narasiṃha temple.
div.p:
śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ Nîrataḍiya Avubaḷa-Nârasiṃhanê gati Vibhava-saṃvatsarada-Mârggaśira-
śu 1 lu śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchârya Kâmageti-Kastûri-Raṅgappa-Nâyaka-ayyanavarige puṇyav âgabêk
endu Tâḷeda Kariyappa-Nâyakaru ...... Nâyaka-svâmige Gañjigaṭṭe-grâmavanu ............
sûrya-chandrâdigaḷ uḷḷa-pariyantradalu (usual final phrases) yî-svâmi-stânikaru dêvara pûjâri voppa
pûjâri .... pûjâri ba ........ ke Muttakadûra staḷada saṃstaṇa Honna.... tina svâmya pûrvvadali
koṭṭadu vokkaḷada hola yî-śâsana nintâ .... ge koṭṭadu vokkuḷada hola (usual imprecatory phrases)
śrî-Râma

div.head:
68
At Guñjaganûr (same hobli), on a stone behind the Îśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ parama-
bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kul̤a-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-
râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ paduḷaṃ saluttam ire
tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-sabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara Kâñchî-pura-
varâdhîśvaraṃ Yad[u]-vaṃśâmbara-dyumaṇi su-bhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârṭṭaṇḍa pari-
chhêdi-gaṇḍa Râjiga-Chôla-manô-bhaṅgaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaru Noḷambavâḍi-
mûvattirchchâsiramumaṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyvuttam ire svasti vas[u]matî-taḷa-
khyâṭaṃ Gaṅgânvaya-prasûtaṃ Koṅguṇivarmma-dharmma-mahârâjâdhirâja vandi-jana-kalpa-
bhûjaṃ Kôḷâla-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ.... pa-Mahêśvaraṃ Nandagiri-nâtha manuja-Mândhâta nanniya
Gaṅga jayad-uttaraṅga mada-gajêndra-lâñchhana viniyôga-kâñchana Padmâvatî-labdha-vara-pra-
sâda mṛigamadâmôda .... kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍan aṇiyoḍe gaṇḍa kôdaṇḍa-Pârttha ra ...... rta
śaraṇâgata-vajra-pañjara vairi-dik-kuñjaraṃ kshatriya ...... tra parâṅganâ-putra chatus-samaya-
[sa]muddharaṇaṃ dêśiy-âbharaṇaṃ ripu-gaḷa-Kâḷa-pâśan ayyana chandrahâsa nâmâdi-praśasti-sahi-
taṃ śrî-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ Gaṅgarasaru tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi Guñjigauûra prabhu-gâvuṇḍugaḷu
kumbâra Bammaṇa tale pûsad anna vuṇada vîra-bratama kaykoṇḍu pratishṭeyaṃ mâḍisida Kum-
bêśvara-dêvar-aṅga-bhôgakke nandâ-dîvigegaṃ nivêdyakkaṃ sarvva-bâdhâ-parihâramâgi Araker̤eya
keḷage biṭṭa gar̤de kammav innûr̤u 200 (details of further grant) Gaṅgarasaru Kukkavâḍi-mûnûr̤uman
âḷuttam iḷdu Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâla la 51 neya Parâbhava-saṃvatsarada Pôshya-su 10 Sômavârad
uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrânti-vyatîpâtadandu Utta varâsi-paṇḍitara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi
koṭṭa dharmma Ponnôjag ondu kauṅg ele-vaḷḷi .... samasta ........ (usual final phrases).

div.head:
69
On a side of the same stone.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Dâsi-Seṭṭiyaru Kukkavâḍi-mûnûr̤ar̤a pannâyamaṃ nôḍut il̤du Kumbêśvara-dêvarige
pannâyada suṅkavaṃ biṭṭaru śrîmad-guṇa-gaṇâbharaṇa Abeyager̤e-ûr-oḍeya Saṅkarayya bareda

div.head:
70
At (bêchirakh) Tyâgadahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone near the bastion.

lg.l: namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ Harêr lîlâ-&c. ǁ

div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varuśa sâ 1438 sandu Yîsvara-saṃvatsarada Kârttika-su 12
lu srîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêsvara srî-vîra-pratâpa srî-Kṛishṇa-Râya-mahârâyara ....
kâryyake karttarâda pradhâna-Malarasarû Jâjûra gaviya Tirumala-dêvarige śrî-Kṛishṇa-Râya-mahâ-
râyaru namage nâyakatanake pâlisida Jâjûra sîmege saluva Têgadahaḷi-grâmavanu Virûpâksha-
Viṭhalêśvara-śrî-Kṛishṇa-dêvara sannidhîli â-grâma-chatus-sîme-voḷagâda ashṭa-bhôga-sahitavâgi
sahiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvakavâgi koṭevâgi âr obaru â-grâmava aḷupi tegadukoṇḍavaru (usual
imprecatory phrases).

div.head:
71
At Kaḍûr (same hobli), on a rock south-east of the Vîrabhadra temple.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1462 ne Sârvari-saṃvatsarada Margaśira-
śudha 10 lu śrîmaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-Achyuta-Dêva-Râya-
mahârâyaru Vidyânagarav emba mahâ-paṭṭaṇadali siṃhâsanâr̤ûḍharâgi pṛithvî-râjyavan âḷutt ira-
lu Penuguṇḍeya Vîrappa-ayanavarige samar̤a...... Gaṅgapâlaja .......... Bâgûra sîmeya voḷagaṇa
Pâṇḍi-dêśake saluva Sakala-sîmeya sthaḷada Kaḍavûru-grâma 1 danu â-Kaḍavûra Vîrêśvara-dêvarige
amṛitapaḍi-nandâdyuti-aṅga-raṅga-vayibhôgake Makara-saṅkrânti-puṇya-kâladalu sahiraṇyôdaka-
dâna-dhârâ-pûrvvakavâgi â-Kaḍavûra Vîrabhadra-dêvarige samarpistevu â-Kaḍavûra-grâmada chatus-
sîmeya vivara (details of boundaries) yint î-chatus-sîmey-oḷaguḷa nidhi-nikshêpa-jala-pâshâṇa-akshîṇi-
âgâmi-siddha-sâdhyaṅgaḷ emba asḥta-bhôga-têjas-svâmyavanu Kaḍavûra Virabhadra-dêvarige amṛita-
paḍi-nandâdîpa-aṅga-raṅga-vaibhogake samarpistevu endu koṭa Kaḍavûra dharmma-śâsana |
Jâjûra gaṇâchâri-(others named) oḷagâda gavuḍa-prajegaḷu Kaḍavûra Vîrabhadra-dêvarige amṛitapaḍi-
nandâdîpa-aṅga-raṅga-vayibhôgake Achyuta-Râya-mahârâyara âṇa viḍidu Virappaṇṇa .... navaru
Vîrabhadra-dêvarige aṅga-raṅga-vayibhôgake koḍalu Kaḍavüra Kaḍavûra grâma 1 vondunu sarvamânyava
naḍasi bahevu yî-grâmake arasugaḷu gaṇâchârigaḷu suṅkadavaru nâḍu taḷavâr̤aru kuḷa-sidâya
bêḍige kâṇikeyaru âru aḷupidarû (usual imprecatory phrases).

div.head:
72
At the same village, on a stone on the old tank bund.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1439 .. Îśvara-saṃvatsarada Kârti ... śu 10
yallu Malarâja-Nâykanavaru Bâgûra sîmeya .... ruvantha Jâjûra sîmeya mê.... da Kâḍavura ker̤eya
kaṭṭe kaṭṭisi jîrṇôddhârava .... yida kaṭṭisidavaru Vâmarasa-ayanavaru

div.head:
73
At Râmagiri (Râmagiri hobli), on a stone north of the Kariyamma temple.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu Śâlivâhana-śaka-varashaṅgaḷu 1440 neya Bahudhânya-saṃavtsarada Mâgha-sudha
12 Budhavâradalu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara śrî-vîr a Kṛishṇa-Râyara mahâ-pradhâna
Bâgûru-Mallarasayyanavaru Râmagiriyalli hoti ... santeya nerasi adar̤a suṅkava Sidapanu Râmay-
anu Râmêliṅga .. udayada-kâladalli mosaru-bhôjanada naivêdya sa .... v eradu koṭṭa mânya ..
........ (usual final phrases).

div.head:
75
At the same village, on the hill near the Siddhêśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śaka-varuśa sâ
* So in the original : but it should be 1327. 1332 neya Pârtthiva-saṃvatsarada Kârttika-su 1 lu Hosa-
paṭṭaṇada Lakhaṇṇa-Voḍeyara nirûpadiṃ Dummiya suṅkada Hosapa-Buḷḷapaṅgaḷu Râmagiriya
Râmaya-dêvara amṛita-paḍige prati-tingaḷu 1 ke Râmaya-dêvarige σ 3 Vîrabhadra-dêvarige σ 2 yî-
ayidu haṇavanû Râmagiriya pasi(left side)ge pasarâyavanu yî-mariyâdeyalu dharmma-gâriyavanu
naḍasavaru munde Dummi hadula thâṇeyada suṅkavanû mâḍuvâtanu yî-dharmmava pâlisabahudu
(usual final phrases and verses).

div.head:
79
At Guṇḍasamudra (same hobli), on a stone standing against to the wall of the Basavaṇṇa temple.
div.p:
śrîmatu Sârvari-Saṃvachharadalu Bâgûra charanti Râmagiri-dêvarige Kâmagetti-Kastûri-Medakeri-
Nâyakaru Guṇḍasamudrada puravargga koṭadu (usual imprecatory phrases).

div.head:
80
At the same village, on a copper plate in possession of Paṭêl Siddayya.
div.p:
svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śakasâ 1605 neya Rudhirôdgâri-saṃvatsarada Vaiśâkha-su 10
llu śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchârya Kâmageti-Kastûri-Chikkappa-Nâyakar-aiyanavaru ǁ Bâgûra charanti
Chenna-Basavappa-dêvara komâra Rudrappa-dêvarige barasi koṭṭa | Śivârpitavâge putra-pavutra-
pârampareyâgi anubhavisikoṇḍu yîhyad eudu koṭṭa bhûmi-vivara Bâgûra sîmege saluva hosa-grâma
Vîrâpuravannu namma ûḷigada bokasta Mudaṇṇana magaḷu Gaṅgammanu Rudrappa-dêvarige
tamage anêka-dharmav âgaliy endu sahiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhâraṇa-pûrvakavâgi ashṭa-bhôga saha
anubhavisikoṇḍu yihad endu koṭa silâ-sâsana | yidanu nâḍigara Chennappa Nâraṇappa Râmaiya
saha hâki koṭṭa śilâ-śâsanakke maṅgaḷa mahâ ǁ śrî

div.head:
81
On another copper plate in possession of the same.
div.p:
svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Ślivâhana-śaka sâ 1581 neya Śârvvari-nâma-saṃvatsarada Vaiśâka-śu
10 lu śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchârya Kâmageti-Kastûri-Medakeri-Nâyakar-aiyanavaru Bâgûra charanti
Chenna-Basappa-dêvarige barasi koṭa śilâ-stâpanâ | Śivârpita Bâgûra-sîme-vaḷagana Guṇḍasamudrava
puravargava koṭṭadu | yî-grâmakke saluva gade beddalu mane mâru sarve samastavannu bhûmi-
yannu sarvamânyavâgi dhârâ-pûrvakavâgi koṭṭu idhêve yî-bhôgavannu anubhavisikoṇḍu tri-
kâladallu Śivârchaneyannu mâḍikoṇḍu sukadallu ihyadu î-dharmake tappidare Karṇṇâṭagadavaru
aḷupidare Kâsiyallu gôvn koyidahâge Musalmâna tappidare Maskedalli handi koyidahâge | (further
final phrases) staḷa-mânya pûrva-mariyâde śrî śrî (usual final verses) Guṇḍasamudrada grâma

div.head:
84
At Gaṅgasamudra (same hobli), on a stone into the tank bund.
div.p:
subham astu svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusa 1441 neya Bahudhânya-saṃvatsarada
Kârtika-śu 15 lu śrîman-mahâ-râjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-vîra-Kṛishṇa-Râya-
mahârâyaru pṛithuvî-râjyaṃ geyiütt iralu Kṛishṇa-Râya-mahârâyara pradhâna Ba.. kama-arasaya-
navarige dharmavâgi avara adhikâri-manusya Vâmarasanu kaṭisida ker̤eya jîrṇôddhâra maṅgaḷa mahâ
śrî

div.head:
85
At Hebbaḷḷi (same hobli), on a vîrakal to the north of the Kallêdêva temple.
div.p:
svasti Saka-va kâlâtîta 899 śrîmat-nanni..... Kandarpa taruṇî-viḷâsa ahitar̤a Pârtha Arabalavana
âḷdoḍe Chôl̤ara Pil̤duveyya Pervvaḷḷiya tur̤ugoḷoḷ svarggasthan âdandu Arabalava Pervvaḷḷiya Pil̤du-
veyya....... râjyam uḷḷannavaraṃ bâḷgal̤chu kalnâṭu goṭṭa kiḍisidandu Vâraṇâsiyan al̤idôr

div.head:
86
On a second vîrakal in the same place.
div.p:
svasti ......śataṅga 898 varishadandu śrîma............ Kûka-Kandarppa taruṇî-viḷâsa ........
.. rttha Arabalavan âḷe Pil̤duva . nu .. ganu Pervvaḷḷiya tur̤ugoḷoḷ svarggastar âdôr tammutt
irvvar

div.head:
87
On a third vîrakal in the same place.
div.p:
svasti Śaka-varisha-saṃvatsara .. kâlâtîta 898 varishadandu śrîmat-nanniy-âlôka Kûka-Kandarppa
taruṇî-viḷâsa ahitaṅge Pârttha Arabalavana mane-vakkaḷ Bâkayya tur̤ugoḷoḷ svarggasthan âdaṃ

div.head:
88
On a fourth vîrakal in the same place.
div.p:
(The upper portion is gone) Kannara-Dêva prithuvî-râjyaṃ geyye Gaṅgavâḍi-tombattaru-sâsiramaṃ
Mârasiṅga-Permmâḍi âḷutt ire Perbbaḷḷi Nanniya-Gaṅga-Gâvuṇḍan ûr-ggâvuṇḍu geyyutt ire Sindara
Mâda .. yya ...... r̤ugoḷoḷ ............ Garajjayyana mayduna Muddeyya tur̤ugoḷoḷ muktige sanda

div.head:
89
At Nâraṇagoṇḍanhaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone in the field No. 101.
div.p:
svasti jayâbhyudaya-Śaka-varuśa
* So in the original : Śaka 1333 = Vikṛti, Vyaya = 1329. 1333 neya Vyaya-saṃvatsarada Kârttika-su 15 lu Ellahadêva-
Nâyka Nânadhriva-Nâykaru Paḍuvala Râmanâtha-devara amṛita-paḍige Gauraṇa-Gauḍana kayalu
gadde bîjavari σ 1¼ beddale yî-vondanû koṭṭevu (usual final phrases and verses).

div.head:
90
At Hosadurga (Hosadurga hobli), an a stone in the Vîrabhadra temple.
div.p:
śrî-Vîrabhadra-dêvarige Mayilâra-dêvarige Śukla-saṃvatsarada Kârtika-śu 14 lu Kâmagettiya
Timmappana maga ... Baḍige koṭa ...gana keḷa-giriya goḍasi Ragapurada umâru.. koṭa grâma-
sîmeyoḷagâgi koṭa hâkida Baḍigi-dêvarige....

div.head:
91
At Kellôḍu (same hobli), on a stone in the lane of Hanumanta’s house.
div.p:
yî-grâmake salataka mânnegâru karaṇika Chikarasapanavaru maṭhadaiyagaḷu Kuṇṭa-vaḍêru ǁ koṇḍi-
kâra Timmadâsaiya taḷavâra Maluna-Mâdi-Nâyaka yidu saṭey endu nuḍidavaṅge agôra-naraka
tapadu ǁ

div.head:
92
At the same village, on a stone in the Hanumanta temple.
div.p:
śrimatu sakala-guṇa-sampannar âda Sante-Bennûra ha Hanimi-Nâykana mommaga Daḷa-Nâykaru
Kelagôḍina Hanumanta-dêvarige Kur̤ubarahaḷḷi ... saṃvatsara-Śrâvaṇa-sudha ... pakshadalu hâkida
... charyara baraha śrî

div.head:
94
At Mattôḍu (same hobli), on copper plates in possession of Narasamma.
div.p: (Nâgarî characters)
(I b) śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ |

lg.l: Harêr lîlâ-varâhasya daṃshṭrâ-daṇḍas sa pâtu vaḥ |
Hêmâdri-kalaśâ yatra dhatrî chhatra-śriyaṃ dadhau ǁ
yad gajô’py Agajôdbhûtaṃ Hariṇâpi cha pûjyatê ǁ
tasyâsît tanayas tapôbhir atuḷair anvartha-nâmâ Budbaḥ
puṇyair asya Purûravâ bhuja-balair âyur dvishâṃ nighnataḥ |
tasy Âyur Nahushô’sya tasya parushô yuddhê Yayâtiḥ kshitau
khyâtas tasya tu Turvasur Vasu-nibhaḥ śrî-Dêvayânî-patêḥ ǁ
yaśasvî Tuḷavêndrêshu Yadôḥ Kṛishṇa ivânvayê ǁ
Kâvêrîm âśu badhvâ bahuḷa-jala-rayâṃ yô vilaṅghyaiva śatruṃ
jîvagrâhaṃ gṛihîtvâ samiti bhuja-balât tañ cha râjyaṃ tadîyaṃ |
kṛitvâ Śrîraṅga-pûrvaṃ tad api nija-vaśê paṭṭaṇaṃ yô babhâsê
Chêraṃ Chôḷañ cha Pâṇḍyaṃ tam api cha Madhurâ-vallabham mâna-bhûshaṃ
vîryôdagraṃ Turushkaṃ Gajapati-nṛipatiṃ châpi jitvâ tadanyân |
khyâta-kshôṇîpatînâṃ srajam iva śirasâ śâsanaṃ yô vyatânît ǁ
dêvyôr iva Nṛisiṃhêndrât tasmât Paṅtirathâd iva ǁ
kîrtyâ nîtyâ nirasyan Nṛiga-Naḷa-Nahushân apy avanyâm athânyân |
â sêtôr â Sumêrôr avanisura-nutaḥ svairam â chôdayâdrêr
â-pâśchatyâchalântâd akhiḷa-hṛidayam âvarjya râjyaṃ śaśâsa ǁ
sthânê śrî-Kâḷahastîśitur api nagarê Veṅkaṭâdrau cha Kâñchyaṃ ǁ
Śrîśailê Śôṇa-śailê mahati Hariharê’hôbalê Saṅgamê cha
Śrîraṅgê Kumbhaghôṇê hata-tamasi mahâ-Nanditîrthê Nivṛittau ǁ
Gôkarṇê Râmasêtau jagati tad-itarêshv apy aśêshêshu puṇya-
svarṇa-kshmâṃ yô hiraṇyâśva-ratham api tulâ-pûrushaṃ gô-sahasraṃ
hêmaśvaṃ hêma-garbhaṃ kanaka-kari-rathân pañcha-lâṅgaly atânît ǁ
prâjyaṃ praśasya nirvighnaṃ râjyaṃ dyâm iva śâsituṃ |
tasmin guṇêna vikhyâtê kshitêr indrê divaṃ gatê ǁ
kîrtyâ yasya samantataḥ prasṛitayâ viśvaṃ ruchaikyaṃ vrajêd
ity âśaṅkya purâ Purârir abhavat phâlêkshaṇaḥ prâyaśaḥ |
Kâḷî khaḍgam adhâd Ramâ cha kamalaṃ viṇâñ cha Vâṇî karê ǁ
śatrûṇâṃ vâsam êtê dadata iti rushâ kin nu saptâmburâśîn
mad-dattâm arthi-sârthâś śriyam iha suchiraṃ bhuñjatâm ity avêtya
prâyaḥ pratyûha-hêtôs tapana-ratha-gatêr âlayam dêvatâ(II b)nâṃ |
stambhâñ jâti-pratishṭhân atanuta bhuvi yô bhûbhṛid abhraṅkashâgrân ǁ
âvartyâvartya sarvêshv atanuta vidhivad bhûyasê śrêyasê yaḥ |
dânâny êvôpadânair api samam akhiḷair âgamôktâni tâni ǁ
Aṅga-Vaṅga-Kaḷiṅgâdyai râjabhis sêvyatê cha yaḥ ǁ

kshmâpâlân Kṛishṇa-Râya-kshitipatir adharîkṛitya
* The intervening portion of the stanza is wanting in the original. kîrtyâ samindhê |
puṇyêpy Arddhôdayê Bhânuvâsarê samayê śubhê ǁ
grâma-grâsârtham asyaiva grâmaṃ Hattadorai tathâ ǁ
vividhair vibudhais śrauta-pathikair adhikair girâ ǁ
yaśasvî yajamânô’sâv imaṃ grâmaṃ vibhajya cha |

div.p: (here follow names &c. of vṛittidars and the details of boundaries).

div.head:
95
A copper plate in possession of the above Narasamma.
div.p: This contains only 13 lines which correspond with the opening portion of No. 94 above.

div.head:
96
On another copper sâsana in possession of the above Narasamma.
div.p: (Nâgarî characters).
(I a) śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ |

lg.l: Harêr lîlâ-varâhasya daṃshtrâ-daṇḍas sa pâtu vaḥ |
Hêmâdri-kalaśâ yatra dhâtrî chhatra-śriyaṃ dadhau ǁ
bhaktânâm ishṭadaṃ dêvaṃ kalayâmi Gaṇâdhipaṃ ǁ
datvâ svarṇṇañ cha vâsô Harihara-divasêshv âtta-kîrttir dvijêbhyaḥ
śauryê Śakrasya tulyaḥ śaśi-nibha-vadanaḥ śikshitâśêsha-śatruḥ ǁ
tasya śrî-Doḍḍaṇâkhyô narapatir abhavat sûnur ugra-pratâpaḥ
Râmâdrâv agrahâraṃ kuru vimala-jalaṃ kârayîtvâ taṭâkaṃ
tênaivaṃ chôditôsau sapadi samakarôd agrahâraṃ mahâtmâ ǁ
âgâminy adhikâ vâpi sarvamânyêna bhujyatâṃ ǁ
śrîmân śâsati mêdinîṃ chirataraṃ dharmêṇa tasmin nṛipê
kîrtiṃ tasya nṛipôttamasya mahatîṃ prâpuḥ sukhaṃ châdhikaṃ ǁ
dṛishṭvâ bhinnaṃ taṭâkaṃ pṛithutara-mrigayâm âcharan kânanê cha |
tân hatvâ râja-varyô vipina-taḷam asau bhîti-hînaṃ chakâra ǁ
putrau mat-tâta-tâtêna yô’grahâraḥ purâ (II a) kṛitaḥ |
tasyâsmâbhiś cha kartavyaṃ pâlanaṃ dharma-kâṅkshibhiḥ ǁ
śrutvâ tu tau tadâ vâkyaṃ pituḥ priyakarasya tat |
tathêty avadatâm astu dharmaṃ pâlaya satvaraṃ ǁ
Hiryaṇṇaṃ Râmachandraṃ cha kshipram âhûya bhûmipaḥ |
abravîd agrahârasya taṭâkaḥ kriyatâm iti ǁ
Hiryaṇṇa-Râmachandrau tu râjñaḥ śrutvâ vachas tadâ |
Râkshasâbdê Mâgha-mâsê Śivarâtrau Śivâya cha ǁ
śâsanaṃ chadadau râjâ Gañjigêra-purasya saḥ ǁ
nâma nirdiśya tênaiva Hiryaṇṇena sunirmitaṃ ǁ
vṛittînâṃ viniyôgaś cha kathyatê Narasâpurê ǁ

div.p: (here follow names &c. of vṛittidars, boundaries and usual final verses).

div.head:
98
At the same village, on a stone in the back-yard of Barber Saṅkappa’s house.
div.p:
śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâryyar âda Mattinaḍuvina Doḍaṇa-Nâyakaru Sâlivâhana-śaka-varsha 1593
neya Virôdhikṛit-saṃvatsarada Phâlguṇa-śu- 2 Sômavâradalu paṭṭada komâra Chinnada-Giriyappa-
Nâyakara vivâha-mahôtsava-samayadalu Mattinaḍuvina sthaḷada kshaurakaru tamma terigeya
pâlsikô endu binnahaṃ mâḍikoḷḷalâgi nimminda sâvira baruvad irdaru pâlsikoṇḍeü endu
staḷada gauḍa-śânabhôva-modalâdavara sanmatadallu śilâ-śâsanakke pâlsikkoṇḍeü (imprecatory
phrases).

div.head:
99
At the same village, on a stone in the well in Kalla-Nâyaka’s garden.
div.p:
svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varushaṅgaḷu 1668 neya Prabhava-nâma-saṃvatsarada
Kârttika-śu 2 lu râjêśrî Siddharâmapa-Nâyakaravaru Mattinaḍuvina Kallayyage barasikoṭṭa śilâ-
śâsana chirañjîvi-Siddharâ .. ge hâlu-beṇṇege Ânigaṭehaḷḷi-bhûmiyalli yiruva aramane-tôṭada
teṅka-dikkinalli yiruva bhûmi-chaükavannu pâlisikkoṇḍu śilâ-śâsanava mâḍisikoṭṭ u yiditu yî-bhû-
miyannu ninna putra-pautra-pâramparyavâgi anubhavisikoṇḍu sukhadali yirôdu yendu barasikoṭṭa
silâ-śâsana yî-bhûmige daṇḍina paṭi-ruṇa-muntâgi pâlisikoṇḍiditu sukhadali anubhavisikoṇḍu yiruvadu

div.head:
101
At Arehaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone in Bâla’s threshing floor.
div.p:
svasti śri jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varsha 1629 ne Sarvvajitu-nâma-saṃvatsarada Srâvaṇa-śu
7 Aṅgârakavâradalu śrîmad-râjâdhirâja-râja-paramêśvara ............ śrî-Saṅgapa-Nâyakara putrar
âda...lapa-Nâyakaraiyanavaru tamma mâtâ-pitṛigaḷige Śiva-sânnidhyav âgabêkuy endu Murige-svâ-
migaḷa Mattanaḍuvina .... maṭakaṭi koṭṭanta Mattanaḍuvina sîmege saluva Arehaḷḷi-grâmavanu
Śivârpitav âgi koṭṭa śilâ-śâsana (usual final phrases).

div.head:
102
At Attimogge (same hobli), on a vîrakal in the Mallêdêva temple.
div.p:
śrî Raudri-saṃvatsarada Mâgha-su 3 Bri-vâradandu svasti samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-nâḍa-pra-
bhu gaḍiy-aṅka-bhîma kaṭaka-tôṭikâr̤a mar̤eyokaḍe kâva sitaga-nâyara gaṇḍa śaraṇâgata-vajra-
pañjararuṃ bandhu-jana-bândhavaruṃ śrî-Râmanâtha-dêvara dibya-śrî-pâda-padumârâdhakarum appa
Attimogheya Balla-gauḍana maga Chika-gauḍana maga Bayichaṇṇa-gauḍanu yakatuḷam ir̤idu
svarggastan âdanu yidu Bayichaṇṇana bîragalu maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî

div.head:
103
At the same place, on a second vîrakal.
div.p:
(Lines 1 to 4 are the same as in previous No.) gaḍigeḷâḷaguḍige bandhu-jana-bândhavaruṃ śrî-Râma-
nâtha dêvara divya-śrî-pâda-padumârâdhakarum appa Attimogheya Balla-gauḍana maga Mudda-gau-
ḍanu yakatuḷam ir̤idu svarggastan âdanu yidu Mudda-gauḍana bîragalu maṅgaḷamahâ maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî

div.head:
104
At Huṇuvinôḍu (same hobli), on a stone to the north of the Nârâyaṇa temple.
div.p:
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ ...... Dvârâvatî-pura-varâdhîśvara Yâdava-kuḷâm-
bara-dyumaṇi samyaktva-chûḍâmaṇi Malerâja-râja Malaparoḷe-gaṇḍâdy-anêka-nâmâḷaṅkṛitam appa
śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Tribhuvanamalla vîra-Vishṇuvarddhana-Hoyisaṇa-Dêvara pratâpav
ent endaḍe |

lg.l: Chôḷana jûbu Mâḷavana goḷmuri Chêranan aṭṭi timba Mâ- |
kâḷi Kaḷiṅganaṃ tuḷiva gandha-gajaṃ Khachan-aḷḷey-ambu Nê- |
pâḷakan emba sambhramame vairi-nṛipâḷara maṇḍaḷaṅgaḷoḷ ǁ
Naṅgali Koṅgu Siṅghamale Râyapuraṃ Taḷakâḍu Roddav â- |
Cheṅgiri-vâsa Koḷḷagiri Baḷḷare Valluru Chakragoṭṭam U- |

div.p: âtana tanûjana parâkramav ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: pâḷakar ôḍi pokku gahanântaramaṃ kshu ...... val anya-bhû- |
pâḷaroḷ irdda haṅgaḷane ...... made kâyi kâyi ba...nṛi- |
pâḷay emb idane hambalisirddudu vairi-saṅkuḷaṃ ǁ

div.p:
ant enisida śrîmanu mahâ-maṇḍalêśvaraṃ Taḷakâḍu-Koṅgu-Naṅgali-Gaṅgavâḍi-Noṇambavâḍi-
Banavase-Hânuṅgallu-goṇḍa bhuja-bal̤a-pratâpan asahâya-sûra nissaṅka-pratâpa Hoysaṇa-vîra-
Ballâḷa-Dêvaru Gaṅgavâḍi-tombhattâr̤u-sâsiramumaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷanaṃ geydu
Dôrasamudrada nelavîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire tatu-pâdârâdhakarum
appa śrîman-mahâ-sâmantâdhipati mahâ-sâmanta-ghasaṇi Nirugundada Chaṭṭaiya-Nâyakara pratâpa-
mahimônnatiy ent endoḍe ǁ

lg.l: Śrîyaṃ śrî-Gauriyaṃ pêr-uradoḷ eḍadoḷ appirddavar vviśva-lôka- |
âyuṃ śrîyuṃ jaya-śrîyuman anavarataṃ mâḷke chandrârkka-târam-(baraṃ) ǁ
mâriṭṭ ambaramaṃ Surâchaḷaman okkaysiṭṭu diṅkiṭṭu tat- |
pârâvâramam antum intum aḷaduṃ muntûgiyuṃ pôgiyuṃ |
pâraṃ kaṇḍavar uṇṭu pôlipa...... biṇpiniṃ guṇpinind |
âruṃ pôlvare pôlar anya-pritanâ-saṅghaṭṭanaṃ Chaṭṭanaṃ ǁ
agaṇitam appa Pâṇḍyana balaṃ ner̤e .......... dhâ- |
trige paḍichandamâg ir̤i .. saṅgatadoḷ keḍe Raṅgaûra kâ- |
taguḷdire yaṭṭidaṃ piḍidan aṅkada biṅkada vâji-râjiyaṃ ǁ

div.p: antu âtan âḷva ṃaṇḍaḷadalli |

lg.l: anuja ........ leyan enal ant â-kulada pem- |

div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvana-vikhyâta-Hari-Hara-Hiraṇyagarbhâdy anêka-pañcha-śata.... śikshaṇâgata-
vasundharâchâryanuṃ śrîma............... svâmigaḷu yêḷuvare hannonduvarege Jambû-dvîpa-
śirômaṇi mahat .. Sirâḷamaḷige Santesâsanada .. Nirggunda-nâḍa halara têjô-mûrtti-sameya-
dharmma-nistârakaṃ para-sameya-sâdhakaṃ tappe tappuvaṃ tappidaḍe r̤eppuvaṃ śrîman-mahâ-nâḷ-
prabhu Vommanakkiya Mâra-Seṭṭiyaru Arambaḷa-nâḍa baḷiya-vâḍan Dêsiyapaṭṭaṇa Santesâsanada
Sirâḷamaḷige Hûḷiganoḍuvina śrî-Mârêsvara-dêvara aṅga-bhôga-pûje-punaskâra-naivêdya-nandâdîvige-
khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhâravaṃ mâḍuvantâgi Śaka-varsha 1150 ya Sarbbadhâri-saṃvatsarada
Ashâḍha-bahuḷa-amâvâse-Sômavâra-sûryya-grahaṇadandu âchâryya Masaṇa-jîyage dhârâ-pûrbbakaṃ
mâḍi biṭṭa gadde (here follow details of gift and usual final verses and phrases).

lg.l: sâsanav âr ittar êke saḷisuve nân î- |
r â-sakaḷaṃ rauravakke gaḷagaḷan iḷivar ǁ

div.p: śrî-Mârêsvara-dêva saraṇu ǁ ..........

div.head:
105
At Śriraṅgapura (same hobli), on a stone north of the Raṅganâtha temple.
div.p:
śubham astu ǁ svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka sâ 1624 neya Chitrabhânu-saṃvatsarada
Chayitra- śu 3 .............................. Nâyakara Bharamaṇṇa-Nâyaga .. tamma mâ ..
pitṛigaḷge ...... vâgabêk endu koṭa (rest illegible).

div.head:
106
At Jênukallu (same hobli), on a vîrakal near the Śaṅkarêśvra temple.
div.p:
Saka-varusha 1225 neya Śôbhakrutu-saṃvatsarada Vayisâkha-ba 1 Guruvâradandu svasti śrîmatu
pratâpa-chakravartti Hoyisaṇa-śrî-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvarasara râjyâbhyudayadalli Hoḷalaker̤ege Kan-
dili-Dêvanu naḍadu bandu śrîmanu-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ maṇḍaḷika maduvara gaṇḍa ........
sûr̤ekâr̤a ...... chakravartti śrî-Mâde-Dêvaraṅge .... padmârâdhakarum appa Kendâri-Dêvarsara
mayduna Basavappanu kâdi geldu sura-lôka-prâptan âdanu yend î-biragalla nuḍida âchâri ........
.. siḷpi .... maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî

div.head:
107
At the same place, on a second vîrakal.
div.p:
svasti śrîmanu-mahâ-pasâyta Râya-Nâyaka Gayika-nâḍa nissaṅka jagadaḷa-maḷḷa Gôva-Bôyi-Nâyaka-
raṅge kaḍada dharmma Sôbhakritu-saṃvatsarada Mâgha-su 10 Bṛihavâradandu Huradahaḷḷi Sani-
Gâvuṇḍanu Sidilaya-Nâyakanavanû Mâdaker̤eya Laka-Hariyayagaḷige Kaḷasu Bannamâra Duḍu-
gaṭṭada Mallaya kaḍisida Abacha-Nâga-Nâkayaru sagake oyidar |

div.head:
108
At Honnênahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone on the tank bund.
div.p:
śubham astu svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1440 neya Bahudhânya-saṃvat-
sarada Chayitra-śu 1 llu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-vîra-Kṛishṇa-
Râya-mahârâyarû pṛithuvî-râjyaṃ geyiüttiralu Kṛishṇa-Râya-mahârâyara pradhânaru Bâgûra Mâ-
rasayanavarige dharmavâgi avara manuśya Vâmarasanû kaṭṭisida ker̤eya jîrṇṇôddhâra maṅgaḷa
mahâ śrî Heggaḍe

div.head:
110
At Bâgûr (Bâgûr hobli), on a stone at the village gate.
div.p: Śrîśaila-Mallikârjjuna-dêvara śrî-pâdavê gati

śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1468 neya Parâbhava-saṃvatsarada dvitîya-Âshâḍha-
śuddha 1 Sômavâradalu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-vîra-Sadâ-
śiva-Râya-mahârâyaru sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ pṛithuvî-râjyaṃ gaiyuttiralu ......... nâvinda-
rige ter̤ige sidhâya biṭṭi birâḍa suṅka taḷavârike yiü-muntâgi sarvamânyav âgi pâlistêv endu Râma-
Râja-ayyanavarige nirûpa goḍalâgi Yar̤e-Kṛishṇappa-Nâyakarige ninna Bâgûra sîmeya nâyindarige
ter̤ige sidhâya biṭi birâḍa suṅka taḷavârike yiü-muntâgi sarvamânyav âgi biṭṭeü biṭṭadake Bâgûra
sîmeya gaüḍa-sênabôva-praje eraḍu-sameyadavaru vopitav âgi nilisida mânya-śâsanake śubham astu
(usual final phrases) ter̤ige biḍisidâta Vijayanagariya Koṇḍôjanu

div.head:
111
On a second stone in the same place.
div.p: Śrîśaila-Mallikârjuna-dêvara śrî-pâdavê gati

śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varushaṃ 1462 neya Śârvari-saṃvatsarada dvitîya-Âsvîja-su-
vijaya 10 yalu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-parmêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa Achyuta-Dêva-Râya-mahâ-
râyaru Vidyânagarav emba mahâ-paṭṭaṇadali pṛithvî-râjyaṃ geyivutta sthiṛa ................
tamma pṛithvî-râjyadoḷage maduveya suṅkava sarvvamânyav âgi pâlisiden emba nirûpadindalû
avara kârya-karttarâda Penuguṇḍeya Vîrappaṇṇ-ayyanavara nirûpadindalû avara tamma Hiriya-
Mallappaṇṇa-ayyanavaru Bâgûra-sîmeya vaḷitada maduveya suṅkava sarvvamânyav âgi biṭṭudake
śubham astu avara kâryyakke karttarâda sîmeya hebâruvaru gavuḍagaḷu sênabôvaru seṭigaḷu paṭaṇa-
svâmigaḷu prajegaḷu Ayivâḷe ubhaya-Nânâ-Dêśi-voḷagâda ........ llaru svâmigaḷu maduveya suṅ-
kava sarvvamânyav âgi biṭṭudake śubham astu (usual final verses) maduveya suṅkava sarvvamân-
yav âgi samastarige binnaha mâḍi biḍisidavaru Dummiya paṭṭaṇa-svâmi Mâḷi-Seṭṭiyara makkaḷu
nâḍa paṭṭaṇa-svâmi Vîre-Seṭaru (usual imprecatory phrases) Vidyânagariya Nâgaṇâchâri baraha śrî

div.head:
112
At the same village, on a stone near the araḷi tree in the tank bed.
div.p:
śubham astu śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1476 neya Ânanda-saṃvatsarada Kârttika-
bahuḷa-pâḍyadallu śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara râjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa Sadâśiva-
Râyaru sukha-râjyavan âḷuttaṃ yiralu Pôtapa-Nâyakayyanavara Kṛishṇappa-Nâyakara kâryakke
karttar âda Viṭhaṇa-Nâyakaru Bâgûra sîmeya pârupatyava mâḍuvâga hor̤a-pêṭheyu khilavâgiral âgi
suṅkada ............................... Nârasiṃhainavaru Viṭhaṇa-Nâyakarige binnahaṃ
mâḍalâgi Liṅgaṇa-gauḍaru (others named) muntâda samasta-prajegaḷanû karasikoṇḍu ..........
geyanu koṭṭu ânambu .. viḍidu î-pêṭhege Er̤a-Kṛushṇappa-Nâyaka-ayyanavara hesarali Krushṇâpurav
endu pratinâmadhêyavaṃ mâḍi pêṭheyanu kaṭṭisi vakkalanu hêḷa.... ra vivara | bandanthâ-vakkalige
vokkalu banda vondu-varusha sarvamânya munde vokkala voḍambaḍikeyalu biṭṭukoṭṭa pramâṇav
allade anubhava mâḍidare nâvu prajegalu pariharisikoḍuvevu (usual imprecatory phrases).

div.head:
113
At the same village, on a stone in the enclosure of the Kêśava temple.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka 1477 neya Râkshasa-saṃvatsarada Puśya-ba .. Âdivâra-
Makara-saṅkrânti-puṇya-kâladalu śrî-vîra-pratâpa-Sadâśiva-Râya-mahârâyara Haḍapada Bomma-
Nâyakara makkaḷu Kṛishṇappa-Nâyakara kâryakke karttarâda Koṇḍa-Râjagaḷu Krushṇapa-Nâyaka-
rige puṇyavâgabêk endu Bhâgyapurada Chenniga-Râyage mâḍida sêve ent endoḍe pûrvadali Gôpaṇṇ-
oḍeyaru mâḍisida sêve Madhureya grâ 1 Araḷihaḷḷi grâ 1 Hâdarikeṭṭeya grâ 1 an[tu] grâma 3 nû aṅga-
raṅga-vaibhôgake biṭadu Krushṇappa-Nâyakaravaru Appamma-Nâyakarû mâḍida sêve Nâgênahaḷḷiya
grâma 1 Kṛishṇâpurada grâ 1 Mûle-vîsada sêve Koṇḍa-Râjagaḷu mâḍida sêve ...... (here follow details
of further grants &c., and usual final phrases) śrî-Chenna-Râya

div.head:
114
On the same stone.
div.p:
Paridhâvi-saṃvatsarada Puśya-śu 12 lu Che ........ pratinâmav âda Krushṇasamudrada grâma-
vanu Er̤e-Kṛishṇappa-Nâyaka.. Sadâśiva-Râyarige puṇyav âgal endu Chenniga-Râyage... Tiruveṅgaḷayya
Śaṭhagôpayya Lakshmaṇaiya yivaru mûvaru Chenniga-Râyana sannidhiyalli nityânusandhâna-tiru-
nakshatra-tiruvadhyânagaḷali.... yavanu mâḍikoṇḍu vondokkalu grâmadalli yidukoṇḍu .... Bâgûralli
yidu pañcha-parva modalâda utsavâdikaṅgaḷalli nâlvar âgi sêve-mâḍi yihadake koṭṭa Baḷuvaḷi-grâma
śubham astu

div.head:
115
On a flooring stone of the raṅga-maṇṭapa of Ammanavara gudi in the same temple.
div.p:
svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varsha 1493 neya Pramôdûta-saṃvatsarada Phâlguṇa-
bahuḷa 1 dalu Santhê-Bennûra Hanuma-Nâyakara maga Râjappa-Nâyakarû tamma tande-tâyige
puṅyavâgabêk endu Lakshmî-dêviyara jîrnôddhâra-pratishṭhe ................................
śubham astu śrî

div.head:
116
On the Garuḍa-kambha in the same temple.
div.p:
śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-vîra-Achchuta-Râya-mahârâyaru
pṛithvî-râjyaṃ geyuttiralu śubham astu svasti jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1452 sanda
Vikṛiti-saṃvatsarada Kârtika-śu 13 Chandravâradallu Ayyapparasayyanavarige puṇyav âgabêk endu
avara kâryakke kartar âda Viśvanâthayyana sêve |

div.head:
118
At the same village, on a stone in front of the Antaragaṭṭamma temple.
div.p: śubham astu

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varsha 1478 neya Râkshasa-saṃvatsarada Chayitra-śu 10
lu śrî-Sadâśiva-Râya-mahârâyaru pṛithvî-râjyaṃ gaiüta iralu Nîrugunda ...... Nâyakara makkaḷu
Kṛishṇappa-Nâya ........ Antaragaṭṭi-Ammana ........ Bhâska .............. l âgi dêvara
........ śâsanada .......... sênabôva .......... svadêśa-prajegaḷu .............. munde
Vîraṇa ........ koṭṭaru (usual final phrases)

div.head:
119
At the same village, on a stone in land No. 70.
div.p:
Yuva-saṃvatsarada Kârttika-śu 1 lû Krushṇa-Râya-mahârâyaru râjyavan âḷuvâga Bâgûra Mallara-
sayanu mâḍista Siṅgara tôpu Mallarasana tôpu adu ......

div.head:
120
At the same village, on a stone near the pond in Râmadâsayya’s grove.
div.p:
śubham astu ǁ svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1445 neya Chitrabhânu-saṃvat-
sarda Srâvaṇa-ba 10 Bu-vâradalu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-
Kṛishṇa-Râya-mahârâyara karaṇika-Prabhukayyana sahôdara Basavappayyanu pṛithvî-râjyaṃ
gaiüttire avarige sakala-sâmbrâjyav âgabêk endu avara boksada kavâyi Timmappanu Kannara-
Seṭṭiya nilisidanu î-dêvastânake Râmagiriya-sîmege saluva Honnagoṇḍanahaḷḷiya grâmavanû sa-
hiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvakadiṃ grâmavanû sarvamanyavâgi koṭṭanthâ grâma (usual final
phrases) maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî

div.head:
121
At Nirugunda (same hobli), on a stone near the Siddêśvara temple.
div.p: ôm...ôm namaś Sivâya śrî

svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-sabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ Dvârâvatî-pura-varâdhîsvaraṃ Yâdava-
kuḷâmbara-dyumaṇi samyaktva-sûtra-chûḍâmaṇi Maleparoḷ gaṇḍa Poysaṇâdy-anêka-nâmâvaḷi-samâ-
ḷaṅkṛita-samêtaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla Vîra-Gaṅga-Hoysaṇa-Dêvar uttarôtara-pravarddhamânam
â-chandrârkka-târam-baraṃ saluttam ire Gaṅgavâḍi-tombhattâr̤u-sâsiramaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-
pratipâḷanaṃ geydu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ gêyvuttam iralu Saka-varushada
* So in the original. 987 neya
Naḷa-saṃvatsrada Puśya-sudha-pañchamî-Bṛihavâra-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrântiyandu samasta-vasumatî-
taḷa-khyâtaṃ Gaṅgânvaya-prasûtaṃ Koṅguḷivarmma dharmma-mahârajâdhirâja vandi-jana-kal̤pa-
bhûja Kôḷâla-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ vîra-Mahêsvaram mada-gajêndra-lâñchhanaṃ viniyôga-kâñchanaṃ
Padumâvatî-dêvî-labdha-vara-prasâda mṛigamadâmôdaṃ nanniya-Gaṅgaṃ jayad-uttaraṅga Gaṅga-
kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ Gaṅ[ga]-Gâṅgêyaṃ kavi-gamaki-vâdi-vâgmi-priyaṃ Śîva-pâdârâdhakaṃ
para-baḷa-sâdhakaṃ gaṇḍa-prachaṇḍaṃ kôdaṇḍa-Pârthaṃ para-baḷa-dhûrttan êkâṅga vîran âhava-
sûra śaraṇâgata-vajra-pañjaraṃ vayiri-dik-kuñjara(m)n âhava-jattalaṭṭaṃ vayiri-gharaṭṭaṃ para-nârî-
sahôdaraṃ vîra-Vṛikôdaraṃ samasta-nâmâvaḷi-samâḷaṅkṛita-samêtaṃ śrîmanu-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ
Gaṅgarasaru Arabalav-eppattumaṃ mêlâḷke-manneya-sahitaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-sishṭa-pratipâḷana-
dind âḷuttam ire |

lg.l: Naṅgali Koṅgu Siṅghamale Râyapuraṃ Taḷakâ ḍu Roddav â- |
Cheṅgiri-vâse Koḷḷagiri Baḷḷare Valluru Chakragoṭṭav U- |

div.p: ant-âtan-agra-tanûja-Narasiṅgha-bhûpâḷakaṃ |

lg.l: dêvaś śrî-Narasiṅgha-bhûpatir asau jîyât sthiraṃ bhûtaḷê ǁ
Narasiṃhaṃ bhûmipâḷaṃ sthira-...... lakshmî-vallabhaṃ Hoysaḷêsaṃ ǁ

div.p: âtana tanayana tôḷ-valav ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: jâḷiyoḷ irdda paṅgaḷane paṇṇ enal ammade kâi kâyi Bal- |
lâḷa-nṛipâḷa yembudane hambaḷis irddudu vairi-saṅkuḷaṃ ǁ

div.p:
ant enisida śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Taḷakâḍu-Gaṅgavâḍi-Noṇambavâḍi-Banavase-Hânuṅgalu-
koṇḍa bhuja-baḷa Vîra Gaṅgan asahâya-sûraṃ Sanivâra-siddhi Giridurgga-malla chalad-aṅka-Râma
nissaṅka-pratâpa Hoyisaṇa-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvaru Gaṅgavâḍi 96000 sâsiramumaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-
śishṭa-pratipâḷanaṃ geydu Dôrasamudrada nelevîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam
ire ǁ svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêsvaraṃ Yâdava-
kuḷâmbara-dyumaṇi sarvajña-chûḍâmaṇi Malerâja-râja Malaparoḷu gaṇḍa gaṇḍa-bhêruṇḍa kadana-
prachaṇḍan asahâya-sûran êkâṅga-vîra Sanivâra-siddhi Giridurg ga-malla chalad-aṅka-Râma vairîbha-
kaṇṭhîrava Magara-râjya-nirmmûḷa Pâṇḍya-disâpaṭṭa Chôḷu-râjya-pratishṭhâchâryya niśśaṅka-
pratâpa-chakravartti Hoyisaṇa-bhuja-baḷa-vîra-Sômêśvara-Dêvaru sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ
geyvuttam ire ǁ tat-pâdârâdhakaṃ śrîman-Nirugundada Chaṭayya-Nâyakana pratâpam ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: uḍiguṃ siṅghada dâḍeyaṃ chiṭil enal saṅkruddha-nâgêndranaṃ |
poḍeguṃ dôpene mêre dappi kavitarpp ambhôdhiyaṃ kôpadiṃ |
kuḍiguṃ sur̤rane nôḍe nâḍe muḷisiṃ mârânta .......... mâr |

div.p: ant avara pâdârâdhakar appa ǁ

lg.l: Dhanadana saman enisida sam- | pattina Dêvâṇḍa-Śeṭṭiy embaṃ jagadoḷ |
Manu-nîti-mârggan enisida | Vanaruhasambhavana jânuvind udayisida ǁ
â-Dêvi-Seṭṭig ant â- | sudatî-ratnav enipa Bemmalâṅganegaṃ band |
udayâdrîśaṃ .. dayisum | uditârkana ter̤ade Nallan udayaṅ-geydaṃ ǁ

div.p: âtana guṇônnatiy ent endaḍe ǁ

lg.l: surataru têjadoḷ dinapan unnatiyoḷ Kanakâchaḷaṃ gaḷâ- |
pariṇatiyoḷ Sarôjabhavan indo .... ge dharitri baṇṇikuṃ |
... kavuṃ kûḍe........ indu ruchiyiṃ traiḷôkyamaṃ parvve tâṃ |
baram â .. ent adu bêḍa nôḍe pusiyiṃ Ballâḷa-Seṭṭi-prabhû- |
vara-kîrt .. late parvvi ... dhare diśâ-kûpântarôpântamaṃ ǁ
d oḍeda taṭâkav irddaḍam anâthar anâśrita-viprar irddaḍaṃ |
taḍeyade koṭṭu kaṭṭi ner̤e nirmmisi lôkadoḷ îgal îtan .. |
Oḍeger̤e-mallan emba pesar âdudu Nallanoḷ î-dharitriyoḷ ǁ
varan ene sanda Lakshmig eṇey â-Masaṇa ...... ryyey âdaḍ î- |
vara nidhi Dêpan agra-tanayaṃ gaḍa Dêvam âkege tamman âdan î- |
dhareyoḷu Nalle-Seṭṭiy enal âkeya nômpiy ad êṃ vichitramô ǁ
rûpaṃ ner̤e nôrppa darppaṇaṃ negaḷd irddaṃ ǁ
jaḷadhiya guṇpu Gujja-Goravaṅge karâgradoḷ eydidad ondu mu- |
.. ḷigene Mêru-Mandara .. biṇp enit irppaḍe munna yorvva-gô- |
vaḷigana kaygey ôdud ene Dêpana guṇpuman unnatikkeyaṃ |
jaḷadhiyan-â-dharâdharada guṇpuma tiṇpuman entu pôlipeṃ ǁ

div.p:
svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâna-japa-samâdhi-sîla-guṇa-sampannar
appa ...... rmma-jîyagevu yibbaru Chaṭṭaya-Nâyaka kâlaṃ toḷadu dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭa
dattiy entendaḍe śrî-Siddhanâtha-dêvar-aṅga-bhôgakkaṃ snâna-nivêdyakkaṃ Chaitra-pavitrârôpaṇa-
kkaṃ jîrṇṇôddhârakkav âgi biṭṭa datti (specified) Kalyâṇi-jîyaṅgeu Mâḷe-jîyaṅgeu Nalli-jîyaṅgeu
mûvarige Nalle-Seṭṭiyaru jîrṇṇôddhârava mâḍisi kâlaṃ toḷadu dhârâ-pûrvvakavâgi śrî-Siddha-
nâtha-dêvarige pâtra-pâuḷa-bhôgakkaṃ mâḍi biṭṭa datti (specified) sarvvajña-vîra-Sômêśvara-Dê-
varu Nirugundada mûla-svâmi Gaṅgêsvara-dêvarigevu Siddhanâtha-dêvarigeu agrahârava mâḍu-
valli dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭa vṛitti ondu ǁ teṅkaṇa Ayyâvaḷe end enisida Nirugundada Nalle-
Seṭṭi-mukhyavâda samasta-nakhara-mummuri-daṇḍaṅgaḷu Siddhanâtha-dêvarigeu Gaṅgêśvara-dêva-
rigeu koṭṭa santheya âya (here follow details, and usual final phrases and verses) śrî-Siddhanâtha ....

svasti śri Vibhava-saṃvatsarada Bhâdrapada-śu 13 Maṃ | śrîmat-pratâpa-chakravartti Hoyisaṇa-
śrî-vîra-Narasiṃha-Dêvarasaru Nirugundada Siddhanâtha-dêvara stânika Nalla-jîyana maga Siddha-
jîyanu svarggastanâgalu â-stâna tavuḍi âgalu paṭṭa-maha-deviyara maga Chôḷayyaṅgeuṃ âtana maga-
Viśamanâtha ...... rugaḷa vaḷagâda gaṇḍu-makkaḷu heṇṇu-makkaḷu ............ â-Siddhanâtha-
dêvara sthâna .. â-vṛi ...... ashṭa-bhôga-têja-sâmya-sahita saluvantâgi tatu-kâlôchita-kraya ga 32
ranu ........ â-Siddhanâtha-dêvara śilâ-śâsanadalu hinde Siddha-jîya-muntâda sthânikarugaḷa
hesariddaḍeṃ ............ â-Nirugundada mahâjanaṅgaḷa ................ stânikara ... dêvara
â-gaṇaṅgaḷa mundevuṃ â-mahâjanaṅgaḷige binnavattaḷeya tanda arasâḷu Mâdeyyaṃ Ballayyaṃ (rest
gone).

div.head:
123
At the same village, on a stone in front of the Channa-Kêśava temple.
div.p:
śrî-Chenna-Kêśavanê gati
* In Nâgarî characters.

lg.l: datvÂnanda-nidhiṃ dvijân dhanadayan âmôdayan Mâdhavaṃ ǁ
kshmâpÂnanda-nidhêr navâpi nidhayaḥ kiṃ tê labhantê tulâṃ ǁ

div.head:
124
At Chikka-Yagaṭe (same hobli), on a stone to the east of the Îśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara Yâdava-
kulâmbara-dyumaṇi samyaktva-chûḍâmaṇi Malerâja-râja Malaparoḷu gaṇḍa kadana-prachaṇḍan asa-
hâya-śûran êkâṅga-vîra Sanivâra-siddhi Giridurgga-malla chalad-aṅka-Rama nissaṅka-malla Hoyi-
saṇa-pratâpa-chakravartti Dôrasamudrada nelevîḍinalu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam
ire ǁ

lg.l: Chôḷana jûbu Mâḷavana goḷmuri Chêran-aṭṭi-timba mâ- |
kâḷi Varâḷanaṃ tuḷiva gandha-gajaṃ Khachan-aḷḷey-ambu Nê- |

div.p: (24 lines are effaced)
âtana mahimônnatiy entendoḍe ǁ

lg.l: rûpan ner̤e nôrppa darppaṇaṃ negaḷd irddaṃ ǁ
jaḷadhiya guṇpu Gujja-Goravaṅge karâgradoḷ eydid ondu mu- |
vaḷigana kaigey ôdud ene .... guṇpuman unnatikeyaṃ |
jaḷadhiyan â-dharâdharada gnṇpuma guṇpuma tiṇpuman entu pôlipeṃ ǁ
dhareyoḷu Nalle-Seṭṭiya tanûjeye Dêviye tîrtthav allave ǁ
vara-guṇi Baychan endaḍ avanaṃ ner̤e baṇṇipar âr dharitriyoḷ ǁ

div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvana-vikhyâta-pañcha-śata-vîra-śâsanarum appa śrîmad-Ayyâvaḷeya ayinûrva-
svâmigaḷa mummuri-daṇḍaṅgaḷolage Noṇambavâḍi-nâḍa-śirômaṇi Vuchchaṅgiya maḷigey-adhishṭâya-
kara appa ...... Seṭṭiya magaṃ Ballâḷa-Nalli-Seṭṭiyaru Hoyisaṇa-nâḍa Arabala-eppattara baḷiya
bâḍaṃ Ekkaṭṭiyalu tamm ayyana hesara Dêmêsvarâyatanamaṃ nirmmisi ǁ

lg.l: Dêvaṇanaṃ Nallan emba yirbbar ttaneyar ǁ

div.p:
â-Viśvanâtha-gurugaḷa pâda-prakshâḷanaṃ mâḍi Saka-varśada
* So in the original. 1116 neya Vibhava-saṃvatsarada
Vaiśâkha-śu .. Sômavâradandu Nalla-Seṭṭiyaru Dêmêsvara-dêvargge aṅga-raṅga-bhôgakkaṃ khaṇḍa-
sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhârakkaṃ nandâdîvige-Chaitra-pavitrârôpaṇakkaṃ tapôdhanar-âhâra-dânakkaṃ
vidyârttigaḷa asanâchhâdanakkaṃ pûjâri .. dhavaśi.. rigaṃ enisuṃ kundade naḍasuvant âgi dhârâ-
pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭa bhümi bhûmi (here follow details of gift, and usual final phrases and verses) .....
nig illa posa-muttugaḷo ............... Dêpa bereda posa .......int î-śâsanaṃ kaṇḍarisidaṃ
rûvari ...

div.head:
125
At Kallakere (same hobli), on a stone to the north of the Hanumanta temple.
div.p:
śubham astu svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varuśa 1457 neya vartamâna-Jaya-saṃvatsa-
rada Mâgha-ba 14 Śivarâtri-puṇya-kâladalu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâ-
pa śrî-vîra-Achuta-Râyana karaṇîku Tiragarasaru Banada-Chauḍêśvariya amṛitapaḍige koṭa Kalake-
r̤eya dharmma-śâsanada kramav ent endare Achyuta-Râya-mahârâyarige anêka-râjyâbhyudayav
âgabêk endu Jayakâr̤a-Râmapayana mâgaṇige saluva Bûdihâḷa-sîmeya vaḷagaṇa Kallaker̤eya-
grâmavanu hiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvakavâgi â-Kallaker̤eya-grâmada gade-bedale-suṅka-uṇḍige-
muntâgi śrî-Banada-Chauḍêśvariya amṛitapaḍige Kallaker̤eya-grâmavanu koṭevâgi â-grâmada
chaumûlege saluva-gadde-bedalanu nâvu Achyuta-Râya-mahârâyarige sakalâbhyudayav âgabêk endu
âtana maneya Jayakâr̤a-Râmappayana kayya Kalaker̤eyanu nâü tri-vâchâ Banada-Chaüḍêśvarige
koṭṭa dharmma-śâsana śrî (usual final phrases).

div.head:
126
At Ballâḷasamudra (same hobli), on a stone in Nâraṇâchârya’s wet land.
div.p:
śubham astu ǁ Âṅgîrasa-saṃvatsarada Chayi .. śu 1 lu śrîmatu kerê-kôḍi ....... Vîraṇa-gauḍanu
Chiga-Hanagaina Râmayyanu Mahantayyanu saha | vaḍuva kaṭisida bage koḍagi hâkikoṭṭa-kramav
ent endare | Mogala-Pâchhâ-Sâhêbara âḷikeyali Ballâḷasamudrada jâgîradâra Abdul-Sâhêbara bage
muñjumujara Veṅkaṭarâya havâladâra Miyâ-Khâna-Bâvâ gariba-nâḍiga Veṅkaṭagiriyappa saha |
prâku kerê-kôḍi-vaḍadu-yiddali Gauḍa-Rêvaṇṇa Chiga-Halagaina Râmaiyya Mahanteyya mûru-mandi
yî-kerê-kôḍi vaḍuva kaṭṭisalâgi koḍagi hâkikoṭṭadu (here follow details).

div.head:
127
At the same village, on a stone below the Garuḍa-kambha of the Kêśava temple.

lg.l: yâvach chandraś cha sûryaś cha yâvat tishṭhati mêdinî |
yâvad Râma-kathâ lôkê tâvad râjyaṃ Vibhîshaṇa ǁ
vandê sadâ Dâśarathaṃ cha Râmaṃ ǁ

div.p:
adya-tithi-mârttaṇḍa-maṇḍalôdayâd upari Prabhava-saṃvatsarada Chayitra-su 1 Gu sanda Śaka-
varushaṅgaḷu 1308 hindake sanda Kali-yuga-gatâbdaṅgaḷu 4488 Ballâḷasamudrada Kêśava-dêvara
dêvâlyada kalu-gelasa dîpamâleya kalu-kambha pratishṭhe mâḍida-dina pûrvva-paśchima-samudrâ-
dhipati śrî-vîra-Harihara-Râyanu pṛithvî-râjyava mâḍutt iralikkâgi avara maneya manneyaru Châ-
ḷuki Nârâyaṇa Châḷuki chakravartti śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara ant-yambara gaṇda gaja-daḷa-bibhâ-
ḍa Mali-Dêviya Vîra-Dêvarasara kumâra Vallabha-Râya-mahârâjara dharmmadali avara nirûpadiṃ
avara manushya Peddarasanu mâḍisidanu â-Vîra-Dêvarâjarige darmma siddisabêk endu mâḍida
dharmma Kêśava-dêvarige amṛita-paḍige saluva gadde (here follow details) yîshṭanû â-chandrâr-
kka dêvara amṛita-paḍige saluvadakke koṭṭa bhûmi yî-dharmmaü sûryya-chandramassugaḷu uḷḷa â-
yîshṭu-kâlavû naḍavudu (usual final phrases and verses) yî-kelasava mâḍida Sirigiri ...... châryyaṅge
arasugaḷuṃ gaüḍu-prajegaḷuṃ oḍambaṭṭu koṭṭadum eṇṭu-koḷaga yand-endigeü salisuvevu âva âva
arasugaḷu bandareü yî-dharmmakke sahâyavâgi pâlisuvaru maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî.

div.head:
128
At Âladahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone in the lane near the village gate.
div.p:
............................. jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana ... ruśa 1438 neya Yuva-saṃvatsarada
Kârtika-śu ....... Kṛishṇa-Râya-mahârâyarige dharmmav âgabêk endu Mallikârjuna-dêvara chatra-
dharma ....... makkaḷu Bâgûra Mallarasaru koṭa grâma-bhû-dâna-śâsanada paṭṭeya kramav ent
endare śrî-...... śrî-Kṛishṇa-Râyarige dharmav âgabêk endu Muḷavâgila Nâgarasara makkaḷu
Bâgûra Mallarasaru śrî-Mallikârjuna-dêvara chartada .... haḷiya grâmavanu koṭevâgi â-grâmake
saluva nidhi-nikshêpa-jala-pâśâṇa ...... âgâmi-siddha-sâdhya-ashṭa-bhôga-têjas-svâmya-yênuḷa-
sakala ...... anubhavisikoṇḍn śrî-vîra-pratâpa-śrî-vîra-Kṛishṇa-Râya-mahârâyarige ... bêk endu
Muḷavâgila-Nâgarasara makkaḷu Mallarasaru dâna-dharma-pû ...... Âlahaḷiya-grâmavanu śrî-Malli-
kârjuna-dêvara chhatrada..... anubhavisi kombiri endu koṭṭa dharmma-śâsana hâgendu koṭṭa śâsana
(usual final verses) ... Âladahaḷiya-grâmavanu śrî-Mallikârjuna-dêvarige koṭṭa ..

div.head:
130
At Maḷali (same hobli), on a vîrakal to the south of the Îśvara temple.
div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêsvaraṃ Dvârâvatî-pura-
varâdhîsvaraṃ Yâdava-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Hoyisaḷa-vîra-śrî-Nârasiṃha-Dêvaru Gaṅgavâḍi-tombhattar̤u-
sâyira Noḷambavâḍi-mûvattitsâyiravaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâlanaṃ mâḍi Dôrasamudrada
nelevîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyvuttam ire Śaka-varsha
* Looks so in the original : but it should be 1148. 1000 paṭṭaṃ gaṭṭida 6
neya Pârtthiva-saṃvatsarada Mâgha-su 5 Âdityavâradandu śrî-Kêśavapuravâda Maṇaliya Chika-
Gauḍana maga Mâcha-Gauḍa (others named) tamm anibaruṃ .. yalu kâdi sattavara dêva-kanneyaru
puspaka-vimânavan êr̤isi uttama-svarga Kaiḷâsa-pura-padam â-Mâhêsvarana śrî-padavaṃ kâṇisi vîrâsa-
nadal irisidaru Mâdi-Gauḍana parôksha-vinayake ettida bîra-galiṅgôsugaṃ śrî-Kali-dêvara upahâra-
ke Kala-Gauḍa .... gauḍ-umbaḷiya .............. saṅkramâṇadali dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭa
beddal ere ayguḷamaṃ biṭṭaru maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî ǁ

div.head:
131
At the same place, on a second vîrakal.
div.p:
svasti śrîmatu pratâpa-chakravarti Hoyisaṇa-śrî-vîra-Sômêśvara-Dêvarasaru sukhadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyu-
tt ire ǁ Hêmaṇambi-saṃvatsarada Âsâḍa-su 15 .. ǁ ...... mâdi-bôvana maga .......... Bôganu
Maṇaliya tur̤uvanu Mâvinahaḷiya Mâdaya .... yahaḷiya Maleya-Nâyakanavaru tur̤uva koṇḍu hôhali
â-Jaka-bôvanu ....... svarga-lôka-prâptiy âdanu .... lla pratishṭheyanu........ ya Mâra-bôva mâ-
ḍida maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî ǁ

div.head:
132
At the same village, on copper plates in possession of Jôḍidâr Râma-bhaṭṭa.
div.p: (Nâgarî characters)
(Corresponds almost with No. 94 above, as far as ‘dushṭa-śârddûla-marddanaḥ’ in line 65).

lg.l: Aṅga-Vaṅga-Kaḷiṅgâdyair râjabhis sêvyatê cha yaḥ ǁ
â pûrvâdrêr athâsta-kshitidhara-kaṭakâd â cha Hêmâchalântâd
â Sêtôr arthi-sârtha-śriyam iha bahaḷîkṛitya kîrtyâ babhâsê ǁ
divâ cha sâyaṃ kumudair virundhê ǁ
madaṃ manasi mârutaṃ sithilayaty amêyai rayaiḥ
ajîjanad iti krudhâ kimu viśôshayaty ambudhiṃ
dânâni shôḍaśa bahûni kṛitâni yêna ǁ
yad-dânâmbu-ghanâmbur ambudhir ahô pûrṇas samudyôtatê ǁ
Aṅgênâpi Kaḷiṅgêna Va .. na cha parair nṛipaiḥ |
jaya jîva mahârâyêty aniśaṃ gîyatê cha yaḥ ǁ
pañchâśatâ cha saṃyuktaiḥ pañchâbhyadhikayâ kramât ǁ

div.p: (here follow names of boundary villages).

lg.l: vâpî-kûpa-taṭâkaiś cha kachchhârâmaiś cha saṃyutaṃ ǁ
vividhair vibudhaiś śrauta-pathikair adhikair girâ ǁ

div.p: (here follow names and other details of vṛittidârs).

lg.l: abhâṇîn mṛidu-sandarbhaṃ tad idaṃ tâmra-śâsanaṃ ǁ

div.p: (usual final verses).
śrî-Virûpâksha (in Kanarese).

div.head:
135
At Ballakere (same hobli), on a vîrakal in Nañjuṇḍayya’s field.
div.p:
śrîmatu Saka-nṛipa-kâḷâtîta-saṃvatsara-sataṅgaḷ eṇṭu-nûr̤-eṇbhatta-nâlkaneya Dundubhi-saṃva ....
da Śrâvaṇa-mâsada pañchamî-Bṛiha .... dandu Kâduvaṭṭi Jagatuṅga-gâvuṇḍana tamma kâdi
sura-lôka ........

div.head:
136
At Honnekere (same hobli), on a stone near the Kallêśvara temple.
div.p: svasti samasta

lg.l: aḷaviyoḷ erddu pâyda puliyam muni hoy seḷeyinda tat-kshaṇaṃ |
seḷeyoḷ aḍarttu poyye seḷeyaṃ negapalk atichitrav âdud â- |
seḷe-koneyalli nêlva puliy ettida sindam enalke kîrttiyaṃ |
taḷarda Saḷaṅge Poysaṇa-yasa prakaṭîkṛitav âytu lôkadoḷ ǁ
dyô .. ṃ śrî-Narasihva-Râyan ivariṃ śrî-vîra-Sômêśvaraṃ ǁ
â-nṛipar âna .. di bharadi yeḷe-mukhak iḷiyal |
ê-vidhiy end aḷki naḍuguvar bhûpâḷar ǁ

div.p:
svasti samasta-bhuvanâsrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ ...śrî-vîrâvatâraṃ paramês-
varaṃ parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ Yâdava-kuḷâmbara-dyumaṇi sarvvajña-chûḍâmaṇi Malerâja-râja Malapa-
roḷu gaṇḍa gaṇḍa-bhêruṇḍa kadana-prachaṇḍan asahâya-śûra êkâṅgi-vîra Sanivâra-siddhi Giri-
durgga-malla chalad-aṅka-Râma vairîbha-kaṇṭhîrava Adiyamana Yama ...... Kâñchî-kâñchana
Chôḷa-Râya-stâpanâchâryya Pâṇḍya-Râya-pratishṭâchâryya Magara-Râya-nirmmûḷa Châḷukya-kuḷôd-
bhavarum appa Hoyisaṇa-śrî-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvarasaru .. Mâdigi-Dêva-daṇṇaykaru Dôrasamudrada-
neleviḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire ǁ svasti yama-niya[ma]-svâdhyâya-
dhyâna-dhâraṇa-mauna-anushṭhâna-japa-tapa-samâdhi-sîla-guṇa-sampannaruṃ aupâsanâgnihôtra-
dvija-guru-dêvatâ-pûjâ-tatpararuṃ Mârkkaṇḍôjvaḷa-kîrtaruṃ yajana-yâjana-adhyana-adhyâpana-dâna-
pratigraha-shaṭ-karma-nirataruṃ Rig-Yajus-Sâma-Atharbbaṇa-vêda-vêdânta-Prâbhâkara-pravîṇa-gu-
ṇa-sampannarum enisida śrîmat-sarbba-namasyada mahâgrahâraṃ śrîmad-Udubhava-Sômanâthapurav
âda Nirugundada śrîmatu yinnûr̤-ippattu-mahâjanaṅ[ga]ḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyut-
tam ire ǁ Gaṅgavâḍi-tombhattâr̤u-sâviradoḷagaṇa Arabal-eppattar̤oḷage prathama-sthaḷa Honneya-
ker̤eya gauḍagaḷa kîrtti-prabhâva(ne)m ent endaḍe ǁ râya-dûsakara gaṇḍa mâvan-aṅkakâr̤a mar̤ey-
okkara kâvaru ǁ

lg.l:
Sôma
* So in the original. Himâbdhig unnata |

div.p:
Honneyaker̤eya śrî-Prasanna-Mallinâtha-dêvara divya-śrî-pâda-padmârâdhakaru śrî-guru-charaṇa-
karu[ṇa]dind udbhavisida Honneyakeṛeya maha-maneya Sôma-gauḍana arddhâṅgi-lakshmi Lakha-gau-
ḍiya udaradalli janiyisida guru-bhakta-niruta satya-Mahêsvara Siva-pâda-sêkhararum appa Malli-
gauḍa mâḍida dharmma ǁ Śaka-varsha 1228 neya Parâbhava-saṃvatsarada Pushya-bahuḷa 5 mî-
Sômavâradalu Makara-saṅkrântiyalu śrî-Prasanna-Mallinâtha-dêvarige aṅga-bhôgakkaṃ raṅga-bhô-
gakkaṃ amṛitapaḍigaṃ dhûpa-dîpa-naivêdyadkaṃ nandâ-dîvigegaṃ biṭṭa datti (here follow details
of this and other gifts, and usual final verses.) śrî-Prasanna-Mallinâtha-dêvara śâsanava barada âchâri
Yêchôjana maga Sidôja-Sômôjaṅgaḷige maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî

div.head:
137
On the same stone.
div.p:
Parâbhava-saṃvatsa[ra]da Âsvayija-suddha 11 Sômâradalu svasti samasta-bhuvana-vikhyâta-pañcha-
sata-vîra-sâsana-labdhânêka-guṇa-gaṇâ[la]ṅkrita satya-saucha-châru-châritra-naya-vinaya-vijñâna vî-
râvatâra Vîra-Baṇañju-sameya-dharmma-pratipâḷakarum app Arabal-eppattar̤a Seṭṭi-guttaru paṭṭaṇa-
svâmi-gavuḍu-stânikaru halaru hadineṇṭu-sameyaṅgaḷu koṭṭa sâsana-kramav ent endaḍe Honneya-
ker̤eya Mâra-gavuṇḍaṅge nâḍa-heggaḍetanavaṃ koṭṭevu 40 vûriṅge vond-on[du] paṇa 30 vûriṅge aḍa
aḍa santey-âya-muntâgi koṭṭevu yint-appudakke nâḍa sva-hastad oppa śrî-Gavar̤êsvara ǁ śrî-Pra-
sanna-Mallinâtha-dêvarige heggaḍe-Mâra-gavu[ḍa]nu dîpâḷigeyali dîptige pa 1 r̤a yeṇṇeyanu
varshaṃ-prati naḍasuvanu śrî śrî

div.head:
141
At Chikka-Jâjûr (Baramaṇṇanâyakandurga hobli), on a stone in the Îśvara temple west of the village.
div.p:
śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ | śubham astu śrî-Sadâśivâya namaḥ svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-
śaka-varuśaṅgaḷu sâ 1586 neya Krôdhi-saṃvatsarada Vayiśâkha-sudha 3 Sômavâradallû | śrîmatu
Jâjûra staḷada gavuḍugaḷû Lôkarasa-gaüḍana maga Râmaṇa-gauḍana maga Puṭṭappaya (others
named) muntâdavarû nâü namma strî-putra-jñâti-dâyâdya-sâvantânumatadiṃ namma avasara-nimit-
yavâgi Hâlattihâḷa Basavaṇṇana pûjâri pañcha-maṭha ......maga Guruvaṇṇanavarige kraya-patravâgi
sale mârâgi koṭa vivara Jâjûru-grâma 1 Kôṭehâḷa-grâma 1 ubhayaṃ yî-yaraḍu-grâmada gauḍikênu
sale mârâgi koṇḍa kraya ga 200 yinnûru-varaha aksharadallû yi(ve)nûru-varaha niü nimma putra-
pautra(ṃ)-parampareyâge â-chandrârka-sthâyigaḷâgi anubhavisi yirriy endu koṭa patra-sâsana (here
follow names of witnesses).
